channel.title: Indie on Game Vibe
channel.description: Recent content in Indie on Game Vibe

item.title: Realm Racer
item.description: Game Description Realm Racer is an arcade racing project, the main goal of which is to find the ideal trajectory to achieve the maximum number of points. The process of passing is complicated by extraordinary routes that run through many eras and various biomes. The key element of the gameplay is a constantly running engine, which completely eliminates the possibility of stopping. Navigating through locations requires sharp reactions and skill to overcome all physical obstacles on the way to the finish line.

item.title: Noosphere
item.description: Game Description Noosphere is a psychological detective story whose central mechanic is to penetrate the minds of other people to unravel a complex mystery. A key aspect of the entire process is the constant movement between physical reality and the mental worlds of the characters encountered. Despite their superficial similarities, these dimensions have unique structures and contain completely different clues. The process of solving puzzles is entirely built on the careful comparison of numerous inconsistencies between two planes of existence.

item.title: Wreckborn
item.description: Game Description Wreckborn is a methodical confrontation with space pirates, requiring gamers not only to have combat skills, but also to strategically plan. Collisions in airless space take place using laser and missile weapons, and the arsenal includes both maneuverable fighters and heavy frigates. The gradually increasing aggression of the enemy forces us to constantly improve our defensive lines, because any gap in the defense can lead to catastrophic consequences. Successful resistance directly depends on a developed industrial infrastructure, which provides access to advanced technologies and new ship models.

item.title: Japan Stigmatized Property 2
item.description: Game Description Japan Stigmatized Property 2 is a surveillance simulator in which the main goal is to meticulously search for anomalies in Japanese properties with a bad reputation. The protagonist needs to hold out until 5 am, tracking any deviations from the norm through camera lenses. The success of the mission depends on attentiveness: missing a significant number of paranormal events or an excessive number of false alarms inevitably leads to failure.

item.title: The Last Ninja Collection + Bonus Games
item.description: Game Description The Last Ninja Collection and Bonus Games - the final confrontation between the ninja Armakuni and the sinister shogun Kunitoki takes place within the walls of an ancient Tibetan temple. The path to the main enemy runs through five halls, each of which is subordinate to its own element. Overcoming these challenges requires not only combat skills, but also ingenuity to solve puzzles and find sacred scrolls. The combat system rewards skill through Bushido mechanics, increasing the effectiveness of a warrior fighting unarmed or using the same type of weapon as his opponent.

item.title: The Ogre King
item.description: Game Description The Ogre King, which explores the tragic story of a one-eyed ogre, offers dynamic combat in a 3D world with roguelike elements. Each chapter of the adventure consists of several combat stages, culminating in a confrontation with a powerful boss. The process of strengthening your character is based on collecting weapons and armor, creating useful potions and gradually unlocking new abilities. Even defeat does not lead to a complete loss of what has been achieved, since the accumulated experience and learned skills are preserved.

item.title: Raiders of Blackveil
item.description: Game Description Raiders of Blackveil is a hybrid action role-playing game, the gameplay of which is based on tactical battles and team interaction in a group of up to 3 people. The combat system requires gamers not to use skills chaotically, but to accurately position and competently manage abilities with recovery time. The process of clearing locations is reminiscent of competitive arenas, where success depends on a combination of attacks and the timely use of skills.

item.title: Alchemy Factory
item.description: Game Description Alchemy Factory is a large-scale project that turns the mystical art of alchemy into a well-functioning production mechanism. A novice adept of magical sciences comes under the control of the gamer, who will have to go from a modest shop owner to the head of an entire industrial empire. The company specializes in the creation of potions, metal processing and jewelry making. The main goal is to transform manual labor into a completely self-sufficient system, operating with virtually no intervention, where all processes from grinding herbs to transmuting ore into the Philosopher’s Stone are performed automatically.

item.title: Memory Keeper
item.description: Game Description Memory Keeper is an interior design simulator whose main goal is to preserve the warmest moments of the past. The project provides a personal digital space for creativity, allowing you to materialize cherished memories, be it the sun-drenched living room of your first apartment or a cozy corner in your grandmother’s house. The whole process is focused on relaxation and creation. There are absolutely no restrictions, tasks or rushes, allowing you to completely immerse yourself in decorating your ideal rooms.

item.title: Military Logistics Simulator
item.description: Game Description Military Logistics Simulator is a first-person simulator dedicated to managing the complex support mechanisms of modern armies. The project proposes to concentrate not on front-line battles, but on rear operations, on which the outcome of any armed conflict depends. Players will have to go through professional growth from an ordinary supply chain to an experienced quartermaster, taking full responsibility for organizing and protecting supply chains in hostile territory. The main goal is not the destruction of the enemy, but the systematic restoration of the war-torn region, including the rescue of the surviving population and the revival of critical infrastructure.

item.title: Eternity Egg
item.description: Game Description Eternity Egg is a chaotic action-adventure platformer with a concept that harkens back to the 3D gaming era of the mid-90s. The visual component of the project deliberately uses stylized polygonal graphics with characteristic shiny surfaces, creating a distinctive and recognizable retro image. This bizarre world is inhabited by grotesque and sometimes awkward creatures, whose appearance perfectly complements the overall atmosphere of a surreal and unpredictable journey. An integral part of this experience is the high-energy electronic trance soundtrack, which sets a fast-paced and intense rhythm to everything that happens.

item.title: I Sell Lemonade
item.description: Game Description I Sell Lemonade is a story about a 1980s summer spent on the sidewalk with a pitcher of soft drink. At the center of the story is a 10-year-old child who, after his father sells his gaming console, is forced to look for something to do on the street. An activity initially conceived as a way to pass the time gradually turns into an extended journey through childhood experiences, friendships and character formation.

item.title: The Cradle
item.description: Game Description The Cradle is a horror film with a psychological bent, the narrative of which revolves around a reporter’s investigation into the tragedy that unfolded within the walls of the Synergy Soft corporation. The main character named Alex needs to make a foray into an abandoned office complex to establish the true motives for the brutal massacre that occurred six months earlier. According to the official interpretation, the incident was caused by a collective clouding of reason, but the reality turns out to be much more frightening.

item.title: Anxiety Puppy
item.description: Game Description Anxiety Puppy is an interactive story that focuses on coming to terms with your inner state. At the center of the plot is an unusual metaphor, where anxiety takes on a physical embodiment in the form of a small puppy. This approach turns a complex psychological topic into a touching fairy tale for adults. The project is made in the original style of an illustrated book, and the entire visual range is made by hand.

item.title: Bits and Bops
item.description: Game Description Bits and Bops is a collection of original rhythm challenges, with each challenge featuring its own soundtrack and unique characters. The gameplay involves hammering nails to the beat, capturing a photo of a rare sea creature, or synchronizing jumping on a handcar as mole miners to keep it moving. Other tasks include pairs skating on ice, where you have to match your partner’s movements to avoid falling, or hitting coins thrown by a monkey to aim them accurately at a suitcase.

item.title: Boxing Simulator
item.description: Game Description Boxing Simulator is a complex project that combines elements of a sports manager and a fighting game. The basis of the gameplay is the creation and development of your own training room, which includes the purchase of a variety of equipment, from boxing rings to weight training equipment. Management also involves recruiting new athletes every day, each with a unique set of characteristics such as health, strength and speed.

item.title: Cozyrama
item.description: Game Description Cozyrama is a meditative sandbox, the main goal of which is to create and arrange magical 3D dioramas. The creative process begins with a blank canvas, gradually turning into the creation of miniature worlds filled with life. The initially empty stage is transformed into whimsical locations with flowering plants, glowing lanterns and tiny animals roaming everywhere. The visual design is made in a stylized manner, giving each corner a special atmosphere of comfort and warmth.

item.title: Dunjungle
item.description: Game Description Dunjungle is a 2D game where gamers take on the role of a monkey tasked with protecting the jungle from a corrupting force. The gameplay is a mixture of exploration, combat and survival. Each dungeon that users encounter transforms with each playthrough, creating a unique experience every time. Such a dynamic environment forces gamers to be on alert. One moment you might be faced with a swarm of unusual enemies, and the next you might find yourself walking through treacherous traps.

item.title: Express No. 6
item.description: Game Description Express No 6 is an intense psychological horror where the main task is survival in the confined space of a moving train. Events take place on New Year’s Eve, and only 30 minutes of real time are allotted for rescue. The protagonist, being an ordinary passenger, finds himself in the midst of terrible incidents. His main mission is to urgently stop the train and save his own life. An unusual camera becomes a key tool for understanding what is happening.

item.title: Mamon King
item.description: Game Description Mamon King is a creature breeding simulator where the tactical depth of confrontations is determined by the unique abilities of each monster. Turn-based duels in the 1v1 format are built on a team basis, where the timely use of skills decides the outcome of the match. Activating skills requires the expenditure of special energy, and the use of the most powerful techniques can require serious sacrifices from the creatures, which adds an element of calculated risk to battles.

item.title: Mutant Football League 2
item.description: Game Description Mutant Football League 2 is a brutal arcade reimagining of American football, where athletes are replaced by teams of orcs, skeletons and deadly robots. The project is an ideological continuation of the cult classic, relying not on realism, but on dark humor and spectacular matches in the 8 vs 8 format. Each arena is a high-danger zone filled with circular saws, mines and other deadly traps. Unpredictability is also introduced by sudden events that can radically change the balance of power during the competition.

item.title: NeverAwake FLASHBACK
item.description: Game Description Delving into the surreal world of subconscious nightmares, NeverAwake FLASHBACK offers a confrontation with distorted childhood memories. The project’s universe is filled with grotesque opponents, which are materialized phobias. The monsters are not demons, but hated vegetables, frightening dentists and other traumatic images from the past of the young heroine named Rem. On this dangerous journey through the recesses of consciousness, she is accompanied by her faithful plush companion Gabe-chan.

item.title: 16 Cyber-Personalities: Survivors
item.description: Game Description 16 Cyber-Personalities: Survivors is a dynamic top-down roguelight shooter, the arena of which is the protagonist’s subconscious. The concept is based on the MBTI personality typology, which is reflected in the key mechanics. The gamer controls four elemental spirits, each of which symbolizes certain character traits. The process of their improvement occurs through unique branches of pumping, which allows you to turn elementals into powerful companions. The main task is to repel the attacks of sinister forces hiding in the depths of the mind.

item.title: Death Howl
item.description: Game Description Death Howl is a tactical card roguelike with soulslike elements, where battles with otherworldly entities take place in arenas divided into square cells. Each move requires informed decisions, because the outcome of the fight depends on the correct use of cards with attacking and defensive skills. You will have to confront not only ordinary spirits, but also powerful bosses, defeating which will require a deep understanding of their behavior.

item.title: Dissimilar
item.description: Game Description Set in an ancient castle with futuristic technology, Dissimilar challenges players to unravel long-forgotten mysteries. The basis of the entire process is navigation through the labyrinths of the citadel called the Vault. Filled with high-tech gadgets and robots, this place stands in stark contrast to its ancient walls. Success in passing depends not only on victories in turn-based encounters, but also on careful study of the environment. Fully hand-rendered visuals combined with a soundtrack that mixes orchestral and synth music create a unique atmosphere.

item.title: Keep the Heroes Out
item.description: Game Description Keep the Heroes Out is an asymmetrical cooperative strategy game, an adaptation of the board game of the same name for 1-4 people. The entire gameplay is based on protecting the dungeon from the attacks of self-proclaimed heroes seeking to plunder the treasury. Participants will take control of monsters, each of which has a unique set of abilities and a starting deck of cards. Effective interaction and clever combination of monster skills, performing roles from crowd control to support, becomes the key to success in solving constantly changing tactical puzzles.

item.title: Angeline Era
item.description: Game Description Angeline Era is a 3D adventure in which former soldier Tetsu Kinoshta must find the truth in a chaotic world. Together with the angel Arcas Gemini, he must break through the storm hiding the angels' mothership, the Throne, to uncover its secrets and determine the future. Traveling through the lands of Era, inhabited by people, angels and fairies, is permeated with an atmosphere of betrayal and unfulfilled desires. To achieve the goal, the heroes will have to explore many locations, from primeval forests and treacherous mountains to abandoned mines and ruins with traps.

item.title: Breadbox
item.description: Game Description Breadbox is a detailed simulator that allows you to touch the golden era of computing in the 70s and 80s. The project offers accurate emulations of such iconic machines as the Commodore 64, VIC-20 and PET 2001-8. The core of the entire process is physical interaction with old-school hardware and storage media within a sophisticated environment. Gamers will have to work with floppy disks, cassettes and cartridges, listening to the authentic sound of their operation.

item.title: Unboxathon
item.description: Game Description Unboxathon is a progressive game where the central objective is to find a sentimental relic from the past - a plush toy lost in childhood. To do this, you have to engage in the soothing opening of an endless stream of mysterious boxes. Each opened package produces a satisfying sonic feedback, and its contents range from the most mundane socks to powerful magical relics and prestigious trophies. The charming pixelated visual style and soothing theme music create a comfortable environment that encourages long-term immersion.

item.title: Light Up The Town
item.description: Game Description Light Up The Town is a cozy project, the main goal of which is to create a festive atmosphere in a small town on the eve of winter celebrations. The process of transforming the settlement provides complete freedom to realize creative ideas. Placement of multi-colored garlands is carried out with a simple mouse click, and for each decorative element detailed settings of dimensions and rotation angle are available. The protagonist is a young ferret named Bean.

item.title: Dungeon Rampage
item.description: Game Description Dungeon Rampage is a cooperative action role-playing game in which groups of up to 4 adventurers go into dangerous dungeons to destroy monsters and search for treasure. The project offers a choice of 8 unique heroes with distinctive fighting styles, from the classic Berserker to the exotic Combat Cook. A deep customization system allows you to fine-tune your characters to suit your preferences, using hundreds of equipment options and skills.

item.title: ANGST: A TALE OF SURVIVAL
item.description: Game Description ANGST: A TALE OF SURVIVAL is an atmospheric survival adventure set in a surreal world reminiscent of a frozen limbo. The protagonist wakes up in a secluded hut in the middle of a silent taiga, deprived of any memories of his past. The surrounding reality, known as the Wasteland, is subject to a strict cycle of day and night. Daylight hours provide an opportunity to prepare and gather resources, while as darkness falls, the icy desert becomes filled with hostile entities.

item.title: Bober Bros No Means Nothing
item.description: Game Description Bober Bros No Means Nothing is about violation of personal space and silent horror born from awkward pauses and hostile glances. The narrative places the hero in an oppressive atmosphere, where a mundane work shift at the packaging turns into a test of strength due to a colleague who constantly tests other people’s boundaries. Attempts to relax at home also turn into failure due to noise from the neighboring apartment and mysterious holes in the walls.

item.title: Forgot
item.description: Game Description Forgot is a psychological horror game where the only way to get out of a trap is to be extremely attentive to the details of the environment. The whole process comes down to careful observation of a familiar environment in search of the slightest deviations from the norm. The detection or absence of oddities directly affects the critical decision: whether to eat the offered cake. If anomalies are noticed in the room, the dessert will be poisoned and should be discarded immediately.

item.title: MineMogul
item.description: Game Description MineMogul is an opportunity to design and build a giant industrial complex in the bowels of the earth, where the main task is to tame chaos. The process is constantly complicated by unpredictable failures caused by a realistic physical model, which forces us to constantly search for creative solutions to keep the mechanisms working. The action takes place in a mysterious, deserted cave system, among the ruins of abandoned mining operations.

item.title: Pawn Planet
item.description: Game Description In Pawn Planet you will plunge headlong into the crazy world of an interstellar pawn shop. Forget dusty earthly stores; it’s a galaxy filled with strange clients and even stranger objects. Here you will have to test your customer service skills by dealing with grumpy Glurgs and outrageous Zilarians who are eager to make a sale or a profitable deal. But in “Planet of Pawns” you need to do more than just bargain.

item.title: Randal's Tuesday
item.description: Game Description Randal’s Tuesday is a classic point-and-click quest, the main intrigue of which is built around a false accusation brought against three students. The protagonists are Randal, Matt and Charlie, each of whom has exclusive access to certain locations, items and dialogue options. The narrative is told through flashbacks, where each of the characters presents their own version of the events that took place before the student council. At the same time, the plot periodically returns to the events of the present time, creating tension.

item.title: Eufloria Classic
item.description: Game Description Eufloria Classic is a strategic project whose main goal is to colonize asteroids with the help of living organisms. The basis of expansion is the cultivation of special units called seedlings, whose production is established on unique Dyson trees. The essence of the process is to direct a swarm of these creatures towards hostile asteroids. Their task is to reach the core of a celestial body and subjugate it, which requires refined tactical maneuvers and competent distribution of available resources.

item.title: FEROCIOUS
item.description: Game Description FEROCIOUS is an atmospheric adventure in a lost prehistoric world inhabited by dangerous dinosaurs. The main character learns a story about sea monsters and missing sailors who visit the mysterious fog over the Pacific Ocean. There is a distress signal from a group of investigative journalists that lead the protagonist to the territory of a tropical island located among a foggy cloud. The hero will make his way through the jungle, facing large and predatory monsters.

item.title: Photographer's Life Simulator
item.description: Game Description Photographers Life Simulator is about turning a dream into a successful business, where the initial capital consists only of an old camera and ambitions. The main goal is to establish the most reputable photography studio in the city, leaving its mark on history. The protagonist must find a delicate balance between creative fulfillment and commercial gain while managing all aspects of the enterprise. All processes are under full control: from fulfilling orders for portrait photography to creating thematic albums and providing printing services.

item.title: ROUTINE
item.description: Game Description ROUTINE begins with an exploration of a silent lunar base, an object built according to the canons of ideas about the future from the 80s. The initial search for information quickly gives way to the direct need to survive in the face of an unknown threat. A hostile presence confronts the player, identifying them as the main danger inside the abandoned complex. The tension mounts as they realize their complete isolation and the fact that every shadow may hide mortal danger.

item.title: The Curse We Made
item.description: Game Description The Curse We Made is a hand-drawn puzzle adventure where the main goal is to bring life back to a cursed world. The protagonist arrives in the city of Gravebrook by train and finds himself in a place completely absorbed in shadows and devoid of any colors. Each of the 32 handcrafted riddles represents a key to healing the land. Successfully solving puzzles not only opens up new locations, but literally fills the lifeless environment with light and color.

item.title: Toy Smash Kaboom!
item.description: Game Description Toy Smash Kaboom! is a hybrid project that combines elements of spatial organization, auto-battler and physical clashes. The playing field is a littered table on which you will have to command armies of animated toys. Squads are managed through a backpack-like inventory system, where each slot has strategic importance for the outcome of the upcoming battle. The troops can be led by unique captains, such as the Chef Doll, who specializes in defense, or Doctor Hamster, who relies on the numerical superiority of his charges.

item.title: Titans of the Past
item.description: Game Description Titans of the Past is a role-playing project with tactical elements, in which the main goal is the development of your own settlement. The construction and improvement of buildings requires resources obtained during risky forays. Each adventure is a procedurally generated route consisting of various nodes: dungeons, rest camps, trading points and unexpected events. Such a metaprogression system allows you to invest the received materials in the city even after unsuccessful expeditions, gradually opening up access to new opportunities for subsequent batches of heroes.

item.title: Ecopunk
item.description: Game Description Ecopunk is a survival simulator in which the main goal is to restore the destroyed ecosystem of the planet through the unique mechanics of the Mother Tree. Planting ancient seeds can bring life back to devastated lands, and sacrificing defeated foes can bestow valuable blessings. The gradual healing of the climate and the rebirth of nature unlock the full power of this ancient creature, making the settlers stronger. In parallel with landscaping the territories, you will have to arrange your own settlement on the ruins of a former civilization.

item.title: Effulgence RPG
item.description: Game Description Effulgence RPG is a party-based adventure in which the hostile inhabitants of the world are not just obstacles, but the main source of resources for survival. Defeated opponents disintegrate into particles, which serve as raw materials for creating new equipment. Using a special material printer, the squad can transform these particles into weapons and useful mechanisms, which is central to progression. The entire process of exploration and combat takes place in a sci-fi world that consists entirely of text characters located in three-dimensional space.

item.title: Kingdom of Night
item.description: Game Description The gloomy atmosphere in Kingdom of Night takes gamers to the streets of Watford, where night demons live. The game is an isometric role-playing adventure game made in the style of retro projects of the 80s. The plot takes place in the eighties, where a mysterious satanic cult appears in Arizona. Cultists call upon the ancient evil Baphomet, which begins to dominate the town of Watford, attacking civilians.

item.title: Scrabdackle
item.description: Game Description Scrabdackle stands out for its visual style. All graphics in this project were drawn by hand. She mixes pencil drawings with pixel art. Externally, the indie title is reminiscent of early flash games. The video game itself is an adventure game with elements of RPG, Metroidvania and action. The camera in it is located at the top and at an angle. The player controls a magician. He has inventory and a spell book.

item.title: She's Leaving
item.description: Game Description Shes Leaving is about the constant feeling of being stalked and the fine line where the prey and the hunter change places. The project offers to immerse yourself in an atmosphere of horror with a first-person view, where survival directly depends on stealth and ingenuity. Confronting an unrelenting enemy poses a difficult choice: confront the threat head-on or flee for your life, using only a stun gun for self-defense that provides a brief respite.

item.title: Simogo Legacy Collection
item.description: Game Description Simogo Legacy Collection is an anthology of 7 classic projects, representing an eclectic collection of works from the past. In addition to the main works, the publication is supplemented by an extensive archive of rare materials. Among them you can find a digital book, an audio drama in podcast format, as well as previously unreleased musical compositions. Of particular interest are game prototypes and interactive storytelling, which allow you to look at the creative process from the inside.

item.title: The Art of Reflection
item.description: Game Description The Art of Reflection is a first-person puzzle game where conventional physics gives way to surreal acrobatics. The protagonist will have to perform dizzying maneuvers that defy gravity and navigate intricate architectural labyrinths. A key tool for navigation is the ability to instantaneously approach, allowing you to cover significant distances in the blink of an eye. This mechanic also makes it possible to adjust the flight path in slow motion, opening up access to previously unreachable areas.

item.title: Grandma, Is That You?
item.description: Game Description Grandma, Is That You? - a psychological horror film, the plot of which takes place within the walls of the dilapidated Winslow estate. The protagonist arrives at a remote estate to help his elderly and ill grandmother, Martha Winslow. However, an initially simple visit turns into a immersion in a frightening atmosphere, where time seems to stand still and the air is saturated with oblivion. The old mansion holds long-forgotten memories and dark family secrets.

item.title: Idlequarium
item.description: Game Description Idlequarium is a simulator dedicated to the creation and development of your own digital aquarium, made in a bright cybernetic style. The process of arranging the underwater world is not limited solely to the visual component. Each element of decor, from colored stones to exotic plants, directly affects the ecosystem, accelerating the experience gained for feeding and the growth rate of inhabitants. Effective management involves the timely sale of adults to make a profit.

item.title: MARVEL Cosmic Invasion
item.description: Game Description MARVEL Cosmic Invasion is a side-scrolling beat ‘em up focused on interstellar conflict. The player will have to choose from 15 heroes to confront the Annihilation Wave, a force threatening the galaxy under the leadership of Annihilus. The story takes place in a variety of locations, starting on Earth, such as New York, and extending into space, including the Negative Zone. Figures like Nova, Spider-Man, Wolverine, Phyla-Vell and Captain America are among the available protagonists to join the efforts against this galactic menace.

item.title: Pocket Gecko
item.description: Game Description Pocket Gecko is about the relaxing experience of collecting and caring for a personal virtual companion. The central figure of the entire adventure is the cute gecko, whose appearance can be customized in detail to reflect his own personality. You are allowed to contact this lizard at any time, simply by observing its lively and natural movements on the screen. Gradually, the pet becomes not just a tool, but a real partner.

item.title: Wild Growth
item.description: Game Description Wild Growth is an incremental action game in which the main goal is to maintain the combat effectiveness of the squad in the harsh world of Scandinavian myths. All responsibility for the survival of the allies falls on the shoulders of the protagonist, acting as a healer. The process of restoring the health of teammates is carried out through the use of healing spells activated by mouse clicks. The outcome of any clash with the enemy directly depends on the timeliness of these actions.

item.title: Where Is Mommy
item.description: Game Description Where Is Mommy is a retro horror game in which the survival process is based on careful observation of the cyclically changing environment. With each new turn, reality undergoes greater distortions, and barely noticeable deviations from the norm penetrate into the usual scenery. The main task is to identify these anomalies, since this is the only way to break the time loop and not become part of this crazy world.

item.title: Air Defender
item.description: Game Description Air Defender is a strategic command simulator that puts full responsibility for the safety of the nation’s airspace on the user’s shoulders. Gameplay focuses on making critical decisions under time pressure when an unidentified contact appears on the radar. It is necessary to quickly determine its nature, distinguishing a civilian aircraft from a real threat, and, if necessary, issue orders for the departure of duty fighters. Every action has far-reaching consequences, and the cost of a mistake can be catastrophic for the entire country.

item.title: Ayasa: Shadows of Silence
item.description: Game Description Ayasa: Shadows of Silence is about a poetic journey through the depths of conscience, where the main confrontation unfolds within the personality itself. The process of progressing through the story is a combination of exploring six surreal worlds, solving puzzles and episodes requiring survival. Control is entrusted to a girl named Ayasa, who will have to master special talents to navigate the treacherous environment and interact with interactive elements.

item.title: Death In Abyss
item.description: Game Description Death In Abyss becomes a real test of strength for connoisseurs of intense shooters, because the project requires honed reflexes and virtuoso control of the combat apparatus. The flight system is designed for the fast maneuvers, including evasive maneuvers and sharp turns, needed to survive high-dynamic collision environments. Confrontation with hostile life forms is based on the use of a powerful arsenal. Each successful elimination of an enemy allows you to absorb his vital energy to restore your own reserve of strength, which forces you to constantly be on the move and conduct an aggressive battle.

item.title: Super Cabbage Kabumi
item.description: Game Description Super Cabbage Kabumi is a roguelike game that focuses on creating unique builds of items and pets for maximum efficiency. The central element of the gameplay is the process of collecting artifacts, whose properties can be combined to produce unpredictable and powerful effects. Unlockable companions have a significant impact on the passage. These creatures have unique abilities that can, for example, modify the speed of a projectile or change the reaction of targets to interaction.

item.title: Barman Simulator
item.description: Game Description Barman Simulator is a simulator for managing your own establishment, where the main goal is to turn a modest bar into the most popular place in the city. Running a successful business will require gamers to not only speed and accuracy when serving customers, but also strategic thinking. An important task is scrupulous control over warehouse stocks in order to avoid shortages of ingredients for creating signature cocktails. In addition, the daily routine is complicated by unforeseen situations, such as confronting thieves and managing an establishment during peak hours, when the flow of visitors reaches its maximum.

item.title: BLACK SOULS 2
item.description: Game Description BLACK SOULS 2 takes the player on a journey through a world inspired by Alice in Wonderland and Alice Through the Looking Glass, reimagined as a dark fairy tale with elements of psychological horror. In this crazy setting, the gaming experience is defined by interactions with 45 heroines, who are female versions of the characters in the original story. These figures, from the White Rabbit to the Queen of Hearts, are central to the narrative’s overt themes and deadly encounters with demonic creatures.

item.title: Bloodface
item.description: Game Description Bloodface is an action role-playing game, the events of which unfold in a cruel medieval world engulfed in the flames of civil war. The protagonist will have to restore order using a merciless combat system with an emphasis on close combat. There is complete freedom to choose tactics: from secretly eliminating enemies to violent head-on collisions. An extensive arsenal of all kinds of weapons and a variety of combat techniques allow you to choose your individual style of play.

item.title: GLONK
item.description: Game Description GLONK is an incremental project in which the entire gameplay is built around feeding the creature of the same name. The central task is to constantly provide the pet with food for its subsequent increase in size, which directly affects financial well-being. The viability and continuous growth of the ward is the only source of income, so maintaining his health becomes a paramount task for accumulating gold. Successfully nurturing one creature opens up the opportunity to have several more, thereby scaling up profits and accelerating advancement to new levels.

item.title: No, I'm not a Voenkom
item.description: Game Description No, I’m not a Voenkom is a psychological thriller whose plot revolves around a sudden invasion of personal space. A sharp knock on the door becomes a catalyst for a whole series of tense events that test the protagonist’s endurance. Every interaction with the outside world becomes a difficult choice between trying to remain safe and risking succumbing to destructive curiosity. The oppressive atmosphere of an old apartment, where the air is saturated with the smell of dust and paint, increases the feeling of isolation.

item.title: Ragnar
item.description: Game Description Ragnar is a roguelike game set in Norse mythology, where the main goal is to confront the god of deception Loki and his attempt to change the fate of Ragnarok. A system of dynamic progression and permanent improvements allows you to become more powerful with each new foray into changing worlds. You can combine divine blessings, abilities, and legendary weapons to create your own fighting style. For example, you can combine the power of Tyr’s Spear of Justice with Freya’s Phantom Ambush, forming unique tactical combinations to crush your enemies.

item.title: Street Food Simulator
item.description: Game Description Street Food Simulator is a street food management simulator where you need to outperform your competitors to succeed. The confrontation unfolds with other entrepreneurs, each of whom has their own strengths and business strategies. Learning their tactics and mastering various areas of the city becomes the key to market dominance. The urban environment lives its own life: people communicate on benches, creating the feeling of a busy metropolis. An important tool in this fight is a mobile retail outlet, which can not only be equipped with improved equipment, but also visually transformed.

item.title: Afallon
item.description: Game Description Afallon is a high fantasy role-playing game in which the world constantly evolves in response to the actions of the protagonist. Completed tasks forever change the appearance of settlements and camps, opening new paths or changing existing locations. As the hero’s power grows, the level of threat also increases: the usual opponents are replaced by stronger enemies, maintaining the difficulty at the current level. Changing the time of day directly affects the environment - at night, merchants go to bed, and bandits and ghosts appear on the roads.

item.title: Comic Book Store Simulator
item.description: Game Description Comic Book Store Simulator is an opportunity to try on the role of a comic book store owner and go from a modest establishment to a real paradise for connoisseurs of graphic novels. The action takes place in a colorful world inspired by Japanese streets, where every day brings new challenges and surprises. The daily routine includes not only arranging goods on shelves, but also interacting with eccentric visitors.

item.title: Duil
item.description: Game Description Duil is a side-scrolling action platformer. The player takes control of Duil, a mysterious knight. The mysterious and hostile world hides multiple secrets and surprises. The central character will face monsters, bosses and minions of the dark lord. The protagonist will fight, get new equipment and upgrade his own skills. The plot begins with an army of evil spirits invading the Kingdom of Targat. Commander-in-Chief Vezruvil decides to attack peaceful lands and enslave them.

item.title: FrostBound
item.description: Game Description FrostBound is a roguelike project with elements of card strategy and tower defense, where the main task is to repel endless enemy attacks in permafrost conditions. In each round, you need to make tactical decisions: attack the enemy or deploy new troops on the battlefield. A feature of the battles is the harsh climate, forcing most fighters to retreat after just one turn. Only the most resilient warriors and durable buildings are able to withstand the onslaught and continue the battle.

item.title: Hail to the Rainbow
item.description: Game Description Hail to the Rainbow puts users in the shoes of Ignat, a young man navigating the harsh post-apocalyptic world of cyberpunk Russia. Having grown up alone after losing his parents, Ignat knows what he needs to do to survive. His life in this grim reality becomes routine until an unexpected email changes everything, sending him down a path of uncertainty and discovery. In an environment where survival is key, the title invites gamers to explore a chaotic world, piecing together its fragments and uncovering secrets hidden in the ruins of the past.

item.title: Infinite Lives
item.description: Game Description Infinite Lives is a shared universe where superhumans and subhumans wage an ongoing struggle for total control over the metropolis. The protagonist must forge his own origin story in a city plagued by supernatural violence. In this endless cycle, one must either gain powers beyond the human, or lose the remnants of the spirit, turning into something worse. Hundreds of other heroes and villains also lay claim to dominance, using their unique talents to conquer every corner of the map.

item.title: Lonely House
item.description: Game Description Lonely House is an opportunity to transform a secluded building at a city crossroads into a unique art object. The project proposes to focus solely on the external design, giving complete control over a small isolated plot of land. Enthusiasts have at their disposal a wide range of tools for customizing the building, allowing them to change the style of the walls and adjust its height. Decoration of the facade is carried out using a variety of objects: from overgrown bushes and ventilation systems to stylish neon signs with customizable lighting.

item.title: LOST EMBER: Rekindled Edition
item.description: Game Description LOST EMBER: Rekindled Edition is about exploring the world left by humanity through the eyes of its wild inhabitants. A wolf comes under control and is accompanied on his journeys by a faithful companion. Together they will uncover the secrets of the past and learn about the reasons for the fall of civilization, going through a five-hour adventure. The narrative reveals a dramatic story touching on themes of loyalty, despair and betrayal.

item.title: Motorhome: Traveling North America 2
item.description: Game Description Motorhome: Traveling North America 2 is a collectible version of the project, whose main task is a measured movement through the most colorful locations of the United States. Gameplay revolves around overcoming mental puzzles and discovering cleverly hidden objects while visiting a variety of locations, from grandiose national parks to comfortable coastal areas. This special edition expands the scope of the ride with 10 additional stages featuring a comical animal to help you discover items.

item.title: Nano Neighbors
item.description: Game Description Nano Neighbors is a life simulator in which your computer desktop turns into a cozy home for the friendly android NANO. The project offers to take on the role of a Handler, responsible for the development and well-being of his digital companion. The small robot is constantly located at the bottom of the screen, reacting to human actions and creating a feeling of constant presence. Social interaction is an important part of the gameplay: you can invite your friends to visit NANO, visit their capsule houses, or meet in common centers for communication and joint activities.

item.title: The Last Case of John Morley
item.description: Game Description The Last Case of John Morley is a dark detective adventure, the plot of which is dedicated to the investigation of a murder twenty years ago. The English countess Lady Margaret Fordside, convinced of the innocence of the convicts, turns to the main character for help. The police have long closed the case of the death of her daughter Elodie, blaming everything on dummies. However, the inconsolable mother is sure that the real criminal is still at large.

item.title: Veterum
item.description: Game Description Veterum is a turn-based tactical strategy with role-playing elements, the success of which directly depends on many interrelated factors. The detailed combat system forces you to take into account not only the relative position of the units, but also such parameters as morale, accumulated fatigue, the direction of the fighters' gaze, and even the level of illumination of each cell. The environment is fully interactive: you can build barricades, dig ditches, or freeze rivers to create crossings.

item.title: AFTERBLAST
item.description: Game Description AFTERBLAST is a fast-paced first-person shooter with rogue-lite elements that takes you on an epic journey across a devastated planet. As you progress through randomly generated dungeons, you’ll encounter hordes of monsters and bosses, and you’ll need dozens of guns and other weapons to defeat them. In this world, chaos came without warning and wreaked havoc on the once beautiful planet of Aryasan. The skies dimmed, the vegetation withered, and animals began to attack each other as resources dried up.

item.title: Holder of Place
item.description: Game Description Holder of Place is a dark sci-fi roguelike auto battler where the main task is to gather a squad of unique followers to confront an ancient evil. Each playthrough takes the wanderer deep into a dying world, offering a series of intense combat encounters and opportunities for strategic choice. The process comes down to a set of various follower cards and their location in the squad. After this, all that remains is to watch the automatic battles with waves of enemies, whose strength is constantly increasing.

item.title: Quantum Loop
item.description: Game Description Quantum Loop is a sci-fi adventure whose gameplay is based on the concept of a time loop. Any collision with an asteroid results in an immediate restart of the mission, but all information received is saved for subsequent attempts. The main task is to prevent an impending asteroid disaster that threatens the entire quadrant. The project does not offer an explicit task log, encouraging independent exploration of the world and the search for non-trivial solutions to many interrelated problems.

item.title: Alice's World
item.description: Game Description Alices World is a story-driven 2D adventure in which the gamer plays an unusual role. There is no place for role-playing here, because the player acts as himself - the voice that the main character hears from behind the screen. A girl named Alice, waking up in a world filled with death, is completely dependent on instructions from the outside. You can be an honest guide or a deceiver, help or deliberately lead to death.

item.title: Dreaming Blue
item.description: Game Description Dreaming Blue is a romantic visual novel in which the main goal is to get rid of an ancient curse. Fate brings the main character, a young woman, with two powerful deities who can help her in this difficult task. The first of these is Zenith, the patron of good fortune, who has a playful disposition and is associated with cats. His complete opposite is Sirius, a mysterious ancient deity whose symbol is the wolf.

item.title: Luna and Sol: Nightmare Ward
item.description: Game Description Luna and Sol: Nightmare Ward is a strategic project in which each new playthrough poses unique tactical challenges to the gamer. The core of the gameplay is constant adaptation to increasing challenges, requiring refined skills and flexible thinking. To enhance your capabilities during battles, you will have to collect over 100 different relics, the combinations of which provide access to unique fighting styles. Even defeat does not mean the end, since the guardian of dreams becomes stronger after each failure, which allows him to overcome increasingly difficult challenges and build a perfect line of defense against monsters.

item.title: TORMENTOR
item.description: Game Description TORMENTOR takes you on a journey through the twisted mind of a maniac. Take on the role of a ruthless torturer who has taken over an abandoned prison filled with victims sentenced to death. As the game progresses, you will struggle with a developing mental illness that robs you of your memories and causes dangerous episodes of fainting. To keep your mind under control, you’ll work with an organized crime group that operates on the dark web to obtain an experimental sanity-preserving drug for you.

item.title: Constance
item.description: Game Description Constance is about creative burnout and the struggle with inner demons, embodied in an action-platformer format. The main character, an artist named Constance, finds herself trapped in a colorful but fading inner world. Armed with a brush, she must confront her own fears and mental blocks, which have taken the form of hostile creatures and mysterious characters that reflect aspects of her psyche. The key mechanic that determines the gameplay is the Corruption system.

item.title: Cross Blitz
item.description: Game Description Cross Blitz is a strategic role-playing adventure game that combines tactical combat and card collecting. Gamers participate in battles using various cards, each of which has unique abilities and synergies. The project features many heroes, each of which has its own playstyle and story campaigns. These heroes can be customized with different deck archetypes, allowing for a variety of strategies and gameplay. In Cross Blitz, gamers explore different regions, encountering different challenges and enemies.

item.title: Of Ash and Steel
item.description: Game Description Of Ash and Steel is a role-playing adventure in an open world, where the center of the story is not a famous warrior, but an ordinary cartographer. His name is Tristan, and he finds himself on the bleak island of Greyshaft after a shipwreck caused by a cataclysm called the Blight. Being a person not accustomed to battles, the protagonist is forced to adapt to harsh realities and learn to survive in a lawless world.

item.title: Uktena 64 - Ultimate
item.description: Game Description Uktena 64 - Ultimate is a dark comedy horror game with visuals inspired by the aesthetics of the N64 console. The core of the gameplay is to track and eliminate infected fauna that are spreading an unknown deadly virus. The project offers a choice of several difficulty levels, from extremely simple to almost unbalanced. To diversify the passage, a system of unlockable cheat codes is provided that allows you to radically change the established rules.

item.title: CoRoT
item.description: Game Description CoRoT is a first-person psychological horror game that revolves around exploring an ever-changing abandoned house. The protagonist awakens in a damp basement, without any memories of how he got here. The home reacts to the presence of an uninvited guest, its corridors are distorted, and its rooms are transformed, as soon as you turn away. The oppressive atmosphere is created not by monsters, but by a feeling of total loneliness, silence and confidence that someone invisible is constantly watching.

item.title: DYSTHANASIA
item.description: Game Description DYSTHANASIA is a depressing project, plunging into an atmosphere of total despair and madness. The setting is a gloomy research complex, where the main character comes to her senses within the walls of a cold morgue. The surroundings, with uncured bloodstains and unidentified remains of flesh, clearly hint at a recent tragedy. The space is filled with inhuman moans emitted by grotesque creatures that mercilessly pursue the protagonist. Any mistake in this hostile world leads to instant and cruel death.

item.title: Galaxy Princess Zorana
item.description: Game Description Galaxy Princess Zorana is a strategic life simulator, the main task of which is to conquer the throne of the Heavenly Empire after the sudden death of your father. The previously carefree life of the second heir to the throne, known for her love of beautiful shoes and pets, is changing dramatically. After the death of his mother and the betrayal of his brother, who was considered a prince, the emperor disappears under mysterious circumstances.

item.title: Maktala: Slime Lootfest
item.description: Game Description Maktala: Slime Lootfest is an incremental project in which each battle opens up new ways to destroy countless hordes of opponents. To fine-tune and improve your character, a system for mining ore and processing precious stones is provided, allowing you to adapt the style of play to your liking. Significant support in battles is provided by a faithful archer, who independently enters the battle and exterminates enemies, being next to the main character.

item.title: The Dinner
item.description: Game Description The Dinner is an immersion into a fractured mind, where the goal is not to scare, but to create a feeling of deep concern and empathy. The project offers an intimate and disturbing experience, forcing you to constantly doubt the reality of what is happening on the screen. Every action and decision taken inexorably brings us closer to the tragic outcome predetermined by the fate of the main character.

item.title: Unseen
item.description: Game Description Unseen is a psychological horror game whose main objective is to immerse yourself in an oppressive and mysterious atmosphere. The project is implemented in the format of a walking simulator, where the narration is from the first person. The gameplay is deliberately devoid of overloaded elements, concentrating on exploring locations and interacting with interactive objects. The process of exploring the environment and solving a few puzzles serve as the main tools for building suspense.

item.title: Berserk B.I.T.S
item.description: Game Description Berserk BITS is a hybrid project that invites you to take on the role of a network detective. The main goal is to uncover the conspiracy behind a series of virus attacks that are shaking cyberspace. Progress along the storyline occurs through completing tasks received from email. During the investigations, you will explore a variety of digital biomes, fighting viruses and defeating powerful bosses. A key ally in this mission is a personal digital companion named B.

item.title: Daisen
item.description: Game Description Daisen is a fast-paced first-person shooter that tells the story of the fate of a girl who finds herself at the center of a mysterious anomaly spreading. The protagonist is Emilia Svitanko, an ordinary girl who inevitably becomes a tool for containing chaos. She will have to figure out the reasons for the anomalous influence that has engulfed the surrounding lands. A key feature of the combat system is the complete absence of ammunition and reloading.

item.title: Dictator Simulator: Gradnar
item.description: Game Description Dictator Simulator: Gradnar is a political simulator where the government of the fictional Eastern European state of Gradnar is associated with the constant threat of a coup. In the role of dictator Vyslan Gatskolki will have to determine the fate of an entire nation, maneuvering between the democratic vector of development and harsh autocracy. Each decision directly affects key indicators, including the economy, army loyalty and party support. Neglect of these systems inevitably leads to the overthrow of the regime.

item.title: Fantasy Monster Hunt
item.description: Game Description Fantasy Monster Hunt is a fast-paced action game where the main goal is to hold off countless enemies over short session matches. The character development system is based on gaining experience points for each defeated enemy. Reaching a new level opens access to power-up cards, which can significantly strengthen the combat capabilities of the selected warrior. What gives depth to the tactical process is the interaction between different abilities.

item.title: HoloCafe
item.description: Game Description HoloCafe is a management simulator in which the player takes on the role of a manager and saves a small establishment from ruin. The plot takes place in an alternate universe, where instead of a VTuber agency, a cafe was opened, but the business quickly fell into disrepair. When the situation began to seem hopeless, virtual idols appear from a mysterious portal, ready to help restore business. The gamer has at his disposal a staff of 17 talents representing the Japanese, English and Indonesian divisions of Hololive.

item.title: Home
item.description: Game Description Home is a pixel adventure, the plot of which reveals a short but eventful segment in the life of a boy who left his home. This narrative, based on real events, offers to follow the fate of the protagonist, whose new refuge becomes the space under the bridge. His main occupation is street musical performances, during which he encounters unexpected acquaintances. The whole story is presented in a restrained and honest manner, reminiscent in style of a short musical film.

item.title: Kriophobia
item.description: Game Description Kriophobia is a psychological survival horror game in which a scientific expedition to the remote island of Zhokhov turns into a nightmare after encountering anomalous magnetic fields. Instead of scientific discoveries, the team finds themselves in a death trap at a long-forgotten Soviet military base, hidden under the thickness of permafrost. The main character, a young geophysicist named Anna, will have to fight alone for life in the icy corridors of the complex.

item.title: SIDE EFFECTS
item.description: Game Description SIDE EFFECTS is a brutal pharmaceutical experiment turned into a deadly survival game. Participants play the role of test subjects caught in the middle of a failed clinical trial. They will have to plunge into the oppressive atmosphere of psychological horror, where hallucinations are indistinguishable from reality. The only goal is to outlast your opponent by taking one dose after another. The basis of the gameplay is turn-based roulette with tablets.

item.title: ZAKO NO AHIRU
item.description: Game Description ZAKO NO AHIRU is a 2D platformer of increased difficulty, the main goal of which is to conquer an inaccessible peak to the accompaniment of caustic comments. Every action is tirelessly watched by a girl named Sugaki Mary, who lives next door. She’s ready to make a caustic remark or an inappropriate joke at any time, using an arsenal of more than 800 fully voiced lines. The reward for your patience and skill will be one of 7 endings, each of which represents a unique surreal situation, reminiscent of a dream.

item.title: Cleared Hot
item.description: Game Description Cleared Hot is an arcade helicopter shooter in which the laws of physics become the main weapon in the hands of the pilot. The story follows a combat veteran who, after leaving the army, lives a secluded life in a Texas trailer. Having received an old helicopter at his disposal, he returns to the sky again, where he will face numerous opponents. The combat vehicle is equipped not only with machine guns and missiles, but also with a unique cable and magnet system that allows you to interact with the environment.

item.title: Infinity Islands
item.description: Game Description Infinity Islets is a relaxing fantasy sandbox that challenges players to explore interdimensional archaeology. The plot begins in a mysterious and empty museum, whose mysterious director asks for help in restoring it after a catastrophic interdimensional collision has destroyed all the exhibits. To complete this mission, the protagonist receives a magic shovel that can dig up the sands of endless islands. Relics found, which can be anything from robots to bananas, must be returned safely to storage.

item.title: IT Specialist Simulator
item.description: Game Description IT Specialist Simulator is a simulator where players will have to go from a beginner to a high-level administrator or IT project manager. Professional development directly depends on the decisions made, allowing you to specialize in both servicing computer equipment and organizing e-sports events. Each completed task and resolved malfunction contributes to career advancement in the corporate world of information technology, opening up new career prospects. The basis of the gameplay is managing IT infrastructure and solving real technical problems.

item.title: Monsters are Coming! Rock & Road
item.description: Game Description Monsters are Coming! Rock & Road means constantly fighting, strengthening and collecting resources on a desperate journey to the saving Arch. The basis of all gameplay is the defense of a constantly moving fortified city, which represents the last stronghold of civilization. On his way, merciless hordes of monsters stand in their way, seeking to wipe out this mobile shelter from the face of the earth. Survival directly depends on the ability to repel attacks from both small monsters and giant bosses that threaten the integrity of the tower.

item.title: Morphos
item.description: Game Description Morphos is a psychological horror in which the line between reality and madness is blurred within the walls of a mysterious scientific complex. Exploring the dark underground corridors involves solving numerous puzzles and confronting anomalous phenomena. The space around is constantly changing, turning into intricate labyrinths and distorting the usual perception. Survival will require stealthy movement, competent management of resources and the use of various types of weapons for self-defense from monsters.

item.title: Organized Inside
item.description: Game Description Organized Inside is a meditative puzzle game in which the process of cleaning becomes a metaphor for personal growth and transformation. The project invites you to immerse yourself in the leisurely systematization of everyday objects, being completely devoid of timers, points or health bars. The main emphasis is on relaxation and finding harmony in the chaos of everyday life. The narrative unfolds through the stories of five strangers whose secrets must be unraveled by putting their things in order.

item.title: Princess of the Water Lilies
item.description: Game Description Princess of the Water Lilies is a 2D puzzle platformer inspired by the golden age of classic animation. Each location is a hand-painted canvas, and the narrative unfolds to the accompaniment of a full-fledged symphony orchestra. The story in this adventure is virtually devoid of dialogue, and its meaning is conveyed through universal icons and beautifully illustrated scenes that are understandable without words. The basis of the gameplay is the exploration of picturesque levels filled with both secrets and numerous dangers.

item.title: Prologue: Go Wayback!
item.description: Game Description Prologue: Go Wayback! is a brutal survival simulator in which players will have to guide a heroine named Lucy through tens of kilometers of wilderness. The main objective is to reach a remote weather tower located on the opposite end of the map. The path is complicated not only by changeable weather conditions, but also by the need to navigate in space without modern navigation aids. The action takes place over a vast area of ​​64 square kilometers, generated for each new playthrough using machine learning technology.

item.title: S.E.M.I. – Side Effects May Include...
item.description: Game Description SEMI – Side Effects May Include is a cooperative action game for 1-4 players, in which the main goal is to escape from a special hospital. Experimental drugs are the main tool for survival and at the same time a source of chaos. After taking the pill, the patient gains superpowers, but along with them, completely unpredictable side effects. Well-coordinated teamwork becomes the key to success, because at any moment the situation can get out of control.

item.title: Sliding Hero
item.description: Game Description Sliding Hero, a dark, top-down Metroidvania puzzle game, takes you into the mysterious atmosphere of an 18th-century Venetian villa. The main character is Luca Sicomoro, a fleet captain who, after a shipwreck, comes to his senses on a mysterious island. He will have to explore an ominous estate to uncover the secret of his imprisonment and find a way to salvation. The world of the project is imbued with carnival aesthetics, and the character designs are inspired by the masks of the Italian commedia dell’arte.

item.title: TerraForge
item.description: Game Description TerraForge invites you into a world where mining and blacksmithing are not just a profession, but a way of life. As the heir to a family of blacksmiths, your goal is clear: forge the perfect weapon and leave a legacy behind. To do this, you will have to plunge into the mysterious Abyss - a kingdom underground, filled with rare and powerful resources. Along the way, you’ll manage loot, sell crafted items, and upgrade your tools to delve deeper into the mysteries of the land.

item.title: Typhon: Bot vs Bot
item.description: Game Description Typhon: Bot vs Bot is a sci-fi tactical strategy game where you need to masterfully write Python scripts to defeat your opponents. Autonomous mechs are controlled through the creation of unique behavior algorithms that determine all actions of combat vehicles. It is the program code that becomes the main weapon responsible for navigation, combat and the execution of complex missions in real time. The main goal is to outwit your opponent by developing better and more adaptive logic for your mechanized forces on the battlefield.

item.title: Xenopurge
item.description: Game Description Xenopurge puts you in the role of a Commander, controlling an elite squad from a remote command center. The main task is to eliminate aliens through indirect orders through the interfaces of several monitors. You will plan routes for fighters, set their priorities and determine tactics before they enter the combat zone. The team’s survival depends on this strategy and preparation, as you will have few direct ways to influence events once the operation begins.

item.title: BIRDCAGE
item.description: Game Description BIRDCAGE is a fast-paced bullet hell shooter where gameplay focuses on unique sword mechanics to fend off attacks and destroy enemies. The project takes inspiration from the arcade classics of the 90s, offering a polished combat system and stylized graphics. The pilot is required not only to dodge hundreds of projectiles, but also to actively use the blade to break through enemy squadrons. The title requires high concentration and sharp reflexes to survive in the chaos of battles.

item.title: Brush Burial: Gutter World
item.description: Game Description Brush Burial: Gutter World is a dark, immersive simulator that revolves around completing missions across four carefully crafted and interconnected locations. The narrative structure offers one Great Contract and three Minor Contracts, encouraging repeated exploration of levels to experiment with tactics to eliminate opponents. Successfully completing challenges and progressing unlocks access to dozens of unique cosmetic items, including unique outfits for the main character, which significantly increases the replayability of the project.

item.title: Christmas Story
item.description: Game Description Christmas Story not only creates a deceptive feeling of festive warmth, but also immerses you in a chilling story where the line between fiction and reality is rapidly blurring. The narrative is transformed under the influence of the actions and choices of the gamer himself, turning a cozy Christmas night into a real nightmare. The symbols of the holiday familiar from childhood take on sinister features, and the crackling of wood in the fireplace gives way to oppressive silence.

item.title: DECRYPTO Project
item.description: Game Description DECRYPTO Project is a simulator in which the main task is to train an advanced artificial intelligence model. The protagonist, selected by a special algorithm, must train the AI ​​to recognize various text encryption systems and better understand human language. All interaction with the system occurs under the supervision of a virtual assistant named Inky from the INKorp corporation. Over the course of one week, the operator will have to analyze encrypted messages and find keys to decrypt them using specialized software.

item.title: Duskpunk
item.description: Game Description Duskpunk is a dark steampunk RPG where a former soldier must survive on the streets of Dredgeport. The main character, mistakenly declared dead, miraculously avoids being processed into fuel for a military machine. Finding himself in the heart of a metropolis, torn apart by corruption and gang power, he is left face to face with the harsh reality. He has only his own life and sanity at his disposal, the preservation of which becomes a paramount task in a world where even the dead serve in war.

item.title: Mara
item.description: Game Description Mara is about a daring robbery of an ancient tomb, recently discovered by a group of archaeologists far from prying eyes. The events take place in the vicinity of an abandoned mine located near the city, in the depths of which a tomb with priceless relics is hidden. The main character, being an experienced thief, receives an order from a buyer of stolen goods to steal these artifacts for their subsequent sale.

item.title: Winter Survival Simulator
item.description: Game Description Winter Survival Simulator is a hardcore first-person survival game that offers you to experience the severity of the winter climate. Finding yourself in the snow-capped mountains, there is nowhere to wait for help. You need to rely only on your own strength. Try to survive. Find shelter and wait for rescuers. The action takes place in the mountains of Washington State. With only limited supplies on hand, battle the cold in the wild.

item.title: Fatal Claw
item.description: Game Description Fatal Claw is a dark 2D metroidvania that asks you to take control of a mysterious cat named Keesha, resurrected after death. The protagonist will have to master a combat system based on the use of mystical claws to confront the terrible creatures that have infested the underground world. As you progress, new mutant abilities are unlocked, allowing you to climb walls, make rapid dashes, and even soar in the air.

item.title: Kingdoms of the Dump
item.description: Game Description Kingdoms of the Dump is a pixelated RPG adventure that follows an unjustly accused squire named Dustin Binsley. After the ruler of the kingdom of Garbagia is kidnapped, it is Dustin, the Garbage Can Knight, who falls under suspicion. Now he must go on a dangerous journey to restore his reputation, save the monarch and uncover a sinister organization that threatens the entire world. His main goal is to prevent a full-scale war and return peace to his native lands.

item.title: LexiRogue
item.description: Game Description LexiRogue is an educational project that combines roguelite mechanics with science-based techniques for memorizing foreign vocabulary. It is based on a 21-day cycle designed to effectively consolidate the material studied. The learning process is based on regular tests, where it is necessary to accurately reproduce words according to given prompts. Any inaccuracy results in the word being marked as unlearned, and the testing phase begins again. In parallel to this, there is a mode with roguelite elements, offering the passage of levels with various combinations of enhancing bonuses for a more exciting learning experience.

item.title: Little Aviary
item.description: Game Description Little Aviary is a meditative collecting simulator where the main goal is to create the perfect aviary for dozens of bird species. The process of replenishing the collection involves breeding over 40 species of birds, each of which has many unique color variations. The project is conceived as a background companion for the desktop, allowing you to observe the life of your pets without being distracted from other tasks.

item.title: Long Drive North: Co-Op RV Simulator
item.description: Game Description Long Drive North: Co-Op RV Simulator is a brutal survival test where an old RV becomes the only refuge in the world after an unknown disaster. This vehicle requires constant attention, forcing gamers to personally repair it, search for spare parts in abandoned buildings and refuel the tank to continue driving. Every bolt found and engine fixed gives a temporary sense of security in the middle of the deserted American wilderness.

item.title: Morsels
item.description: Game Description Morsels is a roguelite action game with elements of creature collecting, offering dynamic battles from a top-down view. The basis of the gameplay is the use of mystical cards that allow you to take on the appearance of creatures of the same name. Players have access to a deck of 3 cards, which they can switch between at any time to tactically adapt to the situation. Each creature has a unique set of attacks, dodges, and special abilities, adding variety to the combat system.

item.title: SpaceBourne 2
item.description: Game Description The events of SpaceBourne 2 begin from the end of the first part, only now the player needs to build his own space empire and develop it in all directions. However, there is no need to rush with this global task. The game world is completely open to exploration of each solar system, where the user can first become famous or, on the contrary, become an enemy, and then make it easier for themselves to establish diplomatic relations.

item.title: ANIWARS: Call of the Void
item.description: Game Description ANIWARS: Call of the Void is a turn-based strategy game set in a world ravaged by endless and violent conflict. The global confrontation between three dominant factions creates an arena for intense tactical battles, where every move is critical to the outcome of the battle. Victory in these clashes requires the commander to carefully plan his actions and wisely use all available resources provided by the harsh reality of this world.

item.title: Dungeons and Kingdoms
item.description: Game Description Dungeons and Kingdoms is a hybrid project that combines the features of a kingdom management simulator and role-playing action game with dungeon exploration. The advancement of technology and the overall prosperity of the settlement directly depend on bold forays into dangerous locations. Adventurers will have to descend into ancient ruins and temples filled with ferocious monsters. Battles with opponents, including powerful bosses, take place in third-person action format. Victory over enemies is rewarded with valuable resources necessary for the technological development of the entire kingdom, as well as for protecting roads from bandits.

item.title: Forestrike
item.description: Game Description Forestrike is a tactical kung fu fighting game with a supernatural element, built on the unique ability to predict the outcome of a battle. The project proposes to hone your skills in mental duels before entering into a real fight. Using the gift of Foresight, the hero can repeatedly play out various battle scenarios in his mind, finding the only correct sequence of movements for victory. However, in a real conflict, any mistake is fatal, because defeat means having to start the whole journey from the very beginning.

item.title: Have You Seen This Man?
item.description: Game Description Have You Seen This Man? is a first-person psychological horror, the plot of which takes you into the atmosphere of Texas in 1975. The gameplay is based on a methodical exploration of the streets of Emsdorf County, where you will have to knock on doors and communicate with local residents. Each encounter is unique: from conversations with eccentric conspiracy theorists to clashes with aggressive hermits with shotguns at the ready.

item.title: Interstellar Espionage Inc.
item.description: Game Description Interstellar Espionage Inc., a strategy and management simulator, focuses on running an interstellar spy agency. The main task is to methodically ruin competing companies through industrial espionage. To do this, you need to explore a procedurally generated universe, find vulnerabilities in information security and strategically sell the obtained information to direct competitors. Each mission is designed for short sessions, allowing you to complete a full game in a relatively short period of time, which makes the gameplay accessible for regular visits.

item.title: Leaf Blower Co.
item.description: Game Description Leaf Blower Co is a meditative simulator that invites you to start your own cleaning business in a cozy town located in New England. The main task is to restore order with the help of a powerful blower, turning chaos into a peaceful landscape. The process is not limited to just blowing away autumn leaves; You will also have to deal with scattered boxes, coconuts and other debris that interfere with harmony.

item.title: Sheepherds!
item.description: Game Description Sheepherds! is a cozy cooperative project that invites you to take on the role of adorable herding dogs. The main task is to manage herds of fluffy sheep, which must be led through picturesque flower fields. This process allows them to dye their fur in vibrant colors to create fun clothing and accessories for their four-legged friends. To achieve the goal, the shepherds will have to run a lot and bark in time, discovering magical corners of the local world.

item.title: Storebound
item.description: Game Description Storebound is a co-op survival horror game that turns a huge furniture store into a death trap for random visitors. With the onset of darkness, bright shop windows and cozy exhibition rooms give way to impenetrable darkness, and the bustle of the day gives way to ringing silence. Local employees begin to patrol the endless trading floors and warehouses - creepy entities obsessed with the idea of ​​​​providing their last service to lost souls.

item.title: Stuck Together
item.description: Game Description Stuck Together is a co-op challenge filled with 1990s nostalgia. The space is filled with recognizable items from the era, including videotapes and furniture with distinctive tacky patterns. However, this retro world is actually a house of horrors from which you have to make a daring escape. Five full-scale rooms, including the Kitchen and Bedroom, conceal numerous dangers, traps and mutilated toys, creating an oppressive and tense environment for a bold ascent to freedom.

item.title: Chill with You: Lo-Fi Story
