item.description: Game Description Chill with You: Lo-Fi Story immerses you in a world where the main goal is to establish a deep emotional connection with Satone, a gifted and imaginative girl who devotes herself to writing stories. Progress in relationships directly depends on the time spent working together at the same table. Each break turns into a valuable opportunity for communication, allowing you to get to know the young writer better and strengthen the budding friendship.

item.title: The Holiday Story
item.description: Game Description The Holiday Story is a psychological horror film with a first-person perspective. The events of the game take place on the eve of 1982, completely immersing you in a festive environment. The project meticulously recreates the retro style of the 80s, visually processed to match the characteristic aesthetics of VHS tapes. The initially welcoming and bright atmosphere of the elegantly decorated store is gradually replaced by an oppressive feeling of inexplicable anxiety.

item.title: Village of the Curse
item.description: Game Description Village of the Curse is a depressing first-person horror game that puts you in the shoes of a journalist investigating the dark secrets of an isolated settlement. The hero will have to survive in an atmosphere of constant fear, because unpredictable and ruthless creatures are hiding in the shadows. Every meeting with these distorted entities becomes a test of strength. Exploring eerie locations, including an abandoned church, a witch’s house and a haunted cemetery, is fraught with mortal danger.

item.title: Void Miner – Incremental Asteroids Roguelite
item.description: Game Description Void Miner – Incremental Asteroids Roguelite, a retro-stylized roguelike shooter that immerses you in the atmosphere of classic arcade games and invites you to take control of a spaceship to clear endless asteroid fields. The main task is to methodically destroy waves of space debris filling hostile space. Gamers will have to not only dodge countless threats, but also conduct targeted fire, turning chaotic clusters into valuable resources for further development.

item.title: Beyond R: Rule Ripper
item.description: Game Description Beyond R: Rule Ripper is a visual novel that places ten strangers in a ruthless game of survival. Finding themselves locked in the mysterious Golden Jack bar, they learn from the mysterious Boss that they have been poisoned. The only chance of salvation lies in following the rules or breaking them completely, setting the stage for a tense psychological thriller. The ultimate goal for each of the captives is to survive until there are three or fewer people left alive.

item.title: Shatterland
item.description: Game Description Shatterland, the plot of which tells the story of a dramatic confrontation between two clones, invites you to immerse yourself in a world destroyed by the rage of one of them. The main character is one of the last survivors, pursued by his crazed brother, who destroyed the laboratory and all their creators. To survive, the protagonist will have to travel through the remains of civilization, restoring fragments of lost memory and discovering hidden abilities.

item.title: CLAWPUNK
item.description: Game Description CLAWPUNK, a 2D action-platformer with roglite elements, takes you to a dystopian city overrun by hostile factions and street gangs. The main goal is to recapture the metropolis from a tyrant named Mister Fluffy, a former ally who betrayed his relatives and expelled all the cats. The liberation mission falls on the shoulders of a squad of 9 unique cat heroes with a total of 9 lives per playthrough.

item.title: Driving Life
item.description: Game Description Driving Life is a detailed simulator that offers you to master more than 40 types of transport in the setting of rural America. Players will explore a vast open world of 16 km², where they can not only complete work tasks, but also buy and sell 16 unique houses. Of particular interest is the mechanics of restoring 6 project cars, parts for which are scattered throughout the island. In addition to managing finances, it is necessary to constantly monitor the basic needs of the character: hunger, thirst, sleep and even boredom, which significantly increases the level of immersion in what is happening.

item.title: Midnight Study
item.description: Game Description Midnight Study is a card-based roguelike horror game in which four high school girls must take back control of a school overrun by vengeful ghosts. You control four heroines, each of whom has a unique fighting style: archer Haneul, kendo master Sumi, chemist Arin and athlete Mirae. Their shared shamanic power allows them to use special talismans in battle. The project’s combat system is based on launching projectiles that ricochet off walls and other objects to hit placed amulets and drive out enemies blocking the path.

item.title: SCHROTT
item.description: Game Description SCHROTT is a roguelike racing game where performing crazy stunts and collecting valuable loot provide the basis for deep vehicle customization. Instead of ordinary machines, there are absurd designs that lend themselves to all sorts of improvements to wreak even more chaos. Each race turns into a hunt for resources that allow you to turn your car into a unique weapon of destruction on the road. Arcade controls make the gameplay accessible and intuitive from the first minutes, and high-speed action does not let you relax.

item.title: Soba's Gunpaw
item.description: Game Description Sobas Gunpaw is a dynamic action game in the style of Bullet Heaven, where survival directly depends on the constant and systematic strengthening of the protagonist. At the heart of it all is an extensive skill system that provides access to numerous character upgrades. The progression process is built on the cyclical destruction of everything on the screen, which allows you to accumulate valuable assets. It is these materials collected from defeated enemies that open new branches in the branched tree of talents.

item.title: DEFRAG
item.description: Game Description DEFRAG becomes a real optimization test for the gamer, since the project requires a careful approach to creating an effective system. The goal is to eliminate digital viruses that have infected system sectors. To achieve success, you will have to collect the resources necessary to strengthen the nodes. Combining these elements allows you to discover new fighting styles, which adds variety to the passage. The effectiveness of weapons is customized using special modules that form the basis for unique assemblies.

item.title: Fracturefront
item.description: Game Description Fracturefront is a third-person fantasy action roguelike in which players must stop the Dimensional Harvester Kaos, who is manipulating rifts to consume entire worlds. This powerful antagonist uses portals to instantly move and drain energy, and battles with him take place in several intense stages. Throughout the battle, he is able to call upon the echoes of fallen worlds, making the confrontation more difficult. The warrior’s ultimate mission is to prevent the collapse of the energy core, for which it is necessary to penetrate desecrated dimensions and destroy ominous altars that drain life forces.

item.title: GigaSword
item.description: Game Description The hero’s adventures in GigaSword allow you to visit many dark dungeons where you will have to face dangerous monsters and deadly traps. Users are forced to move the character through two-dimensional locations with a side view, jumping over platforms using special abilities. The protagonist named Ezr has an ancient and heavy sword, which weighs down the character and affects his movement. Users need to calculate the speed of swinging weapons when fighting with the enemy in order to catch the correct timing and not miss.

item.title: Lia: Hacking Destiny
item.description: Game Description Lia: Hacking Destiny is a side-scrolling roguelite set in a world enslaved by hostile machines. In this setting, the remnants of humanity are waging a guerrilla war, becoming the last hope for freedom. Facing mechanized opponents requires sharp reflexes to dodge attacks and slide along walls. Each raid takes place in unique conditions thanks to the procedural generation of industrial complexes filled with traps and enemies. Successful survival directly depends on constantly improving your equipment and unlocking new abilities.

item.title: Little Corners
item.description: Game Description Little Corners allows you to customize your mystical alchemist’s tower, filling it with flasks, telescopes and ancient tomes, arranged to your liking. At the heart of it all is a meditative creative process of placing stickers, turning a blank canvas into a detailed 3D diorama. There are no time limits or challenging tasks, allowing you to immerse yourself in creating without any pressure. The relaxing atmosphere is supported by an original lo-fi soundtrack that delicately accompanies every action and helps you focus on creativity.

item.title: The Salesman
item.description: Game Description The Salesman plunges you into a dark reality where your own life becomes the main commodity for sale. This psychological horror explores the depths of despair of a man faced with the sudden loss of his job. The main character, left without a livelihood, is forced to make difficult decisions in order not to drown in a debt hole. The process of survival becomes a slow sale of personal belongings, each of which holds a piece of memory and personality.

item.title: The Sushi House
item.description: Game Description The Sushi House is a first-person story-driven adventure where something unsettling and inexplicable lurks behind the façade of an ordinary sushi restaurant. A gradually growing sense of unease becomes the main driver of the narrative, involving us in unraveling the secrets of this place. The initially calm atmosphere gives way to a depressing foreboding, when routine duties begin to seem like part of an ominous mechanism. Every creaking floorboard and unusual shadow makes you doubt the reality of what is happening.

item.title: Duncrush
item.description: Game Description Duncrush is a role-playing clicker game where the depth of character development is achieved through a well-developed skill tree and unique equipment. Creating your own strategy becomes possible thanks to powerful blades, shields and accessories found in battle. All this equipment is necessary to strengthen the hero, preparing to meet stronger opponents. Exploring numerous dungeons, each with unique challenges and rewards, forms the core of the gameplay. In these dangerous journeys, the protagonist is helped by mercenaries who fight shoulder to shoulder.

item.title: Goodnight Universe
item.description: Game Description Goodnight Universe puts at the center of the story a six-month-old baby named Isaac, who has not only a developed intellect, but also mysterious psychic abilities. His main desire is to receive the love and recognition of his family, whose members are emotionally distant from each other. However, the gifted child is already being hunted by a shadowy technology corporation pursuing its own goals. In an attempt to improve his relationships with his loved ones and keep his secret, Isaac secretly uses telekinesis and telepathy to solve their problems and ease their mental suffering, while remaining an ordinary baby in their eyes.

item.title: Hymer 2000
item.description: Game Description Hymer 2000 plunges into a melancholy and philosophical story, where a mundane task of disposing of an outdated artificial intelligence module turns into a deep investigation for technician Frank. He is sent to a mysterious residential complex called Hope Residence with the goal of carrying out a complete shutdown of the system named Hymer. However, upon arrival, he is confronted with digital fragments of other people’s memories, mysterious images and long-buried secrets.

item.title: Indies' Lies 2: Fire Seed
item.description: Game Description Indies' Lies 2: Fire Seed is a 2D tactical roguelike where controlling a squad of three heroes becomes a chess match in an ever-changing arena. Every turn requires careful decisions, whether it’s eliminating healers or interrupting attacks from elite opponents. Terrain becomes a full-fledged weapon, allowing you to separate enemy forces and lure bosses into traps. Success depends on the right combination of character skills, such as Qili’s positional combinations, Diego’s counterattack ambushes, or Daniel’s explosions that spread negative effects.

item.title: Rue Valley
item.description: Game Description Rue Valley plunges into the depths of human consciousness, allowing you to live countless lives in the body of one person. Each new cycle of a temporary anomaly becomes a chance to radically change the protagonist’s personality. Yesterday’s cold-blooded loner, inclined to analyze everything, the next day can turn into an expressive melancholic, trusting only instincts. These constant metamorphoses are not just an experiment, but the only tool for unraveling the mystery that holds the hero in an endless day and forces him to fight the shadows of his own mind.

item.title: Schematic Void
item.description: Game Description Schematic Void is a meta-adventure that asks you to take on an unusual mission to complete someone else’s half-finished project. Here the fourth wall is completely broken, and the creator’s unfinished notes are turned into tools for advancement. Interface elements become part of the puzzles, and the rules are constantly rewritten as you progress. Solutions require not so much technical knowledge as ingenuity and innovative thinking, because the logic of the world is subject to its own, very bizarre laws.

item.title: A Planet of Mine MasterMine Edition
item.description: Game Description A Planet of Mine MasterMine Edition is a comprehensive 4X strategy game in which the process of conquering space begins with detailed customization of the universe itself. Players are given the opportunity to set parameters for a procedurally generated star system, determining the type of sun, the number of planets and the distance to them. The path to dominance can lie through diplomacy, trade or open military clashes, and the conflict can be ended either by the complete defeat of the opponent or by signing a peace treaty.

item.title: Cyber ​​Shard Clicker
item.description: Game Description Cyber ​​Shard Clicker is an incremental project that focuses on strategic development and constant enhancement of hacking capabilities. The central element of the entire progression system is a branched skill tree, offering tactical choices between immediate improvements and permanent bonuses. The latter guarantee a significant advantage in future hacking attempts. The resource for acquiring new skills are data fragments obtained in the process of destroying geometric defense systems. Each click turns into a pulse of digital destruction, aimed at destroying enemy polygonal shields, cubic guards and triangular drones.

item.title: Find The Key 2
item.description: Game Description Find The Key 2 is a surreal journey through abstract worlds, where conventional logic gives way to deep symbolism. The protagonist is surrounded by a minimalist but stylized three-dimensional space filled with bizarre metaphors and allegorical images. Each location is a cinematic scene that contains a hidden message that makes you think about what is happening. The main task is to find a way out of this labyrinth of meanings, where walls block the way, and the only door does not have a visible lock, but requires a special key to open.

item.title: Million Depth
item.description: Game Description Million Depth offers a unique tactical experience where survival is directly dependent on the ability to manage time. The main character, Moma, has a device known as a biotope jammer, which allows her to completely freeze a moment while she herself remains motionless. This mechanic becomes the basis of the combat system: dangerous creatures hiding in the shadows of dungeons make their move only after the actions of the protagonist.

item.title: The Single-Eye Nightmare
item.description: Game Description The Single-Eye Nightmare is a frightening dive into the depths of a long-abandoned underground temple, where the oppressive silence is broken only by the echo of your own footsteps. Instead of treasures and ancient artifacts, winding corridors and dark tunnels conceal a deadly threat, forcing you to constantly be on alert. A monstrous creature is constantly following on the heels - a cyclops, a meeting with which does not bode well, because his only eye sees in the darkness.

item.title: Unpetrified: Echoes of Nature
item.description: Game Description Unpetrified: Echoes of Nature invites you to immerse yourself in a world where the weather and nature itself directly depend on the emotions of a stone golem. This magically reborn creature embarks on a journey of self-discovery, seeking not only to find his purpose, but also to restore harmony. The surrounding world is a single organism, where the emotional state of the protagonist in real time shapes the weather and influences the behavior of animals.

item.title: Wall World 2
item.description: Game Description Wall World 2 continues the exploration of the vertical world. Players will control a complex spider robot as they delve into procedurally generated mines to mine resources and search for lost artifacts. The machine and its pilot will have to fight hostile organisms inhabiting the dark depths of the structure. Each expedition aims to discover forgotten technologies and uncover the fundamental secrets hidden within this massive structure. The entire experience is focused on survival, managing supplies, and battling the horrors that lurk in the darkness.

item.title: Wartorn
item.description: Game Description Wartorn follows the journey of sisters Yara and Elani, who have been exiled from their home and must traverse a world riven by conflict. They lead a caravan through the Talaura Islands, seeking safety in their ancestral fortress, Beinun. The expedition involves controlling a squad of fantastic creatures in numerous battles in real time. Along the way, they must also find lost relatives to piece together their story. The player’s actions determine the survival of this group in a hostile environment.

item.title: Windswept
item.description: Game Description Windswept takes users on an adventure filled with nostalgia and excitement. It features a dynamic duo consisting of a duck and a turtle who find themselves torn from their home due to a severe storm. The main character will have to lead them back to a safe place. The platformer has a ’90s feel, with vibrant visuals, catchy tunes, and levels that will test your skills. Windswept features over 40 carefully designed stages spread across 5 authentic regions, each with its own unique atmosphere and hidden surprises, so there’s never a dull moment.

item.title: Below the Crown
item.description: Game Description Below the Crown takes you on a retro adventure where a deep secret lurks behind the façade of a treasure hunt. Periodic glitches on the screen interrupt the process, prompting you to take psychological tests. The answers to these questions gradually reveal the true background of the events, in the center of which is a powerful wizard, forced to go down into the dungeons. His main mission is to mine gold for the Emperor using unusual tactical skills.

item.title: Donna: The Canine Quest
item.description: Game Description Donna: The Canine Quest is a pixel action role-playing game in which the central place is given to the story of saving the magical world from the demonic threat hanging over it. Exploring the colorful world of Barkhaven, ranging from sun-drenched fields to ancient ruins and enemy-infested forests, is seamlessly combined with dynamic combat. Gameplay is built around a combination of fast-paced hack-and-slash combat, collecting valuable loot, and using a simple but functional crafting system.

item.title: King of Bones
item.description: Game Description In King of Bones, the main goal is to dominate prehistoric arenas in battles with realistic physics. The combat system conveys the weight and power of every encounter as all bites and strikes interact with physically simulated bodies in real time. Gamers dash, stomp and headbutt in fast-paced battles where creatures fight to the last. An attacking Triceratops can throw an enemy into the air, and small raptors can grab onto larger opponents right during a fight.

item.title: Lost Paws
item.description: Game Description Lost Paws is a survival simulator in which you take on the role of a stray dog ​​named Doggo and explore a large open world faced with the mysterious disappearance of all your pets. Personalization of the protagonist is implemented through an equipment system that allows you to find and try on a variety of accessories. There are dozens of items scattered throughout the world, including hats, glasses and even shoes, which are stored in separate inventory slots.

item.title: Nitroglycerine!
item.description: Game Description Nitroglycerine! is a test where the main task is to transport a deadly substance along difficult routes. The process of controlling a heavy tractor is subject to the laws of realistic physics, and the vehicle itself is completely unsuitable for overcoming obstacles along the way. Any mistake in piloting, sharp turn or collision can lead to the detonation of nitroglycerin and instant failure of the mission. Even climbing moderately steep slopes requires precise timing, and putting too much pressure on the engine via turbocharging risks stalling the engine.

item.title: Siegeturtle
item.description: Game Description Siegeturtle is a role-playing project with roguelite and auto-battler elements, which tells the story of the journey of a lonely turtle who is desperately trying to return home. The main character is a creature armed with a cannon, making its way through enemy waves in endless and ever-changing swims. Each new run brings fresh upgrades, teammates and loot, creating a cozy atmosphere and a sense of unstoppable power. At the heart of the story is a metaphor for personal growth, where strength is found through the bonds of friendship formed over a long and dangerous journey.

item.title: VORON: Raven's Story
item.description: Game Description VORON: Raven’s Story tells an emotional story about life and death from an unusual perspective. The main character is a raven who is destined to become a guide to lost souls, helping them find their way to a new world. Starting his journey as a chick, he gradually turns into a mythical creature from ancient legends. However, his very first mission turns into disaster when an ancient evil awakens, disrupting the established order.

item.title: Yes, My Queen
item.description: Game Description Yes, My Queen is a tactical strategy game where magic and absurd tricks break the canonical rules of chess. To break free from captivity, you will have to defeat a chain of opponents in a series of fights, whose power is constantly increasing, which will require both a sharp mind and a willingness to disregard the foundations. There are over forty different cards at your disposal, the use of which can radically change the situation on the board.

item.title: Dragon Blazers
item.description: Game Description Adventures in Dragon Blazers take players into a fantasy setting where they have to take control of a mighty warrior. The hero masters mysterious combat techniques that will be useful in clashes against cyber ninjas. The game is made in the form of a classic arcade adventure game, drawn in retro pixel graphics. Users will wander through two-dimensional locations with a side view, encountering problems such as landscape obstacles (pits, hills, traps) and opponents.

item.title: Drill Bird
item.description: Game Description Drill Bird invites you to immerse yourself in a world where every foray underground is critical. As darkness falls, the depths become filled with danger, forcing you to rush back to the safety of your nest. This story of survival and care is told without a single word, creating a special atmosphere in which comfort is mixed with constant tension. Every decision made directly affects the outcome, because time is running out inexorably, and the creatures waiting in the darkness do not forgive mistakes, turning each expedition into a risky undertaking.

item.title: Hypogea
item.description: Game Description Hypogea plunges into the depths of an abandoned underground megastructure, where a lone automaton awakens. The visual design, inspired by early 2000s graphics, creates a unique atmosphere of mystery and desolation that permeates every winding corridor and echoing hall of this gigantic complex. The storyline unfolds without a single dialogue, inviting you to piece together a mosaic of the past from scattered environmental clues and environmental details. The main task of the protagonist is to find a way to freedom, but his mission does not end there.

item.title: THRASHER
item.description: Game Description THRASHER is a psychedelic arcade odyssey where music, visuals and the process itself are woven into a single transcendental stream that immerses you in a state of flow. The journey takes you from primeval darkness to the heights of celestial bliss, culminating in an intense showdown with a cosmic infant deity. Control the magnificent space eel to gracefully glide and dash across stunning alien worlds in a desperate race for survival.

item.title: Weed Store Simulator
item.description: Game Description Weed Store Simulator is an economic strategy that asks you to build a criminal empire under the guise of a legal store. The entire gameplay is built on a risky balance between the world of law and underground activities. To survive and thrive, you must build complex relationships with various factions, including the police, mafia and street gangs. Any wrong step can lead to disaster: problems with law enforcement agencies threaten raids and business closures, and refusal to cooperate with the mafia will inevitably lead to supply disruptions.

item.title: A Pizza Delivery
item.description: Game Description A Pizza Delivery is about a surreal journey into the depths of other people’s destinies, disguised as an ordinary food delivery. Players will find themselves in a strange liminal space, inhabited by individuals stuck in time and thoughts. Among them are Noby, who is gradually losing his color from the inability to move on, and the Guy with a Backpack, who is trying to realize the emptiness in his relationship.

item.title: Line Clipper: Tennis Tactics
item.description: Game Description Line Clipper: Tennis Tactics is a tactical tennis simulator in which the outcome of the match is decided not by the speed of reaction, but by the depth of strategic planning. The gameplay is based on a turn-based system that encourages you to focus on analyzing your opponent’s playing style to gain a decisive advantage. A key mechanic is the ability to line up the perfect shot and pre-simulate its outcome before committing to the action on the court.

item.title: Lone Fungus: Melody of Spores
item.description: Game Description Lone Fungus: Melody of Spores tells the story of an ancient era when the mushroom tribes were on the verge of extinction. The cause of the disaster was a mythical creature known as the Spiritual Beast, tearing their civilization apart. At the center of events is the ancestor of Greencup, who is destined to fulfill an ancient prophecy. He will become Hiertan, a cultural leader capable of uniting disparate clans to jointly confront a common threat.

item.title: Mecha Blitz
item.description: Game Description Mecha Blitz is an anime-inspired, isometric top-down shooter where players build mechs and engage in chaotic arena battles. The process of creating your own mech, called an Arbiter, offers access to over 100 parts, internal components and weapons. In addition to extensive cosmetic options, there is an upgrade system to improve equipment, abilities and characteristics. The depth of tactical capabilities is revealed through the creation of unique builds. You can design both a mobile but vulnerable vehicle and a heavily armored fortress, which directly affects the style of combat.

item.title: Mercantile Might
item.description: Game Description Mercantile Might is a detailed ruler simulator that asks you to take control of a small medieval settlement and lead it to prosperity through competent strategic planning. The basis for future greatness is social institutions, because it is a strong system of health care, education and law and order that distinguishes a great city from a simple settlement. The creation of a developed healthcare and education system allows not only to improve the quality of life of citizens and ensure the stability of the population, but also to accelerate technological progress.

item.title: My Little Spider
item.description: Game Description My Little Spider invites you to fill out Bugopedia, an extensive catalog of over 50 species of insects. To find everything from the common blue blowfly to the beautiful monarch, you’ll have to keep a close eye on the in-game clock, as many species only appear at certain times. This difficult task is performed by a charming pet spider, who has taken up residence right on your desktop. He independently weaves a web and catches beetles flying by while the gamer goes about his business.

item.title: Paracom
item.description: Game Description Paracom is a tactical horror role-playing game in which managing a task force is complicated not only by encounters with monsters, but also by psychological tension within the squad. Each soldier has his own point of view and may question the commander’s orders if he considers them illogical or irrational. The anomalous zone itself is a living mind that changes its behavior in response to the actions of the players.

item.title: Reentry - An Orbital Simulator
item.description: Game Description Reentry - An Orbital Simulator will tell about the everyday life of real astronauts participating in space programs. The game presents models of real vehicles that have ever left our planet. Having created your astronaut, manage his career and each flight. Each completed task will bring experience. Among these there will be both operations already written into history, and fictional ones that are designed to give the player a feel for themselves in unprecedented circumstances.

item.title: Restaurants
item.description: Game Description Restaurats is a medieval restaurant management simulator where the main characters are a team of resourceful rats. Gamers will have to take full control over all aspects of running a business in a fantasy world. The process includes not only preparing dishes according to a variety of recipes, but also submitting orders on time, as well as maintaining order on the tables. The development of the establishment occurs gradually, opening up access to new drawings to expand the tavern and improve its functionality.

item.title: Session Notes: Route 404
item.description: Game Description Session Notes: Route 404, a first-person psychological survival horror game, follows the story of a former bus steward. His attempt to return to normal life turns into a nightmare journey, where the line between reality and illusion is erased forever. The protagonist will have to fulfill his direct responsibilities: serve passengers, solve their problems and monitor the condition of transport. However, every action takes place under the yoke of the past, because the trauma experienced constantly distorts the perception of the world around us, turning an ordinary trip into a surreal thriller with several possible endings.

item.title: Skopje '83
item.description: Game Description Skopje ‘83 is a tactical shooter with a comic book visual style, immersing you in the dark atmosphere of an alternative history of the Balkans. The only island of relative safety in a city engulfed in chaos is the DOM bus. This mobile base not only serves as a means of navigating dangerous streets, but also as a workshop for upgrading your equipment. Inside it, you can modify your character and save valuable loot collected during forays.

item.title: Tiny Auto Knights
item.description: Game Description Tiny Auto Knights is a deep tactical challenge where the main goal is to survive for as many rounds as possible. The key to success is the ability to assemble a combat-ready team, wisely combining the unique effects of more than 50 available characters. The key mechanic is the merging of identical fighters, which allows you to raise them to level 3 and mark them with a gold star.

item.title: Bloodgrounds
item.description: Game Description Bloodgrounds is a tactical roguelike where every battle in the arena could be the gladiator’s last. Turn-based battles take place on a grid map, requiring the commander to wisely spend action points on movement and attacks. Using class abilities, setting traps, and using consumable items such as potions or scrolls becomes the key to survival. After defeating an enemy fighter, you have to make a choice: show mercy by adding a new warrior to your squad, or execute him for the amusement of a bloodthirsty public, receiving more generous rewards in return.

item.title: Click to Civ
item.description: Game Description Click to Civ is an incremental strategy game where the main goal is to help crashed aliens. The plot revolves around the emergency landing of their ship on prehistoric Earth, where the survivors find themselves surrounded by primitive tribes. The only way to return home is to accelerate the evolution of humanity, taking it from stone tools to interstellar technology. The basis of progress are special signs of civilization, obtained from the destruction of ancient monoliths.

item.title: Cosmic Coop
item.description: Game Description Cosmic Coop is an adventure that takes gamers to their own extraterrestrial farm, beyond which lie uncharted territories full of mysteries and strange NPCs. Descent into the mysterious mines will require courage and a faithful sword, because not only treasures await there, but also various challenges. It is in such forays that one can discover rare materials necessary to create unique items that can transform a personal farmstead and attract the attention of amazing creatures to it.

item.title: Deep Space Exploitation
item.description: Game Description Deep Space Exploitation is a space mining simulator in which pilots have to work for a dubious corporation in the distant future. The storyline, spanning a prologue and several epilogues, challenges gamers to survive under harsh corporate oppression. The main gameplay comes down to the exploration of asteroid fields, where not only courage is required, but also extreme caution to successfully extract resources. Every decision made directly affects the further development of events and the ability to secure a decent future for oneself.

item.title: Dinocop
item.description: Game Description Dinocop is a detective adventure that takes you deep into the investigation of a dinosaur rights convention held at the Cretaceous Hotel. An anonymous denunciation was received about serving illegal human flesh to guests, and now the first lizard policeman in history will have to get to the bottom of the truth. Armed with a magnifying glass to search for clues and relying on the dinosaur’s keen senses, the protagonist interviews witnesses and explores the environment.

item.title: DOG WITCH
item.description: Game Description DOG WITCH is a tactical roguelike that immerses you in an absurd world filled with bizarre opponents. On the way, you’ll encounter heavily armed nesting dolls, vengeful Koto-Ladies, and even dubious milk vending machines. Each encounter with these enemies is a puzzle that requires careful planning and adaptation to constantly changing battle conditions. The hero will have to overcome the consequences of a curse imposed by carelessly drinking a potion from a mysterious wizard.

item.title: Egging On
item.description: Game Description Egging On is a brutal test where every wrong move sends the fragile egg-shaped protagonist back to where he started. There’s no save system, making vertical climbing a tense test of precision and patience. To achieve the cherished freedom, you have to perfectly master difficult physics, feeling every vibration and roll of your fragile shell. Success depends on the ability to synchronize the rotation with the jump to achieve maximum height, because any mistake threatens to fall and the need to start all over again.

item.title: Electronics Store Simulator
item.description: Game Description Electronics Store Simulator presents the entrepreneur with a complex task of managing a high-tech business, where it is necessary to constantly adapt to market conditions. Success directly depends on the ability to analyze demand for various product categories, from smartphones and laptops to drones. You have to balance between purchasing popular gadgets and managing inventory to avoid shortages or excess products. Setting competitive prices and providing a high level of customer service become the foundation for creating a loyal audience and, as a result, increasing the company’s profits.

item.title: Jitter
item.description: Game Description Jitter is a sci-fi simulator that immerses you in the dark atmosphere of the consequences of a catastrophe in the Main Asteroid Belt. A once-bustling mining colony lies in ruins after a mysterious incident, and the truth behind what happened must be uncovered in the rubble. The danger comes not only from the destroyed environment, but also from pirates or even unknown life forms lurking in the shadows. To survive and complete the mission, you must carefully explore abandoned mines, colossal cave systems and remote outposts scattered across the surface of a giant asteroid.

item.title: My Little Puppy
item.description: Game Description My Little Puppy is a touching tale of devotion set in an unusual afterlife. The protagonist will have to cross vast deserts, snow-capped mountain plateaus and deserted meadows, overcoming challenges that combine elements of adventure, racing and action. At the center of this emotional story is a Welsh Corgi named Bong-gu, who escaped from dog paradise for one single purpose - to find his owner. This journey will take him through worlds teetering on the brink of life and death, where every corner looks both familiar and alien, creating a unique atmosphere.

item.title: Service with a Shotgun
item.description: Game Description Service with a Shotgun plunges you into an absurd reality where retail rules apply even during a zombie apocalypse. The main task becomes not only survival among the hordes of the undead, but also high-quality service to the eccentric customers lining up at the half-empty shelves. While the living dead are wandering outside the window, a real drama is unfolding inside the store: you need to speak quickly, shoot accurately and build defensive structures in order to survive the next work shift.

item.title: Star Ores Inc.
item.description: Game Description Star Ores Inc. — a journey into the depths of space, where you will take control of an abandoned station, turning it into the center of a mining empire. Located in the middle of an asteroid field, this complex becomes the starting point for the career of an intergalactic entrepreneur. The initial steps involve manual work, using a high-tech laser drill to cut through the asteroids yourself to extract valuable minerals.

item.title: The Last Caretaker
item.description: Game Description The Last Caretaker is a story of survival in a world where hostile mechanisms and a constant lack of resources force you to act methodically. The gameplay is based on the exploration of abandoned structures towering over the endless ocean. Each rusty tower or silent dock becomes a source of valuable materials obtained by dismantling the remains of a former civilization. Not only tools and weapons are created from the recovered scrap, but also complex energy networks.

item.title: There Are No Orcs
item.description: Game Description There Are No Orcs plunges you into a world of total war and continuous battles, where huge armies clash on the battlefields. Battles take place in four different biomes, from scorched lands to frozen tundra, requiring the commander to adapt tactics to the conditions of the terrain. In this chaos of large-scale clashes, the commander will have to lead his legions to victory. At the same time, one detail unites all warriors, regardless of their origin - a strange green shade of skin, the reasons for which are not usually discussed in this world.

item.title: Tiny Lands 2
item.description: Game Description Tiny Lands 2 invites you to immerse yourself in exploring detailed 3D dioramas made in a photorealistic style. Using the orbital camera, you can freely examine each miniature scene from any angle, looking for the smallest inconsistencies between the two compositions. The process of finding differences is devoid of haste, because there are no timers or any penalties for incorrect actions. This allows you to fully concentrate on contemplative gameplay and enjoy every hand-crafted detail.

item.title: Dead Static Drive
item.description: Game Description Dead Static Drive is a constantly collapsing apocalyptic world. Someone is always chasing the hero, and dangerous and creepy monsters begin to crawl out of the ground. You can continue to run from them, or turn around and fight back. A variety of weapons, from chainsaws to guns, and other survivors will help you with this. But you should be careful, because not all people you meet will be good.

item.title: Deadcam
item.description: Game Description Deadcam is a psychological horror game where the feeling of fear is fueled by the ability to see yourself through the eyes of a ruthless stalker. The main character finds himself locked within the walls of an abandoned rural house along with Margot, a former film crew colleague who has turned into a deadly threat. Her head-mounted camera continues to work, broadcasting in real time her distorted face and every step that brings her closer to her victim.

item.title: Dice Dice Baby
item.description: Game Description Dice Dice Baby is a gambling roguelike where the main goal is to deceive the casino using special dice. To beat the establishment, you have to not just rely on luck, but actively change the rules in your favor. Dozens of types of special dice with unique properties and more than 100 amulets that provide access to dishonest strategies and the creation of powerful builds help with this.

item.title: Eventide Matter
item.description: Game Description Eventide Matter is a 2D adventure where the survival of civilization depends on the construction of an interdimensional portal. The unknown continuum into which the protagonist finds himself turns out to be a hostile environment. Local crystalline life forms perceive the newcomer as an invader and attack without hesitation, trying to destroy any of his creations. As the pilot of the ship, Vanguard Unit 4 will have to operate under constant threat.

item.title: Generation Exile
item.description: Game Description Generation Exile offers an atypical take on the city-building simulation genre. Instead of developing new territories and endless mining, we have to find a balance in a closed system. Progress is to create closed cycles where biological waste is transformed into nutrients or raw materials for bioplastics using anaerobic reactors. Each step in this step-by-step project requires careful planning of resources, since they cannot be replenished from the outside, and the goal is sustainability, not endless growth.

item.title: PLAGUN – The Plague Goes On
item.description: Game Description PLAGUN – The Plague Goes On is a dark world of a fallen kingdom, destroyed by a failed immortality vaccine and turned into an arena for survival. Instead of healing, civilization received an endless plague that gave birth to regenerating horrors. In this setting, a former doctor, now a monster in a mask, will have to fight back the endless hordes of the infected. His task is not just to survive, but also to uncover the dark secret behind the disaster that destroyed everything around him.

item.title: Second Sun
item.description: Game Description Second Sun is a journey through a picturesque world created in an impressionistic style. Here, vast open spaces juxtapose with procedurally generated dungeons to ensure that every encounter is unique. Enemy placements, loot caches, and important locations are also generated randomly, forcing constant adaptation. The main goal is to return the fading light of the Good Sun, because it is for the sake of saving these beautiful but devastated lands that the struggle is being waged.

item.title: Strange Seed
item.description: Game Description Strange Seed is a project where survival depends not so much on reflexes, but on thoughtful mutation. Fighting enemies, including ferocious Soulslike bosses, requires creating a creature with the optimal set of body parts for a given situation. Victory is achieved not by brute force, but by a competent selection of evolutionary improvements, turning each battle into a tactical puzzle. Sophisticated strategies allow you to find vulnerabilities in even the most formidable creatures, opening up opportunities for unconventional victories.

item.title: The Fable: Manga Build Roguelike
item.description: Game Description The Fable: Manga Build Roguelike is a tactical project that allows you to control three unique characters with dissimilar fighting styles. The legendary killer Akira masterfully wields both firearms and melee weapons in close combat. His partner Yoko prefers surprise attacks from the shadows and high mobility to deceive opponents. A cold-blooded killer named Suzuki relies on cunning traps and weakening techniques to offer a completely different approach to combat.

item.title: Snowfall's Mystery
item.description: Game Description Snowfall’s Mystery plunges into the mind of a student computer programmer named Elliot, who encounters a mysterious program during the cold winter of 1999. An ordinary floppy disk received from a friend becomes the source of inexplicable events when the Snowfall messenger contained on it begins a dialogue. The program demonstrates a frightening awareness of the hero’s inner world, and the mysterious Administrator gets in touch, pursuing unknown goals.

item.title: Tavern Keeper
item.description: Game Description Tavern Keeper is a management simulator that dives into the intricacies of running a fantasy tavern. Here every little thing matters, from simulating the temperature and spoilage of food in the cellar to the likelihood of a fire from a spark from the fireplace. The success of an establishment directly depends on the ability to cope with such situations, be it a sudden illness of a cleaner or furniture breakdown in the middle of the evening.

item.title: Car Factory Empire
item.description: Game Description Car Factory Empire - testing the effectiveness of self-designed cars takes place on race tracks, where artificial intelligence acts as an opponent. However, success in the races is only part of the global struggle for market dominance. Competitors are actively fighting for control of resource-rich territories and key cities. Providing production capacity with raw materials by capturing mines and factories on the world map becomes a primary task for any aspiring industrialist.

item.title: Count Meowcula's Barbershop
item.description: Game Description Count Meowcula’s Barbershop offers an extraordinary experience where every action requires precision and quick reflexes. As the bloodlust builds, tool control is inverted, turning a routine beard trim into a tense ordeal. An unsuccessful cut or a bloody incident instantly damages the reputation of the establishment, forcing it to immediately hide any evidence. Ignoring even one spot can cost customers' trust and lead to failure. This simulator forces you to constantly be on your guard, because beauty, as you know, requires sacrifice.

item.title: Legends of Dragaea: Idle Dungeons
item.description: Game Description Legends of Dragaea Idle Dungeons is a journey through a mysterious continent, where the main character arrives, guided by a mysterious dream. Here you will have to found your own guild of adventurers and uncover the secrets of the ancient land. The main process is based on managing squads that independently explore dangerous dungeons in search of treasure and glory. The player is assigned the role of a strategist who determines the composition of the teams, their equipment and development paths.

item.title: Mall Simulator
item.description: Game Description Mall Simulator is a test of management skills where maintaining financial balance is the key to prosperity. To prevent bankruptcy, it is necessary to be sensitive to consumer trends and set thoughtful prices for goods. The satisfaction of each visitor becomes a paramount task, the solution of which directly affects the success of the entire enterprise. You have to constantly monitor the assortment, enter into partnerships with famous brands and decorate the space, creating the ideal atmosphere for shopping.

item.title: No Human Shall Pass
item.description: Game Description No Human Shall Pass is an intense rogue-like shooter about the last stronghold of humanity, plunging into a dark world overrun by deadly machines. As the only survivor, you have to complete a simple but brutal mission: fight your way through the ruins of a destroyed city, destroying countless hordes of hostile robots. Each combat mission takes place in randomly generated locations, which ensures the uniqueness of each passage.

item.title: Rubble Eats The World
item.description: Game Description Rubble Eats The World is a shooter with an advanced physics model, where almost any object on the level is subject to destruction and subsequent absorption. After completing the main story campaign, additional opportunities open up for gamers. The built-in sandbox editor allows you to design your own testing grounds and share them with other players. For those looking for a real challenge, there is a difficulty setting system.

item.title: The Remains and The Residue
item.description: Game Description The Remains and The Residue is a psychological adventure where the line between fiction and reality is rapidly thinning. The story begins in a quiet room, where the flickering TV screen and the creaking of the door create an oppressive feeling of constant surveillance. The protagonist will have to immerse himself in fragmentary stories, putting together a complete picture from fragments of someone else’s past. Here every detail matters, and fictional worlds begin to dangerously leak into reality, forcing you to doubt what is happening.

item.title: Cats and Cups
item.description: Game Description Cats and Cups is a simulator for managing your own establishment, where the path from a simple barista to a real business tycoon requires attention to every detail. The success of the establishment directly depends on the timely modernization of equipment, which allows for significantly faster service to visitors. Good business management includes not only working behind the counter, but also constantly monitoring the stock of ingredients. Thoughtful improvements to all aspects of the cafe open up access to new, more complex recipes and allow you to turn a modest coffee shop into the most popular place in town, attracting more and more furry customers.

item.title: Solomon's Boneyard: Hideous Retro Edition
item.description: Game Description Solomon’s Boneyard Hideous Retro Edition is an explosive mixture of several genres, dressed in stylish retro graphics. This project is an isometric action game that organically combines elements of a bagel, a role-playing system and a dynamic twin-stick shooter. The gameplay is based on exploring dungeons and clearing locations from countless enemies, which turns each session into a real hell of shells. The protagonist will have to use magical abilities to survive in this dark fantasy world, where the atmosphere of hopelessness is diluted with notes of black humor and comedic situations.

item.title: Solomon's Keep: Dreadful Retro Edition
item.description: Game Description Solomon’s Keep: Dreadful Retro Edition is a perilous climb to the top of a dark tower to destroy the most powerful necromancer these lands have ever known. The hero will have to make his way through a series of ominous floors, where every step threatens a collision with the minions of dark magic. The ultimate goal of this risky journey is to reach the abode of the main antagonist and put an end to his atrocities.

item.title: The Boss Gangsters: Nightlife
item.description: Game Description The Boss Gangsters Nightlife is a simulator where the path to power lies through managing shady deals and ruthlessly fighting for territory. Interaction with corrupt police officers and influential officials becomes a tool for achieving goals, and the elimination of competitors becomes a severe necessity. Every decision made shapes a reputation in the criminal world, opening up access to new opportunities or provoking brutal raids on a business. Risky black market activities, such as arms trafficking, promise quick profits, but can lead to the loss of everything.

item.title: 7th Floor
item.description: Game Description 7th Floor plunges you into an atmosphere of despair where survival requires constant adaptation. Confrontation with terrible monsters gives way to the need to hide from the inexorable doctor who is hot on the hero’s heels. The gameplay is divided into sections, combining horror and action elements. All events unfold from the first person, which enhances the effect of presence and forces you to carefully examine the environment in search of useful objects and clues.

item.title: Echoes of the Living
item.description: Game Description Echoes of the Living is a chilling classic survival horror game that will keep you on the edge of your seat! Taking inspiration from the greatest hits of the 90s, this game takes horror to a whole new level. You will be completely immersed in a dark and frightening world, filled with unspeakable horrors and secrets that have yet to be revealed. As you explore a small town located in northern Europe, you quickly realize that something is wrong.

item.title: Ramona
item.description: Game Description Ramona takes a young journalist named Samuel on a frightening journey where reality and hallucination merge. The events take place in the 1970s inside an old house, the walls of which are saturated with old secrets and deep remorse. The hero will have to plunge into the claustrophobic atmosphere of psychological horror, making the transition between light and darkness in search of truth. Each room of this ominous place becomes an arena for exploration, forcing the protagonist to confront someone else’s disturbing memories that should have been buried long ago.

item.title: RazePact
item.description: Game Description A fast-paced action-platformer hybrid, RazePact takes gamers into a dark dungeon inspired by classics of the genre. A small wandering soul named Soul falls under control, seeking answers to questions about his past and origin. Her journey is not just an attempt to break free, but a way to discover herself and uncover the secrets of a mysterious place. On the path to the truth, the heroine will have to face numerous opponents, where each battle makes the spirit stronger, gradually bringing her closer to the solution.

item.title: Silly Survivors
item.description: Game Description Silly Survivors is a casual action game in which the protagonist will have to repel the attacks of hordes of funny ghosts. A brave fluffy fox falls under control, for which the only means of defense is an ordinary flashlight. Despite their comical appearance and ridiculous behavior, otherworldly entities pose a serious threat. They constantly try to get closer to the character in order to pull off some trick that turns out to be fatal.

item.title: Syrup 2: Candy Alchemy RPG
item.description: Game Description Syrup 2: Candy Alchemy RPG is a role-playing adventure where the alchemical synthesis of sweets is a central element of the gameplay. The main task for the protagonist named Syrup is to significantly enrich the assortment of her confectionery shop Atelier Sweets. To do this, you need to travel, collecting rare components from all over the world. Defeating magical opponents provides access to unique ingredients needed to create new treats.

item.title: Testimonium
item.description: Game Description Testimonium plunges into a chilling story, the starting point of which is a mysterious package left at the front door. Inside the package, only an old video cassette is found without any identification marks, with the exception of a mysterious symbol burned into the body. The absence of the sender and the ominous discovery create an immediate sense of unease, which is heightened by the visual style, which is deliberately aged and reminiscent of ’90s-era video footage.

item.title: Leaf it Alone
item.description: Game Description Leaf it Alone is a simulator where completely clearing each individual area of ​​the yard is rewarded with permanent upgrades, such as running faster or being able to tie bags faster. The arsenal for tidying up includes a rake and a powerful blower, as well as the ability to collect leaves manually. It’s especially fun to work with the rake, which allows you to pull down large piles in one smooth motion thanks to the sticking effect at high pumping levels.

item.title: Silver Bullet
item.description: Game Description Silver Bullet is an arcade shooting gallery in which the protagonist will have to clear static screens from numerous waves of enemies. The famous monster hunter Van Helsing falls under the control of the gamer, who will have to go through 12 levels. The gameplay requires precise actions, since simultaneous movement and firing are not provided. To survive, you must constantly evade threats and choose the right position to attack.

item.title: Slot and Dungeons
item.description: Game Description Slot and Dungeons is an unusual roguelike, where each expedition into the depths of mysterious ruins begins by chance. The location of all opponents and valuable finds on the floor is determined by the mechanics of the slot machine, which is activated upon entry. This turns each playthrough into a unique challenge, forcing you to constantly adapt your tactics to the given level configuration. Survival depends on the ability to wisely manage resources that appear on the map in a random order.

item.title: Dark Moon
item.description: Game Description Dark Moon is about a near and bleak future. This time, things have become very bad for humanity, not thanks to aliens or nuclear war, but because of the Sun. A storm is raging on the star, which has disabled all equipment on Earth and provoked unrest there. On the Moon, things are even worse: the sun’s rays destroy any objects on the earth’s satellite that they manage to reach.

item.title: Mindscorn
item.description: Game Description Mindscorn immerses you in the oppressive atmosphere of psychological horror, where every decision has weight. Limited ammunition turns any skirmish into a serious test, because each cartridge must be loaded into the weapon manually, counting down precious seconds. Strange creatures living in the dark corridors of the hotel tirelessly pursue their prey, ready to tear it into pieces at the slightest mistake. Survival here directly depends not on accuracy, but on the ability to hide, run away and open fire only in the most extreme cases, when there is no other choice left, and resource management becomes the key to life.

item.title: Truth Universally Acknowledged
item.description: Game Description Truth Universally Acknowledged is a short dating sim where players experience a few days in the life of a typical high school student. The main character is a young man named Talai, whose daily life is filled with study and communication with friends. The narrative revolves around non-linear choices that determine which of four potential partners the protagonist will become romantically involved with. The key feature of the project is the decision-making mechanics: instead of standard text lines, you need to choose Talai’s facial expressions and emotions.

item.title: 1998: The Toll Keeper Story
item.description: Game Description 1998 The Toll Keeper Story - a simulator in which every day at the workplace turns into a test of the strength of moral principles. As Devi, a pregnant toll checkpoint guard, you must make life-changing decisions that determine who gets to travel further and who gets left behind. Document checks and vehicle inspections take place against the backdrop of general chaos engulfing the fictional country of Janapa. Society collapses under the yoke of a financial crisis, protests erupt in the streets, and trust in government evaporates, turning routine work into a series of moral dilemmas.

item.title: As Long As You're Here
item.description: Game Description As Long As You’re Here is a narrative adventure in which the world around the main character constantly and subtly changes, creating a feeling of disorientation. The blurring of boundaries between past and present is a central element through which the vulnerability of an elderly woman named Annie, who suffers from Alzheimer’s disease, is conveyed. Delving into her mind from a first-person perspective, the participants share her doubts and feelings of social isolation.

item.title: Cyber ​​Rats
item.description: Game Description Cyber ​​Rats is a dark dive into a nightmarish scientific complex controlled by a ruthless artificial intelligence. Inside this sinister facility, cruel experiments are carried out on experimental rodents, forcing them to survive in deadly labyrinths. Each escape attempt is unique, as procedural generation constantly changes the structure of the corridors, filling them with new dangers. The path to freedom is blocked not only by sophisticated traps, but also by cybernetic hunters, whose only goal is to eliminate the fugitives.

item.title: Dread Protocol
item.description: Game Description Dread Protocol is a gritty space adventure where the Federation’s enemies wage their war in the corridors of procedurally generated stations. Each foray is a merciless third-person encounter in which even the walls provide no reliable cover and can be destroyed. At the Atax station, improved lighting helps to better navigate the chaos of the battle, while at the Varang facilities a new enemy awaits - the Flamethrower. Boss battles such as Skagz require maximum concentration and skillful use of available equipment.

item.title: Master of Command
item.description: Game Description Master of Command is a project in which command of the armies of the Seven Years' War is presented as a harsh struggle for survival. Resource management is becoming as important as tactical superiority on the battlefield. A commander on a procedurally generated map hidden in the fog of war is constantly faced with a dilemma: make a rapid forced march, risking running out of supplies, or make a stop to replenish supplies, giving the enemy precious time to regroup.

item.title: Outbreak Island
item.description: Game Description Outbreak Island takes place on Erlsen Island. A mysterious virus that came out of nowhere began to drive the inhabitants of a small region crazy. The governments of nearby countries agreed on a secret operation so as not to expose the disaster. The territory was isolated from the rest of the world. The main character, Howard Chapman, secretly arrives on the island to find out the true reasons for the incident.

item.title: Silly Polly Beast
item.description: Game Description Silly Polly Beast is a dive into a nightmarish and often abstract underground world shrouded in a deadly fog. In this ominous dimension, the main character will have to adapt to cruel rules in order to survive. A special bracelet serves as the only indicator of danger, lighting up red when approaching a destructive haze. You can move around creepy locations not only on foot, but also with the help of a skateboard, which is also used as a weapon for close combat.

item.title: Escape Simulator 2
item.description: Game Description Escape Simulator 2 is a continuation of the popular quest room simulator, offering immersion in solving puzzles from a first-person view. The project provides the opportunity to explore various locations both alone and in the company of friends. Locked in themed rooms, participants must use their wits and powers of observation to find a way out. The environment is fully interactive: almost any item can be picked up, examined, or used to interact with other objects, which creates the feeling of actually being in an escape room.

item.title: Lost Lullabies: The Orphanage Chronicles
item.description: Game Description Lost Lullabies: The Orphanage Chronicles takes gamers to the eerie depths of a once-abandoned orphanage in Lowell, Massachusetts. Set in 1980, it draws inspiration from the tragic events of 1960, when a fire destroyed the orphanage, leaving behind a tangled web of secrets. Users, either alone or in teams of up to four, embark on a chilling adventure to confront the evil spirits haunting the area. The main task is to uncover the history of these restless ghosts and perform rituals to send them to rest or eliminate their malevolent presence.

item.title: MIMESIS
item.description: Game Description Mimesis - invites a group of four survivors to take refuge in an old tram, which has become the only shelter in a world engulfed in disaster. Within this fragile island of security, paranoia arises, since any of the allies could turn out to be an enemy. The main threat comes from creatures capable of thoroughly copying the behavior, voice and even memories of a person, which makes you constantly doubt those who are nearby.

item.title: MotionRec
item.description: Game Description MotionRec follows the journey of a robot named Rec as he explores a destroyed world. The main task of this mechanical protagonist is to restore records of a lost civilization. Moving through the levels is carried out using a unique ability that allows you to record the trajectory of your own movements, and then play them back to overcome obstacles. This mechanic opens up space for creative puzzle solving, because you can record both a regular walk or jump, and more complex sequences of actions using environmental elements.

item.title: Mythrealm
item.description: Game Description Mythrealm is an adventure project in which the heroine will face demonic opponents using a combination of medieval martial arts, archery and fire magic. The confrontation takes place in the vastness of the continent of Arloria, where battles take place both on mountain tops and in deep dungeons. The gameplay requires the character not only to have combat skills, but also to overcome difficult terrain, climbing walls and jumping over platforms, as well as solving puzzles to find treasures or avoid traps.

item.title: The Horde Wants You Dead
item.description: Game Description The Horde Wants You Dead is a fast-paced top-down shooter that plunges you into a desperate fight for survival against countless hordes of enemies. The main task is to confront thousands of ruthless opponents, using an extensive arsenal and tactical maneuvers. Survivors must collect coins from defeated enemies, which are exchanged for supply crates containing character upgrades, new weapons, or increased firepower. The gameplay is based on constant movement and adaptation to different types of enemies.

item.title: The Session of Blake Manor
item.description: Game Description The Seance of Blake Manor is a mysterious investigation taking place within the walls of the secluded Irish hotel Blake Manor in 1897. Mystics from all over the world came here to the western part of Ireland to hold the Great Seance on Halloween and tear the veil between the worlds of the living and the dead. Into this tense situation arrives private investigator Declan Ward, tasked with finding a missing guest named Evelyn Dean.

item.title: Toziuha Night: Order of the Alchemists
item.description: Game Description Toziuha Night: Order of the Alchemists invites gamers into a world full of danger, secrets and a thirst for revenge. This 2D side-scrolling action platformer offers a fast-paced mix of elements, combining Metroidvania exploration with combat and character development. The game’s protagonist, Xandria, is not an ordinary hero. As an Iron Alchemist, she uses her mastery of the chemical elements to battle her enemies and achieve her ultimate goal of revenge.

item.title: İblis3:Phenomena
item.description: Game Description İblis3:Phenomena is a first-person psychological horror that follows the investigation of a journalist who arrives in an abandoned Turkish village. His goal is to explore a mysterious house that has become the epicenter of paranormal activity. The events of the project are inspired by a real incident that occurred in 1994, and focus on slowly building horror. There are no complex puzzles or fast-paced battles here, as the focus is on creating an oppressive and realistic environment that keeps you in constant suspense.

item.title: Yoiyami Biscuit
item.description: Game Description Yoiyami Biscuit is a fast-paced, top-down roguelike shooter that pits you against hordes of enemies in a world filled with snacks. To help Rumia survive, she has access to over 100 different items that can be purchased between battles. These artifacts are capable of both passively enhancing characteristics and calling upon combat partners to help block enemy projectiles. Spiritual Strike Talismans play a vital role in tactics, allowing them to deal devastating damage or temporarily provide a character with powerful enhancements.

item.title: 9 Souls
item.description: Game Description 9 Souls takes you on an atmospheric journey on the edge between madness and reality, where every step requires utmost care. The gameplay is based on constant choice: in each section, three paths open to the protagonist, but only one of them is free from anomalies. The slightest details in the environment, barely noticeable distortions of familiar objects, become the key to advancement. The right decision saves the lost soul, bringing it closer to the solution, but the price of a mistake is immersion in even greater chaos and uncertainty, forcing you to doubt your own perception.

item.title: Death Frame
item.description: Game Description Death Frame is a psychological horror game in which the protagonist, the estranged child of a notorious serial killer, returns to the mansion he inherited. Inside the dilapidated walls of this estate are hidden paintings that can draw the hero into surreal worlds, woven from fragments of memories and nightmares. Each dive reveals new details about the father’s madness, shedding light on the fate of his victims and, perhaps, on the protagonist’s own bloody legacy.

item.title: Hidden Cats in Spooky Village
item.description: Game Description Hidden Cats in Spooky Village is about returning light to darkness through the search for numerous whiskered creatures in a mysterious settlement. Each scene initially appears in gray tones, devoid of life and detail. Discovering hidden kittens and other characters gradually fills locations with vibrant colors, revealing intricate details and eerie surprises hidden in the shadows. Gamers will have to explore both frightening and cozy corners of the village, where secrets lurk around every corner.

item.title: Love Craft
item.description: Game Description Love Craft is a dating simulator where the search for a soulmate is based on the principle of selection within a creative circle. Events take place within the walls of Cubiversity University, where the protagonist arrives as a new student. The central element of the story is joining the prestigious Handicraft Club. Here you will have to form a working group of 5 candidates, choosing them from 15 available classmates.

item.title: Midnight Heist
item.description: Game Description Midnight Heist is a unique blend of co-op horror and heist genres that transports players to a dystopian city teeming with intrigue and danger. In this digital realm, hackers find work in a variety of organizations, performing tasks that involve stealing data, breaking into systems, and exposing closely guarded secrets. Whether flying solo or working with up to three teammates, each heist offers its own objectives, challenges and dangerous encounters.

item.title: MISERY
item.description: Game Description MISERY throws up to 15 players into a cooperative survival scenario in a nuclear disaster zone. The characters take on the roles of PMCs guarding a research institute in the Republic of Zaslavie before the conflict escalated into nuclear war. A siren sounds, signaling an incoming bomb and providing a 60-second window to grab supplies before retreating to the bunker. After the strike, the daily routine consists of forays into the procedurally generated Exclusion Zone to collect resources from ruined cities and abandoned military bases.

item.title: OLAPU
item.description: Game Description OLAPU is a test for a well-coordinated team, challenging raid bosses whose mechanics are reminiscent of large-scale battles in MMORPGs. Defeating opponents like Guardian Seraphina or Empress Elisera will require not only perfect knowledge of attack patterns, but also impeccable coordination. Each successful foray into the Valley of Elisera is rewarded, allowing you to unlock permanent upgrades, legendary gear with semi-random stats, and even new characters for future runs.

item.title: Onirism
item.description: Game Description Onirism features a young girl named Carol as the main character. She is full of energy, but at the same time absolutely disciplined. One day, a strange portal materializes next to her bed, from which creatures of unknown origin appear. They take the plush toy, hiding on the other side of the portal. Without the slightest hesitation, the heroine follows them, intending to return what was taken from her.

item.title: Slots and Daggers
item.description: Game Description Slots and Daggers is a retro fantasy adventure wrapped in slot machine mechanics, where each spin determines the fate of the hero in dangerous lands. The gameplay is based on the rotation of reels, the symbols on which correspond to actions in battle: attacks, the use of potions or spells. Defeating eccentric opponents that include Kul Knights and Hammer-wielding Goblins will require not only quick reflexes and luck, but also strategic thinking.

item.title: Tattoo Tycoon
item.description: Game Description Tattoo Tycoon is a management simulator in which you will revive the tattoo culture in the city of Tattooga Bay, which was once its center. The protagonist, whose appearance and backstory can be created independently, gets the last remaining salon. The main task is to turn a modest studio into a thriving chain of establishments, returning the city to its former glory. This will require not only skillfully applying designs to the skin, but also building relationships with a variety of residents, among whom there are eccentric clients and problematic artists, as well as an influential businessman known as the Tycoon.

item.title: The Bench
item.description: Game Description The Bench is the story of an elderly retiree who, tired of the rules of a nursing home, decides to run away. Armed with a cane and an endless supply of bread, he sets out on a journey through a colorful world, moving from one bench to another. An ever-growing flock of pigeons becomes his faithful companions and assistants in this adventure. Feathered friends not only accompany the protagonist, but also carry out his instructions, helping to solve puzzles and obtain useful items necessary for advancement.

item.title: UltraGirl Alters
item.description: Game Description UltraGirl Alters is a tactical project in which the gamer controls a group of virtual idols, Alters, fighting the creations of corporate algorithms. Five girls, dressed in tokusatsu-style battle suits, confront monsters on live-streamed battlefields. The outcome of each clash is determined not only by the competent use of the heroines’ unique abilities, but also by the reaction of the audience to the actions of the commander. Accumulating SP points gives you access to ultimate attacks that can destroy entire squads of enemies or deal devastating damage to bosses.

item.title: Unbound Eternity
item.description: Game Description Unbound Eternity is a turn-based card roguelike in which players take on the role of a powerful monster. The protagonist will have to invade the mysterious lands controlled by the mysterious cult of the Eye and challenge its orders. The basis of the combat system is runes, which allow you to play cards and create powerful combinations. With their help, you can multiply damage, poison opponents, or sacrifice your own health for the sake of devastating attacks.

item.title: Battle On! Hero Academy
item.description: Game Description Battle On! Hero Academy is a strategic simulator with elements of idle mechanics, the main goal of which is to create a self-sufficient educational institution for heroes. The fundamental concept of the project is built on the principle of iteration and legacy, where the release of characters at the maximum level is not a loss, but a strategic investment in the future. Each graduate leaves behind valuable relics that are used to unlock permanent global improvements in the academy’s technology tree.

item.title: Crown and Adventure
item.description: Game Description Crown and Adventure is a project in which managing cities, appointing ministers, and issuing edicts form the basis for building a powerful dynasty. The path to dominance lies through the competent management of taxes, the development of technology and the strengthening of one’s faction, which allows one to turn captured territories into prosperous centers of power. Large-scale battles unfolding from a top-down side view make it possible to control armies numbering up to 1000 units on the screen at the same time.

item.title: GODBREAKERS
item.description: Game Description GODBREAKERS is a project in which an artificial intelligence called Monad has destroyed humanity and now threatens the sun itself, successively consuming planets. To save a dying star, the mysterious sisterhood of the Coven creates vessels from the void, endowed with human consciousness. These warriors must journey through six surreal biomes to challenge the crazed AI and his minions. Each mission becomes a unique challenge, forcing you to adapt to constantly changing conditions and enemies.

item.title: Maid of Salvation
