item.description: Game Description Maid of Salvation is a dark fantasy adventure where the dynamics of fast-paced battles are intertwined with the exploration of mysterious locations. The combat system is built on a skillful combination of swords, firearms and special moves, requiring sharp reflexes to dodge, parry and launch surprise attacks. You will have to confront more than 20 powerful bosses and hordes of demonic creatures known as Fiends that have infested Purgatory.

item.title: oneway.exe: Module 1.0
item.description: Game Description oneway.exe: Module 1.0 places the gamer in a corrupted and unfinished video game. The setting for the investigation of her past is UNTITLED.exe - a declining digital space. The main goal is to uncover the story of its three creators and find out the circumstances that destroyed their working relationship. Gamers reconstruct the narrative by exploring the remains of an abandoned project, tormented by virtual decay and fragmented memories.

item.title: Pizza Deathlivery
item.description: Game Description Pizza Deathlivery is a risky food delivery mission in a city shrouded in ominous fog. The streets of the metropolis, where almost all the inhabitants have turned into monsters, have become a deadly labyrinth. The only hope for survivors suffering from hunger is a brave courier, whose task is to deliver all orders before midnight. Failure means not only the boss’s displeasure, but also certain death in the foggy darkness.

item.title: Roulette Hero
item.description: Game Description Roulette Hero is a project in which a squad of adorable animals confronts ruthless mechanical monsters, and the outcome of the battles is decided by the rotation of the roulette. Gamers will have to form a team of various animals, each of which has unique abilities. Some companions are distinguished by their attack speed, while others create impenetrable defense. The thoughtful placement of fighters on the cells of the roulette wheel and its subsequent launch activate their skills, creating powerful combinations and synergies that can turn the tide of even the most difficult fight.

item.title: Species: Unknown
item.description: Game Description Species Unknown is a dark sci-fi adventure in which mercenaries must face horror aboard abandoned spaceships. An unpredictable threat lurks within the depths of these wrecked ships, forcing squads of up to four to work together to survive. Each task plunges you into an atmosphere of oppressive uncertainty, because the hunt is led by one of five deadly entities with unique habits and strengths. Successful completion of the contract depends on the team’s ability to adapt and use the tools available to confront the nightmare that lurks in the darkness.

item.title: The Jackbox Party Pack 11
item.description: Game Description The Jackbox Party Pack 11 is a collection of five unique party experiences that offer a fresh take on familiar formats. For the first time in the history of the series, the collection consists entirely of original concepts, abandoning the continuations of popular hits like Quiplash or Fibbage. Players will be immersed in a variety of activities, from creating absurd sound effects in Hear Say to collaborating on slaying monsters using erudition in Legends of Trivia.

item.title: The Lonesome Guild
item.description: Game Description The Lonesome Guild is a journey through the world of Etere, where switching between party members is the key to surviving fast-paced battles. Overcoming obstacles, the heroes solve puzzles and explore vibrant but fading locations, from snowy streets to ancient ruins. The main character, known as the Phantom, is a spirit devoid of memories who must confront a mysterious fog. This substance poisons the minds of its inhabitants and spreads a destructive loneliness across the land, forcing the protagonist to seek allies to save the world.

item.title: Becastled
item.description: Game Description Becastled is an indie real-time strategy game that was created over a long period of time due to many changes that the developers made. The game uses an isometric camera standard for the genre, which allows you to see all controlled territories and instantly react to events both in peacetime and during military operations. The project has only a single-player mode with a built-in list of achievements, in which rewards are given to the gamer for certain successes during the passage.

item.title: Cut That Wire
item.description: Game Description Cut That Wire is a project in which four hostages have to find themselves in a confined space, where each of them has an explosive device attached to their chest. In this tense situation, they need to identify the traitor hiding under the guise of an ally, because any mistake could be the last. One of the participants, known as the Engineer, has critical information - he knows one of the safe wires.

item.title: Dispatch
item.description: Game Description Dispatch takes the superhero genre and turns it on its head, placing it in the mundane yet unpredictable world of office life. Instead of fighting evil aliens or saving cities, the title follows Robert Robertson, a former superhero called Mecha Man, who is now forced to find his place in a superhero control center after his trusty mech suit is destroyed in a fight with his nemesis. So what?

item.title: Goblin Lands
item.description: Game Description Goblin Lands invites you to become the ruler of the seas in a world created using colorful 2D graphics. The journey spans 80 unique levels, distributed across 4 expansive maps, where you will encounter 24 types of islands. The seas are not empty: they are patrolled by wandering transports, and along the way there are various obstacles that require adapting tactics. For the most persistent explorers, hidden locations are provided, and the epic orchestral accompaniment emphasizes the scale of the events taking place and gives each battle a special atmosphere.

item.title: GOD FORSAKEN
item.description: Game Description GOD FORSAKEN is a dark adventure in which a handful of survivors must defy fate in a land abandoned by the gods. Having chosen his path as a mighty warrior, a mysterious warlock, an undead necromancer lord or an agile hunter, the protagonist gains a unique talent tree. Each battle against hordes of twisted monsters and powerful bosses is a test of not only reflexes, but also strategic thinking.

item.title: House Builder 2
item.description: Game Description House Builder 2 is a simulation game in which the building process begins with careful planning and preparation. Before laying the first stone in the foundation, you have to go to the warehouse to get the necessary tools and materials. After loading everything onto his truck, the player goes anywhere in the vast open world to begin fulfilling the order. The developers have focused on advanced construction mechanics, which provide high precision and control over every stage of work, from the construction of walls to the smallest interior details.

item.title: HYPERBEAT
item.description: Game Description HYPERBEAT is a rhythmic adventure in which the armored HYPERKNIGHT races through surreal interdimensional tunnels. Players must navigate their way through neon mazes, where every note of the original electronic soundtrack dictates the action. Instead of a static environment, the character plunges into an endless dream, reminiscent of a dynamic tube, dodging obstacles and tracking light paths. Progressing through this world unlocks cosmetic items and a variety of palettes that allow you to fine-tune your turquoise knight’s appearance.

item.title: Pale Coins
item.description: Game Description Pale Coins is a journey through the kingdom of Grenmark, where every step outside the safe settlements threatens to clash with dangerous monsters. Exploring abandoned ruins, dense forests and deep caves is an essential part of surviving in this world. The character, who began his journey with only an old weapon in his hands, will have to navigate his own route through lands filled with goblins and other enemies, without any hints or directions.

item.title: Refate: Echoes of Desire
item.description: Game Description Refate Echoes of Desire is a cinematic adventure where the protagonist’s consciousness returns to the neon streets of Tokyo, and the memory of the past is completely erased. Finding himself in the midst of a violent conflict between powerful Yakuza clans and police forces, the protagonist is forced to survive without any money or allies. The only way to restore his lost identity is to build relationships with eight completely different women, each of whom holds a piece of the puzzle of his past.

item.title: Riddlewood Manor
item.description: Game Description Riddlewood Manor is an adventure where the walls of a gothic mansion hide dark secrets and eccentric inhabitants. In its quaint halls you can meet an unusual dragon or feed an eternally hungry chicken, but not all its inhabitants are friendly. The sinister laughter of a possessed doll named Susie echoes through the dark corridors, and ghosts and evil spirits are constantly trying to destroy anyone who dares to disturb their peace.

item.title: DREAMOUT
item.description: Game Description DREAMOUT is an adventure in which a surreal world is inhabited by very unusual creatures. Here battles take place with gangs of watermelon gopniks, and the chickens from hell will have to resist. Meetings with eccentric characters, such as carrot people or drunken butterflies, have become commonplace in the local environment. To solve emerging problems, a whole arsenal of means is used: from destroying rocks and incinerating enemies to throwing bombs at portals.

item.title: Fantasy Maiden Wars - DREAM OF THE STRAY DREAMER -
item.description: Game Description Fantasy Maiden Wars DREAM OF THE STRAY DREAMER is a tactical role-playing project, the events of which take place in a world called Genshokyo, where gods, people and supernatural creatures youkai exist together. The story begins with a series of mysterious incidents that upset the fragile balance of this region. To understand the causes of the growing chaos, two heroines, the priestess Reimu Hakurei and the sorceress Marisa Kirisame, set off on a long journey.

item.title: ILA: A Frosty Glide
item.description: Game Description ILA A Frosty Glide is the journey of a young witch named Ila, unfolding in the vastness of a mysterious snow-covered island. The search for the missing kitten Coco, the last reminder of her mother, forces the heroine to ride her skatebroom - an unusual means of transportation that combines the properties of a broom and a skateboard. Moving around the world with the help of this magical item, the girl explores snow-capped mountains and enchanted forests, discovering hidden corners and solving puzzles.

item.title: RV There Yet?
item.description: Game Description RV There Yet? - a journey through the deadly Mabutts Valley, where not everyone is destined to get out alive. A group of friends, whose vacation was interrupted by the need to take an alternative route, will have to make their way home through difficult terrain. Survival here directly depends on the constant replenishment of food supplies, including burgers, as well as the availability of antidotes and epipenes to counter the threats of a hostile environment.

item.title: Spooky Express
item.description: Game Description Spooky Express is a logistics puzzle set within a spooky theme park where the main challenge is the safe transportation of some very unusual passengers. Human visitors must reach the exit while a variety of monsters pursue their goals: vampires aim for coffins and zombies for burial pits. The main difficulty is planning routes in such a way that people do not end up next to creepy travel companions.

item.title: SWAPMEAT
item.description: Game Description SWAPMEAT is a co-op roguelite shooter set on the strangest and most hostile planets in the galaxy. In this project, players will have to carry out raids on alien worlds inhabited by aggressive alien creatures in order to collect their flesh. A central mechanic is the ability to instantly replace your character’s body parts with organs borrowed from defeated enemies. This approach allows you to constantly adapt to the combat situation, adopting the unique abilities of your opponents right during the battle.

item.title: Bermuda Survivor
item.description: Game Description Bermuda Survivor is an adventure in which the mysterious Bermuda Triangle becomes a survival arena where every step affects the environment. The protagonist will not only have to fight off hordes of enemies, but also actively change the world around him. Resources collected during forays are used to open hidden paths, restore abandoned buildings and activate ancient mechanisms. In this way, exploring hand-crafted islands with their fixed landscapes turns into meaningful transformation of locations, allowing you to find more efficient routes for future visits.

item.title: Gamestonk Simulator: Gone Rogue
item.description: Game Description Gamestonk Simulator: Gone Rogue is a roguelite store simulator. Gamers will have to manage the last video game store in town, solving everyday problems in a changing market. Every morning you need to order new game licenses, consoles and peripherals to replenish the assortment. During the day, you will be required to stock shelves and work behind the cash register to process payments. The goal is to support the business through strategic purchasing and effective sales.

item.title: HyperBlade 2050 - Dystopian Sports Manager
item.description: Game Description HyperBlade 2050 - Dystopian Sports Manager is a text-based sports management simulator that immerses you in the gloomy atmosphere of a dystopian Future Earth. Here, against the background of the decline of civilization, brutal sports competitions became the main entertainment for the masses, requiring incredible endurance from the participants. The gameplay is based on the fictional discipline Hyperblade, which is a hybrid of hockey, handball and roller derby. The concept for this brutal competition draws heavily from the classic 1975 film Rollerball, offering an elaborate story about life in an alternate 2050s.

item.title: Lessaria: Fantasy Kingdom Sim
item.description: Game Description Lessaria Fantasy Kingdom Sim - offers you to lead a fantasy kingdom, where wayward heroes live their own lives, often ignoring the direct instructions of the ruler. Instead of direct command of troops, all the power of the monarch is reduced to indirect influence on the actions of adventurers. Adventurers decide for themselves whether to explore ancient ruins, fight goblins, or simply hang out in a tavern. Their behavior, based on their unique character traits, makes government a challenging task that requires strategic thinking and the ability to adapt to the ever-changing circumstances in the lands of Lessaria.

item.title: Touhou Dystopian
item.description: Game Description Touhou Dystopian is a fast-paced adventure that puts control in the hands of one of four heroines, each with a unique fighting style. The fate of the protagonists is in the hands of the gamer, who can develop their talents and discover new improvements. There are about 100 different power-up abilities available in the arsenal, allowing you to choose individual tactics for each battle. Among the playable characters are such famous heroines as Flandre Scarlet, Youmu and Mokou, which makes it possible to look at events from different angles.

item.title: Arcade Forever
item.description: Game Description Arcade Forever is a vertically scrolling 3D space shooter that immerses you in a sci-fi atmosphere of continuous battles. The project offers dynamic gameplay where you have to maneuver among numerous obstacles and enemy squadrons. The main task is to survive and destroy enemies throughout 25 different levels. The gameplay is based on automatic shooting and a system of independent improvements, which allows you to concentrate on dodging enemy fire and tactical movement.

item.title: Buhei
item.description: Game Description Buhei is a competitive action game that immerses you in crazy shootouts in multi-level arenas. Up to 8 fighters can fight simultaneously in local or online confrontations, sorting things out in free skirmish or team battle modes. To eliminate rivals, there is an extensive arsenal, including rapid-fire projectiles, clever traps and even a ping-pong paddle that repels enemy attacks. Characters are also able to cast supernatural spells or use artifacts that defy the laws of physics, such as a hot dog that shoots mustard.

item.title: Lumo 2
item.description: Game Description Lumo 2 is the journey of a mature wizard through the labyrinths of changing dimensions, where every step is a test of logic and reflexes. Overcoming dangerous platforms, the protagonist finds himself either in the scenery of a haunted house or on board a spaceship, which forces him to constantly adapt to new conditions. The main goal is not only to find a way out, but also to collect carefully hidden collectibles: 25 vintage cassette tapes and 20 camouflaged ducks are scattered around the world, the detection of which requires remarkable care.

item.title: THIEF'S SHELTER
item.description: Game Description THIEF’S SHELTER is a psychological adventure where reality itself becomes a reflection of the disintegrating consciousness of Detective James. His mind, affected by artificial dementia, gives rise to hallucinations and distorts memories, turning the investigation into a mysterious murder at Hybern Mansion into a real struggle with internal demons. Every room and corridor of this dark place can change at any moment, forcing you to doubt even your own thoughts and conclusions.

item.title: BALL x PIT
item.description: Game Description BALL x PIT is a dynamic roguelike, the events of which unfold in a world that has experienced the death of the great city of Ballbilon. After a mysterious cataclysm, a bottomless Pit was formed on the site of the metropolis, which attracted adventurers and treasure seekers from all over the world. The heroes will have to descend into its dark depths to fight hordes of enemies with the help of ricocheting balls and find the riches left over from the fallen civilization.

item.title: Escape from Duckov
item.description: Game Description Escape from Duckov is an action-adventure game that immerses you in a world where the main character, a little duck, has to survive and fight for his life. Having awakened from a strange dream, the protagonist finds himself in a harsh reality full of dangers and hostile creatures. To survive, he needs to explore the surrounding areas, constantly in search of useful supplies and resources. Every foray outside the shelter turns into a risky undertaking, because in the event of death, all the equipment found will be irretrievably lost.

item.title: Go To Sleep
item.description: Game Description Go To Sleep is a psychological horror that plunges the protagonist into a nightmare from which there seems to be no way out. Events unfold within the confines of one room, where a young teenager finds himself locked with his fears, embodied in the form of a ruthless demon. This creature, born of guilt and regret, tirelessly pursues the hero, trying to plunge him into eternal sleep forever. The only salvation is a paradoxical action - close your eyes and fall asleep in order to speed up the passage of time until the saving sound of the alarm clock.

item.title: Neffy -Moonlight Labyrinth X-
item.description: Game Description Neffy Moonlight Labyrinth X is a joint adventure of two completely different heroes, designed to test their wits in a world full of dangers and mysteries. The gameplay is based on a unique mechanic of switching between two points of view. On one side stands Novalis, a powerful summoned creature who can control the giant mechanisms of the labyrinth. Using the power of moonlight, he opens sealed passages and helps his companion from above.

item.title: Zaccaria Pinball
item.description: Game Description Zaccaria Pinball is the digital incarnation of pinball machines, offering an extensive collection of tables divided into several categories. Enthusiasts have access to both classic electro-mechanical (EM) devices, like Nautilus or Universe, and more modern solid-state (SS) versions, including Time Machine and Devil Riders. In addition to authentic recreations, the project includes completely redesigned tables such as Space Shuttle 2016 and Farfalla 2017, as well as unique themed designs presented in the Award category, where you can find The Mummy and Aliens.

item.title: Chickenhare and the treasure of Spiking-Beard
item.description: Game Description Chickenhare and the treasure of Spiking Beard is an exciting adventure in which an unusual hero, half chicken and half hare, goes on an exciting journey with his loyal friends. He is accompanied by Abe the turtle and Meg the skunk, a martial arts master. The trio must outrun the villain named Pricklybeard and his minions in search of seven magical crystals. Their journey takes them through a variety of worlds, from the majestic halls of Featherbeard’s castle to the dark depths of the Demon Hole, where ingenious puzzles and hidden secrets await at every turn.

item.title: GHOST TRAVELER: Adventures in Edo
item.description: Game Description GHOST TRAVELER: Adventures in Edo is a mystical visual novel that follows the investigation into a series of brutal murders set against the backdrop of Japan’s Yoshiwara entertainment district. The main character is a 17-year-old boy named Kotaro, whose soul, after a supernatural incident in modern Shibuya, is transported to the 19th century. Having learned from a certain deity about the death of his physical body, the protagonist finds himself locked in the past with no clear path to returning home or moving on to the afterlife.

item.title: Lords of Ravage
item.description: Game Description The action-adventure of the Lord of Ruin takes the player into a fictional world where he must fight powerful monsters and overcome dangerous territories. The user will take control of a powerful final boss to fight the heroes and wear them down with traps before a personal meeting. You can control a variety of wards and followers in order to preemptively tense up your opponents or kill them.

item.title: Playtown 3
item.description: Game Description Playtown 3 is a dive into the sinister mystery of an abandoned amusement park, where the protagonist will have to stop the activities of the mysterious order E.Y.E. 13 years after the events of the previous parts, the once innocent place for games has reopened its doors, hiding terrifying experiments under a bright sign. The hero enters the territory to uncover the truth, but quickly realizes that the reality is much worse than his suspicions.

item.title: Royal Revolt Survivors
item.description: Game Description Royal Revolt Survivors is a continuation of the famous franchise, taking gamers into a fantasy world that is being desecrated by hordes of dark forces. In the role of one of the Warriors from the star cast of heroes in the Royal Revolt universe, you will have to repel the invaders and cleanse your native lands of filth. This project combines elements of a slasher film and a simplified roguelike, where the main task is to survive under the onslaught of hundreds of enemies in a variety of dynamic arenas.

item.title: Water of M
item.description: Game Description Water of M is a psychological horror game in which the main goal is to uncover the dark secrets of an unusual educational institution. The protagonist awakens in the middle of dark corridors, having no memories of his past, but discovering traces of blood on his hands. This discovery raises the main question: is he a victim of circumstances or the perpetrator of some terrible event. The atmosphere of oppressive silence and constantly flickering light turn classrooms and halls that are familiar at first glance into deadly labyrinths.

item.title: Bad Janitor
item.description: Game Description Bad Janitor is a clever eviction operation disguised as routine cleaning of premises. The main character, acting undercover, must quietly create unbearable living conditions in order to force people to leave their apartments. Penetrating into other people’s apartments in the absence of the owners, the protagonist uses household items to organize minor dirty tricks. Every action, from turning on the radio at full volume to ruining the taps, must look like an accident, maintaining the cover of a secret agent.

item.title: Choco Kiosk Simulator
item.description: Game Description Choco Kiosk Simulator is an enterprise in which managing a small retail outlet becomes a test of strength in the face of growing urban absurdity. In this world, the survival of the confectionery business depends not only on the timely purchase of milk chocolate from the wholesaler, but also on the ability to withstand zombie outbreaks on weekends. The entrepreneur has to make a choice: develop a legal chocolate empire, attracting passers-by, or take a risky path, fulfilling orders for alien clients.

item.title: ScreenWolf
item.description: Game Description ScreenWolf is a creative platform that lets you bring your computer desktop to life with unique virtual companions. The basis of the project is a special toolkit ScreenWolf Pet Packager, which allows users to independently create and share pets. Thanks to the open structure, anyone can design their own creatures, giving them unique animations, sound effects and style of interaction with the environment, turning the desktop into a personal interactive space.

item.title: Resonant Dusk
item.description: Game Description Resonant Dusk is the story of the cursed Baritone Mansion, where shadowy entities known as Resonants are trapped within its walls. These echoes of the people who once lived here suffer from unresolved mysteries that chain them to the mortal world. The fate of each spirit is in the hands of detective Lucas Asher, who arrived at the estate after receiving a mysterious message from an old friend. It is he who will have to decide whether the restless souls will find salvation or will be doomed to eternal torment.

item.title: Spindle
item.description: Game Description The uniqueness of Spindle is captivating. The concept of the project assumes the complete absence of death as such - no one dies, while the world around us is surrounded by chaos. Death itself is trying to find out the reason for what is happening. This time she won’t be alone; her faithful companion, the pig, is going with her on a journey through the old-school world. The main character arms herself with a scythe, takes a companion with her, and moves on to living beings.

item.title: Undusted: Letters from the Past
item.description: Game Description Undusted Letters from the Past is a touching story about a girl named Jane who, after moving into her late grandmother’s house, discovers an abandoned workshop full of dusty and broken objects. Every item, be it an old camera or a music box, requires careful restoration. The process of dusting and repairing the mechanisms reveals hidden letters and memories, gradually revealing a secret love story from her family’s past.

item.title: Bad Dream: Afterlife
item.description: Game Description Bad Dream: Afterlife is a immersion in a surreal nightmare where the protagonist finds himself completely alone. The entire city was abandoned by the inhabitants, who left behind only ominous messages on the walls, from which it becomes clear that the reason for their flight was the hero himself. Drawn in a minimalist, sketch-like style, this world is filled with strange creatures and an oppressive atmosphere. Only a few old people and the sick remained in the empty houses, but they diligently avoid any contact.

item.title: Spacenap
item.description: Game Description Spacenap is a journey into the depths of space, where the main task is to create unique constellations from a variety of stellar bodies. Players will have to discover hidden celestial patterns and expand their collections by receiving passive bonuses or selling creations for gold coins. The whole process is tied to the search and collection of stars, for which special assistants are involved: scout owls discover star fields, and collector owls help to obtain them.

item.title: Before Exit: Gas Station
item.description: Game Description Before Exit: Gas Station is a tense test where a strict boss does not forgive mistakes. Just two missteps separate an employee from being fired, followed by a restart of the entire seven-day work week. This roguelike element turns an ordinary shift into a test of attention to the smallest details, forcing you to constantly be on your guard. Every action has weight, and the cost of inattention is having to start all over again, which creates a unique pressure throughout the entire playthrough.

item.title: Dice Legends
item.description: Game Description Dice Legends presents a setting where a magical cataclysm has turned all the people into monsters. The player’s task is to uncover the mystery of this event and the magician known as the Last Man. At the beginning of the journey, you have to choose one of three characters: Paladin-Lion, Summoner of Demon-Ravens or Assassin-Toad. Each hero offers a unique playstyle to navigate four different worlds with their own unique challenges.

item.title: Dreams of Another
item.description: Game Description Dreams of Another turns the key mechanics of third-person action games upside down, as the gamer’s projectiles materialize the environment rather than destroy it. The world is created through these actions, taking shape around the character as they explore. What is happening unfolds in an ephemeral, dream-like environment, directly linking each action with creation. Instead of depleting the landscape, any shot contributes to its appearance. Players independently pave the way forward, and the main gameplay is based on a complete rethinking of genre canons.

item.title: Football Pitch Simulator
item.description: Game Description Football Pitch Simulator is a project in which the entrepreneur is responsible for the complete management of his own complex of football fields. Taking care of your business starts with the very basics: it is necessary to promptly repair worn-out surfaces, renew floors and refresh paint to maintain the establishment’s reputation at a high level. The success of an enterprise directly depends on customer satisfaction, which requires informed strategic decisions.

item.title: Treasure 'n Trio
item.description: Game Description Treasure ‘n Trio offers challenges that only a team of three adventurers can overcome. A warrior relies on brute force, while a nimble thief passes many dangers unharmed. The wizard in the squad has teleportation magic, which opens up new paths and allows you to change position. The gamer will have to alternately control three heroes, because none of them alone will be able to solve the riddles. Their coordinated actions are needed to interact with the environment and collect unusual treasures.

item.title: Vanquish The Eternal
item.description: Game Description Vanquish The Eternal provides an arsenal of unique abilities, extensive talent trees, and a variety of empowering buffs to counter the forces of evil. Players will choose from eight fully voiced characters, including the mysterious Alchemist, to fight back against the nightmarish creatures. Advancement is built on a meta-progression system that allows you to gradually strengthen your heroes for subsequent battles. Deep customization of your fighting style is a key element in preparing for the battle with the main antagonist, whose power increases with each new challenge.

item.title: Absolum
item.description: Game Description Absolum offers to take on the role of outcast heroes living in the world of Talam. These characters oppose the Sun King Azra, seeking to take away his power over magic. The experience combines the mechanics of a side-scrolling beat ‘em up with roguelite elements that influence the progression of each run. To complete the task, you need to move around Talam and fight Azra’s troops for the main goal.

item.title: Beacon of Neyda
item.description: Game Description In Beacon of Neyda, a failed robot uprising has left the world in ruins. The last handful of humanity are trying to leave lifeless lands patrolled by hostile automata. Players will have to guide survivors through abandoned areas, building temporary fortifications to protect against mechanical threats. The main task is to organize an exodus from the dead wastelands. Each location offers a new challenge in the ongoing struggle for the future of the remaining people, forced to survive in a world under the rule of their former servants.

item.title: Bye Sweet Carole
item.description: Game Description In Bye Sweet Carole, Lana Benton begins to investigate the mysterious disappearance of her friend Carol Simmons. The tracks lead her to the gloomy Bunny Hall shelter, which holds many secrets. The action takes place in Britain at the beginning of the 20th century, during the birth of the women’s rights movement. The heroine will have to plunge into the abyss of the secrets of this institution in order to find answers and understand what fate befell Carol.

item.title: Dicealot
item.description: Game Description Dicealot follows Queen Guinevere as she strives to save the cursed King Arthur by leading knights through chaos-ridden Camelot. Gamers will face more than 30 types of opponents, from commoners to mythical creatures, in this unpredictable medieval world. Each run is a solo journey with permanent death, forcing you to start a new adventure from scratch. The decisions made directly affect the outcome of the mission to remove the spell that threatens the domain.

item.title: Lost Eidolons: Veil of the Witch
item.description: Game Description Lost Eidolons: Veil of the Witch invites gamers into a realm full of challenges and mysteries. The action takes place on a secluded island, where the main character, struggling with fragmentary memories, goes in search of clarity. This journey cannot be called simple: users are faced with a number of battles that test their strategic thinking and decision-making skills. Each encounter offers a new opportunity to interact with the game’s mechanics, allowing gamers to remain engaged in the experience.

item.title: Runeborn
item.description: Game Description Runeborn offers turn-based combat, similar to a slot machine. Spells are activated by rotating runic columns to match symbols along five different lines. Successful combinations initiate attacks against demonic opponents. For increased control, gamers can lock up to 8 individual symbols in place while the rest of the reels spin, allowing them to build powerful streaks. This mechanic underlies all tactical encounters with Malakar’s forces. Strategy in Runeborn is based on direct customization of runic columns.

item.title: The Lacerator
item.description: Game Description The plot of The Lacerator revolves around an 80s porn star named Max, who, along with a film crew, ends up in the lair of a psychopath. The erotic scene turns into a desperate battle for life, and the main task is to escape from the maniac’s tangled hideout. Gamers will have to guide the hero through a dangerous environment, where the lines between intense horror and black comedy are deliberately blurred.

item.title: ACRES
item.description: Game Description ACRES, a strategic simulation game centered on crop production and market needs, offers a unique and engaging farming experience. Here you set out on a journey to build a successful farm, one acre at a time, by responding to market orders, upgrading equipment, and optimizing yields under time pressure. The project challenges you to thrive in an ever-evolving agricultural market. The key is to grow crops in a targeted manner.

item.title: Last Term
item.description: Game Description Last Term is a plunge into an endless nightmare, where a mysterious deity imprisoned the protagonist within the walls of a school. The main task is to escape from this time loop, for which you need to go down to the ground floor of the building. The way out of the vicious circle of repeating locations lies through attention to detail and the ability to distinguish the norm from the terrible deviations embedded in the familiar environment.

item.title: MOONY:Black_Lotus
item.description: Game Description MOONY Black Lotus is a journey through the ruins of a once prosperous civilization, where the past is a collection of disparate fragments. In this dystopian world filled with government conspiracies and unforgiving mechanisms, the main character must face the truth about his life. Moving through the remains of the city, where shadows flicker in unison with the metallic echo in the mind, the character must restore the lost essence.

item.title: Pocket Boss
item.description: Game Description Pocket Boss puts the player in the role of a remote employee whose main task is to manipulate business schedules. The central goal is to achieve a promotion in one week by adjusting data to meet the demands of superiors. These activities include inflating performance metrics, increasing shareholder value, and hiding financial losses in reports. Each task requires you to find a convincing solution to an information puzzle while taking into account the whims of your boss.

item.title: Swamp Keeper
item.description: Game Description Swamp Keeper is a tale about a little keeper who is destined to protect a sacred swamp from the encroachments of invaders. Armed only with a bow, this nimble lizard must repel the onslaught of the enemy army of Ho, seeking to seize the valuable resources of the swamps. The fate of the native lands depends on accuracy and tactical calculation, because the enemy, using iron and fire, has already approached the very heart of the swamp sanctuary.

item.title: The Gretlow Tapes
item.description: Game Description The Gretlow Tapes explores the secrets of the abandoned Gretlow mansion, where the only tool for interacting with the world is a camera. Through the lens, you will not only document the frightening findings, but also interact with echoes of the past in order to uncover the dark secret of this place. The atmosphere of oppressive horror is created thanks to the realistic style of the found film and the ominous soundtrack.

item.title: The Legacy
item.description: Game Description The Legacy is a co-op survival horror game set in a dark tale of a family curse in a deserted town. Events unfold years after in 1990, Grandfather Molfar, a local sorcerer, refused to sacrifice one of his descendants to the dark forces of the forest. To save his grandchildren, he sent them from their hometown of Svetlograd to Kyiv, but this act doomed the entire area to death and desolation.

item.title: Blood of Mehran
item.description: Game Description Blood of Mehran takes the legendary warrior Mehran to Ancient Mesopotamia, where his desire for a peaceful life is destroyed by the ambitions of others. Inspired by the Arabian Nights, the story revolves around themes of love, loss and loyalty. The game world includes sprawling palaces, bustling bazaars, and endless sand dunes to explore. Gamers can travel on horseback, exploring locations in search of secrets and collectibles hidden in cities and in the wild.

item.title: Deathground
item.description: Game Description Deathground is a first-person survival horror game aimed at cooperative play. The story centers on people fighting for survival among bloodthirsty dinosaurs. There are different modes available in which you need to team up with three more players, trying to break through the jungle and military bases, fighting against powerful ancient lizards. The heroes will have to survive on the killing field, where every enemy poses a serious threat.

item.title: My Card Is Better Than Your Card!
item.description: Game Description The main goal in My Card Is Better Than Your Card! — become the main duelist on the site, collecting unique decks. Gamers design cards using stickers from a catalog of over 200 options, each with its own effect. Combining multiple stickers unlocks multi-level tactics, but increases the cost of the card played. This collection of personal creations is used to challenge opponents in the neighborhood. Turn-based battles in My Card Is Better Than Your Card!

item.title: Vampire's Best Friend
item.description: Game Description Vampire’s Best Friend - a brave bat, controlled by the user, must make his way through deadly traps and treacherous obstacles to save his owner. The gameplay is based on unique flight mechanics, requiring refined and precise wing strokes to maneuver in confined spaces. The journey unfolds in gloomy but charming locations, among which there are foggy caves and ancient ruins. The visual design is stylized as retro classics, which is achieved through pixel graphics and a limited color palette, creating a nostalgic atmosphere.

item.title: Erannorth Renaissance
item.description: Game Description Erannorth Renaissance is an RPG where every decision shapes the unfolding journey. Users move around a vast world, freely creating their own path, participating in turn-based battles and interacting with a number of unique heroes. The title combines tabletop mechanics and expansive storytelling, offering a variety of possibilities in a Renaissance-inspired setting. The characters evolve based on the choices made throughout their journey, affecting not only their personal growth, but also the world around them.

item.title: Castle of Heart: Retold
item.description: Game Description Castle of Heart Retold is a dark action platformer that immerses you in the world of Slavic mythology, where the brave warrior Swaran challenges the sinister Sorcerer. A powerful sorcerer, a servant of the dark god Chernobog, kidnapped the hero’s beloved, priestess Mira, and placed a terrible curse on Svaran himself and his village, turning everyone to stone. However, Mira’s tear, which fell on the warrior’s petrified body, partially weakened the spell, giving him a chance to save his beloved and take revenge.

item.title: Disaster Arms - Impact Project B.A.H.N.
item.description: Game Description Disaster Arms Impact Project B.A.H.N. - The story of a lonely soldier named Gveral, whose vengeful chase unfolds on the threshold of the global apocalypse. The world stands on the edge of death due to an alien invasion provoked by the ruthless experiments of the Kaisercorps corporation. The past of the gover, known as the “empty soldier”, is revealed through the non -linear narration, presented in the form of stylized comics, immersing in the gloomy atmosphere of the coming anti -utopia.

item.title: Dream Abyss: Survivors
item.description: Game Description Dream Abyss Survivors is a spontaneous role-playing adventure that immerses brave heroines in a surreal dream world, where they must fight back endless waves of nightmarish creatures. Each foray into the depths of the nightmare becomes a unique challenge thanks to an extensive progression system. Gamers create a variety of fighting styles by combining 65 skills, 17 variable characteristics and 23 power-up cards. Countless hordes of monsters and powerful bosses are destroyed by one of four selectable protagonists, each of whom has a unique set of abilities and a special style of combat in this vibrant anime fantasy.

item.title: Melted Valor
item.description: Game Description Melted Valor is a desperate struggle for survival, unfolding in the vastness of an ordinary residential area that has turned into a field of all-out war. Under the command of the player are the Green Forces, whose peaceful days are in the past. Now they must defend their homes and friends from a ruthless threat known as the Tang Menace. The enemy does not hesitate to use the dirtiest methods to achieve his goals, turning the familiar world into a war zone.

item.title: Murder Is Game Over: Murder Otaku
item.description: Game Description Murder Is Game Over Murder Otaku is a mysterious incident at the pop culture convention YokaiKon, where a detective duo must unravel a mysterious crime. The main characters, Detective Guy and his faithful dog Cleo, arrive at the historic 1920s hotel that serves as the venue for the event. Their mission begins after the tragic death of a famous J-pop singer, whose death shrouds the noisy event in an ominous mystery.

item.title: Syrup and the Ultimate Sweet
item.description: Game Description Syrup and the Ultimate Sweet is a visual novel where failure to create a magical dessert sets off a chain of unpredictable events. The conflict flares up when the main character Syrup, who fundamentally does not use magic in confectionery, rejects the idea of ​​​​creating the so-called Ideal Sweetness. This decision prompts a living candy golem named Gumdrop to escape from the workshop. In her search for the necessary magical ingredients, she joins forces with Butterscotch, Syrup’s longtime rival, complicating an already difficult situation for all parties involved.

item.title: IDLE BOSS Rush
item.description: Game Description In IDLE BOSS Rush, the starting point for creating a powerful kingdom is a lifeless wasteland. The main task is to turn a modest camp into a prosperous city, gathering an army to defeat giant bosses. Each battle with the enemy is a serious test that requires either time or competent tactics. Further development depends on the management of the population and resources. The economic foundation is important for the maintenance of an army that can reflect the onslaught of huge monsters and expand the boundaries of the settlement.

item.title: PANIK
item.description: Game Description PANIK is a puzzle game in which frightened creatures called panickers freeze in place in fear. The main task is to find an individual approach to each of them in order to calm them down and accompany them to a safe exit. Solving logical problems directly depends on the abilities of the players, among whom there are a robot, a ninja, and even a character wearing a crown. It is their unique talents that are the key to overcoming all obstacles along the way.

item.title: Rose of Wind
item.description: Game Description Rose of Wind offers to take care of an old tavern inherited from his grandfather. This once flourished institution now needs a caring hand to restore its reputation and again make the center of attraction for travelers. A variety of guests will knock on the door, from tired merchants to brave adventurers, each with his own fate. The atmosphere depends on the decisions of the manager: you can feed them added to them, provide an overnight stay or support the conversation at the hearth.

item.title: Beatblock
item.description: Game Description In Beatblock, the player controls a platform located in the center of a circular arena. As the character Cranky, you need to intercept blocks that appear in time with the melody. This action requires constant rotation to meet targets that appear around the perimeter. Gameplay is complicated by the introduction of four different types of blocks, each requiring a different approach to eliminate. Each track is a self-contained level with a unique visual style, in which the main goal is to score points.

item.title: Car Dealership Simulator 2
item.description: Game Description Car Dealership Simulator 2 puts the player in charge of a growing car trade. The main occupation is exploring the open city in search of cars to buy at various markets and from other dealers. You can purchase both new and used vehicles, each of which opens up the opportunity to make a profit. Through a continuous cycle of strategic purchasing and effective sales, you will expand the business and achieve a dominant position in the car market, turning the initial enterprise into a large business.

item.title: Cloverpit
item.description: Game Description Cloverpit puts the protagonist in a rusty camera equipped only with a slot machine and an ATM. Each round sets a clear goal: to accumulate enough coins to pay a constantly growing debt to an invisible kidnapper. This cycle of risky bets works as a debt simulator, in which non -payment leads to an immediate loss. A closed, surreal environment creates an atmosphere of a psychological horror, turning a solitary passage into a desperate attempt to escape from the hellish Western.

item.title: Deadswitch Combat
item.description: Game Description Deadswitch Combat is a fast-paced 2D side-scrolling shooter that immerses fighters in fast-paced tactical battles across a variety of maps. The project offers many competitive modes, including classic team clashes such as Team Deathmatch and Capture the Flag. In addition to them, more specific scenarios are also available, for example, Demolition with the installation of a bomb or Headquarters, where it is necessary to capture and hold strategic points.

item.title: HOTEL BARCELONA
item.description: Game Description HOTEL BARCELONA places the player inside a remote structure designed as a trap for American serial killers. The main character is Justine, a new federal marshal whose mind is shared with the maniac Dr. Carnival. Together, the two individuals must eliminate every criminal within the hotel’s walls. Their common goal is to survive this ordeal and get out of the building. The action in HOTEL BARCELONA takes place in a 2.

item.title: Macabre
item.description: Game Description Macabre plunges a squad of one to four into an unstable Rift with constantly changing maps and objectives. The key task is to find rare resources and stabilize the location before it is destroyed. The area is patrolled by a smart monster that adapts to the actions of gamers and forces them to constantly improvise. Survival depends on stealth and cunning, because outwitting this creature is the only chance, since open combat is impossible.

item.title: Mars First Logistics
item.description: Game Description Mars First Logistics physics and transportation simulator with an open world to explore. The game was invented so that the player could feel like a delivery driver of various cargo items with a capricious shape. To deliver the cargo that the game provides, you need to take a vehicle. You can make a car or a vehicle on wheels yourself from various mechanisms offered by the game. To promote and develop your mechanical creation, you need to receive virtual currency called credits.

item.title: Hotel Magnate
item.description: Game Description Hotel Magnate is a hotel manager simulator. You need to manage the whole process: from building a building and choosing the color of the walls - to the hire of workers and the fight against emergency situations. You can manage a luxurious hotel in the center of the metropolis, a small motel by the road or a sunny resort with a pool. In the Hotel Magnate, everything will begin with the construction of the building: the foundation, walls, rooms and stairs.

item.title: Letters of War
item.description: Game Description In the center of the plot of Letters of War is the fate of the Briton Liam, who volunteered for the front during the Second World War. The main goal is to preserve the connection with the little daughter of Rosie through correspondence, overcoming the distance between the battlefields and a quiet rear. Gamers have to go the path of a fighter of the 8th British Army, whose activities are covered in a project with historical accuracy.

item.title: Forgotten Fragments
item.description: Game Description The goal in Forgotten Fragments is to recover lost artifacts by completing puzzle levels. Gamers control the protagonists Enid, Ryder and Dayen, and the main mechanics are based on throwing spheres. Using projectiles, you need to light torches to complete the stage. The gameplay combines precise platforming and physics-based aiming, with successful throws needing to be made before time runs out. This key action underlies all location challenges.

item.title: Forsaker: Dingding and Blade
item.description: Game Description Forsaker: Dingding and Blade begins with a regular mission for two young men, which develops into a Cannibal Odyssey on the Hel continent. The local world is divided into three fractions: people, the Church of the Divine Body and the devouring flesh of the outcasts. Players explore this society, constantly faced with the main choice: to eat another or become prey. The plot reveals deep conspiracies and casts doubt on the established order and the very nature of survival.

item.title: Jumpbound
item.description: Game Description Jumpbound is a first-person platformer where every jump is crucial on your way to the top of a mysterious alien world. Exploring the remains of an ancient civilization is accompanied by relaxing sound design and breathtaking views, and the atmosphere changes as you progress. The project offers flexible difficulty settings, allowing you to either leisurely explore the environment using checkpoints, or take on the challenge without them for the sake of glory.

item.title: This Be Mutiny
item.description: Game Description This Be Mutiny is a tactical adventure centered around betrayal and infighting among the team. At the center of the story is a squad of 11 colorful characters united by a common goal, but everyone’s personal ambitions lead to inevitable rebellion. The gameplay is built on complex decisions, forcing the user to constantly choose which of his teammates to keep on the team and which to mercilessly throw overboard.

item.title: TORSO TENNIS
item.description: Game Description TORSO TENNIS is about creating absurd but effective combinations of body parts and tattoos for total domination on the court. Players, controlling only one torso, will have to piece together a powerful tennis mechanism capable of independently generating chain reactions. The basis of everything is a synergy system inspired by auto-battlers, where some items act as triggers to activate the effects of others. This allows you to unleash spectacular combinations, turning each match into a unique event.

item.title: Touhou Makuka Sai ~ Fantastic Danmaku Festival Part III
item.description: Game Description In Touhou Makuka Sai ~ Fantastic Danmaku Festival Part 3, a conspiracy related to the strange moon above Gansko is revealed. During the annual festival of mid -autumn, the lunar exhibition is unusually lively. With the sunrise of the full moon, a huge curtain stops the movement of the night sky to the ground. This phenomenon lures numerous Yokaev - creatures, previously known only by rumors interested in a passing banquet.

item.title: Aethermancer
item.description: Game Description Aethermancer - an adventure in which the player in the role of a powerful Ethermant will have to explore the constantly changing world of the Terast. The main task is to create an indestructible connection with mythical creatures that fell into an endless cycle of death and rebirth. The protagonist needs to assemble a detachment of three monsters and conduct them through dangerous procedurally generated locations of destroyed ruins.

item.title: Baby Steps
item.description: Game Description Baby Steps puts players in the role of Nate, an unemployed man with no stated purpose. He discovers a previously unknown ability: the ability to consciously put one foot in front of the other. The gameplay is entirely focused on a physical walking simulation, where each step Nate takes is a separate action, controlled from a third person. Controlling the character in the world of Baby Steps, constantly shrouded in fog, step by step, becomes the main task.

item.title: Blippo+
item.description: Game Description Blippo+ is a non -cable television simulator with living actors. The main gameplay is to switch the channels for viewing transmissions broadcasting to the entire alien world. The broadcast is filled with soap operas, sitcoms, news releases, weather forecasts and all kinds of talk shows. Each broadcast creates a separate universe stylized for pirate TV and public stations of the 1980s, which is supplemented by a surreal supply with interference on the screen.

item.title: Crypt Crawler
item.description: Game Description The plot of Crypt Crawler starts after the fall of the heroes of the kingdom under the onslaught of the hordes of undead, poured from the open gates of the underworld. The mission to seal the fault is assigned to a lonely mechanic goblin. The character will have a 16-level descent into the dungeon in a dungeon in a monsters to achieve and close the portal. Each stage offers a new tactical task, forcing the goblin to climb deeper into the enemy territory for the sake of fulfilling the mission.

item.title: Deconstruction Simulator
item.description: Game Description Deconstruction Simulator immerses users in business demolition business. Gamers become in the place of a demolition manager who is instructed to evaluate the cost of various materials in the process of demolition of buildings. Title provides users with a platform for studying and participating in the process of destruction, starting with the assessment of objects for resale and ending with the use of powerful equipment for the destruction of buildings.

item.title: Global Magnates: Shipping Tycoon
item.description: Game Description Global Magnates: Shipping Tycoon sets the gamers the task of creating a marine empire built around a new technology for its time - a sea container. The main goal is to turn a small enterprise into a dominant logistics corporation. The process includes competition with rivals under the control of AI, using hostile absorptions, buying assets and price wars to capture the market share. Success requires the acquisition of key ports, expand the flotilla and investment in a shipyard to maintain superiority in a changeable economic situation, where each solution affects the situation.

item.title: Granvir
item.description: Game Description The Granvir pilots are fading to the partisan war, controlling heavily armed furs. The key task is to promote the battlefield to the evacuation points with parallel collection of components. Details fall from defeated opponents, allowing to constantly replace and improve the combat vehicle. The arsenal includes both near -battle weapons like swords and pile installations, as well as long -range cannons with flamethrowers. Such a system pushes gamers to experiments with various equipment combinations to complete the tasks.

item.title: Hyperviolent
item.description: Game Description HYPERVIOLENT is the most dynamic action game in which the player will immerse himself in the atmosphere of action games of the 90s. Pixel animation, frantic battles that turn into a bloody mess and a huge variety of weapons will definitely not let you get bored. No matter how difficult the victory may be, the main thing is to achieve the goal and destroy all opponents on the field.

item.title: It has my face
item.description: Game Description IT HAS My Face unfolds the action in a crowded area, where a double, indistinguishable from others, tracks out a protagonist. The player’s main task is to identify this hostile clone in the crowd and eliminate it before the death attack. This key mechanics gives rise to a procedurally generated paranoia, forcing to constantly maintain vigilance and notice barely noticeable details in behavior. Survival depends on the timely discovery of the only hidden threat, otherwise the character will be a victim of a sudden attack, and the cycle will begin again.

item.title: Pompeii: The Legacy
item.description: Game Description Pompeii: The Legacy sets the gamers the task of leading the Roman family and restore the city 20 years after the eruption of Vesuvius. The project requires to take into account the different needs of the patricians, plebeians and slaves, since each group has its own goals. Players from scratch lay streets, erects forums and build aqueducts. Any infrastructure or social decision affects the position of the family and determines its legacy for centuries, generating the consequences for future generations.

item.title: Slime Rancher 2
item.description: Game Description Slime Rancher 2 continues the adventure of Beatrix LeBeau, who travels to Rainbow Island, making her way through a host of obstacles to create a slug farm. The platformer with construction elements features an open world where the user is invited to encounter a mass of slimes that must be collected using a special blaster-vacuum cleaner. Here you will also discover new species of slugs, explore a mysterious world, and build a greenhouse, placing it on a paradise island.

item.title: Banker Simulator
item.description: Game Description Banker Simulator tasks the player with reviving a bankrupt bank. The main goal is to return profitability to the financial structure through competent management and strategic investments, overcoming economic difficulties to restore market positions. The process requires a balance between active actions and passive income, forcing you to take into account both customer needs and long-term risks. Success depends on the ability to lift an organization from the abyss and secure its place in the industry.

item.title: Bloodthief
item.description: Game Description Bloodthief sends a vampire to a high -speed race through dangerous dungeons and ghost locks. By controlling the character in the first person, the player uses inertia to perform parkour-malevors in a complex three-dimensional environment. Moving is combined with a near battle on swords, and victory over enemies that block the path requires accurate strikes. The main task is to explore the locations for the disclosure of dark secrets hidden in them, surviving under the onslaught of constant threats.

item.title: Cozy Island
item.description: Game Description Cozy Island is set in a world full of surprises where gamers will have to explore and build. The main activity is traveling around the open-world island to collect resources and build a personal base. You can wander without a specific direction, discovering different locations at your own pace. Toys and furniture are scattered around the area, serving as the main materials for decorating the designated secret area. In addition, the island is inhabited by various animals, you can find them and bring them to your home.

item.title: Deadly Days: Roadtrip
item.description: Game Description Deadly Days: Roadtrip sends gamers on a journey from one stop to another in the world in a teeming zombie. Moving by bus along the procedurally generated route, survivors make decisions that determine their further path. The main gameplay cycle consists of battles with crowds of the dead in different locations to collect supplies and fuel. This constant struggle allows you to continue the trip and brings closer to salvation from a ruthless chase.

item.title: Den Pain
item.description: Game Description Den Pain introduces Dan - a cleaner whose life has come down. Dismissed with a meager allowance, he remains alone in an abandoned apartment near New York. Its isolation is aggravated by a father, instead of help, bringing only bitter reproaches. The betrayal of a woman named Louise ends with a robbery, humiliation and a gun attached to his temple. He is a choice: take your fate or take up a weapon in order to return everything lost.

item.title: Medieval Crafter: Blacksmith
item.description: Game Description Medieval Crafter: Blacksmith puts you in the role of a skilled blacksmith in a medieval fantasy world. It revolves around crafting weapons and armor, but there’s more to it than just forging tools. The user will have to dive into mining, explore the mines to find ore and gems, and then create items from these resources. As a blacksmith, you are constantly faced with an influx of orders from various villagers who require different equipment for their needs.

item.title: Northwind
item.description: Game Description The mercenary in Northwind chooses a specific hunt, after which it plans the route through a dangerous, frozen territory. The main task is to travel around these lands in order to find and defeat formidable monsters. In the breaks between the signs, the avant -navpost serves as a central base for preparation and improvements. The gameplay is built on the implementation of such tasks, overcoming powerful bosses and collecting resources to strengthen subsequent attempts.

item.title: The Evelyn Game
item.description: Game Description The Evelyn Game is a psychological adventure in which a young woman named Evelyn returns to her childhood house. This place, abandoned after the death of her mother, keeps not only dusty memories, but also gloomy secrets of the past. The atmosphere of an abandoned mansion is saturated with symbolism, and each object and corner can tell their history. Players have to plunge into the study of this fading family nest, where the echoes of the past sound in empty rooms, and something sinister is hidden behind the locked doors.

item.title: Witchy Business
item.description: Game Description Witchy Business offers you to run your own witchcraft shop. The main task is to prepare potions for a continuous flow of customers. Daily activities include fulfilling special orders, crafting magical items, and growing your enterprise. You also need to deal with troubles, for example, casting spells on thieves trying to steal coins. The ultimate goal is to successfully manage the establishment and achieve its prosperity through high-quality service and streamlined production.

item.title: Wander Stars
item.description: Game Description In Wander Stars, martial artist Ringo and a scoundrel named Wolf work together to search for pieces of a legendary map across the universe. Their alliance becomes the basis for the search for Ringo’s brother and the discovery of the secrets of Wolfe’s past - a story told in 10 separate episodes. This space adventure involves forming alliances with a variety of characters, gradually creating a real family. The plot touches on themes of mystery, betrayal and redemption as the duo travels between worlds.

item.title: Eclipsium
item.description: Game Description Eclipsium begins in a sunless, self-eating world. A desperate protagonist known as the Wanderer is forced to search for a mysterious figure called She. His first-person journey takes him through a series of surreal, ever-changing locations, including hellish tombs and cathedrals of flesh. The environment is unstable, and the hero must sacrifice everything to continue his search. Each place becomes a psychological test in an atmosphere of mystery and existential horror.

item.title: Folly of the Wizards
item.description: Game Description Folly of the Wizards proposes to try on the role of a sorcerer’s student from a kind of magical cult. The main task is to stop the invasion of demons, passing through a series of procedurally created dungeons. Each race will require the use of unpredictable spells to destroy bizarre opponents and advance inland of chaotic locations. To survive, a quick reaction and a tactical mindset are necessary to overcome many dangers.

item.title: Jump Space
item.description: Game Description Jump Space is a team-based first-person shooter game designed for teams of up to 4 people crewing one starship. The gameplay involves completing specific tasks in space. Gamers seamlessly switch between controlling the ship, exploring locations on foot, and moving outside the vehicle when entering airless space. Maintaining the operational condition and upgrading the overall starship is a key activity within the gameplay. In Jump Ship, teams will take part in combat encounters that take place both on planetary surfaces and in the vacuum of space.

item.title: Megabonk
item.description: Game Description In Megabonk, the gamer opposes the endless waves of creatures on randomly generated maps. The main task is to withstand the onslaught for as long as possible, using the mechanics of the slasher and a third -person shooter. With the strengthening of the Horde, survival depends on the destruction of opponents and maneuvering in space. The purpose of each stage is to find and defeat the location boss, opening access to a new, more difficult zone.

item.title: Moros Protocol
item.description: Game Description Shootouts in Moros Protocol take place in a sci-fi setting where users have to face a variety of mutated monsters. The game is stylized as old-school designs drawn in pixel graphics. The gameplay is an action first-person shooter with roguelike elements. The main character is forced to confront the monsters and bandits that appeared in the universe due to the activities of two megacorporations involved in neurobiology. In the Darkverse universe, users have the opportunity to explore dark laboratory dungeons that will be formed randomly.

item.title: Stuck in the Present
item.description: Game Description Stuck in the Present sends two friends, Fei and Rich, a trap of surreal corridors of the dilapidated metro system. This underground labyrinth under a large unfamiliar city becomes the physical embodiment of their common painful past. Forgotten memories come to the surface, distorting the environment and creating a terrible reflection of the internal confusion of the heroes. To search for a way out, the couple will have to face a depressed story, because the escape depends on the clue of past events.

item.title: Arctic Awakening
item.description: Game Description Arctic Awakening is an adventure first -person game, the plot of which is served episodically. Once in the vastness of the harsh Arctic, surviving after air flipping. Traveling to travel in the company of a protagonist and drone with pumped artificial intelligence. Together, the heroes need to go on a journey in which they need to find the second pilot in order to get out of snowy lands.

item.title: Deadeye Deepfake Simulacrum
item.description: Game Description Deadeye Deepfake Simulacrum stands out against the background of similar projects due to specific visual design and design. Here, as the protagonist, is a cybernetic corporate agent who has to go through a series of tests in order to get to the bottom of the truth. Each step here needs to be carefully weighed, because only one enemy bullet can finish the journey of the hero. But everything is not so bad, because he has his trump cards in his sleeve, and it is at the expense of them that he will be able to get an advantage over opponents.

item.title: Easy Delivery Co.
item.description: Game Description In Easy Delivery Co. The player takes on the role of the driver-who travels along the picturesque mountain town with severe weather conditions. The main task is to deliver parcels to local residents on a compact kei-kare. Remuneration of labor is significantly lower than the minimum, forming the economic background of the situation in which the hero found himself. The open world allows you to explore the surroundings outside the main routes, and the physics of transport affects the controllability of the machine on a different relief.

item.title: Formula Legends
item.description: Game Description Racers in Formula Legends have been competing in car races for several decades. The gameplay spans the period from the 1960s to the present day, offering 16 vehicle models based on historical prototypes. Races take place at 14 circuits based on famous racing locations. These tracks are not static, they change over the years and offer fresh challenges in each new era. This journey through time clearly shows the evolution of racing cars and track configurations.

item.title: Glass Masquarade 4: Constellations
item.description: Game Description Glass Masquarade 4: Constellations represents a heavenly map with 7 constellations containing thematic art-heads. The main goal is to assemble images in the style of stained glass. Each of the 28 mosaics, inspired by different cultures, invites the player to make a collection of art plots. The process consists in the methodical fitting of textured glass fragments to the place to complete the work, opening the final composition one fragment at a time.

item.title: Goblin Cleanup
item.description: Game Description Goblin Cleanup will turn over the idea of ​​the classic Dungeon Crawler genre. Forget about the extermination of dragons and the plunder of treasures - here you yourself put things in order. Take the role of a professional cleaner of the dungeons, who is instructed to restore order after a group of violent adventure seekers arranged a pogrom here. This is not an ordinary cleaning simulator. Time management is a key moment.

item.title: Hellbrella
item.description: Game Description Hellbrella sends a cat in a cloak in the depths of the underworld. The main task is to survive in battles with hordes of demonic eyes and other monsters. The combat system is based on dynamic air mechanics in the Hack and Slash genre, focusing on continuous movement and pure aggression. The hero uses an umbrella as a single weapon, conducting long combinations in flight to clean up locations.

item.title: I Hate My Waifu Streamer
item.description: Game Description In I Hate My Waifu Streamer, the gamer will have to capture the attention of the streamer before other viewers. The main goal is to interact with a girl named Mio during her live broadcasts. Communication is based on writing chat messages and sending donations to stand out among other subscribers. This competition for recognition forms the basis of the gameplay, and financial support becomes a key way to develop relationships and attract Mio’s interest.

item.title: Netherworld
item.description: Game Description Netherworld introduces a player with a jellyfish named Medu, who went to the bar to fill in grief with vodka after his wife leaves. This family crisis is the beginning of an unexpected trip to gloomy lands inhabited by strange creatures. Trying to establish his life, honey is in contact with the local population consisting of cocaine magicians, enterprising prostitutes, gangsters and sociopathic children. The plot moves through dialogs and investigations related to these characters.

item.title: PIGFACE
item.description: Game Description The main character of PIGFACE, a woman named Exit, comes to her senses and discovers a bomb implanted in her head. Her past actions led to her being blackmailed into fulfilling contracts for the figures now controlling her life. Missions do not have a prescribed method of completion, allowing both rapid assaults and more tactical, slow progress. The only requirement is to complete the goal by any available means.

item.title: Platypus Reclayed
item.description: Game Description Platypus Reclayed takes place as an overpopulated Collosatropolis sets its sights on neighboring Mungola for expansion. The smog-choked metropolis sends out its formidable battle fleet to seize new lands. The people of Mungola are forced to rely on the only force that can protect them. A squadron of outdated F-27 fighters becomes the last hope against the full might of the invaders, laying the groundwork for a desperate defensive campaign.

item.title: Ratatan
item.description: Game Description The creatures of Ratatan begin a journey together to a place called The Everafter. According to legend, the Goddess lives in this distant land, and meeting her has become a common goal for all the bestial inhabitants of the island. Despite their differences in appearance and character, they are united by this desire. The heroes set out on a journey from their busy home, prepared for numerous attempts and failures on the way to their dream, which they will never give up.

item.title: Ale Abbey
item.description: Game Description Ale Abbey is a unique world where users will be able to build, manage and expand the monastery specializing in the cooking of the Holy Elya. Title does not make it possible to use ready -made recipes, forcing to experiment and create your own varieties of beer from scratch. The users will have to comprehend the art of brewing, adjusting the temperature of the grout, the quality and amount of beer in order to achieve the perfect result.

item.title: Antivirus PROTOCOL
item.description: Game Description Antivirus PROTOCOL opens up a digital world captured by the ubiquitous Virus, and the gamer is given the role of counter-program. The main task is the methodical extermination of hostile elements that have filled the system. The first steps involve eliminating small pests to obtain their internal components, represented by code fragments and raw data. This process of gathering resources becomes the basis for achieving the main goal - complete cleanup of the infected network.

item.title: BRAZILIAN DRUG DEALER 3
item.description: Game Description BRAZILIAN DRUG DEALER 3 is not a title for the faint of heart, because it throws users straight into a world where chaos reigns, and their main task is simple: to correct the disorder caused by an unforeseen and catastrophic ritual. The plot centers on a fan of the cult Brazilian funk musician MIT AIA, who, while trying to revive the star, accidentally opens a portal to Hell. At this point, everything takes a turn for the worse, and suddenly the entire state of Rio de Janeiro is overrun by demons and possessed creatures.

item.title: Flick Shot Rogues
item.description: Game Description Flick Shot Rogues places heroes on a desktop field, where the outcome of each course depends on the laws of physics. Players plan, aim and start their characters, like balls in billiards or pinball. The task is to clean the location from opponents, causing chain reactions and thoughtful clashes. Success requires a combination of tactical insight with an understanding of inertia to conquer various biomes of the island, including the full trap of the jungle.

item.title: Lord Ambermase
item.description: Game Description The Universe in Lord Ambermaze succumbed to a terrible curse that stopped the normal course of time. The main character is a guy named Zin, who owns an ancient magic relic under the name “sword of movement.” Thanks to the enchanted weapon, the protagonist gets the opportunity to move freely around the world and resist the dangers that the Lord Ambermase prepares. Users will have to save the kingdom and the princess, which is in the imprisonment of the criminal.

item.title: Shapehero Factory
item.description: Game Description Shapehero Factory combines the elements of the simulator of the factory, rogelitis and Tower Defense. Players build huts for the mass production of heroes who automatically fight with the waves of enemies. The goal is to defeat the great disaster sealed in the book of magic. With the help of minions, collect a variety of characters from basic figures found on a magic scroll. Circles and triangles form soldiers, and circles and squares - sprites.

item.title: Strange Antiquits
item.description: Game Description In Strange Antiquets, the gamer will become the keeper of the bench of occult objects. The establishment is located in the town of Andermir, located on the border between the worlds. The proximity to the unknown affects local residents looking for mysterious artifacts to solve their unusual problems.
