The central task is to help these clients, responding to their specific and sometimes alarming requests generated by life in such a strange place.

item.title: Bookshop Simulator
item.description: Game Description In Bookshop Simulator, the game process is to order goods, their arrangement on shelves and maintenance at the cash desk for revenue. Earned funds are directed to decorating the premises, its physical expansion and subsequent hiring of personnel. Employees can be entrusted with the duties of cashiers or merchandisers, freeing time for the management of other aspects of their business. The player’s main task is to turn a small shop into a large trading network.

item.title: Cubic Cosmos
item.description: Game Description Cubic Cosmos throws fighters into a deadly competition orchestrated by the goddess. The main goal is to break the endless cycle of testing. The gameplay combines roguelike deckbuilding with turn-based tactics containing tower defense elements. Gamers form an army of pawns and place them on the battlefield to confront enemy forces. Survival depends on the placement of units and the proper use of a unique card deck, and failure turns the character into a sport for the deity.

item.title: Daymare Town
item.description: Game Description Daymare Town immerses the player in the surrealist city landscape, holding him in his abstract borders. The study of the world is conducted in the Point-And-Click format, and the forwarding forward depends on the search for key items and solving riddles. The scene is numerous interconnected locations full of secrets and hidden objects. The main task is to collect hints and use the inventory to find a way out of the alarm.

item.title: No, i'm not a human
item.description: Game Description No, i’m not a Human represents the scenario on the sunset of the Earth, forcing a person to stay inside and lock all the doors. The outside world is hostile, and on the streets burned by the sun are blackened bodies distorted in torment. In the afternoon, his eyes are able to burn his eyes, forcing to hide in shelter. The only salvation comes with the onset of darkness, but this time belongs to creatures known as visitors.

item.title: Rana Card
item.description: Game Description The player plays the role of a farm manager working on the TimeTech corporation. Its task is to achieve planned indicators established by management. The whole process is built on the formation of the deck and the competent use of cards, each of which has its own time in time. Each move has to decide whether it is worth taking another card, risking the exhausted time limit. This element of excitement and balanced risk is the central part of the gameplay.

item.title: Superhero Simulator
item.description: Game Description The Superhero Simulator has to protect Goldpine - a city faced with an increase in crime. The player’s main task is to patrol streets, suppress robberies, save civilians and enter into an open battle with villains. Each successful act reveals new abilities, gradually increasing the power of the character. This gameplay cycle is combined with the need to lead an ordinary life, forcing to constantly look for a balance between two different roles.

item.title: Town to City
item.description: Game Description Town to City challenges the player to transform a 19th-century Mediterranean settlement into a thriving metropolis. Construction without reference to a grid allows you to freely place all structures and natural elements. This way you can create both orderly areas with straight avenues and organically growing towns connected by winding paths. The placement of residential buildings, shops and infrastructure shapes the layout and functionality of a growing city.

item.title: Voyages of Nera
item.description: Game Description Voyages of Nera offers gamers the role of Echo, a descendant of the long -disappeared defenders of the world. The main task is to cross the magical ocean to confront monstrous creatures and the awakening of scattered spirits. This world, negligently, is filled with ancient ruins and original biomes located on its islands. Players can combine up to 10 people for joint swimming around the seas or go on a trip alone.

item.title: eXoSpace Combat Engineer
item.description: Game Description eXoSpace Combat Engineer is a journey into the depths of a procedurally generated galaxy, where survival depends solely on engineering savvy and piloting skill. In the role of a bounty hunter, you will have to chart a course through unexplored sectors of space, each hyperjump in which promises unpredictable events. Fate can lead you to a research station in distress, throw you into the thick of a battle with pirates, or force you to face a moral choice - to provide assistance or engage in robbery.

item.title: Greedland
item.description: Game Description Greedland is an exciting isometric shooter in which you play for the interstellar mercenary. Fight in constantly changing environmental environments and destroy the waves of enemies. If you like a dynamic gameplay like Crimsonland and Vampire Survivors, then Greedland is an ideal game for you! An online mode is offered for 2-4 people, an endless regime, a number of complex tasks, a system of fur and many roles to choose from.

item.title: Little Witch in the Woods
item.description: Game Description Little Witch in the Woods allows you to plunge into the life of a girl - an apprentice witch who goes to explore a strange forest, helping its inhabitants. The adventure game has a deep storyline, pixel graphics, a variety of activities and the opportunity to spend interesting leisure time. The heroine is Ellie, who learns magic. The young protagonist lives in the Witch House, in the world of LUCEREIN ORTU.

item.title: Pinata Go Boom
item.description: Game Description Pinata Go Boom throws a player in the role of an employee armed with bat and corporate ambitions. The main task is to break the Pignata in a series of industrial premises. To go to the next zone, it is necessary to destroy all containers. Broken Pignata releases a variety of toys and prey to be collected. The accumulated catch becomes the basis for career growth and development of skills in the hierarchy.

item.title: Serviceit: You can do it
item.description: Game Description Create your own company to develop IT solutions at Serviceit: You can do it. Stand in the place of an experienced entrepreneur, manage a team of technicians and make sure that the problems of your customers with equipment remain in the past. The game offers a variety of playing platform for technically savvy and business people: from fuss with motherboards to user navigation. Master the art of repair. Diagnize faulty equipment, accurately own a soldering iron and change tired transistors to new ones.

item.title: M.A.S.S. Builder
item.description: Game Description M.A.S.S. Builder is a dynamic slasher game that allows you to completely customize your combat robot. The game allows you to create a unique Mechanical Assault Skeleton Suit (in the original - Mechanical Assault Skeleton Suit, abbreviated as MASS). You have to lead an army to protect humanity from an alien invasion. Don’t let the human race be destroyed and take the lives of your people into your own hands!

item.title: Restart Shuhan Dynasty: Origin
item.description: Game Description In Restart Shuhan Dynasty: Origin, a modern worker is transferred to the East Han dynasty torn by conflicts. At first, he has a handicap, believing that knowledge of future events will provide him with the right path to victory. Soon the hero discovers how the story begins to deviate from known facts, because his actions create waves in time. The player is trying on the role of Liu Bay, traveling around the world with familiar faces and inevitable elections, destroying the previous ideas about the era of three -prisoners.

item.title: Misty Judgment
item.description: Game Description Misty Judgment begins with the awakening of the protagonist, qi and, from a nightmare in a strange reality without clear memories. Unable to confirm his own personality, he investigates a series of murders filed in the video format with real actors. The main task is the search and analysis of evidence, the comparison of facts and the calculation of the criminal. Any solution affects further events, and the future of the protagonist depends on the deductive abilities of the player.

item.title: Beyond Sunset
item.description: Game Description Beond Sunset is a bright neon action, in which the player will become a street samurai. The beautiful style of the city of the future, where there is a crime scene and unique cybernetic developments are recreated in a pixel style with smooth animations. The game is perfect for those who love a deep story that opens through the dialogs with NPS, as well as powerful battles with thought out tactics.

item.title: Chrono Gear: Warden of Time
item.description: Game Description The Chrono Gear: Warden of Time project immerses the player in the center of a temporary collapse provoked by the battle between the Guardian of Time Ouro Kronia and the demon Alter Laplus. During the collision, the artifact she created to stabilize realities, the Chrono Mechanism, was destroyed. Its fragments, the Golden Gears, scattered throughout the universe, which poses the main task for the gamer: to find them and restore the disturbed order.

item.title: Coal LLC
item.description: Game Description In Coal LLC, the player is engaged in the extraction of constantly growing coal volumes to perform a daily quota, and the failure leads to the end of the passage. The activity begins with one Old Kirki, forcing to descend deep underground to achieve production goals before dark. The underground world is updated daily, offering a new location of resources requiring quick development. As the company’s industrial activity expands, the environment begins to demonstrate signs of decline.

item.title: Gloomy Eyes
item.description: Game Description In Gloomy Eyes, the player alternates between controlling a zombie boy and a human girl as they navigate a world without the sun. The story is set in a conflict between the living and the undead, where the two main characters, Gloomi and Nena, form a forbidden alliance. They challenge the established order by going on a journey together. Their common goal is to find the sun and return its light.

item.title: Retromania Wrestling
item.description: Game Description Retromania Wrestling is a sequel to the cult game Wrestlefest, which was released back in 1991. The gameplay is a dynamic wrestling that is distinguished by detailed two -dimensional sprites of characters and animated backgrounds. In fact, before you a simplified version of the struggle without rules, balancing on the verge of a simulator and arcade. Roster of wrestlers is 16 unique athletes, each of whom owns an individual battle style and is distinguished by appearance.

item.title: Try To Drive
item.description: Game Description Try to Drive sets two players the task of simultaneously piloting a tandem bicycle on a vertical highway. One gamer controls the gas, setting the speed of movement and evading the traps. At the same time, his partner is responsible for the wheel, laying the route through the environment. Successful ascent to the top directly depends on the coordination and connection in the duet. The entire gameplay is built on this joint control scheme, turning cooperation into a key element for advance forward.

item.title: A Twisted Place
item.description: Game Description A Twisted Place sets the task of getting out of a nightmare place full of unimaginable threats. A single narrative develops for several chapters, switching between a 2.5D-view from the side and the perspective of the first person. Such a change in angles emphasizes the surrealism of the environment and its demonic inhabitants. The basis of the gameplay is a continuous struggle with otherworldly dangers in the gloomy atmosphere, and the main goal is to find the way out.

item.title: Dead Reset
item.description: Game Description In Dead Reset, surgeon Cole Mason is forced to operate on a patient to remove a parasitic organism while isolated in an underwater station. After being kidnapped and taken to this facility, the protagonist becomes trapped in a brutal and repeating cycle of death. Each failure and the terrible death that follows is not the end, but a way to look at the situation from a different angle. This series of deaths becomes the main method of gathering information, uncovering the truth and finding a way to escape from the bloody trap.

item.title: Professional Fishing 2
item.description: Game Description Players in Professional Fishing 2 begin their journey as novice anglers with simple equipment. The starter kit includes an old fishing rod, a reel from the 1980s, and bait bread. The landing net helps you catch prey, and the tent allows you to rest and create a save point anywhere. With the accumulation of experience and increasing levels comes progress. Selling the fish you catch earns you the currency you need to purchase upgraded equipment, which gives you access to various techniques such as float fishing, spinning and feeder methods, as well as special baits and sonar for tracking down large prey.

item.title: Shape of Dreams
item.description: Game Description Shape of Dreams project, whose essence is this: Imagine the action of Rogue-Lite, seasoned with Moba elements, invented by Lizard Smoothie for PC Gamers. Are you intrigued? Still. This world of dreams is your playground. You are sculpting the heroes from their memories, turning them into champions, like a sculptor from a cutter. Alone or with three friends in a cooperative, Adventure destroys the boundaries of the genre, offering something fresh.

item.title: Machick 2
item.description: Game Description In Machick 2, a magical chicken faces off against countless hordes of frogs in chaotic arenas. The key task is to survive under the continuous onslaught of enemy waves in conditions of dense fire with a view from above. Each attempt offers a unique set of challenges and opportunities, requiring the gamer to constantly adapt. The main goal in these unpredictable scenarios is to destroy the legions of amphibians and defeat the powerful bosses who command them.

item.title: The Bleakest Keep
item.description: Game Description The Bleakest Keep sends Edward, captain of the guard, to a fortified tower to confront the dark sorcerer Cormac. The adventure begins in the cemetery outside the castle walls, and the final goal awaits at the very top of the structure. Progression involves passing through 4 different levels in the style of dark fantasy, teeming with hordes of zombies, vampires and other creatures. The main task of the player is to reach the peak, defeat the sorcerer and thereby save the kingdom from the nightmares he unleashed on these lands.

item.title: Disc Golf City
item.description: Game Description In Disc Golf City, gamers find themselves in stylized urban locations that serve as tracks. The main task is to abandon the shell in the target basket for the minimum number of attempts. The path of the drive of the disk must be laid through parks, squares and roofs, turning concrete jungle into a sports arena. The physical model controls the trajectory of the projectile and its collision with surfaces, requiring the exact calculation of the angle and the strength of each launch.

item.title: Trainatic
item.description: Game Description Trainatic offers the player to pump wagons to collect materials when driving along a railway canvas. The key task is the constant expansion of the locomotive, starting with one engine. The accession of new components increases its length and capabilities, facilitating the promotion of the procedurally generated path. This process allows you to accumulate raw materials for subsequent construction. Over time, the composition is transformed from the initial form into a massive structure that occupies a significant part of the screen.

item.title: Star Fire: Eternal Cycle
item.description: Game Description Star Fire: Eternal Cycle triggers a race in which the main character makes jerks and combo against alien enemies in futuristic 2.5D-gallocations. The gameplay is built on a combination of sid-scrolling battles in the spirit of Beat ‘Em Up and progression systems characteristic of Roguelite. Each attempt to clean the level is distinguished by a unique arrangement of enemies and procedurally generated branches of tracks. The player’s movement and attacks are designed for direct control, requiring evasions and accurate calculation of the time to win the cyberpanic opponents in the destroyed environment.

item.title: The Lightkeeper
item.description: Game Description The Lightkeeper transfers Arthur, a veteran of the First World War, to a distant island in 1925. He assumes the position of the sole caretaker of the lighthouse, trying to escape from the memories that pursuing him. His solitude is soon interrupted by the secrets of the past related to the inexplicable fate of previous workers. As daily tasks, the line between its perception and reality is erased, and in the darkness an unknown presence awakens, fed to the heroes of the hero.

item.title: Ammo and Oxygen
item.description: Game Description Ammo and Oxygen sends an expedition to Voydregula 6, a planet where communication with the new colony has been completely severed. The purpose of the mission is to find out the reason for the silence and determine the fate of the settlers. Gamers will explore procedurally generated locations, moving through abandoned stations, canyons, swamps and permafrost. Each foray into these dangerous zones becomes an attempt to restore the picture of the events that led to the collapse of the settlement and to confront the hostile inhabitants.

item.title: Dark Hunting Ground
item.description: Game Description Dark Hunting Ground is a project that focuses on hunting, looting, and growing in strength with every battle. The story begins with users joining the Hunters Association and taking on the difficult task of fighting the Void. This monster-infested land serves as the backdrop to your journey, offering constant challenge as gamers collect loot and build their characters. At the heart of all this is the most important principle: development.

item.title: Bazar Simulator: The Wan Story
item.description: Game Description Bazar Simulator: The Wan Story will throw players in the role of Wang, who arrived in Bokeron City to control the bazaar of his uncle. While his uncle, Van Lun, is passionate about slot machines, Van’s father, Yussef, acts as a mentor in business. However, the outlet itself stores secrets leading to cooperation with the local mafia and a hidden conspiracy. This situation forces the protagonist to combine daily commerce with investigations regarding his own family, combining the management of the shop full of intrigues.

item.title: Hidden Cats in Istanbul
item.description: Game Description Hidden Cats in Istanbul offers the player detailed, unpainted scenes created based on the historical city. The central task is to search for cats hidden throughout the location. If each animal is detected by clicking, parts of the initially monochrome landscape are stained in different colors, gradually appearing a complete picture. This key mechanics combines the solution of puzzles with a gradual artistic manifestation of various city attractions and streets.

item.title: Lumber and Plunder
item.description: Game Description Lumber and Plunder sends players to a remote island, according to rumors, hiding a long -forgotten treasure. The main lesson is the extraction of resources from the environment, for example, the cutting of trees in the mysterious forest. The materials obtained are sold for currency invested in improving tools. Such a progression system opens access to new areas and helps to climb the central mountain, the main goal in finding a legendary treasure.

item.title: Onigiri Shop Simulator
item.description: Game Description Onigiri Shop Simulator sets the player the task of managing the snack on the corner of Japanese street as its sole operator. With a first -person view, he conducts all the things, combining the roles of the owner, cook and cashier. The menu is focused on rice balls with a variety of fillings, and also includes side dishes like crockets and fried fish. A continuous flow of customers places orders that require accurate execution.

item.title: Adventure of Samsara
item.description: Game Description Adventure of Samsara begins with the resurrection of a solar champion, a long -dead Plutonian, revived by a primitive light source. This creature is instructed to re -activate the inter -spatial fortress to restore balance in the entire multi -senior. The main narrative explores the topics of death, revival and fragmented memory, while the protagonist moves through the deeply connected world. The disclosure of the deeper layers of the space storyline is a key component of advancement, requiring players to overcome the obstacles of the environment to fulfill their goal.

item.title: Casebook 1899 - The Leipzig Murders
item.description: Game Description Casebook 1899 - The Leipzig Murders places detective Joseph Kreiser at the center of four murder investigations in the industrial city of Leipzig. The events take place at the turn of the 20th century, and the storyline requires careful study of various locations in search of evidence relevant to each case. Players navigate the city, interact with its inhabitants, and directly interrogate witnesses and potential suspects. The main goal is to collect important information and physical evidence associated with each murder, while solving environmental mysteries.

item.title: Hollow Knight: Silksong
item.description: Game Description Hollow Knight: Silksong talks about the deadly princess Hornet, who protects Hallowest. The girl will travel through the new kingdom of music and silk, faced with unpredictable enemies who block her path to ancient secrets. More than 150 bosses and opponents are available in the game, among which there are not only killers and kings, but also animals and even insects. The main character will have to defeat all the obstacles and reveal the secrets of her nature and the past.

item.title: Jetrunner
item.description: Game Description Jetrunner combines first -person parkour with dynamic shooting in the framework of futuristic sports. Opponents move along the arenas created by hand, using a combination of running, jumping, sliding and firing for promotion. The fully voiced story campaign is dedicated to the history of the newcomer-sensation of Nina White, rising along the competitive ladder. Her path describes battles and challenges in an attempt to achieve legendary status in this discipline.

item.title: Burger Bots Inc.
item.description: Game Description Burger Bots Inc is an intense fight for survival, where the only means of defense for the entire team is a single shotgun. Horrors lurk in the basement of the establishment, and the staff provides the resources to prepare cutlets to combat them. The survival of the team directly depends on coordinated actions and the ability to withstand random, nightmarish events that bring chaos to the work process. Each shift turns into a test, because the main task is not only to serve visitors, but also to stay alive, repelling attacks from hostile entities.

item.title: Kemono Teatime
item.description: Game Description Kemono Teatime invites the player to lead a cafe in the world of Melodius, which has become a refuge for visitors with animal ears. The main task is to prepare signature tea blends for a diverse clientele, where each guest has their own history and preferences. Communication with these characters is central to the narrative, as their visits are temporary and serve as a prelude to their eventual fate.

item.title: ODD Dorable
item.description: Game Description ODD Dorable opens a world in front of the player, created based on hand-drawn illustrations of a 4-year-old child. The main goal is to help the princess find magic sweets scattered around the district to return lost magic. The open world of the project consists of several funny, dissimilar locations, complete secrets and hiding places. Formation advancement requires the study of these areas, interaction with the environment and solving local puzzles organically inscribed in children’s drawing.

item.title: Bad Cheese
item.description: Game Description Bad Cheese provides gameplay where a little mouse performs a series of household chores while spending the weekend with his dysfunctional father in the absence of his mother. The key task is to remain in the favor of the parent and avoid punishment in the house shared with the brother and other demonic beings. The mouse has to wash the floors, cook French fries, destroy spiders and bring medicine to his father.

item.title: Flow
item.description: Game Description The player in Flow initiates drifts in picturesque locations where the style exceeds clean speed. Each level is divided into two special phases that challenge control and stability. The initial stage, Lead the Way, allows the driver to lay his own path in turns, while the car with AI repeats his movement. Then the roles change in the Chase The Flow segment, which requires a gamer to pursue AI, which paves the perfect trajectory and correspond to its rhythm to complete the race.

item.title: Dimwood
item.description: Game Description Dimwood is a card roguelike that takes you on a journey through the dark forest of the same name, where the main goal is to defeat the powerful Beast that lives in the thicket. The visual execution of the project is made in minimalistic 1-bit pixel graphics, creating a special atmosphere. Each enemy encounter is a tactical puzzle, the outcome of which depends on the careful use of cards with modal effects that change depending on the level of light.

item.title: Dungeon Warfare 3
item.description: Game Description Dungeon Warfare 3 offers the player to construct a deadly obstacle strip, laying out the landscape tiles and cutting out dangerous paths for the advancing adventurers. The main activity is the deployment of an expanded arsenal of traps and cunning mechanisms intended for inflicting injuries, wounds and disorientation of enemy detachments. You can directly form a battlefield, erecting walls or swarms and thereby directing opponents to strategically arranged protective structures.

item.title: NODE: The Last Favor of the Antarii
item.description: Game Description NODE: The Last Favor of the Antarii sends an autonomous AI deep into a crumbling Soviet nuclear complex during the Cold War. A robot named NODE navigates the maze of the Tosca facility by following a sequence of commands given on a timeline. This core mechanic is used to solve puzzles and interact with the environment. Success depends on the precise planning of each step to advance through the plot and uncover the secrets hidden in a dangerous location.

item.title: Palette: Cards and Chaos
item.description: Game Description Palette: Cards and Chaos is a roguelike shooter that plunges you into the midst of ever-increasing madness. As a water spirit, armed with a giant brush, you will have to descend into an endless, procedurally generated labyrinth. Each new level of this ever-changing dungeon increases the onslaught of opponents, forcing them to create more and more sophisticated and destructive combinations. The view from above reveals a complete picture of the battle, where real canvases of chaos, woven from paint and explosions, unfold on the battlefield.

item.title: PLAN B: TerRaform
item.description: Game Description In PLAN B: TerraForm, it is necessary to take up the colonization of the planet. To do this, it is necessary to collect resources on the surface of the continent and debug a system for supplying production to cities for further production. The most important resource is settlers. It is required to do everything you need to make the planet suitable for people to live. For example, you need to heat the atmosphere to the correct temperature, create water bodies, plant trees and much more.

item.title: Poly Plaza Ultimate
item.description: Game Description Poly Plaza Ultimate sends a player to an open city to purchase property and rent rent. The key task is to manage an economic enterprise through the sale of resources and the commission of strategic purchases to increase capital. The main goal is the accumulation of wealth in the worldwater, filled with non-game characters, parked cars and a dynamic change of day and night. Such an environment serves as a background for all commercial undertakings.

item.title: The Knightling
item.description: Game Description In The Knightling begins a campaign for a missing mentor, Sir Lyionstone, who did not return from his last wanderings. Being a protege of a warrior, the protagonist goes to the lands of the Classia in search of him. The main tool on this journey is the legendary shield left by Liionstone. The protagonist confronts the bandits and monsters, exploring the power of this artifact and the glorious past of the kingdom in order to find a mentor before the regional destabilization of the region.

item.title: Whisper of the House
item.description: Game Description Whisper of the House proposes to fulfill the requests of citizens to move, arrange and clean their personal spaces. Through these organizational tasks, the player directly affects the life of local residents, affecting their everyday affairs. The study of the environment and its objects gradually reveals personal stories and urban secrets lurking in disorder. The gameplay is focused on the study and solving puzzles in home locations, and each premises put in order moves the narrative forward.

item.title: Computer Shrilow
item.description: Game Description In the Computer Shrilow, a familiar computer screen appears in front of the gamer, in the center of which is now a green dog. Its appearance coincides with the origin of the whole economy that functions inside the system. The task is to interact with this digital space to find out what exactly captured the machine and its functions. The linear plot directs the passage, introducing to the characters and events explaining the strange circumstances of the incident.

item.title: Quartet
item.description: Game Description Quartet immerses in the world in which incredible adventures and unforgettable battles await you. Start your way in the world of full mysteries, hidden government intrigues and powerful magic. In this fascinating and old -school RPG you can choose one of the four stories and go through them in any order, revealing the secrets of the Quartet world. A series of train robberies, a mysterious deck of cards, deadly aircraft and an accidental magician - all this awaits you in Quartet.

item.title: Beyond the Map
item.description: Game Description Beyond The Map begins with a shipwreck on the outskirts of the known seas, setting the player an immediate task of survival in a mysterious territory. The development of the character is complete without a class system: increasing the level of skills opens up new basic abilities. The search for rare folios with spells around the world provides access to incredible forces, additionally determining the capabilities of the hero.

item.title: Turretgirls
item.description: Game Description Turretgirls offers to manage an operative with a turret reflecting the attacks of extraterrestrial forces from unstable wormholes. The main mission is to protect the generator, the only source of energy for planetary superweapies. Acting with a fixed rail platform, the heroine is opposed to the swarm of alien invaders that threaten the entire installation. The survival of the planet depends on this single defense against the invasion horde, since the retreat is impossible.

item.title: Parisian Brasserie Simulator
item.description: Game Description Parisian Brasserie Simulator begins gameplay on a Parisian avenue: setting up tables, ordering ingredients, and creating a menu for the grand opening. The owner needs to set up the space in preparation for the first day, including developing seasonal menus based on French cuisine. Once preparations are complete, the doors open to welcome the first customers. The main task is to turn a small establishment into a recognized city institution.

item.title: Waterpark Simulator
item.description: Game Description Waterpark Simulator invites the player to build unique attractions and manage the water complex from the first person. At first, all duties are performed manually: from selling tickets and preparing food to rescuing drowning visitors. Operational chaos also affects the maintenance of infrastructure, including repairing broken slides, cleaning the area and removing debris from swimming pools. Every aspect of the establishment’s layout and design is subject to direct instructions.

item.title: Volkolak: The Will of Gods
item.description: Game Description Volkolak: The Will of Gods is a side-scrolling action adventure set in a vast, interconnected world inspired by Slavic fantasy. The main character travels through the Far Far Away Kingdom, medieval lands struck by the ominous curse of the necromancer Koshchei the Immortal. This curse drives its inhabitants mad, turning them into evil creatures. Gameplay revolves around facing off against these minions through a deep combat system and exploring a hand-drawn 2D world with many secrets and multiple ending options.

item.title: Ways of Alchemy
item.description: Game Description In Ways of Alchemy, the player begins his journey in a secluded hut, where he uses card mechanics to create powerful elixirs from many ingredients. The final goal is to build an entire alchemical empire on the basis of a modest shack, using intelligence and tactical thinking. To do this, you will have to look for ancient recipes and recruit adventurers, constantly avoiding the close attention of the Inquisition.

item.title: Herdling
item.description: Game Description In Herdling, the player leads a motley oral of creatures called Kalicorn into a grand campaign to the mountains. The journey passes along a winding path full of terrible dangers and sudden barriers. Promotion requires laying the route forward through a complex area to a secret lying on top. The intersection of forgotten lands constantly experiences the strength between the conductor and the wards of animals in the middle of a deserted wild.

item.title: Island Notes
item.description: Game Description Island Notes begins after a yacht accident leaves the player and guests stranded on an uncharted island. The initial choice is the priority between one’s own salvation and helping the group. Key activities include establishing a base, cultivating crops, and fishing. This project also focuses on forming close bonds with other survivors that can develop into romantic partnerships. Here, interpersonal dramas are as important to overcome as the challenges presented by nature.

item.title: Knightica
item.description: Game Description Knightica instructs commanders to gather a detachment and strategically arrange its fighters to use combat synergies. Units have unique abilities activated by accurate arrangement and turning on the battlefield. The player forms these forces from various fractions, such as the legions of undead or adherents of the guild of magicians, before their entry into automated battles. The assembled army then goes on a hike through a series of trials in order to free the kingdom.

item.title: Stone Simulator - Just Be a Rock
item.description: Game Description Stone Simulator - Just Be a Rock offers you to live the life of one motionless boulder over huge periods of time. The key is to simply exist, observing the evolving world in a continuous cycle of days, nights and changing seasons. The stationary facility endures dynamic weather events, from summer heat and spring rains to severe winter snowstorms. This unique gaming experience unfolds from a static third-person perspective, emphasizing passive contemplation rather than direct action.

item.title: Worldwide rush
item.description: Game Description Worldwide Rush is immersed in the management of the global passenger corporation. The start of the career begins with the construction of the main office and the selection of equipment from an extensive park in 120 models, including cars, trains, planes and ships. The main goal of this gaming project is to connect thousands of settlements with profitable routes, based on dynamic demand. To increase profits, you can invest in the hotel business and advertising campaigns, while the entire logistics system requires constant improvement.

item.title: Crescent Tower
item.description: Game Description Crescent Tower begins an in-game event in which adventurers gather in the imperial capital of Mayirdoam to climb a structure that appears once every 50 years. These daredevils are driven by legends of a wish-granting jewel and the elixir of immortality at its pinnacle. The journey begins in the Adventurers' Guild with the creation of a character from 3 races and 9 classes. Strategic development involves changing professions to transfer acquired skills, providing deep customization to the squad as the expedition progresses.

item.title: OOLO
item.description: Game Description OOLO is an isometric adventure that takes gamers on a dangerous journey through a dark fantasy world called the Island of Souls. The process of exploring this large-scale and holistic location, consisting of more than 400 interconnected rooms, will lead the traveler through mysterious forests, ancient catacombs and the ruins of magical castles. The main task is to solve numerous spatial puzzles that require attentiveness and ingenuity. The ultimate goal of this long campaign is the revival of the World Flame, which will allow the lost harmony and order to be returned to these lands.

item.title: Sword of the Sea
item.description: Game Description Sword of the Sea sets the task of crossing the devastated world for the restoration of the buried sea before the resurrected ghost. The journey begins in the location of Necropolis and consists in surfing on vast, fluid sandscapes made of sand. The main means of movement is a hoverboard - an artifact that combines the characteristics of a snowboard, a skateboard and a surfboard. In this game, the purpose is to be found, simultaneously opening the ancient ocean, hidden deep under the dunes.

item.title: Hordelord
item.description: Game Description Hordelord throws a player on the closed arenas against the consistent waves of hostile creatures. Gamers use destructive weapons and high mobility to move the location and reprisals against opponents. The task is to score the maximum number of points for getting into the world tables of leaders, relying on accurate shooting and a system for fixing murders. The gameplay is distinguished by constant violence, concentrating on the suppression of opponents with speed and fire power.

item.title: Stick It to the Stickman
item.description: Game Description Stick It to the Stickman is an adventure with dynamic battles in the Stickman universe. The passage is tied to fights between drawn men. The player controls Stickman and fights other similar creatures. New pages in the life of the main character of Stick It To The Stickman begin from the moment he comes to the office for an interview, and the boss says that his friend will take his place.

item.title: Bendy: Lone Wolf
item.description: Game Description Bendy: Lone Wolf sends gamers in the role of Boris deep into the endlessly generated corridors of Joey Drew’s studio in search of supplies. He will have to travel through the bizarre cartoon halls of the animation studio, filled with monsters and obstacles appearing from all sides. This foray becomes a constant test of survival in the face of increasing danger, forcing the hero to face the dark secrets hidden inside the building.

item.title: Photo Studio Simulator
item.description: Game Description Photo Studio Simulator offers the player to take on the full management of the photo business, from the moment of opening to solving everyday problems. The tasks include staff hiring, improving the interior of the studio and the enterprise management to attract a wide range of customers. The main goal is to turn a modest starting room into a full -scale photographic base. Interaction with models is not limited to professional filming, but includes building relationships and dates, ending with exclusive private photo shoots with a demonstration of nudity.

item.title: Planetary Life
item.description: Game Description In Planetary Life, you will find yourself in the role of a planetary architect. In this Simulator, you get divine control over the barren world. Create mountains and cut the valleys, erupt volcanic rage or create gentle slopes. Create the perfect environment: adjust the heat of the nuclei, work with gases in the atmosphere and control precipitation. Planetary life is not only the formation of land. You will also become a shepherd of life itself.

item.title: Project X: Light Years
item.description: Game Description In the Project X: Light Years, the user will have to pilot a modern starship through enemy territories 30 years after the initial battle. There is navigation on various locations, including asteroid fields and outposts in deep space, where it will have to be opposed by the waves of alien opponents. The main task is to collect objects that improve the firepower, speed and protection of the ship.

item.title: The Dark Queen of Mortholme
item.description: Game Description The Dark Queen of Mortholme starts from the victory of the Land overlord over the invading hero. The conflict, it would seem, is exhausted, but the applicant is inexplicably returning, meeting the right death over and over again. This violence cycle takes place in a two -dimensional world with a fixed screen, where the player uses the queen’s arsenal to multiply pacify the insolent. The plot reveals the secret of the stubbornness of the antagonist, offering a short adventure combining action with a rich history.

item.title: Jupiter Hell Classic
item.description: Game Description Jupiter Hell Classic follows the tradition of classic roguelikes with grid-based movement, turn-based combat and procedural generation. Users navigate a sci-fi environment filled with demons and use an arsenal of weapons to survive. Every action counts, as permadete ensures that mistakes are costly, forcing you to adapt to ever-changing conditions. Strategy plays a central role, and movement and positioning affect the chances of survival. Jupiter Hell Classic builds on its predecessor while integrating elements from its modern counterpart, allowing it to update the mechanics while maintaining the essence of the original.

item.title: Not Sure About That
item.description: Game Description Not Sure About That is an intellectual quiz where participants will have to demonstrate their knowledge in order to win a prestigious award - the Golden Brain trophy. The protagonist must overcome 555 multiple choice questions covering a wide variety of topics. Each correct answer allows you to move forward to the next test, while any mistake inevitably leads to a fall into the cold ocean waters. Fortunately for the test taker, there is a checkpoint after each question to save progress.

item.title: OVIS LOOP
item.description: Game Description Ovis Loop throws a cybernetic sheep, which was a guardian robot, into the post-apocalyptic world for the confrontation of wolves to the legions using a science fiction sword. After the massacre, arranged by the robot, AI with amnesia wakes up in a new guise. The player has to follow the brutal struggle of this mechanical creature for survival against predators. He needs to take on the burden of the hidden truths of the world, challenging a familiar story that can be not at all as it is commonly believed.

item.title: Relic Hunters Legend
item.description: Game Description Relic Hunters Legend is a 2D adventure game that stands out for its vibrant style, fast and fun gameplay, and the ability to play in co-op. Gather up to 4 people and go save the Galaxy. A terrible villain is terrorizing the entire area and what’s even worse - he stole the past! You have to find Duke Dukan to return peace and memories to the lands. Rid the planet of oppressive regimes!

item.title: Squiggle Football
item.description: Game Description In Squigl Football, a gamer plunges into the world of management of a sports club, where success depends on the creation of effective ligaments from players, coaches and tactical schemes. The main goal is to conduct your team through the lower divisions to the treasured championship in the National League. The basis of everything is the deck collection system, and Australian football was the source of inspiration for the project.

item.title: Journey of Realm: Dawn Dew
item.description: Game Description Journey of Realm: Dawn Dew gives control of a character named Dew on a journey of redemption. The adventure takes place in a kingdom consumed by a wave of black beasts and monstrous malice. As he progresses, Dew uncovers the history of the region, searching for the origins of a brutal threat. The plot explores a world where greed has destroyed innocence, prompting the heroine to arrive as a force to counteract the ongoing destruction.

item.title: Metavoidal
item.description: Game Description Metavoidal puts the player in the role of the drummer after an unsuccessful listening in the metal group. The musician discovers that the work of the team controls reality, turning the world into a hostile environment. The army of defiled fans is now standing on the way to freedom, imposing the will of its idols. To destroy this curse, the drummer will repulse each participant in the ominous team, using only a couple of drum sticks.

item.title: Wagotabi: A Japanese Journey
item.description: Game Description Wagotabi: A Japanese Journey is a role-playing game designed to teach the Japanese language. The project offers speech acquisition through interactive dialogues and puzzle solving in a digital analogue of Japan. Progress is achieved through interaction with the environment and its inhabitants. The curriculum introduces hiragana, katakana, and kanji sequentially as vocabulary expands. This structure integrates language practice directly into gameplay, linking progression to linguistic understanding. In Wagotabi: A Japanese Journey, learning focuses on the practical application of vocabulary.

item.title: Abyssus
item.description: Game Description Abyssus is a dynamic adventure through a world created based on the legends of Atlantis. For greater color, the buildings of the Aztecs and their temples were used to develop the architecture. The player will have to explore a vast territory, which is not very happy that its silence has been disturbed, and it is ready to call on all possible forces to help restore peace. Actions take place in the 19th century.

item.title: Fallen City Brawl
item.description: Game Description Fallen City Brawl was inspired by classic games in the spirit of “Being of all of them” and was created in a pleasant retro style. The player will have to go out onto the streets, teeming with criminals and eliminating everyone who will stand in the way of his team. Only by uniting, experienced fighters will be able to survive, destroy the source of evil and, finally, feel free.

item.title: Shields of Loyalty
item.description: Game Description Shields of Loyalty - Turn-based strategy in which you need to take command of an army consisting of several units and classes. Set out to explore a mysterious island, moving across the battlefield using hexagonal hexes. Develop a strategy and increase the efficiency of your army. Fight powerful warriors who are followers of darkness. Shields of Loyalty takes place in the dark fantasy world of Mantaria. There are several small armies under your command.

item.title: Super Farming Boy
item.description: Game Description Super Farming Boy offers flights, harvesting and battles with opponents with the help of superhen, changing the form by pressing one button. The antagonist named Korpo captivated his mother and friends of the protagonist, forcing him to work on his own land and taking all the income. To advance forward, the character needs to perform tests and save resources for the redemption of loved ones for sale. The entire gameplay is built on a farm with elements of action-headed, using chain reactions and combinations.

item.title: Yield! Fall of Rome
item.description: Game Description Yield! Fall of Rome is a turn-based 4X strategy game that places gamers at the crossroads of history, specifically during the decline of the Roman Empire. Here you have to lead one of eight unique factions, each of which has its own advantages and weaknesses. These factions vary in style, requiring users to adapt to different tactical and strategic approaches. As a result, no two sessions are the same.

item.title: Whisper Mountain Outbreak
item.description: Game Description Whisper Mountain Outbreak is an action-adventure survival horror game that offers intriguing gameplay whether you go it alone or team up with friends in online co-op. Set against the eerie backdrop of 1998, the game takes players to Mount Bisik, where a mining expedition has inadvertently unleashed an ancient horror that has shrouded everyone in a mysterious shroud of fog. Your task is to work with other players to fight the relentless horde of monsters, explore abandoned buildings, mine vital resources, craft essentials, solve puzzles - all in order to escape the sinister clutches of the “whispering madness”.

item.title: The Unholy Priest
item.description: Game Description The Unholy Priest offers the player the role of a clergyman, head of a funeral service in a deaf forest, covered by a curse. Key classes include the legend of the Earth or the cremation of the deceased, the commission of the rites of the expulsion of evil spirits and the confrontation of demonic entities. In addition, the priest seeks to rest the souls that remain confused after death.

item.title: Cleanfall
item.description: Game Description Cleanfall puts a player at the head of the harvesting robot, the only function of which is to maintain cleanliness in the house. This simple task becomes a planetary mission after one techie brought the world closer to his sun. The cataclysm that happened covered the surface with a whirlwind of dust and death, making a restraint of order impossible. In order to bring cleanliness in his house again, the mechanism must first correct the whole world, going down to the underground layers of the planet to start his work.

item.title: SLACKJAW
item.description: Game Description In SLACKJAW, the player awakens in the basement of a serial killer, becoming his next intended victim. Survival depends on exploring confined spaces and using the resources you find to solve interconnected puzzles. Each action must be performed with caution, since the maniac is at the top and reacts to sounds. The main task is to organize an escape from captivity before being discovered, navigating in a world recreated from an eyewitness account of real events.

item.title: Anant Express
item.description: Game Description The plot of Anant Express takes place around a passenger who has sat down in a sleeping car for a regular trip. However, the journey quickly deviates from the expected, because inexplicable events begin to occur in wagons. The displaced compartment, invisible whisper and mysterious fellow travelers violate the usual course of time. The central element of gameplay requires a gamer of close attention to detect anomalies. Having noticed something unusual, you need to immediately turn back, which makes you rethink the environment and choose a new route.

item.title: Artis impact
item.description: Game Description Artis Impact throws the player under the control of Akan, a person traveling around the future world, populated people and artificial intelligence. The action takes place in the post-apocalyptic universe, the heroine being studied along with its AI-Companion Boat. The gameplay is built on step -by -step battles and the completion of side tasks from local inhabitants. The narrative presented through the pixel graphics and the style of comics combines humor with gloomy topics that open as it passes.

item.title: GuntouChables
item.description: Game Description GuntouChables sets from 1 to 4 players in the role of prepared survivors in the conditions of post -apocalypse. The main task is to conquer ground territories at hordes of hostile, continuously evolving mutants. These creatures constantly invent new methods of eliminating heroes, bringing fresh threats with every battle. The gameplay is tied to the confrontation of this dynamically changing enemy force. Promotion in the plot is tied to the execution of missions for which Upcrates are issued with currency and perks to increase the chances of survival.

item.title: Is This Seat Taken?
item.description: Game Description Is This Seat Taken? will tell the story of aspiring actor Nat, who saw a familiar silhouette on the silver screen and set off on a trip around the world. This adventure sets the stage for a series of logic challenges that focus on organizing groups of special people. The main goal is to find a suitable place for each individual according to his likes and dislikes. Each character has unique requirements, turning simple seating charts into complex puzzles that require solutions to progress through the story and meet the hero.

item.title: King's Blade
item.description: Game Description King’s Blade throws a small detachment of elite warriors to break through the hordes of the Bargian Empire. This Beat ‘Em Up with side scrolling immerses in a gloomy fantasy world created under the influence of the Konan-Cover and Arcadian Titles universe like Golden Axe and Streets of Rage. Players have to move around the enemy lands and participate in brawls, trying to break through to the capital of the enemy.

item.title: MakeRoom
item.description: Game Description MakeRoom provides the player with a sandbox to create personalized dioramas from an isometric perspective. You will have to construct scenes in three different settings: an interior room, an open-air garden or a camper. To arrange locations, a catalog of more than 1000 objects is used. In addition, special tools allow you to create unique furnishings from scratch, significantly expanding the inventory available for any project. The mechanics of MakeRoom are introduced through a series of educational design tasks on a special island.

item.title: Strange Jigsaws
item.description: Game Description Strange Jigsaws is a head-headed game based on the solution of a set of non-traditional puzzles. The project contains about 50 different tasks, each of which offers its own method to complete. Gamers have to move according to a series of abstract worlds, thematically related to the central concept. The goal is to detect the special logic necessary for each test. The structure encourages the study of the media called jigsawverse, each area of ​​which stores a new mechanical secret.

item.title: The Night Shift
item.description: Game Description The Night Shift is a first-person psychological horror game that immerses you in a nightmarish work shift. Inside a department store locked down due to a storm, the only rule of survival is constant vigilance, as deadly mannequins change their position as soon as you look away from them. The hero, a newly hired employee, finds himself trapped on his first night. The storm outside activates the emergency shutters, cutting off his escape and leaving him alone with the animated dolls in the empty shopping malls.

item.title: Tiny Bookshop
item.description: Game Description Tiny Bookshop places the player in the role of an owner who moves to a coastal town to run a mobile bookstall. The gameplay involves managing a second-hand book business, which involves purchasing a variety of literature and other items for sale. The gamer chooses various locations throughout the city to place his store, attracting new types of customers with each change of location. Success depends on understanding the reading habits of local people and building relationships with them.

item.title: Warnament
item.description: Game Description Warnament is a turn-based global strategy game that puts the player in charge of the fate of an entire nation. Progress is achieved through the conquest of new territories and steady development in the military, technological, cultural or political spheres. You have the opportunity to take part in historical scenarios or create completely original worlds using the built-in editor. This approach opens the way to campaigns based on real events, or to alternative universes of your own design, where each province is governed separately.

item.title: Wild West Supermarket Simulator
item.description: Game Description Wild West Supermarket Simulator immerses the player at the head of the universal store in 1850. The action takes place in a ghost town, empty after the end of the gold fever and the majority of their inhabitants. The gamer arrives to lead a business, which is only a shadow of former greatness. The main task is to restore the enterprise from scratch, laying out goods on shelves and managing supplies to revive an abandoned location.

item.title: Static Dread: The Lighthouse
item.description: Game Description Static Dread: The Lighthouse begins after the global cataclysm, placing the player on the island far from the coast. The port authorities re -activate the lighthouse again, sending the only caretaker to control him. He uses radio equipment to send ships to the harbor - a task that has consequences for the city and vessels at sea. On the mainland, a wife and daughter are waiting for him, a fact that affects his work and spiritual state.

item.title: Grand Empire 2: Portals Apart
item.description: Game Description Grand Emprise 2: Portals Apart is a survival and crafting experience built around traversing magical portals. As a sequel to Grand Emprise: Time Travel, this project develops the concept of a directed adventure. The journey takes the player through a series of fantasy worlds, where each portal opens up access to new resources. Development follows a linear technology path, forming a structured single-player campaign instead of an open-world sandbox where the gamer determines his own goals.

item.title: Kitchen Wars
item.description: Game Description Kitchen Wars collects from 2 to 8 people for restaurant rivalry, dividing gamers into warring teams. Groups from 1 to 4 people on each side work in their appointed institution. The main task is to find a balance between visitors' maintenance and interference for a competing business. Groups control their institution, simultaneously preventing opponents from direct actions. In Kitchen Wars, the teams are focused on the preparation and delivery of orders so that customers are satisfied.

item.title: Shikiyoku -teru yumemi in the nightmare-
item.description: Game Description In Shikiyoku -teru Yumemi in the Nightmare- Paranormal detective Teru Yumami uses the ability of Dream Link to penetrate the worlds created by ghosts after death. His sister Luna helps him return to reality with the help of his strength, a curse of the red thread. Together they investigate paranormal incidents and help people who have learned too much, performing a mission inherited from the late mother. The plot develops in the format of the detective series, and the entire gameplay with the study of locations and mini-stories is designed for 10 hours.

item.title: Tall Trails
item.description: Game Description Tall Trails gives control of the Alps, a little goal in search of its purpose. The movement is tied on a rocket boot - a device that consumes collected items as a fuel for flights. The gamer has to run and climb the world using a boot for a vertical rise. Each item gives a unique effect, changing the method of navigation of the character among obstacles. This mechanic is central to research in this game and requires a constant collection of resources.

item.title: Bum: Revenge
item.description: Game Description Bum: Revenge is a first-person crime simulator centered on the life of a homeless person. The plot begins after the protagonist is beaten by his wife’s lover, Dennis. Waking up in the hospital with divorce papers, the hero spends 6 months on the street, becoming addicted to alcohol and drugs. Players enter this world with nothing, exploring the squalid environment of the city’s back streets. The main goal is to survive in new conditions and take revenge.

item.title: Dead Take
item.description: Game Description Dead Take begins with a search for a missing friend. When Winnie stops answering calls, the player goes to his last well -known location - the mansion, where the party was held the day before. The residence is now immersed in silence. It is necessary to go inside to find a comrade, because in the entertainment industry, the actors support each other in difficult moments. So the investigation of secrets hidden in the walls of the building begins.

item.title: Game of Grass
item.description: Game Description Game of Grass begins with a call from a neighbor who offended the player’s lawn. The main task is to demonstrate superiority through the cultivation of the remarkable courtyard. The process includes methodical mowing of vegetation using a variety of tools. Gamers acquire upgrades to increase the efficiency of their equipment, which allows you to quickly clear the territory. The goal is to achieve the status of the legend of haircuts of grass by methodically improving the site, and advance in this simulator is linearly and focused on tangible results.

item.title: Gold Gold Adventure Gold
item.description: Game Description Gold Gold Adventure Gold will put the player in charge of a developing settlement, where currency is the main instrument of power. It is necessary to build a city and establish an economy to attract individuals hungry for profit. These adventurers take on assignments for reward, completing tasks that lead to the accumulation of funds to achieve your goals. In parallel with the management of the settlement, the giant creature needs care, feeding and training, gradually developing into a powerful force.

item.title: Heartworm
item.description: Game Description Heartworm is a classic Survival Horror with elements of a psychological thriller. A girl named Sam with cut legs leads a closed lifestyle and does not want to leave her home. From the very beginning, the game hints that due to difficult childhood a young woman began to have problems with the psyche. Once she receives a video cassette with strange contents. Having looked at the record, the heroine suddenly comes to his senses in a completely different place.

item.title: Icoptic Journey
item.description: Game Description In the ICOPTIC Journey, the player begins his way, clinging to the protrusions in surreal, bright spaces and starting from the trampolines for the flight. Moving is a continuous, based on physics, a stream of actions that allows you to steam in colorful and psychedelic locations with a first -person view. The main task is to overcome stylized levels to achieve the intended goal. The path to the heights of skill in Icoptic Journey:

item.title: Mashina
item.description: Game Description Mashina immerses the player in a solitary adventure, where under his control is a robot with a mission to restore his native world. The basis of this project is the methodical study of the subsoil to collect valuable materials necessary for the survival of the whole settlement. All fossils found are used to help the community of other mechanisms, contributing to the gradual revival of their destroyed house.

item.title: MISC. A Tiny Tale
item.description: Game Description Three -dimensional MISC platformer. A Tiny Tale tells about the adventures of two incredibly cute robots that explore the futuristic world and the search for golden screws. The protagonists of Bag Boy and Buddy always dreamed of adventures and when beautiful shiny wrappers, bolts and screws began to suddenly fall from the sky, they decided to hit the road and find out what is happening in the world of robots.

item.title: Orbi Universo 2
item.description: Game Description Orbi Universo 2 puts the player at the helm of a civilization’s journey through history. It is necessary to lead society from its Neolithic origins to the development of atomic energy. The project operates on a system of nodes that links each component of the nation together. The actions taken produce cascading effects, changing the structure and future of the entire society. This network includes food production, trade, belief systems and conflict.

item.title: Panta Rhei - Guardian of Time
item.description: Game Description Panta Rhei - Guardian of Time tells about the journey of Fi, a guard expelled to the garden of the past. The chaotic force threatens to destroy the course of being, forcing the Glaverroy to leave his refuge. The reluctant protagonist will have to go to the source of time to confront this threat. This path will require him to face the shadows of the past and take a forgotten debt for the sake of saving the house.

item.title: PowerLust
item.description: Game Description Powerlust throws you into the open world, where you yourself form your fate. Create a unique character not connected by strict class restrictions. Become a magician of fire, owning a colossal sword, or an archer-nonsense, shedding death from afar. A huge selection of spells, weapons, abilities and skills will allow you to create your own game style and experiment with countless builds. But raw power is not all. A fight based on skills requires an exact choice of time and awareness.

item.title: Prospector
item.description: Game Description Prospector begins with arrival at someone else’s world, having only a set of tools at its disposal. The primary task is to collect the planet’s resources for the construction of the basis for the base. Players build structures, explore the environment, and then establish automated production lines. For construction, everything is used, from primitive materials to unknown alien substances found on the landscape. Gradually, a simple avantopost turns into a complex object with an optimized working process.

item.title: Reflex Unit: Strike Ops
item.description: Game Description Reflex Unit: Strike Ops immerses in the future, destroyed by cataclysm and captured by powerful corporations. The player is headed by an elite detachment opposing the despotistical corporation Neotech, operating the remnants of civilization. The key gameplay consists in managing specialized equipment during various tactical operations. The tasks include daring rescue sorties, collecting key resources and direct attacks on enemy bases to undermine the power of the regime and struggle for freedom of the population.

item.title: Tiny Terraces
item.description: Game Description Tiny Terraces is an idle farming simulator where players watch an evolving landscape. Gameplay centers on small figures called Tiny Guys who autonomously perform various tasks on the terrace. These creatures manage garden plots, contributing to the expansion and transformation of the environment. The system is designed to work in the background, ensuring constant development while the user is busy with other things. This framework supports the resource management and construction cycle that forms the core of the gameplay.

item.title: Tower Networking Inc.
item.description: Game Description Tower Networking Inc. puts the player at the head of an Internet provider operating in a single, constantly growing structure. The main task is to design and build network infrastructure for new clients as the tower randomly generates additional floors. Players physically connect equipment, connecting cables between switches, routers, and data risers to establish communications. Each new level introduces unique residential or office spaces, introducing varied service requirements that require constant adaptation to the tower’s growth.

item.title: Demon Hunt
item.description: Game Description Demon Hunt is an action in which players pilot furs through landscapes flooded demons. The process is built on a combination of firing with the view of the Bullet Hell under the Rogue-Lite. Gamers go hunting, faced with numerous opponents and strong bosses in every sortie. During the battles, it is necessary to survive, collect resources and defeat the main enemy. This structure guarantees that each race in the game offers different trials and opportunities for development.

item.title: Night Club Simulator
item.description: Game Description Night Club Simulator puts gamers at the Center for Transformation, where a dilapidated institution becomes the center of nightlife. The goal is simple - to turn the dilapidated room into the most dynamic night club of the country. Disguised, users are faced with the need to solve a variety of problems - from repair to managing the endless stream of customers. But what is the chip? They are not alone in this matter.

item.title: Sky The Scraper
item.description: Game Description Sky The Scraper tells about the history of a person named Sky, working as a rower of windows and pursuing personal ambitions. This game combines the action with movement on cables and the responsibilities of managing everyday life. It is necessary to go through a two -month period of hard work and care for yourself in order to influence the future. Its path forward is determined by overcoming the difficulties presented by his occupation and circumstances.

item.title: The Rotting Man
item.description: Game Description The Rotting Man will allow you to get used to the role of a student of the university who has arranged for the part-time job as a clerk in the Japanese Internet cafe. The narrative begins with the performance of a character of routine duties, including the maintenance of the booths and assistance to visitors in a closed space. Gradually, an ordinary working environment turns into a stage for a series of strange and inexplicable incidents that violate the usual routine.

item.title: The Shaman's Ark
item.description: Game Description The Shaman’s Ark represents a world standing over an essence named the abyss. Once upon a time, people found a refuge on a structure called an ark, but the emptiness below now seeps back into their land. The shaman returns from darkness, armed only with a drum. The ancient melodies of the instrument function as a weapon, turning every battle with the ideas of the abyss into a rhythmic ritual committed on the verge of mortality.

item.title: Unlockers
item.description: Game Description Unlockers starts with a boy named Noah, an orphan waking up in a locked bedroom resembling a hotel room. In the door he found, there is no keyhole, creating an immediate obstacle. When studying the room, a sudden attack of dizziness makes him lose consciousness. Waking up, he finds an unfamiliar notebook and a locked box, deepening the secret of his conclusion in a strange complex where he is held.

item.title: Wood for Nobody Else
item.description: Game Description Wood for nobody Else immerses the process of monotonous chips of firewood, lasting 7 days in a row from the first person. The plot is built around a low -paid and overloaded employee who feels the pressure of ungrateful labor. Every day it sets a new task, and the cutting of wood is the only way to pay for growing bills. This single project describes a week of exhausting work against the backdrop of personal experiences and fear of the future.

item.title: Achilles: Survivor
item.description: Game Description Achilles: Survivor takes players into a world of intense, non-stop action where survival depends on smart decisions, quick reflexes and strong strategy. You are immersed in a scenario where thousands of enemies are trying to stop you. Your character develops, gaining more strength and capabilities after each attempt. This cycle of death and rebirth becomes the basis of your survival story. As you progress through each wave, your goal is clear: survive and become stronger for the battles ahead.

item.title: Tales of the Shire: A The Lord of The Rings Game
item.description: Game Description Tales of the Shire: A The Lord of the Rings Game invites gamers to travel to the world of the Shire, a famous location from the Lord of the Rings universe. With a focus on simplicity and community, the title allows gamers to create a hobbit avatar and engage in the various daily activities that make up the humble lives of these beloved characters. From building houses to maintaining gardens, there is no shortage of ways to personalize the Shire and make it feel like home.

item.title: FUMES
item.description: Game Description FUMES plunges you into the heart of a chaotic wasteland world where vehicular combat reigns. Users take control of customizable vehicles, equipping them with weapons and armor to survive the unforgiving desert landscape. The title brings an old-school feel to car combat, drawing on the style of classic rally games with driving mechanics that reflect a time before flashy graphics and complex controls. It’s fast-paced, straightforward, and has genuine tension.

item.title: Inkborn
item.description: Game Description Inkborn represents a card combat system based on the consistent use of glyphs for a tactical effect. Gamers have cards according to special symbols, activating chain results during step -by -step clashes with otherworldly creatures. Such a gameplay is the basis for promotion. The scene is a world created from ink, folded paper and metal containing a hidden story for disclosure. The narrative unfolds as the expeditions are completed and the tasks set.

item.title: Keytamine
item.description: Game Description Keytamine is an action focused on a rhythmic battle against the waves of opponents in the form of keyboards in the isometric world. Players enter into a fight with these opponents using a auto-clique mechanics, moving along the procedurally generated levels requiring tactical awareness. The main gameplay is built on a set of glasses, and survival and effective destruction of goals are the main tasks. The battle is a question of timing and reaction that integrates the Bullet Hell elements as the number of enemies grows and requires constant movement and control over the arena.

item.title: One-Eyed Likho
item.description: Game Description One-Eyed Likho is a first-person adventure that draws its plot from a Slavic fairy tale. This project takes the player to 19th century Russia - a region presented in shades of gray and designed to be explored. The main goal is personal: to find the titular creature and avoid your own evil fate. Progress through the plot depends on direct exploration of the world and revealing its secrets in order to escape from a state of psychological discomfort.

item.title: Primal Planet
item.description: Game Description Primal Planet begins with the struggle of a cave person for protecting his family from primitive predators. The narrative unfolds after the brutal attack of Ti-Rex, forcing the protagonist to be in a hostile environment and put the beginning of the history of survival. The plot combines the elements of prehistoric life with the advent of a UFO and an alien presence. As the truth is revealed, the character concludes unexpected unions, while from the very beginning the possibility of a joint local game is available.

item.title: RECHARGE
item.description: Game Description RECHARGE is a simulation-arcade racing experience in which the player controls radio-controlled machines. The gameplay was built on a physical model of behavior and allows the customization of vehicles. Gamers compete on tracks created based on professional RC tracks and other locations, including beaches and entertainment parks. The project is intended for use with several input devices, supporting both standard gamepads and specialized controllers. These features create the basis for individual and competitive races.

item.title: Star Vortex
item.description: Game Description Star Vortex puts the player in control of a fighter pilot during a period of human conflict. An unidentified hostile force has emerged, targeting the fleets and demanding the return of the flagship to Earth with intelligence. The pilot’s job is to ensure that the mothership receives the gate keys from the numerous space sectors needed to complete the transit and deliver the warning. This journey involves navigating contested territories while defending the lead ship from constant attack.

item.title: Village Tale
item.description: Game Description Village Tale represents the construction simulator designed for continuous work on the user desktop. The gamer will have to build structures, create goods and engage in commerce to expand its village from the very foundation. The task is to open new industries and increase the number of community. The gameplay proceeds in real time, allowing the village to function even when you are busy with other matters. The activity of residents and the development of resources go continuously, creating a permanent world for management.

item.title: Ascent of Ashes
item.description: Game Description Ascent of Ashes is an immersion in a post-apocalyptic colony where your task is to build and defend a base, survive and explore a world teeming with dangers. Here you will find real-time battles with raiders, aliens and other factions, where you need to use stealth tactics and outwit the enemy. But the base itself also requires attention: grow crops, tame alien creatures, introduce technologies and strengthen walls against enemies.

item.title: Danger in pompeii
item.description: Game Description Danger in Pompeii places a player in a historical city on his last day. The goal is to decipher the message from Mercury and an attempt to survive during the eruption of Vesuvius. Promotion in the plot is ensured by navigation through the streets and interaction with the population. The central part of the experience is helping the city’s residents in solving their problems before the start of the cataclysm.

item.title: Flower in Us
item.description: Game Description Flower in Us features a narrative where the protagonist wakes up in a basement after a brutal attack that erases all personal memory. Nearby is a tied up young woman, in whose gaze one can read a familiar feeling that is unrequited for the player character. She recognizes the main character, but this recognition is not mutual, which immediately creates tension in a closed space. The first goal is to navigate this harsh environment and assess the current situation.

item.title: Lost Luminosity
item.description: Game Description Lost Luminosity begins with how Sam inherits the mother’s apartment after her death. Recently discharged from a psychiatric hospital, she never revealed the causes of her mental disorder.
