The neighbors complain about strange sounds and inexplicable phenomena coming from an empty dwelling. Intrigued by these stories, the hero decides to personally find out the source of anxiety and find out the truth about the past of his family. The whole investigation is focused on the study of a closed space to understand the events that occurred there.

item.title: Pip My Dice
item.description: Game Description Pip My Dice features a roguelike structure based on the Yahtzee mechanic. The main objective requires the player to accumulate a target score to progress through a series of levels. The currency earned in rounds is used to purchase new items in the store, including various dice, relics with special effects, and modifiers that change the properties of dice. Gameplay focuses on turn-based strategy and scoring principles, where decisions affect the final outcome of the session.

item.title: Prison Escape Simulator: Dig Out
item.description: Game Description Prison Escape Simulator: Dig Out puts the player in the role of a prisoner searching for a path to freedom. The main task is to create a tunnel, a project that starts with a teaspoon hidden under the carpet. This covert operation requires constant attention from the patrolling guards, whose inspections can shut down the enterprise at any time. It is also necessary to solve the logistical problem of disposing of the dug sand by flushing the evidence in the cell toilet.

item.title: Runway 66
item.description: Game Description Runway 66 puts the player in the place of Gabriel, who has survived in a plane crash and designated as an object 66. After the incident, he falls into a coma and comes into his senses inside the government mental simulation created in his own mind. This first -person experience is a journey through an artificial universe, questioning reality itself. The main task is to survive in the program, confronts the contents of the split psyche.

item.title: Slayer: The Demon Haunted World
item.description: Game Description Slayer: The Demon Haunted World represents the world emerging from the period, which historians called the Aera of ash and dust. The belief in the end of this era was erroneous, because the shadows awaken again. A girl born under the moon and possessing white hair is the only one who can fight back the threat of fallen stars. She enters the tower for a battle with this evil, while the Universe balances on the verge of darkness.

item.title: Yume Kakigori
item.description: Game Description Yume Kakigori is the story of a visitor from different times and places who finds solace in a secluded establishment located among the clouds. Each ice-cold dessert served determines the further development of the plot, opening new branches of dialogue and relationships. Objects and scattered notes left by guests serve as fragments of a large mosaic, by collecting which one can understand their past. Gradually, these details not only form a closer connection with each client, but also reveal the truth about this unusual world and its inhabitants.

item.title: Look mum no computer
item.description: Game Description Look Mum No Computer is a twin-style shooter, the action of which takes place in the Saldersworth universe. Players take on the role of Sam, working together with the cosmo-cosmo companion to combat mechanisms that have gone under control. The mission requires penetrating these devices to repair them and direct confrontation of chaos. The journey includes the execution of quests from the inhabitants of the machine worlds and a fight with large -scale bosses.

item.title: Miami Hotel Simulator
item.description: Game Description Miami Hotel Simulator gives the player control of the hotel complex. The task is to turn an old establishment into a profitable business through direct management and renovation. Gamers can decorate the interior of the building and expand its capabilities to attract more visitors. In multiplayer mode, friends work together to manage business, sharing responsibilities for operation and development. Together they improve the hotel and increase its income, coordinating their actions for well-coordinated teamwork.

item.title: Steal The Pig
item.description: Game Description Steal The Pig is a cooperative game in which 2 players take on the roles of thieves. The main task is to transfer the pig through a series of locations filled with obstacles. The animal can wake up and try to hide, demanding coordinated actions from the partners for further advancement. This project supports a single mode, the passage of together on the same device with a divided screen, as well as online lobby for joint sessions.

item.title: The Great Villarance: Strategy of Lily
item.description: Game Description The Great Villarance: Strategy of Lily is a step -by -step tactical game about the Duchess of Scarlet, faced with accusation of regicide. Accused of the murder of the emperor, she concludes an alliance with Lily, the captain of the aircraft, a stream. Together they declare the war of the empire, becoming the first military streamers on the continent. The conflict grows due to a clash of impulsiveness and cold pragmatism.

item.title: Twisted Gallery
item.description: Game Description Twisted Gallery immerses you in a chilling atmosphere of anxious loneliness in the sterile halls of contemporary art. The protagonist finds himself trapped in a space with white walls and polished black floors, where each exhibit is arranged with impeccable precision. However, this apparent calm is constantly disrupted by subtle changes in the environment. The horror here lies not in the screamers, but in the oppressive silence and growing tension that makes you doubt your own perception of reality.

item.title: and Roger
item.description: Game Description and Roger is an interactive novel that begins in the morning, deviating from the usual routine for the main character. Waking up, she discovers her father missing from their home. Instead, a man previously unknown to her is sleeping on the sofa in the living room. When he comes to, the stranger speaks in broken sentences and tells the girl to take medicine, showing sadness in his voice and ignoring her confusion.

item.title: Animal Shelter 2
item.description: Game Description Animal Shelter 2 plunges into the world of animal care simulators. Forget about the battles with aliens or the salvation of the princesses, here you have to manage a virtual shelter filled with fluffy (or feathered, or scaly) friends. You have to provide them with comfortable beds, good nutrition and a lot of care. Consider that this is a brief management of a shelter, only without paperwork (possibly). In the sequel, everything becomes even more interesting: you can establish a deeper relationship with your virtual pets.

item.title: Dinosaurs Dominion
item.description: Game Description Dinosaurs Dominion is a single -user adventure focused on territorial conquest. The player has to control the dinosaur for battles, evolution and gradual seizure of control over the environment. Progress in each passage is earned through the study of the world and victory in battle. The defeat returns the creature by the beginning of his journey, which is a key feature of Roguelite design. The choice of 14 accessible species, from agile scouts to massive predators, provides different approaches to this survival cycle.

item.title: Slidemagi
item.description: Game Description Slidemagi is a duel between the two magicians on the 10x10 board, where units move by shifting the entire grid lines. In one move, the player performs one action: moves a row or applies a spell. This solution is central to the tactical pattern of battle. Following this, all controlled fighters on the field simultaneously attack in four main directions in the presence of goals. This tactical game offers several modes for single and multiplayer competitions.

item.title: Undermine 2
item.description: Game Description Undermine 2 expands the Action-Roguelike formula, sending the players back to their underground world. Two conflicts are simultaneously unfolding within the limits of Developer: King Faraam IV is trying to return his kingdom, and the invisible war between demonic creatures permeates the very reality. The path begins with the role of a peasant, who has to move around this world, where human political squabbles serve as a distraction from deeper cosmic intrigues.

item.title: Grimshire
item.description: Game Description Grimshire represents a script with a spreading plague that threatens an isolated mountain settlement. The player arrives here after the absorption of his hometown with chaos, getting a chance for a new beginning on the local farm. Its role consists in managing the economy, collecting forest gifts and ensuring a permanent reserve in the cellar. The main task is to prevent bloating of food in preparation for the arrival of the disease, which requires competent supplies to maintain everyone’s life.

item.title: Hell Clock
item.description: Game Description Hell Clock places players in 19th century Brazil during the War of Canudus, an era involving asylum and government action that resulted in the deaths of 25,000 people. Gamers will have to control Page, a fighter whose task is to return the soul of the Advisor, his mentor, from otherworldly captivity. Each dive into the game’s dark zones warps time; Page’s capabilities increase when confronted with the forces responsible for the death of his mentor and the imprisonment of his soul.

item.title: Monument Valley 3
item.description: Game Description In the Monument Valley 3, players will go on a new journey, leading a student of Nur through a world built from optical illusions and mobile architecture. The main goal is to comprehend the meaning of sacred light, moving along locations with changeable gravity. For advance, it is necessary to directly manipulate buildings, rotate entire levels and change the perspective, paving routes through impossible geometry. Features of the surrealist adventure Nur:

item.title: Swords and Souls Legacy Collection
item.description: Game Description Swords and Souls Legacy Collection brings together 5 individual games from the Flash era into one compilation. This collection offers a wide range of experiences, allowing you to fight for recognition in a special arena, become a wanted person on the run, or solve puzzles through special actions. You have to create heroes, systematically improve their parameters and interact with mechanics based on the principles of role-playing projects and racing action games.

item.title: Console Shop Simulator
item.description: Game Description Console Shop Simulator puts the player in the role of the owner of a gaming store. Primary activities include conducting day-to-day operations, from arranging titles on shelves to maintaining the cleanliness of the retail space. Gamers interact with customers to fulfill orders and track their satisfaction levels. Strategic product placement and inventory control are central to the operation of a retail outlet. The goal is to effectively manage the project while meeting the needs of customers entering the establishment.

item.title: Craggenrock
item.description: Game Description Craggenrock puts a player in the role of Arlo, a blacksmith returning to the island of Khalin. In the restored settlement, Pareho Arlo opens the workshop to create equipment with adventurers and local residents. The task is to earn reputation and condition at the work of the forge. It is necessary to control the shop, make objects and participate in the local economy. This lesson forms the basis of a gameplay concentrated on management and production as part of this simulation.

item.title: Logic Bombs
item.description: Game Description Logic Bombs is a puzzle that requires a player in the use of logical thinking in situations associated with bombs. The Title contains 160 tasks built on a single set of basic rules. Gamers have to use deduction to determine the necessary actions at each stage. The decision of each riddle is exclusively through the application of logic embedded in the project, guaranteeing a single approach to passage.

item.title: The Demons Told Me to Make This Game
item.description: Game Description The Demons Told Me to Make This Game begins in the city of Red Havyvs at 5:00 a.m. on October 26, 2016. This moment marks the beginning of the last day of the world: the bloody ritual ends and a spirit named a dark light appears in the void. Being this incorporeal essence, the player cannot directly interact with the physical world. The main way of influence is the instilling in the inhabitants of the city and whipping them in the ear of instructions for sending their actions.

item.title: Expedition to the BackRooms
item.description: Game Description Expedition to the BackRooms puts the player in the place of the ASYNC research team member. This group is sent to study the place of the alleged anomaly, and the search is brought into a parallel measurement from the interconnected rooms and corridors. This world consists of the same type of buildings with a yellow tint, and the lighting is provided by the roar of ceiling fluorescent lamps. Gamers move through this labyrinth -like structure to detect artifacts and tips.

item.title: Gold Miner: Classic Edition
item.description: Game Description Gold Miner: Classic Edition puts the player in control of a miner operating an underground winch with a 2D side-scroller perspective. The main task is to launch the swinging gripper in a timely manner to intercept and retrieve gold nuggets, precious stones and other valuables from the ground. Each level offers a new arrangement of resources under a strict time limit, requiring efficient mining of items to complete a financial goal.

item.title: Kingdom Ascension
item.description: Game Description Kingdom Ascension puts the player in the lord position with the task of creating his own possession in an empty plot of land. The initial stage includes a systematic collection of provisions and materials - basic elements for any settlement. These assets then go to the construction of the first buildings to create a stronghold in the world. Subsequently, the focus shifts the recruitment of military detachments that form an army to protect native lands and spread the influence of the outside.

item.title: Digger: Galactic Treasures
item.description: Game Description Digger: Galactic Treasures puts the player in the role of a worker in a distant future where humanity has spread throughout space. This expansion was driven by the search for minerals, but habitable planets remain a rarity. The entire galaxy is controlled by the megacorporation GRAVEX Inc., which exploits the labor of miners and treasure hunters. The story begins with the inheritance of a decommissioned, half-disassembled ship and a notebook from his grandfather, who once worked as a researcher in a corporation.

item.title: Little Fighter 2 Remastered
item.description: Game Description Little Fighter 2 Remastered introduces an updated version of the multiplayer fighting game. This version introduces completely redrawn graphics, replacing the original assets. It enables local network gaming with up to eight computers connected, expanding multiplayer options for users on the same network. Characters' move sets have been adjusted, which affects how fighters perform actions during combat scenes. Operational improvements have been made by fixing various minor technical issues that existed previously.

item.title: Magical Girl Witch Trials
item.description: Game Description Magical Girl Witch Trials opens with high school student Emma awakening in a gloomy prison cell. She turns out to be one of 13 girls forcibly brought to a complex on a remote island. An owl appears and declares that a witch is hiding among them and must be found. The captives are told that they will spend the rest of their lives here if they fail to expose the culprit in a formal trial.

item.title: Phantom Squad
item.description: Game Description Phantom Squad is a cooperative shooter with a view of 1-4 players, combining tactics in real time and battles with high rates. Before the collision, groups must formulate the assault plan, using gaming tools for marking implementation routes, tasks and entry points during the operation. Constant voice communication serves as the main element of the coordination of maneuvers and the reaction to the change of operational situation. Gamers create a unit for the execution of these cruel tasks in which each solution directly affects survival.

item.title: The Drifter
item.description: Game Description The Drifter is a criminal n-clic-triller, telling about the resurrection of the hero Mick Carter a couple of moments to death. The story of the protagonist is very dramatic and difficult. He never managed to linger for a long time in one place and at one work. His life put him in a position when he had to return to his hometown. Here he also failed to find peace, because he becomes a victim of a maniac.

item.title: Who's at the door?
item.description: Game Description Who’s at the door? puts the player in the shoes of a man locked in a house and suffering from psychosis with amnesia. The protagonist, being a psychiatric patient, has no memories of the beginning of his condition, but experiences headaches and hallucinations. The main task is to survive for 8 days, for which you need to receive medicine from visitors. This requires carefully examining your surroundings, because the boundary between perception and reality has begun to disappear.

item.title: Bridge Constructor Studio
item.description: Game Description Bridge Constructor Studio is a series of physics-based construction puzzles. The player’s task is to design structures in animated 3D mini-dioramas. The goal is to apply engineering principles to construct functional span crossings. Once the work is completed, a simulation is run to test the structural integrity of the creation under the influence of physical forces. This process determines the stability and success of the building under the load of passing traffic, summing up the test of the architect’s intent.

item.title: DUST RADERS
item.description: Game Description Dust Raiders puts the player in the role of the manager on the lawless, post -apocalyptic wasteland, where control over resources is the main task. The plot originates after the Sawblade attack, which led to the loss of the oil refinery, the death of the Viktor’s ally and the dissolution of the original team. Left without fuel and equipment, it is necessary to collect a functional machine from scrap metal to start recovery.

item.title: Fill up the Hole
item.description: Game Description Fill up the Hole puts the player in the role of the overseer of the anti -utopian settlement, built around the only economic activity: transformation of waste into profit. The population of the peons independently collects garbage for discharge into the central pit - this process generates resources for growth. The main task is to build and expand the village, as well as strategic placement of structures to increase the volume of garbage production and its subsequent disposal.

item.title: Neon Abyss 2
item.description: Game Description Neon Abyss 2 makes gamers pass procedurally generated levels. The game takes place in a futuristic cyberpunk setting, the title offers a unique mixture of Roguelike mechanics and a stressed platformer action. Users examine the depths of the abyss - a chaotic environment filled with enemies, traps and secrets that are waiting in the wings. Each passage is a new challenge, since the levels in the Title are generated randomly, which prevents two identical ones.

item.title: Ink Reverie
item.description: Game Description Ink Reverie puts a player at the head of a settlement in the world with an art based on Chinese dynasties of Tan and Song. The key mechanics are tied to the synthesis system of three in a row for the construction of buildings; Gamers click and drag neighboring low -level structures, combining them into a higher rank structure. This action opens access to additional game elements and content.

item.title: Voxel Eras
item.description: Game Description Voxel Eras presents a 3D world made up of voxels for collection, crafting and automation. The player will have to start with a basic workshop, using only his own hands, to lay the foundation for the future industry. The main task is to develop your production, leading it through various eras of technological progress through the design, construction and expansion of systems. This entire process takes place in a procedurally generated, borderless environment that provides a unique landscape for each endeavor and allows for large-scale construction projects to be implemented.

item.title: Worship
item.description: Game Description Worship is a dark combat quest that depicts all the horrors that often occur in cults of worship of dark deities. The leader and his followers, as a rule, have a long trail of blood behind them, since they do not allow anyone to challenge their ideology. And if someone tries to stop them or involve the church in solving the problem, he will pay dearly for it, becoming food for the monster.

item.title: Assenizator
item.description: Game Description Assenizator plunges into the harsh everyday life of sewage disposal service workers, whose already difficult work is complicated by constant challenges. Partners Petrovich and Mikhalych not only have to deal with their direct responsibilities, but also resist an annoying competitor who is trying to intercept all orders. The situation is aggravated after an incident involving waste dumping into the river, which attracted the attention of law enforcement officers. Now the heroes urgently need to earn money to pay a large fine in order to avoid serious consequences from the law, turning the routine into a struggle for survival.

item.title: Everstrife
item.description: Game Description Everstrife combines a battle with a look from the top and strategy for building a deck, placing players in locations filled with shells. Development depends on the system of skills based on Roguelike maps and elements. The central place in the gameplay is occupied by a synthesis mechanic that allows you to combine basic abilities. With 30 fundamental spells, gamers can generate more than 2000 of their options, so that each race offers new tactical solutions.

item.title: Noobs are coming
item.description: Game Description Noobs Are Coming puts the player in the place of the final boss in the arena, where he will have to fight off the waves of opponents. The main task is to withstand the gradually intensifying attacks of attackers called nobs for a 30-minute round. A list of characters-bosses, which includes a giant worm, queen of spiders or seductive succubus, is offered to choose from. After that, it is necessary to create a unique assembly, equipping the hero with special skills and combined dozens of different attacks for constructing protective tactics.

item.title: Star Rift Saga
item.description: Game Description Star Rift Saga places a player on a distant foreign world, where spatial faults break the fabric of reality. These cosmic gaps threaten to release in the galaxy the devouring planets of essence, which becomes the main task. The mission consists in moving in many biomes to confront these creatures and the subsequent closure of spatial anomalies. The battles require accurate platforming, the use of invulnerable jerks and the ability to fly in order to defeat various opponents and their leaders.

item.title: Your Personal Chill Apartment
item.description: Game Description The Your Personal Chill Apartment is a simulator in which players build and furnish a personal digital space. Progress in the game is directly related to the fulfillment by a gamer of tasks from real life. The report on performed actions brings the user intra -game currency. This resource serves to buy new furniture and decor, helping in the future arrangement of a virtual apartment. A key gameplay is building a connection between personal productivity and awards available in this project.

item.title: Kaizen: A Factory Story
item.description: Game Description Kaizen: A Factory Story introduces David Sugimoto, a South Bend, Indiana native who moves to Japan in 1986 to pursue a career at Matsuzawa Manufacturing. He arrives with an eye on an executive position in international sales, an opportunity available during the country’s economic expansion. Those hopes are dashed when he is sent not to the corporate office, but to one of the company’s old factories on the outskirts of Tokyo.

item.title: Motemancer
item.description: Game Description Motemancer is a game about automation in which players act on 6 intersecting elemental plans, procedurally generated and affordable in real time. The action takes place on a hexagonal network that serves as the basis for the construction of alchemical structures and the design of logistics systems for resource management. Gamers saturate the ingredients and combine various components, which directly changes the world around him. The art of managing elements and matter in Motemacer:

item.title: Seacret 1
item.description: Game Description Seacret 1 is a sandbox in the 17th century Caribbean, where players are engaged in trade, battles or management. The economy here functions in real time, and the prices and volumes of goods in each individual city are constantly fluctuating. The journey begins with one modest tartan, but over time you can expand your flotilla to three vessels, including fast slices or more impressive galleons. Strategic planning of commercial routes is becoming a key basis for the accumulation of wealth, vital for conducting operations in an extensive open world.

item.title: What Happened to Lily?
item.description: Game Description What Happened to Lily? is an intense first-person adventure where the main goal is to uncover the dark secrets that shroud an old farm. The protagonist will have to plunge into the oppressive atmosphere of an abandoned home, where every step is accompanied by inexplicable phenomena. The narrative revolves around exploring the environment and solving puzzles, and the main source of information is disturbing entries from the diary of a missing girl.

item.title: A Chamber of Stars
item.description: Game Description A chamber of Stars tells about the life of the performer Starr - a musician who has passed through decades of cultural shifts and personal transformation. After many stage images, the change of genres and public scandals, the artist remains a significant figure in the public consciousness. The anticipation of the new album is growing, according to rumors, preparing to become his main work. This journey explores the internal universe of personality, asking the question of what part of yourself can be conveyed through creativity in the world, constantly creating your own myths about you.

item.title: Aurora Defense
item.description: Game Description Aurora Defense combines Roguelike Deckbuilding with Tower-Defense gameplay with the construction of the base. The player’s task is to build defensive structures in the last stronghold of light, restraining the onslaught of the advancing darkness. The protection of the last goddess is the main goal of the mission throughout the passage. The tool for all actions is maps that allow you to place new buildings, modernize existing buildings and use spells.

item.title: Chipwits
item.description: Game Description Chipwits is a series of logical puzzles built on automation. The player takes the Chipwit CW-03.24 model under the control of the robot and learns to direct his actions on the territory of the workshop. To create sequences of movements and operations, chips with instructions are placed. Skills from past zones are used to solve subsequent, more intricate tests. The main task is to help Professor a chip with the opening of his first factory, having fulfilled all the necessary instructions for each location.

item.title: Crisis in the Kremlin: The Cold War
item.description: Game Description Crisis in the Kremlin: The Cold War is a political strategic simulation that has put you at the head of the Soviet Union in its last decade. The project demonstrates a country encountered with pressure from the internal fractions and external forces requiring changes. As the head of state, you lead the economy, external relations and determine the internal course of the Union. The gameplay includes interaction with other nations, the use of diplomatic channels, or the outbreak of proxy conflicts to expand influence.

item.title: Koro-San's Home Wan! Derby
item.description: Game Description Koro-San’s Home Wan! Derby puts the player in the role of repelling during a special baseball event. The character Koro-san organizes the game and invites other Hololive gamers, but the situation arises: all the audience want to be pitchens. Such a arrangement leaves Koro-san with the only figure on the home base. The appointed listeners take on the entire defense in the field, allowing you to concentrate exclusively on the blows.

item.title: Lost Child
item.description: Game Description Lost Child begins with Andrey’s awakening inside the endless labyrinth of corridors. His memory is erased, and the physical space around is distorted with each movement. Voices are reported from darkness, accompanied by childish screams and the appearance of ominous shadows. These phenomena give rise to uncertainty in their source: whether it is hallucinations, scraps of the past or someone’s cruel experiment. The further path is a study of this anxious and dynamic environment.

item.title: Mycopunk
item.description: Game Description Mycopunk puts players in the New Atlas Hazard Crew, a detachment of robots hired by Saxon Corporation. This group of exterinators is directed to fight a fungal threat that is spreading through the planet. The crew performs these tasks to ensure its existence and avoid disposal. These instructions also help to find out the details of the planetary biological disaster and the role of Saxon in it. The gameplay in Mycopunk is built on the implementation of missions and deep customization of equipment.

item.title: Nelumbra
item.description: Game Description Nelumbra puts the player in the role of the bearer of light, character who fell into a temporary loop without memories of the past. The main task is to fight for the truth of one’s own existence, and the price of this is unknown. Survival is built on the use of rhythmic car autocat and jerks as the surrounding light is extinct, which steadily pumps stress with each action.

item.title: OUR WAR: FirePower Suppression
item.description: Game Description OUR WAR: FirePower Suppression is a flight shooter in which players use continuous fire to neutralize enemy forces. The story of the Title is submitted after 30 plot chapters, describing the war between the human faction and the essence of the fat bird from the parallel world. Combat operations take place on various three -dimensional locations, each with a unique relief that affects the tactical approach to clashes.

item.title: Power The Future
item.description: Game Description Power The Future throws the player under the control of one of 7 nations, including the USA, Germany and China. The game is developing step by step from 2025 to 2038, where the main task is to provide the state’s energy needs. Players achieve this, developing technologies and creating a power grid that extends through national and international territories. This system requires the provision of consumption units located in its own and surrounding territories.

item.title: SANAE's sylphid breeze
item.description: Game Description SANAE’s sylphid breeze is a 2D action platformer starring SANAE KOTHIYA from Touhou Project. The plot begins after an attack by an unknown person on Lady Kanako, the goddess of the Moriya Temple. In addition to this, the symbolic pillar of the shrine, the Onbashira, was stolen by the attacker. Suspects include the thief Marisa, business rivals from the Myouren Temple, and a certain Celestial. Sanae’s path is to investigate these clues to find the culprit and return the stolen artifact.

item.title: Wildrise
item.description: Game Description Wildrise represents the world where concrete has captured natural soil, leaving the silent space. A forest keeper named Floof is awakening from a dream that lasted for centuries and sees this altered landscape. The main task of the player is to help this keeper systematically revive nature, destroying artificial coatings. This is achieved through step -by -step mechanics of arranging and combining mushrooms, flowers and animals on the field, while each combination helps to restore land and fauna.

item.title: Dr. Gloom's Lab
item.description: Game Description Dr. Gloom’s Lab puts a player in the future of Jackson Blair, a character who goes to a secluded research center. The plot originates at the entrance, offering a first -person gameplay in which the study becomes a key element of promotion. Gamers have to find and distribute limited reserves for survival, moving through the internal spaces of the structure. The central goal is the consistent clarification of events inside the complex and a collision with the direct consequences of its previous operations.

item.title: ISLANDERS: New Shores
item.description: Game Description ISLANDERS: New Shores is a game that revolves around building settlements on a series of randomly generated islands. This project develops the city-building framework, focusing on simplicity, but adding more mechanics and content. Players will have to choose between two formats: High Score, which rewards strategic efficiency, and Sandbox, which removes score limits for free creativity. The main activity is the correct placement of buildings to accumulate points, which opens up access to more advanced structures from the inventory.

item.title: Jason Maxx
item.description: Game Description Jason Maxx begins with a case in 1999, after a man falls to his death under mysterious circumstances in Metro City. The investigation is carried out by a specific detective, recognizable by his leather jacket and constant cigarette. He will have to immerse himself in the life of a metropolis, where crime and absurdity often mix, creating unique difficulties. The city’s inhabitants, a collection of scoundrels and eccentrics, hold the keys to the mystery, but their testimony is often skewed by their own strange worldview.

item.title: Mazgeon
item.description: Game Description Mazgeon is an arcade style game with the study of the dungeons and procedural generation of levels. The player’s main task is to move along these changing labyrinths and accumulate prey. The world is influenced by the essence of a braid, a gloomy reaper, returning from hell to hold his games in the damned city of Mazgeon. Heroes descend into the depths to challenge his servants and find the cause of the widespread curse.

item.title: Mysteries of Fangclaw
item.description: Game Description Mysteries of Fangclaw begins after a friend betrays Bakster Hemlock and imprisones him in an abandoned gold mine. The player’s main goal is to contribute to the survival of the protagonist, exploring the underground passages and the entities that are opposing there. Promotion in the plot is associated with a mission to collect creatures of creatures and make decisions that determine life or death in the conditions of a change of day and night.

item.title: Plastic Battlegrounds
item.description: Game Description Plastic Battlegrounds is a virtual reality combat simulator based on toy soldier warfare. Players construct the battlefield, deploying units, vehicles, and stationary fortifications from a growing list to create a unique tactical environment. The project offers a dual perspective, allowing the user to either directly participate in the battle as a soldier, or observe a miniature conflict in the form of a life-size figure. Tools for creating the perfect battle in Plastic Battlegrounds:

item.title: Devil Spire Falls
item.description: Game Description Devil Spire Falls represents a procedurally generated land, where the last cataclysm has released the damned fog and creatures inside it. The process begins with the creation of the character, the choice of several races and origin with the definition of 7 basic characteristics. The local game world functions through interconnected systems that respond to the presence of avatar and its solution. This environment is the result of the fall of the first devilish spire, which spread the sinister presence in the lands and dungeons, leaving behind the environment indifferent to the well -being of the protagonist.

item.title: Fever Meme
item.description: Game Description Fever Meme is a journey into the mind where behind the façade of absurdity and parody lies a deep personal story. Surrounded by white walls and checkerboard floors, a path begins that leads far beyond the normal gaming experience. From time to time, fragments of phrases appear on the screen - emotional messages and requests for help, hinting at the author’s inner experiences. The initial guide in this strange world is a skeleton in a fedora named Salvador, whose actions immediately set the tone for the entire subsequent adventure, full of unexpected turns and metaphors.

item.title: AWAKE
item.description: Game Description AWAKE puts the player in the place of Yusuf, a former member of the rescue forces, moving along the post -war landscape. The world governments fell, leaving behind the zones of total infection with deadly gases, radiation and unknown diseases, called the regions of awakening. Yusuf penetrates one of these territories, having received a distress signal, allegedly from his wife, who disappeared along with the child during the collapse of society a year ago.

item.title: SCOOTX
item.description: Game Description SCOOTX represents a scooter simulation, where each component is 100 percent controlled by physics. All actions on the screen, from wheels to the head of the rider, determines the central physical engine. Pressing buttons triggers are launched by the animations of the tricks, however, the final movement is calculated by the base system, based on the laws of physics. Any graind, VIP or collision with the surface cause a reaction based on applied strength.

item.title: Chosen War
item.description: Game Description Chosen War puts the player in the role of the chosen one who is instructed to gather and novels the army in the archipelago. It is necessary to move around the fogs covered in fog and enter into battle with enemy forces using the tactical placement of detachments. Each adventure is built around the study of the world and provisions. The ultimate goal is a collision with the supreme priest on the final location.

item.title: Don'T Messes with Bober
item.description: Game Description Don’T Messes with Bober begins with a character from the city to the city to a country house for the relaxation period. The arrival of the protagonist is conceived as an escape from the hustle and bustle, but one careless act against the local fauna completely changes the situation. This action awakens a beaver that begins the campaign of revenge against a person. The narrative was created in the spirit of horror films of the 1980s, turning a secluded location into a hostile territory.

item.title: Revengeful Ghost
item.description: Game Description Revengeful Ghost introduces Kayiti Tsujisava, a second grade student of a high school, whose twin sister Akane disappears after a message on his phone-scrap. This communication contained a video that became central in subsequent events. Soon after the loss of Akan, another student from his school takes scores with life, jumping off the roof. This second incident forces Cayiti to go to the educational institution to clarify the connection between these cases.

item.title: Score The Fear
item.description: Game Description Score The Fear is a 3D adventure where a player interacts with a ghost intending to become a frightening entity. Central activity lies in the study of closed rooms in order to find a spirit named Yu-kun, hiding in different places. Being discovered, the ghost initiates the scene designed to scare the gamer. The plot develops for three game days, and its progress directly depends on the feedback.

item.title: The BackRooms: Expedition
item.description: Game Description The Backrooms: Expedition is a strange and alarming world, where it is ahead of the various levels, some of which are filled with terrible calm, and others with stress. When you fall into this bizarre and nervous environment, the journey becomes unpredictable. You will have to not only explore the endless, at first glance, rooms, but also to be on the alert, because danger lurks in the shade. The minimalist interface focuses on the atmosphere, allowing users to completely immerse themselves in what is happening.

item.title: Radiant: Guardians of Light
item.description: Game Description Radiant: Guardians of Light puts players in the fantasy world, where progress develops through a direct action. Gamers can explore helium alone or with a companion, determining the pace of their journey. The structure of this Action RPG is focused on elements combining the Hack-And-Slash approach in battle, the development of characters through experience and extensive creation of objects. Fighters constantly face a variety of opponents, preparing for subsequent meetings and significant clashes.

item.title: Rekindled Trails
item.description: Game Description Rekindled Trails sends a player on a trip to collect distant goods in order to restore the destroyed cities in the world of Autheris. With the help of a fiery satellite named, the flame gamer mines fish, minerals and roots from the environment, using a fishing rod, a pick and gloves. These natural gifts serve as the basis for promotion, opening access to new biomes and locations as part of the mission to return the light to the darkened land.

item.title: Taiwan Coolfox
item.description: Game Description Taiwan Coolfox is a 3D action-adventure, where anthropomorphic animals are the main characters. This project unfolds in the formation of horizontal scrolling, organically combining the elements of the platformer and intense contractions. A solitary regime is concentrated on instant immersion in the combat system with a side of the side, requiring an accurate positioning and skillful execution of maneuvers against opponents. The main gameplay cycle includes the Taiwan Coolfox movement in various areas, each of which offers its tests, checking the reaction and command actions of the player.

item.title: Frog Jump
item.description: Game Description Frog Jump puts players under the control of amphibians with the aim of vertical climbing through the three -dimensional world. They have to move according to a complex design, using jumps and climbing to go from one site to another. The entire level is designed around this movement up, representing a continuous navigation task. The first princess’s kiss receives a victory that reached the top. This platformer can be held alone or in a multi -user competition for 8 competitors over the network.

item.title: Holoreversi
item.description: Game Description Holoreversi is a tactical table puzzle that offers a fresh look at the classic rules of reversali with the participation of virtual talents from the Hololive group. The project introduces original mechanics into the familiar process, such as the ability to put chips on each other. This technique, called the accumulation, allows you to carry out powerful chain reactions during a coup of stops, radically changing the situation on the board.

item.title: Project Silverfish
item.description: Game Description Project Silverfish places the hero inside the hostile alienation zone in search of powerful artifacts and exotic weapons. This universe is fraught with forgotten nightmares, both man -made and supernatural. The character will go down to the lost dungeons of the Cold War in search of resources and the new arsenal. The gameplay is based on first -person mechanics and requires ingenuity, as well as the use of various survival tools.

item.title: Ruffy and the Riverside
item.description: Game Description Ruffy and the Riverside is a game where the player character uses an ability called SWAP to change the environment. This power allows you to directly copy and overlay textures, which changes the properties of objects and surfaces. The gamer can turn ice into lava, transform waterfalls into vines, or make wood from stone to build a boat. Raffi uses this skill to navigate locations, solve spatial puzzles and clear paths, turning solid walls into ruins.

item.title: Dealer Simulator
item.description: Game Description Dealer Simulator is a title where gamers find themselves in the role of a warehouse manager, where to achieve success they need to navigate the intricacies of logistics, sales and negotiations. The title starts with a simple premise: start small, sell products, and reinvest the profits to expand your operation. This is a world where business acumen and quick thinking are key: every decision, from what to sell to how to negotiate, matters.

item.title: Ranch Farm and Store Simulator
item.description: Game Description Ranch Farm and Store Simulator sets the player the task of creating and managing a united agricultural and retail enterprise. It all starts with the purchase of livestock, including chickens, goslings and calves that need constructed pens for detention. Animals give products, for example, eggs and milk, and after growing up, they can be launched for sale. Thus, the gamer controls the livestock cycle from young animals to receiving the final product.

item.title: My Tiny Room
item.description: Game Description My Tiny Room immerses you in the meditative process of creating cozy, confined spaces where there are no timers or bad decisions. The only goal is to achieve harmony and comfort in a miniature home, turning it into an island of calm. The entire gameplay is based on the thoughtful placement of interior items, which appear in the inventory three at a time. The main rule is to avoid clutter, not allowing objects to intersect with each other.

item.title: Wordatro!
item.description: Game Description Wordatro! Combines the compilation of words with step -by -step mechanics Roguelite. The players are given a set of letters, each of which has point value, and they form expressions from them to achieve a target. The creation of words with a high cost activates the combo-abdominal, increasing points for subsequent moves. The strategic selection of lexemes and the use of symbols are of key importance for the completion of each stage.

item.title: Parcel Simulator
item.description: Game Description Parcel Simulator includes the inspection and processing of parcels in the warehouse. The player will have to receive and sort incoming delivery, checking on each sticker such parts as weight, destination and type of contents. The process consists of entering or scanning barcodes, inspection of departments for smuggling and making a decision on admission or refusal for each box based on constantly changing rules. As Parcel Simulator passes, the main emphasis shifts the automation and expansion of the enterprise.

item.title: Suit for Hire
item.description: Game Description Suit for Hire as if throwing users into a first -class action movie, where they have to go through a series of locations in the role of a killer, leaving a mountain of corpses. There is no deeply prescribed plot, serious development of characters or complex mechanics. There are only pure action and arsenal of techniques with which you can eliminate the next portion of goals. In addition, the scene is constantly changing, due to which you will have to get used to the new environment again.

item.title: CRUFT
item.description: Game Description CRUFT is a pixel simulator, the main concept of which is based on the process of creation and the accompanying accumulation of waste. Any activity to create objects inevitably leads to the appearance of waste that requires disposal or proper storage. The gamer is faced with a choice: maintain perfect cleanliness in his area or completely plunge into chaos, turning the territory into a real landfill. The economic component allows you to interact with merchants through a mobile phone to buy and sell various things, as well as go to the city to sell what you have accumulated.

item.title: Dark Fairy Tale: Dreamland Survivors
item.description: Game Description Dark Fairy Tale: Dreamland Survivors puts a player under the control of Pinocchio, a puppet who has trapped in a hostile and distorted space of nightmares. The character moves around this world by controlling one hand, while the system is automatically introduced to creatures from rethought fairy tales. The promotion depends on the collection and absorption of more than 100 different forbidden dreams of dreams, each of which modifies offensive and defensive capabilities.

item.title: Metro Gravity
item.description: Game Description Metro Gravity places the protagonist in the Halls, a location they are taken to after clicking on a hyperlink and filling out a survey. This world functions without the usual concepts of up or down, being the material embodiment of the collective subconscious. The other inhabitants of this place push the main character to face personal regrets, which is the only way to gain strength and find a way out.

item.title: The Legend of Dark Witch Episode 4
item.description: Game Description The Legend of Dark Witch Episode 4 is a continuation of a series of two-dimensional action games, the gameplay of which is based on clearing locations and strengthening the character. The visual style of the project is made in pixel graphics format. The basis for the heroine’s development is a resource called Tres, received for eliminating opponents at the level. Each location contains hidden special enemies known as Jammers.

item.title: BellFortis
item.description: Game Description In BellFortis, the action takes place in the early Middle Ages, where users seek to expand their kingdoms and influence the course of history. Title combines step -by -step strategic planning and real -time battles, which gives you the opportunity to control the army and make decisions that affect the world. Would you like to build a strong empire with the help of diplomacy or strength - the choice is yours.

item.title: Len's Island
item.description: Game Description Len’s Island is an open world adventure, which is the construction of a base with the possibility of a pharmacy, craft, research and battles. Each player is able to build his own house of dreams, care for crops and simply explore the secrets of the island. If you manage to find a sword, then you can go to more dangerous adventures, fighting with numerous enemies guarding the treasures.

item.title: Rematch
item.description: Game Description Rematch is a competitive football, where, unlike traditional titles, he offers a unique interpretation of this sport, focusing on quick matches. Gamers control one character with a third person, focusing on individual skill and teamwork. The game is designed in such a way as to constantly keep users in suspense, focusing on speed and accuracy. Here each move matters, and the outcome is determined by how well users coordinate their actions and respond to pressure.

item.title: Road Food Simulator
item.description: Game Description Road Food Simulator puts the player directly in charge of running a roadside pizzeria - a task that can be completed independently or with partners in online co-op mode. Activities are focused on preparing pizza and processing customer orders within tight deadlines; The retention of visitors and the volume of new contracts depend on this. The funds earned go directly to the development and improvement of the establishment, including its equipment.

item.title: The Lingering Graveyard Visit
item.description: Game Description The Lingering Graveyard Visit introduces the class, an 11-year-old boy who accompanies his mother to the burial place of his late father. This game is part of an episodic series that adapts stories and legends from Indonesia. A visit to the graveyard acquires a different measurement after mentioning the sacrificial ritual to search for wealth. They say that the ceremony requires the offering of the soul of a small child.

item.title: Thrive: Heavy Lies the Crown
item.description: Game Description Thrive: Heavy Lies The Crown is an exciting medieval fantasy urban planning strategy that will check your leadership qualities and make you make a difficult choice to ensure the survival and prosperity of your kingdom. In this game, the fate of your people largely depends on the decisions you have taken, and the path you have chosen - favor or tyranny - will determine your heritage. The will is your weapon, you must build and strengthen your city, form the land and develop your kingdom with the help of a deep technological tree.

item.title: Crown Gambit
item.description: Game Description Crown Gambit puts a player in the kingdom called Meodred, possession, destabilized by the crisis of the throne of the throne. The balance of power in the state has been violated, and numerous applicants mobilize their troops to capture the crown, while the rebellion of commoners is gaining momentum. In the epicenter of these events, three inexperienced paladin are, forced to make decisions that will determine the future of the kingdom.

item.title: Dragonloop
item.description: Game Description Dragonloop is a metro-vanning that combines manipulations over time with the design of the map, enclosing a player in a repeating 5-day cycle. The main character is a woman who has lost her memory and trapped this temporary loop. Together with a satellite named Ouro, she travels around a two -dimensional world, where strange temporal changes take place. The basis of the gameplay is the study and battles in order to break out of the closed circle, change fate and reveal the truth about the situation.

item.title: Netherworld Covenant
item.description: Game Description Netherworld Covenant puts the player in the abyss, where the world of mortals and the underworld are intertwined after the disaster. Being surviving, the character owns the lantern of the void - an artifact connecting two dimensions. This item lights up with azure flame, making it possible to cross the procedurally created labyrinths and destroy the damned barriers. The goal is to confront the fallen heroes and demonic overlords in order to reveal the truth woven from blood and soul.

item.title: A Building Full of Cats 2
item.description: Game Description A Building Full of Cats 2 puts the player inside a multi -storey building with a certain set of goals. The main activity is a methodical search for more than 1300 cats located in specific and sometimes secluded places throughout the house. Along with this large -scale search, it is necessary to contact the inhabitants of the building, contributing to them in the implementation of everyday affairs and personal instructions.

item.title: Crime Simulator
item.description: Game Description Crime Simulator allows you to quit your nine-to-five job and dive into a virtual life of crime. In this open-world sandbox, you’ll dive headfirst into the dirty underbelly of illegal activities. From petty thefts to sophisticated heists, Crime Simulator offers a buffet of criminal adventures. Start your journey from the very bottom of the food chain, completing small assignments to climb the criminal ladder. As your reputation grows, new opportunities open up.

item.title: Date EVERYTHING!
item.description: Game Description Date EVERYTHING! It begins after the main character loses his job due to artificial intelligence. Following this incident, a stranger delivers a parcel with glasses called DateViators. This accessory revives inanimate things in the dwelling of the protagonist, endowing them with his own character. The project contains a list of 100 potential partners, from bed to fire alarm, each of which is completely voiced. Through dialogues, the player studies the background and motives of these household objects that have now become his companions.

item.title: Loot of Baal
item.description: Game Description Loot of Baal works from the side panel of the screen, allowing you to play at the same time with other computer tasks. Players collect and send a detachment of mercenaries for battles with demons and obtaining treasures on randomly generated combat locations. The project offers hundreds of fighters, each with unique skills, and a collection of more than 1000 different things for the search. This concept of gameplay facilitates the promotion, because the key adventure occurs in a separate area of the display and does not require constant attention.

item.title: Lost in Random: The Eternal Die
item.description: Game Description Lost in Random: The Eternal Die is an exciting adventure in the Rogue -Lite genre, plunging users into a bizarre and unpredictable world of random. In the role of Queen Alexandra, you must go in search to return what was stolen by an ancient evil. With the help of fortune, a cube that serves both a companion and a conductor, users go on a trip to randomly generated kingdoms filled with unique tasks, dangers and capabilities.

item.title: Soulstone Survivors
item.description: Game Description Soulstone Survivors events take place in the gloomy fantasy universe, and the main characters will be the abyss hunters who strive to capture the unique stones of the soul. They have an incredible force capable of turning a carrier into a creature with which only a deity can compare by capabilities. However, it is extremely difficult to get them - for this it will be necessary to first defeat the master of the void.

item.title: Desktop Fishing
item.description: Game Description Desktop Fishing is an idle game designed to run in a small window on the screen and run in parallel with other tasks on the computer. In it, the frog character fishes on his own, finds new clothes for himself and discovers a series of different fishing spots. The main conflict is the spread of algae, which threatens the fish population in the project world. Consequently, the main goal for the player becomes to rescue as many fish as possible from these increasingly polluted waters.

item.title: Fish to Dish: Idle Sushi
item.description: Game Description Fish to Dish: Idle Sushi is an idle fishing game designed to run on the player’s desktop, taking up part of the screen. The boat floats on digital waves, a line is cast, and a variety of marine life is caught from various bays and islands. The gameplay combines collecting creatures with managing a food establishment. The mechanism deploys as the vessel crosses the water, automatically pulling out the prey at a preset speed.

item.title: Grimstar: Crystals Are the New Oil!
item.description: Game Description Grimstar: Crystals Are the New Oil! - This is an exciting strategy in real time, in which you will go to study the distant world called Grimstar, where you will find a new type of natural energy resources. But not everything is so rosy and sunny - because of your brother’s sudden death, you have to fulfill his contract with the corporation for which he worked, and you must take his place on an alien planet.

item.title: Peak
item.description: Game Description Peak puts players in the role of lost scouts on the lost island for the only purpose - salvation. Survival depends on the conquest of the mountain in the center of the island, this test can be passed alone or in the team up to 4 people. The landscape is changing with every new attempt, demanding adaptation from climos. Gamers can help each other climb to ledges or place ropes and rocky hooks to pave the way for the detachment.

item.title: Rooftops & Alleys: The Parkour Game
item.description: Game Description Rooftops & Alleys: The Parkour Game is not your average button-mashing parkour game. Forget about quick events and scripted sequences. Instead, the responsibility is placed on you, the gamer, to master the complex art of movement. Imagine navigating a sprawling cityscape, turning rooftops and alleys into your own personal parkour playground. Every jump, leap and wall climb requires precision and split-second decision making. Beauty lies in variety. This project offers you a variety of conditions, each of which poses unique challenges.

item.title: Snow Plowing Simulator
item.description: Game Description Snow Plowing Simulator is a relaxing and atmospheric simulator in which cleaning the territory from snow becomes an exciting adventure! Forget about the difficulties of winter cleaning - here you can enjoy snowy beauty and study the surroundings using various tools and vehicles. Start with a simple shovel, and then advance to more serious machines and interchangeable plows systems to complete more and more complex tasks in all corners of the city and mountainous areas.

item.title: Blasfemia
item.description: Game Description Blasfemia traps the player in a seemingly ordinary apartment, experienced entirely from a first-person perspective. At first, the room looks ordinary, but it soon becomes clear that the gamer is not alone here. An unknown presence makes itself felt, creating a feeling of constant surveillance, which makes the walls seem to shrink. The main task is to find a way out of the residence while a certain entity prevents the escape, and its proximity is felt in every room.

item.title: Five Nights at Freddy's: Secret of the Mimic
item.description: Game Description Five Nights at Freddy’s: Secret of the Mimic plunges people into the structure of Murray Costume Manor, an abandoned workshop containing unresolved questions. The characters must explore its depths to uncover the secret left behind by Edwin Murray, the solitary creator of this place. This location offers a space where any dark area can hide information or a secret passage, directly affecting the gameplay and understanding of past events.

item.title: Mr. Meat
item.description: Game Description Mr. Meat represents a story that begins after the long period of isolation ends with a find in the refrigerator. A speaking piece of meat appears there, which voices his only desire to the main character. For food, he needs human flesh, which puts the only inhabitant of the house in a difficult position, because he is locked in four walls. The character will have to decide what to do with the demand of the creature: to obey and feed him, or to go against his will.

item.title: IDLE WATERS
item.description: Game Description IDLE WATERS is a game in the IDLE-Rybank genre that works from the window at the bottom of the screen and is designed to simultaneously work with other computer operations. The game window has flexibility: it can be scale, change the layout, change the size and move to any part of the desktop or completely hide. This system allows the simulator to function without requiring constant attention from the gamer.

item.title: Train Valley Origins
item.description: Game Description Train Valley Origins challenges players to manage train systems in numerous scenarios. The project requires switching switches and diverting trains along different tracks to ensure continuity of traffic flow. Gamers will have to control the delivery of goods through different historical eras, observing the development from steam engines to modern rail technology. The result depends on the well-coordinated operation of the network, the delivery of goods on time to the required stations and the avoidance of collisions between locomotives.

item.title: Berserk or die
item.description: Game Description Berserk or Die puts the player in the position of the only survivor on the contested battlefield. The protagonist, being surrounded, opposes the endless stream of opponents advancing on the left and right sides of the two -dimensional space. It is impossible to advance forward, and the only way to move by location is to take attacks. The combat system reads the number of simultaneous keystrokes, transforming more of them into a blow with a wide area of defeat.

item.title: Hopeless Sea
item.description: Game Description Hopeless Sea imagines a world submerged after climate catastrophe melts the polar ice caps. A sea level rise of more than 50 meters has rendered 90 of the planet’s coastal cities uninhabitable, forcing survivors to move inland to escape powerful storms. Soon, a new threat emerged from the ocean depths - mutated aggressive sea creatures that began to attack the last strongholds of people. To save civilization, a final mission is sent to the sea to find the source of the creatures and eliminate the root cause of the disaster.

item.title: Scope X
item.description: Game Description Scope X provides the ability to zoom in real time to any selected area of ​​the computer screen, serving as a tool for improving visual access. This lightweight software is designed to improve image clarity for PC gamers and other users across the entire display area. Its central goal is to instantly zoom into specific areas, revealing important details in any active game, without interrupting the process. The utility operates through an overlay, allowing it to work independently of the running software and enlarging the image directly from the monitor.

item.title: Bank Simulator
item.description: Game Description Bank Simulator is a simulator dedicated to creating from scratch and then managing a banking organization. The player takes on the primary role in managing all operational aspects, starting with the initial construction of the facility. Key responsibilities include selecting and supervising personnel to perform required functions. This management extends to maintaining customer accounts and making strategic decisions that influence the bank’s development trajectory. The goal is to guide the company through the various stages of its growth.

item.title: Covenant of Solitude
item.description: Game Description Covenant of Solitude introduces the story of a young man named Fort, who secretly owns the gift to command monsters in a secluded settlement of the leaves. The carriers of such a force are called ginns - their fate is full of persecution, fear and exploitation from others. The familiar way of life of the hero breaks off when the war breaks into his house, flooding the streets with blood and forcing the fort to accept his essence.

item.title: Dragon Is Dead
item.description: Game Description Dragon Is Dead throws you headlong into a world remade by a fallen dragon. Gone are the days of majestic flight and fire, replaced by a shadowy kingdom infested with vile creatures. This is not your grandfather’s platformer - here you need not just jump and press buttons, but build a strategy for passing. Each enemy you encounter is a puzzle to solve, a challenge that requires you to adapt your tactics on the fly.

item.title: Unlighted
item.description: Game Description Unlighted is a journey into a dystopian world teetering on the edge between oblivion and memory, where a great secret hidden from humanity awaits to be revealed. At the heart of this world is the phenomenon of Umbralite - rare stones with previously unseen properties. These mysterious materials are invisible to the naked eye and only take on physical form when bathed in a stream of light. It was the study of the origin of these anomalies that became the main task of the Umbral Alchemy Corporation.

item.title: Hardaf
item.description: Game Description Hardaf offers to move along invisible locations, where each death illuminates a section of a dangerous landscape. The player performs accurate jerks, jumps and jogging at manually created stages, filled with hidden obstacles. The level scheme opens gradually, because traces from each death highlight the further path. This ruthless cycle of deaths and repetitions is the key to promotion in sideling tests. The main plot mode in Hardaf is a campaign of 5 separate chapters containing more than 60 harsh levels.

item.title: Parallel Experiment
item.description: Game Description Parallel Experiment is an intense and addictive co-op adventure that will test your detective skills. You and your partner will have to carefully communicate and solve a series of intricate puzzles posed by the insidious Cryptic Killer. Can you buy time, outwit your captor and escape the laboratory before time runs out? As two seasoned detectives, you’ll have to work together to crack codes, decipher numbers, and unravel the mystery of the Cryptic Killer.

item.title: Zombie Graveyard Simulator
item.description: Game Description Zombie Graveyard Simulator features a dual operation cycle: during the day, players handle burials and cremations, tend to graves, satisfy visitor requests, and tend to crops. As night falls, attention turns entirely to defense against the attacks of the walking dead, which requires the erection of barriers to preserve the results of the day’s work and one’s own salvation. This change of activity forms the core of the process.

item.title: DELTARUNE
item.description: Game Description Deltarune - spin -off puzzle Undertale, which is talking about the name of the game, acting as an anagram of the word. The difference from the understail is that now there is the opportunity to fight immediately by the team of heroes. They can protect themselves, use magic and many other capabilities. The design and graphic performance has changed significantly. The protagonist of Delta Runa is a boy named Chris.

item.title: Kill the Clock
item.description: Game Description Kill the Clock immerses players in the role of the vengeful protagonist, moving along the gloomy European streets of the mid-1900s and finding that his sworn enemy is already killed by an unknown attacker. Accused of this atrocity, the player must reveal the riddle of the death of his enemy. The investigation occurs inside the repeating temporary cycle, forcing the protagonist to live the same seven -day to live again, while each round offers another option for a deprivation of life, which must be unraveled before the time is overturned, in the intricacies of insidious deception.

item.title: DecayZ Origin
item.description: Game Description Decayz Origin is the story of a desperate struggle for life in a world that was destroyed by a viral disaster. In the center of the story is a man whose only goal is to save his loved one from a deadly infection, which makes him go to the very heart of the epidemic. The journey of the protagonist runs through the ruins of civilization, where terrifying mutations and traces of the former tragedy await at every step.

item.title: Rise of Industry 2
item.description: Game Description Rise of Industry 2 is a setting in which production magnates form the economy, factories produce goods at a frantic speed, and transactions are concluded according to stationary phones with a rotating dial. Success depends on smart investments, effective production and happiness of the right people. Each solution has weight, whether it is the conclusion of profitable trading transactions or the choice of the industry in which it should be dominated.

item.title: VOID War
item.description: Game Description Void War puts a player at the head of an ancient starship, sending him on a journey to the heart of a dying empire. This ship is described as a powerful and formidable gun filled with secret technologies. The tasks include the reflection of the attacks of crazy cultists, cowardly cosmopirates and xenophobic imperial soldiers. The detection of powerful artifacts allows you to turn a starship into a frightening combat vehicle.

item.title: Cyber Knights: Flashpoint
item.description: Game Description Cyber Knights: Flashpoint is an anti -utopic world in which a modern cyberpunk and a gloomy atmosphere of despair and disobey have intertwined. Since the colonization of the solar system on Earth and in other places, complete anarchy began with illegal trade and hired killers. The player will be in the very center of this new world, exploring his shadow side. Actions take place in 2223 as a result of the environmental disaster and negligence of mankind, the ozone ball was completely destroyed and people were forced to create colonies on more distant planets, the benefit of technology allow.

item.title: Ricave
item.description: Game Description Ricave sends a player to an escape from a changeable dungeon, where the movement occurs step by step around the cells. The battles suggest the use of the environment: you can encounter opponents in poisonous water or lure them to barrels with explosives. The state of the character monitors specific ailments, including diseases, bleeding and fractures. The damage here is local: the loss of the leg slows down, the eye injury leads to blindness, and the lack of hands limits the interaction with objects for all creatures.

item.title: Paranormal Cleanup
item.description: Game Description Paranormal Cleanup is a cooperative horror with a first -person view. You can play it together, three or four via the Internet. There is also a single mode. The characters are controlled through the mouse and the keyboard. In addition, there is support for gamepads, but only partial. This project is distinguished by its concept, gameplay and atmosphere from other indie chorrorists. The players are assigned to the roles of employees of the cleaning company.

item.title: Car Dealer Simulator
item.description: Game Description Car Dealer Simulator opens the way to the sphere of trading by former cars. People look for suitable offers, buy vehicles at a low cost, make improvements and then sell them to increase profits. The gameplay reflects the development from basic automobile works to the management of the car dealership. This approach contributes to the formation of your business. In Car Dealer Simulator, gamers master commercial techniques in Little Sam, a hero with features in terms of order.

item.title: Missing Banban
item.description: Game Description Missing Banban begins with the fact that the sheriff of Toadster, the main character, is faced with the mysterious disappearance of his friend. At the same time, in his world, experiencing shock, dark power begins to act. The players are assigned the role of this sheriff-jibs, the only one who is able to withstand the threat and understand what is happening over the course of many stages. The central task is the search for a missing comrade - a mission pushing the protagonist to adventures.

item.title: Kabuto Park
item.description: Game Description Kabuto Park immerses players in the summer atmosphere of collecting collectibles and competitions. The heroine, Hana, spends her holidays aiming for the Bug Fighting Championship. This task requires locating various insects, increasing their individual powers, and forming teams for structured meetings. This project allows us to observe a diverse population of these creatures in a specific natural environment. Kabuto Park includes a collection system for over 40 different species of fauna such as beetles, butterflies, bees and dragonflies.

item.title: Near-Mage
item.description: Game Description The magic universe in Near-Mage shows the adventures of the young girl Illy Vraj, who was invited to live in Transylvania for the summer. The girl will meet with her cousin Dominica, who wants to tell her about the secret witch’s kind. The heroine will receive the opportunity to enter the Transylvanian Institute of Magic, where he will master the art of witchcraft. The girl will go to the preparatory summer school to become a full -fledged caster.

item.title: Pipistrello and the Cursed Yoyo
item.description: Game Description Pipistrello and the Cursed Yoyo is a 2D top-down action adventure focused on urban exploration. Gamers navigate vast environments, mastering yo-yo maneuvers for movement and direct confrontation. The task is to counter rival criminal leaders and their henchmen in different areas of the metropolis in order to regain the influence of the Pipistrello family. This project combines combat, movement and puzzles, all presented in a plot that reveals corporate intrigue.

item.title: Project Warlock 2
item.description: Game Description Among the fiery battles of Project Warlock 2, there is a rational grain - the confrontation between the forces of light and darkness. In a world full of vile creatures, the main character learned the art of magic from his mentor. But waking up in an abandoned castle, the protagonist discovers that his teacher has disappeared without a trace, and the area is literally infested with monsters. Pulling himself together, Palmer reloads his staff and goes in search of his comrade, simultaneously crushing herds of brainless demonic henchmen.

item.title: ODDSPARKS: An Automation Adventure
item.description: Game Description ODDSPARKS: An Automation Adventure combines the elements of automation and real -time strategy, focusing on both veterans and beginners in the automation genre. Players explore the strange fantasy world, solve ancient secrets, build automated workshops and go to adventure with their charming sparks. The main gameplay rotates around the design and automation of workshops. Forget about conveyor ribbons - you have to control the movement of sparks in order to optimize the work of your creations.

item.title: Small Spaces
item.description: Game Description Small Spaces is a simulator focused on the construction and arrangement of compact residential buildings. This project encourages creative expression by allowing players to transform a minimalist Tokyo apartment into a multi-level New York loft with industrial elements. The main limitation of this system is the physical limitation of each area, which determines the boundaries of design and equipment. Within these parameters, each planning challenge encourages the search for inventive solutions that maximize the functionality and appearance of the selected location.

item.title: SOL CESTO
item.description: Game Description SOL CESTO is a swift route that encounter a strategy and accident. Gamers fall into the world shrouded in secrets, and seek to get to the depths of the dungeon in search of a long -lost sun. The dungeon is generated randomly, which means that there are no two identical travels. Each floor is divided into four rooms, and you have to decide which one to enter, never knowing what awaits the door.

item.title: Alien Market Simulator
item.description: Game Description Alien Market Simulator begins with the player tasked with running a market on a space station in a remote location, as a direct result of a connection with the Intergalactic Police. Restoring freedom depends on the success of the enterprise, requiring daily reports to authorities through the complex’s system. The main task is to develop the facility, which requires modernization, into a point with a large volume of trading operations for alien buyers.

item.title: Contractville
