Travel across vast deserts, lush forests, and any kind of road (or lack thereof). But this is not just a sightseeing trip. Drive Beyond Horizons is fraught with many secrets and difficulties that remain to be unraveled.

item.title: Legend of Heroes: Three Kingdoms
item.description: Game Description Legend of Heroes: Three Kingdoms places the player in a historical period as the only participant with multiple paths available. The gamer can choose the role of a ruler, a subordinate commander, or an independent mercenary operating in the world. The project features 3 different types of conflicts: large-scale legion battles take place in real time, while individual combat duels and verbal debates use a turn-based card system.

item.title: Nordhold
item.description: Game Description Nordhold is a strategic tower defense project that invites gamers to immerse themselves in a medieval Scandinavian village, balancing resource management and defense tactics. In a setting where enemies are constantly approaching, the main mechanics of the title boil down to constructing and upgrading various buildings to ensure the city’s survival. As waves of enemies approach, gamers must optimize city construction to maintain strong defenses without damaging the economy.

item.title: Device Doctor Simulator 2024
item.description: Game Description Device Doctor Simulator 2024 puts the gamer in the role of a repair expert. The meaning of the title is to diagnose and repair various digital gadgets. As a user, you find yourself in a workshop filled with broken devices that require attention. In the gameplay you will have to understand how the devices function and apply solutions to restore their functionality. Each scenario represents a different task, ranging from simple tasks such as replacing a screen to more complex problems involving hardware or software failures.

item.title: Splintered
item.description: Game Description Splintered brings a fresh twist to the genre. In this game, the setting is not static, it changes unpredictably after each major victory, thanks to the villain’s ability to randomize the environment. What starts out as a traditional RPG with a simple mission to avenge your king soon turns into something much more complex. As you progress, users will encounter new challenges that arise thanks to the randomized world, cities, items and enemies.

item.title: A Merchant's Promise
item.description: Game Description A Merchant’s Promise places the player in a stylized medieval setting focused on commerce and transportation through the direct physical handling of objects. The journey begins with the role of the Worthless Merchant, tasked with manually moving cargo using a physics-based system. There is no usual equipment here; Each object must be lifted, carried and placed, creating a constant risk of dropping or even throwing luggage. Promotion includes increasing Merchant Status, which directly affects communication and potential profit in the title’s economy.

item.title: Metal Garden
item.description: Game Description Metal Garden is a first-person shooter game set in a vast megastructure overgrown with vegetation. The title follows a lone traveler navigating a setting abandoned to its original purpose. The remains of past civilizations are scattered throughout the vast and multi-layered industrial ruins. The main character will have to go through this environment, facing unknown threats and obstacles. Progress depends on exploring the terrain, discovering lost knowledge, and adapting to the dangers present in the changing landscape.

item.title: Urban Jungle
item.description: Game Description Urban Jungle gives users the opportunity to turn ordinary residential premises into bright vegetable sanctuaries, without straining in a gameplay. The project invites enthusiasts to experiment with the placement of plants in compact apartments, creating personal green corners without typical care worries that accompany gardening in the real world. Users use the main mechanics of strategic decoration, determining the optimal position for each plant variety in order to maximize the level of comfort in digital living space.

item.title: Sapo 3D
item.description: Game Description In Sapo 3D, the player takes control of a frog who must collect golden flies to unlock portals. These transitions lead to new, linearly constructed levels. The gameplay offers a journey through four unique worlds, where the main goal is to collect enough insects. This is necessary to open the huge gate in the central hub and get to the ending of this platformer. Representatives of aggressive flora and fauna will stand in the way of the protagonist of Sapo 3D: from plants that shoot seeds to chickens with explosive eggs and ladybugs with axes.

item.title: Astroloot
item.description: Game Description Astroloot combines top-down combat with RPG systems in a sci-fi universe. Players travel through the Astroloot sector, a region of space full of enemies and valuable items. The main gameplay is to eliminate enemy units, collect the resources they leave behind and gain experience points. This sequence of actions forms the basis for leveling up the character, combining the dynamics of an arena shooter with the mechanics of hack and slash.

item.title: Asylum
item.description: Game Description Asylum-an adventure indie-chorror in the first person, immersing a gamer into a mystical, frightening atmosphere. The developers were inspired by the stories of Lovecraft and Fulchi to create the most gloomy setting that makes every rustle be scared behind their backs and be constantly in suspense. A single -user campaign takes place at the mental institute of Hanwell, where brutal crimes and experiments are taking place on people. The walls of this room saw a lot, and some objects of the environment will tell about what happened to the main character of the story, and the occurrers of hallucinations and sharp schemers will confuse the cards.

item.title: Coffee Express: Barista Simulator
item.description: Game Description Coffee Express: Barista Simulator is an opportunity to immerse yourself in running your own coffee shop, taking on the role of a professional barista. You have to create a cozy establishment from scratch in a bright and colorful world, where every guest will have their perfect drink. The main task is to transform a modest corner into a real coffee paradise, attracting visitors with its hospitality and quality of service.

item.title: Falling for yaoguais
item.description: Game Description In Falling for Yaoguais, the main character enters the entertainment park, which is controlled by supernatural creatures from Taiwanese folklore. Having settled in appearance to ordinary work, she finds out that this is a trap to attract people as food. The protagonist will have to be disguised as Yaoguay for a secret investigation of the conspiracy underlying the activities of the institution. The girl maneuverates in a brewing conflict between people and inhuman staff, trying to preserve her cover.

item.title: Motorcycle Night Ride
item.description: Game Description Motorcycle Night Ride invites gamers to a serene setting of night travel, where the open road becomes an escape from the chaos of everyday life. The title focuses on the pure thrill of driving a motorcycle on endless highways, bathed in the soft light of street lamps and the moon. Users zip through various environments without the pressure of competition or time limits, allowing them to immerse themselves in the atmosphere at their own pace.

item.title: Call of Boba
item.description: Game Description Call of Boba transfers to a small, bizarre town, where they find themselves in the role of assistants, helping to revive the destructive Bob tea store. At first, the task is simple: to cook delicious drinks, attract customers and develop business. But underground is hiding something more. With the onset of night, a completely new world opens, and this is where real adventures begin. Armed with the ingredients for Bob milk tea, users fight enemies to get inspiration for the creations of the store.

item.title: Scholar of the Arcane Arts
item.description: Game Description Scholar of the Arcane Arts is devoted to the use of spells interacting with each other to confront the invasion. The universe flooded five plans of magic, forcing the player to look for new forces. Knowledge is gained through the collection of magic scrolls hidden in different parts of the world. For survival, it is necessary to solve puzzles, explore the secret dungeons and destroy monsters, stereing of powerful artifacts.

item.title: ORDER 13
item.description: Game Description ORDER 13 immerses you in a stressful, lonely work environment where packing orders becomes a race against time and an invisible threat. The title begins with you in a dark, remote warehouse, surrounded by high shelves of goods waiting to be packed and shipped. Your only companion is a cat, a small consolation in the oppressive and creepy atmosphere. Orders are piling up quickly, and the warehouse is not empty - something lurks in the shadows, adding danger to every shift.

item.title: Voids Vigil
item.description: Game Description Voids Vigil is an arena with an Autoboy in the Rogue -Lite style, where the action never stops. Gamers will have to clean the one who flooded the arena of the hordes of robots armed only with automatic weapons, drones and many special abilities. Title maintains interest, offering a variety of modes and complexity settings, which allows you to always find new tests. As you advanced, users should competently dispose of their koga - the key resource, which is used in stores that appear throughout the game.

item.title: Warm Monkey
item.description: Game Description Warm Monkey is about a desperate struggle for survival in the heart of a concrete jungle, where a troop of small monkeys multiplies under the scorching sun. Instead of the traditional health scale, there is an inexorably decreasing thirst indicator, forcing you to constantly look for saving moisture. The behavior of their relatives, appearing every 10 seconds, is unpredictable: they can fall from a height or run out onto the roadway under the wheels of scooters.

item.title: Chernobylite 2: Exclusion Zone
item.description: Game Description Chernobylite 2: Exclusion Zone takes you into the shadowy reality of the Chernobyl Exclusion Zone, where radioactive material has transformed the landscape into something both familiar and alien. Players navigate a post-apocalyptic landscape as planet walkers in search of an energy-rich substance called Chernobyl, while battling nightmarish creatures for survival. The project offers switching first- and third-person perspectives, allowing you to fully appreciate the carefully recreated environment based on the real exclusion zone.

item.title: Dragonkin: The Banished
item.description: Game Description Dragonkin: The Banished throws you into the world, devastated by dragon blood. Evil creatures that have become a result of dragon blood lurk in the shade. Four heroes rise to challenge this spoiled world. Each of them has unique skills and a chance to rewrite the future. The ice warrior in Dragonkin: The Banished, a barbarian, feeding on the blood of a white dragon, embodies gross power. He wields an ax and hammer, becoming more and more when he cuts and breaks enemies due to his resistance.

item.title: I Am Legion: Stand Survivors
item.description: Game Description I Am Legion: Stand Survivors combines combat and strategy, offering gamers a wide variety of choices. The central mechanic involves summoning powerful fighters, each with their own abilities, to fight waves of enemies. As users progress, they encounter various difficulties, including unlocking new characters and equipment. This allows for continuous development and adaptation of the game, adding an extra layer of complexity to the gameplay. The core loop of I Am Legion: Stand Survivors revolves around synthesizing and upgrading your warriors.

item.title: Immortal Hunters
item.description: Game Description The Immortal Hunters action begins in a world that has forever changed as a result of one fateful act. The church, which once served as a lighthouse of light and leadership, went to a radical step, killing God. That is how - God is dead, and behind this is the church. This is not an ordinary story about faith and devotion; This is a story about power, manipulations and survival.

item.title: Gruel
item.description: Game Description Gruel - this is an exciting first -person shooter in which chaos reigns in the endless arena. Users move around the unpredictable temple, faced with a series of constantly changing rooms filled with bizarre enemies. Each step forward is a new challenge that makes reflexes and adapt to the limit. Traditional shooting mechanics fades into the background, and improvisation becomes a key point. Movement is constantly, fluctuations lead to disaster, and the only way out is a passage.

item.title: Deadly Heart Gambit
item.description: Game Description Deadly Heart Gambit is an intense card competition, where each card drawn can either extend the allotted time or bring the fatal ending closer. Participants in this fight will have to rely on memory and strategic thinking to avoid a fatal meeting with the Joker, which means an instant loss in the round. Defeat is awarded to the one who draws this single card. To win, you must carefully monitor the cards already played and wisely use the opportunity to skip your turn.

item.title: Everhood 2
item.description: Game Description Everhood 2 is an unconventional role-playing game (ARPG) that throws traditional combat out the window. Instead of standard battles, users encounter enemies accompanied by music. You are guided by the celestial Raven, who promises to help you regain your voice if you can defeat the fearsome Dragon of the Mind. This quest will take you through a surreal world where the line between life and death is blurred, and every victory seems like a step deeper into the unknown.

item.title: Speedboat Simulator
item.description: Game Description Speedboat Simulator is a realistic racing simulator where gamers will take control of powerful high-speed boats to participate in water competitions. The main arena for the competition is the picturesque Hawaiian waters, offering many challenging routes. Each available vessel has individual handling and speed parameters, which requires the pilot to constantly adapt his driving style to the specific conditions of the race. Success in racing directly depends on the ability to feel the technique and effectively use its strengths on various sections of the route.

item.title: Democrators
item.description: Game Description Desecrators offers Gamer the role of the cosmic marauder, operating in the Galaxy Milky Way in 4096. Humanity has erected numerous large structures in mastered star systems, from deep processing stations to orbital complexes, often containing valuable technologies, weapons and resources. On board the Nightingale FTL Cracer, the character acts as a well-known defiler, making raids on the selected objects. The task is to accumulate a destructive arsenal and sufficient technologies to try to storm the legendary storage facilities of the Galactic Treasury, but this path runs through the galaxy full of dangers for all prey hunters.

item.title: Card Survival: Fantasy Forest
item.description: Game Description Card Survival: Fantasy Forest is a survival simulator that immerses in the very heart of the ancient forest. Title takes users to a world where nature is not only living, but also has its own mind. Here, gamers build a house, overcome daily difficulties and interact with a rich ecosystem full of wild animals, magical creatures and unpredictable forces. Every day brings new difficulties associated with survival: from hunger and health management to solving problems with the weather and seasons.

item.title: FACEMINER
item.description: Game Description FaceMiner offers a deep immersion in the world of collecting biometric data. Here gamers fall into the chaotic world before the beginning of the new millennium, where the main task is to collect and classifying data on faces on a mass scale. As a user, you start small, gradually building an empire from biometric data. On this path, you have to expand the scale: to update software, develop infrastructure and maximize profits, overcoming the sea of ​​corporate problems.

item.title: Blood Typers
item.description: Game Description Blood Typers offers a unique twist on survival horror gameplay, combining traditional horror elements with unusual control mechanics. Users find themselves in a cursed film studio, where the line between fiction and reality is blurred, and monsters from horror films invade the real world. Whether you play alone or in a group of up to four gamers, the challenge remains the same: survive the chaos and escape. The title takes place on procedurally generated levels, making each session different from the previous one.

item.title: Cabin Crew Life Simulator
item.description: Game Description Cabin Crew Life Simulator offers an in-depth look into the life of a flight attendant, going well beyond the simple tasks of serving drinks and snacks. Gamers step into the role of a flight attendant who must cope with various aspects of the job, from serving passengers to responding to emergencies. As they progress, users work on different types of aircraft and at different airports, gradually mastering all the basic responsibilities.

item.title: Cinnabunny
item.description: Game Description Cinnabunny is a life simulator in which gamers will find themselves in the furry paws of a bunny running a bakery. In Sugar Creek Burrows, you have to help a family of rabbits overcome drought and build a new life. The goal is to accumulate enough carrots to help the family move to a new home, while managing the bakery and developing your baking skills. You’ll bake a variety of treats, from bread to pies, and even add your own personal touch to recipes with ingredients like berries and nuts.

item.title: NO-SKIN
item.description: Game Description NO-SKIN is a roguelike that thrives on its suspenseful horror elements and complex gameplay mechanics. Moving along the winding corridors of a house that seems alive, users find themselves in a series of strange, creepy scenarios. Every corner seems to hide a new secret, and every interaction with the environment has the potential to reveal something dark in the unfolding story. The structure involves many attempts, where each attempt is different from the previous one.

item.title: PASSIONERS
item.description: Game Description PASSIONERS is a visual novel, the action of which takes place on board a spaceship setting off to colonize a distant planet. Having woken up prematurely from cryosleep, the main character finds himself isolated on a ship where women are kept in numerous cryopods. The mission has gone off course, and now the main character must decide which women to awaken and how to interact with them. The dynamics of the emerging relationship and the direction of plot development will depend on the choice made.

item.title: DarkBlade ascent
item.description: Game Description In DarkBlade Ascent, the action and strategy are combined into intense gameplay. Gamers can expect random loss of weapons and upgrades during each passage, which makes the game fresh and unpredictable. The Title offers a strategic combat system in which gamers should think in advance, studying enemy schemes and choosing the right moment for impact, evasion or parrying. Choosing the elements or focusing on physical damage, you can choose your style in accordance with the task.

item.title: Mind Over Magic
item.description: Game Description The Mind Over Magic offers the player to become the master of the magic school located over a dangerous underground maze. You have to design, build and manage all aspects of your school, from classes to dormitories, from gardens to laboratories. You also have to train your students with various magical skills, such as lost lasso, production of potions, growing plants and necromancy. But your school is not a safe refuge.

item.title: Recall: Empty Wishes
item.description: Game Description Recall: Empty Wishes immerses you in a dark atmosphere of exploration, where you have to wander as different characters through frightening locations and understand mystical events. A group of friends one day encounters the disappearance of Tommy Lin, a smart and attentive boy. The guys decide to go in search of the young man in order to save him from possible troubles. The game is made in the horror genre, drawn in an anime style.

item.title: SteamDolls - Order of Chaos
item.description: Game Description SteamDolls - Order of Chaos - Metro -Aviation in steampunk stylistics, characterized by a rich gameplay and incredible cruelty. There is a huge amount of blood and dismemberment. There is a time to play for a thief and anarchist named a whisper. Its task is to penetrate the well -protected territory. You need to act as quieter as possible and try not to enter into a direct confrontation with protection.

item.title: Astronomics
item.description: Game Description In Astronomics, gamers are sent to study the space and the production of asteroids. You have to move through randomly generated asteroids, extract resources and manage a developing enterprise. At first, the whole thing is assembling materials on asteroids flying past, but as it moves forward, automation becomes a key factor. With workers and command bots, at your disposal, the tasks for which the clock used to go, can be completed much faster.

item.title: Reality Break
item.description: Game Description Reality Break takes a unique approach to the ARPG genre, combining fast-paced action with roguelite elements for fresh and unpredictable gameplay. At its core, this is a management game. You play as a mercenary who suddenly gains the ability to distort reality, throwing you into a whirlwind of constant change and danger. As you progress, you will face challenges that require more than just combat skills - it is your mastery of reality control that will determine the outcome.

item.title: A Game About Digging A Hole
item.description: Game Description A Game About Digging A Hole offers a simple but intriguing idea: dig in the house you just bought. You start with basic tools, but with each shovel the game unfolds. There’s no rushing to some grand conclusion or fighting monsters—just you, a shovel, and the promise of discovering something hidden beneath the surface. As you dig, you will find various items that you can sell to make a profit.

item.title: Astral Throne
item.description: Game Description Astral Throne is a journey through a land cursed by a falling star, whose fog destroys memory and blurs the boundaries between the real and the forgotten. This strategy RPG combines the best elements of turn-based strategy and adventure, offering a new take on a familiar genre. As you navigate a volatile world, you’ll create and customize your team of multiple characters, each with their own skills and history.

item.title: Last outpost
item.description: Game Description Last Outpost is a strategy with elements of basic construction, the action of which takes place in the post -apocalyptic world, teeming with zombies. Gamers have to build and strengthen their outpost in order to survive in chaos conditions. As the days stretch, the threat poses not only the undead - the other survivors, the same desperate, will try to capture what you built. Resource management, modernization of defensive structures and ensuring the safety of outpost require constant attention.

item.title: Keep Driving
item.description: Game Description Keep Driving immerses in the atmosphere of freedom of a long, slow trip to the procedurally generated world. The action takes place in the early 2000s, you are behind the wheel of your first car, a long road and a festival are ahead, which you need to get to the other end of the country. Passing along the highway and dirt roads, you are faced with difficulties, both from the environment and from the bizarre hitchhiker, looking for a passage.

item.title: Rift of the Necrodancer
item.description: Game Description Rift of the Necrodancer immerses the world of musical battles. Title talks about Kadens, which turned out to be locked in a strange dimension filled with monsters. To survive, she must fight with these creatures, using a mechanics based on the rhythm. Each enemy has its own unique behavior, which makes players adapt their approach to each meeting. As the players move, they will face more and more complex opponents, to win over several strikes, so the accuracy and time become critically important.

item.title: Stray Path
item.description: Game Description Stray Path combines Freecell mechanics and strategic adventure gameplay. Gamers begin with the choice of one of several characters and plunge into the world, which is different each time. The Title offers a random set of enemies, tests and awards, all this is regulated by the cards that you pull. Each card is a new decision, whether it is a battle, avoiding a meeting or choosing equipment. The choice you make affects the outcome of your trip.

item.title: Sworn
item.description: Game Description Sworn immerses the players into a gloomy rethinking of the Arturian legend. This cooperative action in the Rogue-Like genre allows gamers to pass the test alone or with three friends. Once the noble Camelot was under the corrupt rule of the perverted Arthur and his knights. In the role of a knight with a hardened soul, you must explore the depths of the fallen kingdom and find a source of impending darkness.

item.title: Underward
item.description: Game Description Underward is a cooperative horror in which gamers will work together in a deadly underground hospital. Here, up to four users take on the roles of investigators who are instructed to extract the monsters of Test-Subject from the depths of this abandoned object. The task is clear: to convey dangerous capsules to the elevator and escape, but the path is far from simple. Users will encounter unpredictable enemies, traps and dangerous environmental factors, making their way through labyrinths.

item.title: Blood Bar Tycoon
item.description: Game Description In Blood Bar Tycoon, users are in the place of the manager of the Vampire Bar. The goal is to create and manage a series of blood bars so that people and vampire customers are satisfied. Along the way, gamers build blood factories, collect blood and encounter problems such as hunters and vampire-competing. Due to the possibility of micro -study or assignment automation, users can accurately configure the work to develop their dark empire.

item.title: Rift Wizard 2
item.description: Game Description Rift Wizard 2 is a roguelike wizard simulator that puts players in the shoes of an immortal amnesiac wizard. Main goal? Travel through space and fight an old enemy. Each playthrough of the game is a new adventure in which no two tasks are the same. Procedural generation ensures that users will always encounter different obstacles, monsters and environments, which makes the game fresh and unpredictable. The challenge lies in how gamers adapt their strategies as they progress through different levels, where every decision matters and every spell cast can be the difference between life and death.

item.title: Citizen Sleeper 2: Starward Vector
item.description: Game Description Citizen Sleeper 2: Starward Vector is a dice RPG set in a vast, chaotic sci-fi universe. You play as the Sleeper, an android with a malfunctioning body and a past you can’t remember. With a price on your head, you find yourself on the run in the Starbelt, a collection of habitats built in the asteroid belt and relentlessly pursued by their creators. The world is full of difficult decisions, dubious contracts and the constant need to balance survival and moral choices.

item.title: Foundation
item.description: Game Description The urban planning simulator-Foundation-will allow you to plunge in the medieval era, build a whole settlement, make people happy at the expense of unique structures, as well as understand the history of the construction of houses and churches, on which there was a lot of emphasis due to constant rivalry of religious directions. We will build houses and other structures with smart brushes. They will allow us not to exceed authority and put only those buildings that will meet environmental norms and criteria.

item.title: Whispers of the Eyeless
item.description: Game Description Whispers of the Eyeless is set in a dark fantasy world where every decision has weight. Users take on the role of the First Prophet, tasked with rebuilding the destroyed city and managing a growing cult. As you navigate the regions of Aranthor, you must balance ambition, survival, and the looming influence of the Dead Gods. The title revolves around tactical turn-based combat, where planning and foresight are the key to victory.

item.title: Ropuka's Idle Island
item.description: Game Description Ropuka’s Idle Island offers a unique blend of idle gameplay that integrates seamlessly into a desktop environment. In the game there is a small frog called Ropuka, who constantly mows the grass. While you’re focused on work or other matters, Ropuka diligently tends to her garden, earning grass that can be spent on upgrades or island decorations. It’s a simple yet effective system that allows players to make progress without much effort, making it ideal for those who like to be low-maintenance.

item.title: Back in Service: A Metro Driver
item.description: Game Description Back in Service: A Metro Driver will allow gamers to immerse themselves in transport control in the detailed system of the Prague Metro. By controlling the historical train of the ES series from the cabin from the first person, the players move along the lines of the metropolitan subway. The main task is to navigate on the specified routes, timely and safe transportation of passengers, as well as strict observance of the movement schedule to prevent delays.

item.title: Orcs Must Die! Deathtrap
item.description: Game Description Orcs Must Die! Deathtrap is a third -person action player and trap protection, which used the main elements of its predecessors and added several new opportunities designed to diversify the gameplay. The action takes place in the same universe as in the previous parts of Orcs Must Die!, And gamers will have to join chaotic battles with the waves of orcs and other monstrous creatures, using all kinds of weapons, traps and strategic solutions.

item.title: Space Engineers 2
item.description: Game Description Space Engineers 2 returns to the world of space development with updated experience. In this continuation, you will have a new adventure in the Almagest system, where engineering tasks and spaces of space are combined in the most unexpected way. This is a sandbox with an open world in which you can build from scratch - or, rather, from stars - from starships to entire space stations. The goal is simple: to raise your creative potential to a new height, while managing the difficulties of survival in the cold, inexorable spaces of space.

item.title: Learning Factory
item.description: Game Description learning factory - a simulator that is designed to create an automated process of processes and, most importantly, understand one simple truth: what do cats want? The gameplay allows you to head the Kotovod factory. It was once closed, but now it has been possible to renew the process and create your own cat store. Learning factory gameplay largely gives an idea of ​​how machine learning works. Your factory is analyzing a huge database, trying to study the behavior of pets.

item.title: AI Learns To Drive
item.description: Game Description AI Learns To Drive offers gamers a unique opportunity to dive into the world of artificial intelligence and simulation. It is based on the creation and training of artificial intelligence to drive a racing car. The journey begins with a simple neural network that gradually evolves through the power of evolutionary algorithms. Users have the ability to fine-tune their AI, adjusting various factors such as the number of layers or neurons to see how each change affects their creation’s driving abilities.

item.title: Jaded
item.description: Game Description Jaded is a 2D platformer where any mistake, be it colliding with an enemy or falling on spikes, immediately returns the hero to the beginning of the room, providing an infinite number of attempts to overcome the challenges. The main tool for survival is the ability to slow down time using a 360-degree dash. This mechanic allows you not only to maneuver in the air, but also to lock on to targets to deliver precise strikes.

item.title: Dreamcore
item.description: Game Description Dreamcore is a psychological study that immerses the limits of line spaces. Here you have to move through huge, confusing environment, which seem to extend between ordinary and unusual. The design of these levels is such that every turn can bring you closer to a clue or deeper into a secret. The users have to roam these spaces, solving the logic of their strange schemes, and at the same time experience a sense of discomfort, which only intensifies as it passes.

item.title: Turbo Dismount 2
item.description: Game Description Turbo Dismount 2 brings a fresh twist to the world of physics-based gaming, offering players a playground of chaos and humor. The game features a wide variety of levels where you can launch your character, Mr. Dismount, and his companions into increasingly wild scenarios. These levels are not limited to traditional racing, but also include stunt tracks and physics puzzles that add unexpected challenges. It’s a kind of freedom of action, but that’s the beauty of it.

item.title: IDUN
item.description: Game Description Idun throws you into a hostile world, teeming with resources and teeming with enemies. This is a genre mixing in which in real time the strategy is combined with the protection of the tower, which gives a unique experience. Your mission? To capture all the most valuable and get out alive. But this is not a light walk. Enemy hordes are teeming on the battlefield, tirelessly pursuing your base.

item.title: Jotunnslayer: Hordes of Hel
item.description: Game Description Jotunnslayer: Hordes of Hel invites users to the world immersed in Norwegian mythology, where survival depends on skill and strategy. Moving along the inexorable landscape, gamers are faced with an inexorable stream of enemies. In the center of the game is the idea of confrontation with insurmountable forces, and the waves of enemies experience even the most experienced gamers for strength. Fighting off the hordes, moving through the dark kingdoms, teeming with dangers, is a real challenge.

item.title: Lonely Mountains: Snow Riders
item.description: Game Description Lonely Mountains: Snow Riders offers gamers a new look at the snowy slopes. The title takes the core elements of its predecessor and adds new twists, offering users the opportunity to navigate the mountains in both relaxed and competitive modes. The fun begins when you start heading down the slopes, encountering everything from icy lakes to hairpin turns. It’s all about finding your rhythm while pushing the boundaries of your skill.

item.title: Cyclopean: The Great Abyss
item.description: Game Description Cyclopean: The Great Abyss shows the labyrinth of the underworld, full of oddities and difficulties. Locked in a place where there is little what your character should be guided in this dark kingdom with the help of available instruments, unions and decisions. The world is formed by a choice, from battle to dialogue, and each action can open or close the path. Users should manage limited resources such as gold, health and even sanity, to pave their way through a huge, mysterious environment.

item.title: Diddy
item.description: Game Description Diddy begins with a mission to destroy a dark party held in a private estate. Players in the Company of Eminam and 51 Centers must stop the owner’s atrocities and stop the meeting. The main task is the salvation of Justin B, who is in the territory after the accumulation of a state fraud. The detachment confronts the army of Selebri, acting as a guards, ready to defend the estate and its owner.

item.title: Tyrant's Realm
item.description: Game Description Tyrant’s Realm offers a cruel, but fascinating experience for those who crave trials in their adventures. The Title is a role -playing -adventure game that draws gamers into a world where every step is an adventure, and each death brings new lessons. The design is based on the idea of ​​unpredictability: no passage is the same. Every time you plunge into the game, you are faced with a constantly changing world full of dangers that make you be on the alert.

item.title: Aloft
item.description: Game Description Aloft is an exciting indie game that takes you on a journey through a world of floating islands and an eternal hurricane. Survive and thrive as you build your base, discover new islands, and fight the destructive forces of the fungi. In this sandbox you have complete freedom to create and build sails for your island. Create your own sails that can be customized to any shape or size, and use them to control wind and jet currents to move faster.

item.title: Endless Alice
item.description: Game Description endless alice - this is an adventure from a third person with an intriguing combination of elements of the Rowlaik and visual design, inspired by anime. Title invites gamers to explore a huge, constantly changing world, where each solution can determine their path. Six characters to choose from, each of which offers its own set of abilities and styles of battle, allow users to combine them in accordance with their style.

item.title: Heroes of Hammerwatch 2
item.description: Game Description Heroes of Hammerwatch 2 expands the hack-and-slash experience by transporting users into a vast world filled with danger, quests and loot. The action takes place on Hammer Island, and users find themselves in the heart of a kingdom in turmoil, where an evil army has seized power and forced the kingdom’s allies into hiding. The gamer’s task is simple: gather resistance, challenge the forces of oppression and restore the land to its former glory.

item.title: Hyper Light Breaker
item.description: Game Description Hyper Light Breaker is a three -dimensional cooperative adventure, the action of which takes place in an expanding universe. In this new part, gamers are sent to Overtergrowth - a new land that is full of opportunities for studying huge dynamic environment. There are both single and multi-user online solutions that allow users to test the new world alone or with friends. The main attention is paid to the disclosure of hidden secrets, the fight against evil monsters and survival in the dangers that lurks around every angle.

item.title: The Roottrees are Dead
item.description: Game Description The Roottrees are Dead invites gamers to immerse themselves in the intricacies of a family history shrouded in the mystery of tragedy. Set against the backdrop of the December 1998 plane crash that claimed the lives of the Roottry family, the title challenges users to uncover the mysteries surrounding a famous candy-making family. Through research and deduction, participants embark on a quest to piece together a complex family tree, identifying both known and little-known relatives.

item.title: Worldneverland - Daily Life in the Elnea Kingdom - Another Life Adventure
item.description: Game Description Worldneverland - Daily Life in the Elnea Kingdom - Another Life Adventure offers to get acquainted with a completely different way of life. Title invites you to get into a bright, simulated kingdom, where your every action is part of a large, living story. You can do almost everything from farming and battles to falling in love and creating a family. Beauty lies in its flexibility, which provides players with the freedom of choosing a path and making decisions that affect their virtual life countless ways.

item.title: Threefold Recital
item.description: Game Description Threefold Recital invites gamers to move to bright eastern fantasy, where the overgrown city of Bluscles stands on the threshold of a new era. Once the city was warmed in the rays of the Golden Age, and now it is mired in political instability and tension. Title draws a picture of the world where ancient magic and modern technologies are intertwined, creating a unique mixture that drives the narrative forward.

item.title: Airborne Empire
item.description: Game Description Airborne Empire. Want a city-building adventure with a twist? This game throws you straight into the clouds, tasking you with building and managing a city that floats among them. Think SimCity and sky pirates and exploration. The basis is strategic planning and resource management. You will have to keep your city afloat, in the literal sense of the word. Every decision you make affects how well your air metropolis functions.

item.title: Nine Ball Roulette
item.description: Game Description Nine-Ball Roulette is a new challenge for billiards lovers. It’s a pool game, but with a twist that comes from roulette. Up to four gamers can battle it out in fast-paced battles where strategy and skill come together in unexpected ways. The goal is simple: destroy your opponents one by one until only one remains. Each round can bring a surprise, as the roulette wheel adds an element of chance.

item.title: Super Puzzle Cat
item.description: Game Description Super Puzzled Cat is a 2D puzzle platformer where the user has to guide a cat through various challenging stages. The title features time manipulation mechanics built into the game, offering a unique twist on traditional platforming. Users use tools such as jetpacks, portals, bombs and bubble gum to overcome obstacles and solve puzzles. The title has over 150 levels, featuring a variety of environments and scenarios that require strategies to complete.

item.title: The Haunting of Joni Evers
item.description: Game Description The Haunting of Joni Evers takes gamers into the isolated world of Joni, a woman living in a mansion in Harvest, Oklahoma. The plot tells a complex tale of family, loss and the unsettling presence of something dark in an old house. Joni’s life, once marked by distance from her family, begins to unravel after a tense argument with her only friend. Subsequent events in The Haunting of Joni Evers draw the user deeper into the secrets of the house, revealing fragments of the past, painful and mysterious.

item.title: Mystic Rest Stop
item.description: Game Description Mystic Rest Stop offers a unique twist on the psychological horror genre. The title follows 22-year-old Arthur Brooks, who takes a summer job working the night shift at a lonely gas station. When he gets used to the role, it seems to him that something is wrong. There is an uneasy tension in the atmosphere that continues as customers come and go. But these aren’t just ordinary clients: Arthur’s encounters quickly escalate, blurring the lines between the mundane and the horrific.

item.title: My Summer Car
item.description: Game Description My Summer Car is a life simulator of a Finnish, a 19-year-old boy who lives in a dacha in picturesque forests. His relatives on vacation in Tenerife, the whole house, and most importantly, garage, at his disposal. Created on Unity, thanks to the flexibility of this engine, and it became possible to add so much mechanic, which are below. Your main occupation will be the restoration of the ancient Satsuma AMP car made on the basis of a real car - Datsun 100a.

item.title: Behind Glass: Aquarium Simulator
item.description: Game Description Behind Glass: Aquarium Simulator, as the name suggests, is an aquarium simulator. The title allows you not only to admire underwater inhabitants, but also to engage in construction. Thanks to this game, owners of real aquariums from real life will be able to recreate them in a digital environment and share their creations with other users. Players are allowed to rotate objects and adjust their sizes. In addition, here you can set the lighting by installing lamps and adjusting the color, angle, radius and light intensity separately for each of them.

item.title: Builders of Egypt
item.description: Game Description Builders of Egypt is a urban planning simulator in which the player acts as a manager of a great country located in the Nile River Valley. The huge rate is made on the economic development of the state, for this a large number of mechanics have been added, complicating the process of state development. The gamer will see the history of the origin of the Egyptian state in the proto -the -stage period, the golden age, ending with the death of Cleopatra Seventh.

item.title: Sea Fantasy
item.description: Game Description Sea Fantasy Transes users to the water world, where the war changed the landscape. Seventy percent of the continent is under water, and two young islanders named Rod and Axel find themselves in the center of the crisis. Their mission is to catch the mysterious Seaaz, which is an important part of the plan to prevent the return of a nightmare of biological weapons - a black dragon. Forget about idyllic fishing.

item.title: Make Good Choices
item.description: Game Description Make Good Choices puts gamers in the awkward position of having to solve an unnervingly simple task: getting home. What seems like a simple journey down a quiet street quickly turns into an intense task of survival. Each step along the way presents a new set of obstacles, often unexpected, forcing gamers to constantly evaluate their choices. Although the story is based on a walk down a single street, the tension that builds throughout the game is palpable as a seemingly mundane environment turns into something much more sinister.

item.title: Alice Mesmerizing Episodes of Neurosis (Amen)
item.description: Game Description Alice Mesmerizing Episodes of Neurosis (Amen) sends a gamer for the psychological horizon of events - a point of no return. The main character, Alice, is experiencing the decay of her own personality, presented as a necessary but painful process. This journey looks like an escape from the abyss, immersion in a deeply personal and abstract inner world. The key goal is to lead the girl through the anxious environment, help her cross the symbolic path and find the key personifying liberation.

item.title: Lands of Mine
item.description: Game Description Lands of Mine is a story about survival after an unforeseen disaster that occurs as a result of a collision between a spaceship and an asteroid. The cause of the crash was a momentary inattention of the pilot, who was carried away by the passage of another entertainment project. Waking up in an unfamiliar place, the hero is forced to adapt to the harsh conditions of an alien planet.

item.title: Dreamcore Retro
item.description: Game Description Dreamcore Retro is a mental challenge set in psychedelic worlds inspired by the concepts of lucid dreaming and liminal spaces. The project immerses you in a state where the line between sleep and reality is blurred, forcing you to doubt the reality of what is happening. The visual design, in a low-poly style with obvious references to the PSX era, enhances the feeling of an interactive fever dream. This unusual journey through the recesses of the subconscious is accompanied by an intense soundtrack that perfectly complements the overall picture of disturbing unpredictability and surrealism.

item.title: Banebush
item.description: Game Description Banebush is a title whose action takes place in the mysterious Hukendary Mud, a place where few looked and where even fewer who returned. Users stand in place of the nameless protagonist, who finds himself in a distant and deserted area. The world is filled with puzzles, secrets and many trials that make users be on the alert. This is a game that requires research and strategy, because each choice has its own weight and affects the further path.

item.title: Talented
item.description: Game Description Talented is an arcade roguelite shoot ‘em up that throws gamers into a chaotic world where survival is key. The project revolves around the character Ed, who will spend 20 nights on the infamous Demon Conveyor Belt (D.C.B). Each night presents him with new challenges as waves of enemies come inexorably, and Ed can only adapt and use a combination of abilities and upgrades to stay alive. The randomness-focused structure makes each session feel different, as no two playthroughs are the same.

item.title: Endless Dark
item.description: Game Description In Endless Dark you will have to serve a sleeping colony ship alone. As the Guardian, a sentient machine, your job is to keep the ship’s systems running, but you also face an eerie sense of isolation. There is no combat here, but instead you are faced with system failures, unpredictable events and the gradual destruction of your sanity. This combination of mechanical problems and mental stress creates a unique sensation.

item.title: Leif's Adventure: Netherworld Hero
item.description: Game Description Leif’s Adventure: Netherworld Hero is a co-op adventure about constant combat, friendship and teamwork. The boy never wanted to be a hero, but one day he learns that responding with force to rudeness is not always right. Users take control of two different characters, like yin and yang. They have to go through hundreds of dangers that have appeared in their lives and join forces. The main characters find themselves in the Underworld, where evil sources will stand in their way.

item.title: Myths and Legends
item.description: Game Description Myths and Legends takes gamers into a world created 2,500 years ago where they can take part in various strategic activities. The title combines exploration, combat, trade and diplomacy, offering a new take on real-time strategy. Its design focuses on creating and managing city-states on procedurally generated islands, where no two playthroughs are the same. With a focus on resource management and tactical decision-making, users have a lot to think about as they try to build and maintain their power.

item.title: On Your Tail
item.description: Game Description On Your Tail is not your average investigation. This interactive story throws you headlong into a charming Italian seaside town where relaxation and detective work collide. Here you play as Diana, an aspiring detective with a nose for trouble. Every decision you make shapes the plot, so choose wisely - the plot depends on your next move. Unraveling mysteries isn’t all sunshine and ice cream. On Your Tail combines social interaction with good old-fashioned sleuthing.

item.title: Anime City
item.description: Game Description Anime City transfers gamers to a bright 3D virtual Tokyo, inspired by anime culture. Title combines the mechanics of the visual novel and sandbox, creating an interactive environment, focused on everyday life, social interactions and school experience. Users stand in the place of a high school student, moving along a dynamic, fictitious city landscape, interacting with the characters, exploring key places and participating in various events. Title offers many ways to plunge into this detailed city - from clubs after lessons to public events and part -time work.

item.title: KLETKA
item.description: Game Description KLETKA is a co-op horror adventure where gamers must work together to navigate the dangerous depths of the seemingly endless Gigastructure. It’s based on a unique and disturbing idea: users must feed an ever-hungry elevator to keep it well-fed, while battling the various deadly anomalies inhabiting the building. These anomalies are far from ordinary, with each floor of the Gigastructure offering its own set of challenges, traps and dangers.

item.title: Airport X-Ray Simulator
item.description: Game Description Airport X-Ray Simulator is an adventure game in which gamers find themselves in the shoes of an airport security officer. Main task? Do not allow prohibited or dangerous items to be brought on board the aircraft. From the very beginning of the game, users find themselves in a busy airport environment, where the focus is on carefully scanning luggage. X-ray machines are their main tool, and users must be on alert for anything that doesn’t belong to them.

item.title: Deathless. Tales of Old Rus
item.description: Game Description Deathless. Tales of Old Rus immerses gamers in a role -playing game with a deck created against the backdrop of Slavic myths and legends. Explore the vivid world of the Belosweres along with the legendary heroes and terrible creatures from children’s fairy tales at night. Currently, you can take on the role of brave barbarian beautiful, and soon wise Vasilisa will join you. Together you will withstand the growing bestiaria from more than 40 monsters and 8 bosses.

item.title: Defensurvivor
item.description: Game Description Defensurvivor puts a player at the head of the protection of asylum in the world captured by zombies. The main goal is to hold out for 15 minutes against the continuous waves of attackers, managing defense and staff. Gamers erect and modernize the walls through the construction menu, creating barriers to the direction of movement of the approaching horde. Success requires adaptation to the fighters accidentally issued for each session.

item.title: Grizzly Man
item.description: Game Description Grizzly Man represents a narrative, the action of which takes place in Alaska in 1983. The main character is Robert, suffering from amnesia after a forest incident of a 12-year ago and a guide. He leads a group of tourists up the river during salmon spawning, not knowing about his past of a government agent. Suddenly, the expedition is faced with a deadly pursuer, known as the Grisli man.

item.title: Heat Death: Survival Train
item.description: Game Description Heat Death: Survival Train drops you into a frozen wasteland where surviving is like winning the lottery. You will travel on your trusty train - a rickety metal beast that is your only hope against the piercing winds and all the nastiness that roams this desolate world. Every decision you make could be the difference between seeing another sunrise or turning into ice cream. A train is not just transport, it is your home on the rails.

item.title: The Spirit of the Samurai
item.description: Game Description The Spirit of the Samurai is an adventure game that takes users into the world of feudal Japan, where ancient traditions and supernatural forces collide. The title follows the journey of Takeshi, a samurai bound by honor, and his unlikely ally, Chisai, a warrior cat with his own mysterious powers. Together they must navigate a world overrun by the undead and confront the dark forces that threaten their homeland.

item.title: Fast Food Simulator
item.description: Game Description Fast Food Simulator is an adventure game in which you manage a noisy fast food restaurant. It invites gamers to immerse themselves in the hectic world of fast food, where every decision matters. Whether played alone or teaming up with friends, the adventure game combines strategy and time management to create a fast-paced environment that keeps gamers constantly engaged. Here users will have to solve a variety of tasks, from grilling burgers to preparing drinks, while providing fast and high-quality customer service.

item.title: VOIN
item.description: Game Description Voin transfers gamers to the world, immersed in darkness, where the danger lurks behind every angle, and each solution can mean the difference between survival and defeat. This adventure is a mixture of elements, which makes user be alert, combining fast -person battles with a strategic study. The world is huge and full of secrets that reward those who are ready to plunge into it deeper. However, this is not a walk in the park.

item.title: NAIAD
item.description: Game Description NAIAD is a casual, top-down arcade video game with a plot that goes back to ancient Greek myths. The main heroine of the story is Naiad. This unique creature is a lower deity, and also the daughter of the Olympian himself - Zeus. Naiads were created to protect a body of water - each of them was assigned a small river or lake. The creatures had strong magical skills and a strong will, with the help of which they defend their territory and protect its inhabitants.

item.title: Puropu Defense Squad
item.description: Game Description Puropu Defense Squad is a strategy action game where animate inanimate objects are forced to defend their existence from ruthless invaders from Earth. The central task for the fighters of the elite squad is the defense of the Extractor, which is the source of life for the entire Puropu civilization. Confronting aggressors requires not only direct participation in battles, but also the construction of complex defensive structures. Defenders have at their disposal an extensive arsenal of hundreds of defense mechanisms, including 15 types of traps and turrets.

item.title: Urban Strife
item.description: Game Description Urban Strife takes place in a post-apocalyptic world, and the gameplay is presented in the style of old school TBS. The main character lives in a dangerous environment, where every resident does everything for his own benefit. Resources are running out, there are no jobs, and most kill and rob to survive. The player can enter into alliances by choosing 1 of several factions, automatically becoming an enemy of the remaining factions.

item.title: Chrysalis
item.description: Game Description Chrysalis is a roguelike strategy game whose gameplay is divided into two contrasting phases. Initially, the protagonist, in the guise of a disembodied spirit, explores procedurally generated locations, inhabiting friendly creatures and collecting resources. After the timer expires, the calm garden atmosphere is replaced by an ominous one, and waves of aggressive monsters appear on the map. From this moment, the defense stage begins, requiring the use of all accumulated forces and tactical skills to repel attacks.

item.title: Laundry Store Simulator
item.description: Game Description Laundry Store Simulator - a game in which you start small and advance up the career ladder. You will update the equipment, arrange a stylish store and expand the range of services. Is your goal in the laundry store simulator? Become the owner of the best institution in the world. Turn a small laundry into a flourishing business imperial! Update the equipment, arrange and expand the store, hire staff and much more!

item.title: Undead West
item.description: Game Description Undead West immerses players in a role-playing rheal adventure in the Bullet-Shell style, the action of which unfolds in the harsh wild West. You take on the role of an arrow, eager for revenge after a defeat in a duel with a mysterious person in red. Revived by death, you fulfill a double mission: take scores with life and repay the debt for revival, collecting souls. Each defeated enemy brings you closer to both goals, giving the resources necessary for unlocking weapons and improving the battle of the tinctures of whiskey.

item.title: Zort
item.description: Game Description Zort is an adventure game that combines action, adventure and horror, offering gamers a challenging and exciting experience. In a world filled with lurking creatures and ominous environments, up to four users can join forces as they explore various maps. As users delve deeper into the maps, they must work together to avoid the dangers that await them and survive long enough to escape. Communication plays a key role in this process, and in-game voice chat allows you to coordinate actions in real time.

item.title: Tower of Mask
item.description: Game Description Tower of Mask is a kraler that scoops up inspiration in the classic role adventure of the 1980s about dungeons and offering a modern approach to old -school mechanics. Title puts gamers in a huge mystical tower, where they have to fight enemies, solve complex puzzles and overcome various tests. The goal is simple, but ambitious: climb the tower and get to the top. However, this journey is not at all simple.

item.title: Xiaomei and the Flame Dragon's Fist
item.description: Game Description In the center of Xiaomei and the Flame Dragon’s Fist is the story of Xiao May, a martial artist who is looking for his older sister of Xiao In. The narrative was built in the conflict of two schools: the heroine owns a fist of the dragon fiery, while her sister suffered the dark art of a fist of the murderer of a dark dragon. Xiao in disappeared, succumbing to the temptation of forbidden power, which made her sister go on a dangerous journey for her salvation.

item.title: Caves of QUD
item.description: Game Description Caves of QUD-A game in the sling genre with an unusual mixture of styles, such as: fantasy (ordinary swords and bows as a weapon of murders, are combined with magic and marvelous creatures), post-apocalypse and science fiction. A feature will be the choice of a protagonist before the start of each new preservation with his bonuses. The mutant receives unlimited scope for various modifications, by obtaining changes in his DNA, in other words, mutations, among which there is a second heart, second head, wings, claws and much more.

item.title: Ion Shift
item.description: Game Description Ion Shift will force gamers to be on the edge of his chair from beginning to end. Being in the very heart of a huge and hostile spacecraft, this 2D platformer does not accept prisoners. In the role of an alien creature, you have to navigate in an insidious environment, full of dangers that can break your run in the blink of an eye. Enemy soldiers, laser drones and deadly turrets, creating an atmosphere of tension and excitement.

item.title: Unknown Tapes
item.description: Game Description Unknown Tapes immerses you in a primitive nightmare. Developed by Traviteam Games, this horror game uses found personnel to place you in the very center of the modern world in which dinosaurs occurred. Remember the “Jurassic Park”, where all safety measures were torn and replaced by rusty nails, and the heart freezes in tension. Here you are not a hero with a flamethrower, but prey. Each rustle of foliage, every creak of floorboards is a potential death.

item.title: Battle Shapers
item.description: Game Description Battle Shapers is a thrilling sci-fi roguelite first-person shooter that puts you in the shoes of Ada, a determined warrior who must reclaim the future of New Elysium from the treacherous Overlords and their corrupt robot armies. From the start of Battle Shapers, you’ll find yourself armed with a formidable array of futuristic weapons, special abilities, and even abilities stolen from the unforgiving Overlords themselves. Your task is to go through their treacherous towers, which are fraught with traps and dangers at every step.

item.title: Entropy Survivors
item.description: Game Description Entropy Survivors is a fast-paced bullet hell roguelike that combines frantic action with unique mechanics. Here, gamers control both a massive mech and a pointy-eared space frog, creating an unusual pair of characters with different abilities. In single or co-op play, gamers must control both units as they fight their way through waves of enemies, each offering their own set of challenges. Gameplay is designed to test reflexes, strategy and timing, requiring quick decision making as users dodge bullets and land their own blows.

item.title: Shui's Odyssey
item.description: Game Description Shui’s Odyssey is a puzzle game that combines text with images, challenging the user to piece together memory fragments. The process focuses on the experiences of patients with Alzheimer’s disease, using visual illusions as the main tool for reconstructing events. Gamers will have to piece together the truth of their personal history. The narrative that emerges from these actions spans 3 generations of one family. Uncover a tapestry of intertwined destinies and memories:

item.title: Necromorphosis
item.description: Game Description Necromorphosis is a merciless world where survival requires becoming the embodiment of death to your enemies. The main goal is to ascend to the throne of skulls and proclaim yourself the King of the Undead, but the path to it lies through fierce battles with countless monsters. The pretender to the throne will have to challenge powerful rulers who jealously guard their possessions. Only by defeating these formidable opponents and taking their power can you prove your right to dominance in this inanimate hell.

item.title: Enigma of Fear
item.description: Game Description Enigma of Fear is a title that puts gamers in the shoes of Mia, a paranormal investigator on a personal mission: to find her missing father. Finding themselves in the Perimeter, a place that exists outside of reality, Mia and her dog Loopy are plunged into the unknown, where nothing is as it seems. The Perimeter is shrouded in mystery, filled with strange happenings, sinister creatures and a web of secrets that Mia must unravel.

item.title: W.A.N.D. Project
item.description: Game Description W.A.N.D. Project is a fast-paced roguelike set in a futuristic Tokyo, where gamers take on the role of a young sorceress tasked with protecting the city from waves of alien creatures. The title combines bullet hell and spell mechanics, giving users the opportunity to experiment with magical elements and combine them to create powerful spells. The goal is simple: survive and become stronger by coming up with the best spell combinations and strategies to take down increasingly difficult enemies.

item.title: Yet Another Climbing Game
item.description: Game Description Yet Another Climbing Game is a tough climb, the main goal of which is to reach a mysterious peak, accessible only to the most persistent and courageous. Every wrong move threatens to fall and completely lose all the progress made, which turns the journey into a real test for the nervous system. The reward for those who dare to challenge the heights will be a secret hidden from the majority.

item.title: 30 Birds
item.description: Game Description 30 Birds takes you on an adventure through a mesmerizing kingdom created on the surface of rotating flying lanterns. Immerse yourself in an eccentric culture of quirky characters and immerse yourself in the rhythm of mystical synths playing dub music. Join Zig, a brave girl on a quest to find the missing goddess Simurgh, who created this magical world. To reach the goddess, the heroine must find and collect thirty elusive birds scattered throughout the city of rotating flying lanterns.

item.title: Midori no Kaori
item.description: Game Description Midori no Kaori is an adventure game based on the art of peaceful store management. In this relaxed environment, gamers will create and manage their own establishment, drawing on elements of Japanese culture to shape their vision. The title doesn’t focus on fast-paced action or intense competition, but rather encourages players to create a space that reflects their personal taste. There are no strict goals or deadlines, making it a refreshing alternative to many other games that prioritize speed or performance.

item.title: One Boss One Fight
item.description: Game Description InOne Boss One Fight players face one unforgiving enemy - Death. From the moment you enter the arena, every decision, every dodge and every blow becomes a matter of survival. This roguelike is built around one intense fight where the stakes couldn’t be higher. Death is not just an adversary, it is a force of nature, adapting and evolving with each stage. Combat unfolds in multiple layers, each more complex than the last, requiring precision and adaptation from even the most experienced players.

item.title: Sin Slayers: Reign of The 8th
item.description: Game Description Sin Slayers: Reign of The 8th immerses users in a dark, unforgiving world, where every corner is fraught with new dangers and moral dilemmas. In this turn-based strategy game, players take on the role of a group of adventurers, each representing one of the Seven Deadly Sins. Their mission? Confront monstrous enemies, travel through dark and twisted places, and ultimately confront the formidable Eighth Sin - Fate. This latest installment in the Sin Slayers series expands on the formula of its predecessor, introducing new regions, improved mechanics, and an even deeper story that will force players to question not only the fate of their characters, but the very nature of sin.

item.title: Void Crew
item.description: Game Description Void Crew invites you to go on an exciting journey through space with your crew members. In this high-stakes interstellar odyssey, teamwork is paramount as you and your friends face the challenges of deep space together. You will find yourself at the helm of a modern spaceship, which will rush through outer space, performing the most ordinary tasks. Asteroid storms, solar flares and random mistakes by crew members - there is never a dull moment in the game.

item.title: Space Architect
item.description: Game Description Space Architect is a simulator where gamers have to become in place of the manager of the space station. The main goal is to build, maintain and expand the space station, simultaneously coping with the difficulties of resource management and interstellar trade. In the beginning, users are faced with a serious financial burden - a huge debt to a powerful megarporace, which forces them to make complex decisions on how to get income and stay afloat in endless cosmic voids.

item.title: Atlyss
item.description: Game Description Atlyss is a role -playing advent with an open world, which represents to gamers a vast and surreal universe. It is filled with various creatures and mysterious locations, inviting users to explore each of its corners. Users themselves can choose how to interact with the world: to cooperate with others or to cope with difficulties alone. Dynamic nature allows them to adapt their style, raising a sense of responsibility for their experience.

item.title: Scourge of the village
item.description: Game Description Scourge of the Village takes gamers on an eerie journey through a mountain village shrouded in mystery and supernatural elements. Set against the backdrop of Chinese folk horror, the plot revolves around an investigation that goes wrong. Chen Xi, a trainee reporter, begins investigating a wastewater discharge incident at a factory, but soon finds himself in a much more alarming situation. As she navigates the twisted paths of reality and dreams, the boundaries between the two worlds blur, and what was once an investigation into environmental crimes turns into a struggle to understand the tragic history of the village.

item.title: Loco Motive
item.description: Game Description Loco Motive may appeal to fans of old-school quests. The indie title imitates those representatives of the point-and-click adventure genre that were released on computers at the end of the last century. It is a minimalist product with pixel art graphics and a side view. It can be completed in one evening. In Loco Motive, the characters' speech is displayed in the form of text above their heads. During dialogues, they sometimes let you choose your lines.

item.title: Luma Island
item.description: Game Description Luma Island sends users on a trip full of research, discoveries and tests. Regardless of whether you go alone or unite with friends, this adventure is a world full of possibilities. The island offers a wide range of classes - from the construction of the farm of his dreams to the discovery of hidden treasures and solving confusing puzzles. This is a game in which you can plunge into a bright world, constantly discovering something new for yourself and moving forward at your own pace.

item.title: Node Farm
item.description: Game Description Node Farm is an adventure game, the essence of which is to create an automated farm using nodes. The concept is simple: connect nodes to grow crops, harvest them and sell them for profit. Gamers can then reinvest this money to expand their farms and discover new islands. Over time, the farm becomes more efficient as users develop strategies to automate every step of the farming process. This constant development is at the heart of the game, offering a satisfying combination of resource management and strategic planning.

item.title: RAM: Random Access Mayhem
item.description: Game Description RAM: Random Access Mayhem is a roguelike shooter that takes a familiar concept and turns it into something chaotic and strategic. In a world filled with bizarre robots, gamers take on the role of a disembodied AI programmed to wreak havoc. Unlike typical shooters, the adventure game features new mechanics: you control and switch between eight different types of enemies, each with their own unique abilities. This twist not only keeps the action fresh, but also requires quick thinking and strategy as you progress through increasingly difficult levels.

item.title: Forgotten but Unbroken
item.description: Game Description Forgotten but Unbroken is an exciting tactical turn-based strategy game that takes inspiration from XCOM but offers its own unique and unforgettable twist. You will have the opportunity to fight with or against real heroes of World War II, unjustly forgotten by history. It’s time to take your place as the leader of a small but powerful resistance group and fight the might of the Axis forces to help liberate Europe!

item.title: Once Alive
item.description: Game Description Once Alive takes gamers into a world where survival is the ultimate goal and every step forward is fraught with mystery. Set in a post-apocalyptic setting, it puts you in the shoes of James and his brother as they navigate the effects of a global viral outbreak. The duo believe they are the last remnants of humanity, isolated in a desert landscape. Their journey takes them to Houseville, a settlement that promises to find other survivors, but what they find when they arrive is far from what they expected.

item.title: 420BLAZEIT 2: GAME OF THE YEAR - Dank Dreams and Goated Memes
item.description: Game Description 420BLAZEIT 2: GAME OF THE YEAR - Dank Dreams and Goated Memes is a first-person shooter that stands out for its wild premise and unpredictable gameplay. The story follows a former Secret Service agent who leaves behind a life of danger and intrigue to pursue a quieter existence as an artist. However, peace does not last long. The agent is soon forced back into action to save memes from the clutches of the Illuminati, a shadowy organization that seems intent on controlling the internet’s most valuable content.

item.title: D.A.M. Champion
item.description: Game Description D.A.M. Champion is a nonlinear role -playing game focused on the collection of creatures and step -by -step battles. The action takes place in the anti -utopian world, where the economy is directly related to the technology of creating and managing artificial copies of wild monsters. This copying technique is also the main tool that people use to study creatures that inhabit their environment. The player falls into this society as a tamer, collecting a detachment and participating in a system where living entities are read by a product.

item.title: Finnish Cottage Simulator
item.description: Game Description Finnish Cottage Simulator is an adventure game that invites gamers into the tranquil world of Finnish summer traditions. From the first minutes you find yourself in a quiet corner of the Finnish countryside, where the pace of life is leisurely and nature takes center stage. Whether it’s grilling sausages by the lake, going to the sauna with friends or just walking through the woods, the game gives you an insight into what Finnish country life is like at its truest.

item.title: Gravity Castle
item.description: Game Description Gravity Castle invites the player to move according to the colossal structure descending into the core of the world, controlling the gravity forces. The path through the mysterious underground ruins will make you face a series of incredible tests and pass by the remains of fallen researchers. The protagonist comes to his senses in the bowels of this mysterious building of unknown origin. The gates are already closed, and the only way leads down to the center of the world - a place where no one has yet returned.

item.title: My Hotel
item.description: Game Description Users inMy Hotel have to try their hand at being a novice businessman who is going to set up a small hotel and gradually develop it. You will have to buy a dirty and in terrible condition of a house in which you can arrange rooms for living and set up a reception. It is necessary to wash all the floors, clean the furniture from dust and do everything possible to make an attractive and prestigious appearance for the building.

item.title: Space Trash Scavenger
item.description: Game Description Space Trash Scavenger takes place in a future where humanity has reached for the stars and survival means using what others have left behind. Here, gamers take on the role of scavengers operating in a galaxy littered with the rubble of an ancient conflict. The journey begins with a space drill - a multi-purpose node floating among the remains of abandoned ships, forgotten outposts and asteroid fields. This is not just a shelter, but a factory, equipped with critical systems for agriculture, defense and waste processing - all necessary to turn interstellar waste into something valuable.

item.title: Tricky Madness
item.description: Game Description Tricky Madness is making its way onto the indie gaming scene, promising a wild ride for snowboarding enthusiasts. This adventure game is inspired by classic arcade snowboard games like SSX and 1080, so strap on your virtual board and get ready for some adrenaline-pumping action. The mountain is calling: Buckle up and get ready to fall down the treacherous slopes. This is not just the finish line, it is exploring and overcoming the boundaries of your capabilities.

item.title: Beyond The Darkness
item.description: Game Description Beyond The Darkness is an adventure game that immerses gamers in a world of ghostly memories and disturbing experiences. The game follows the story of Millie, a young girl whose family mysteriously disappeared. Her journey takes her through several eerie, memory-based worlds, each more complex and disturbing than the last. The narrative revolves around Millie’s quest to discover the truth about her family’s fate while at the same time confronting the nightmares that seem to manifest themselves in the very fabric of her memories.

item.title: Bullet Runner
item.description: Game Description The dynamic shootouts inBullet Runner show the adventures of a pixelated man who is forced to resist against a crowd of evil opponents. The game is a top-down action shooter where you have to fight with various opponents.
