The project is filled with fast and active gameplay, where users can test the speed of their reaction to current events. You’ll have to move around the map and shoot enemies using a wide arsenal of weapons.

item.title: Catizens
item.description: Game Description Users in Catizens have to develop the city of cats. Players will be able to watch the activities of cute and fluffy animals, helping the kittens build a big and beautiful city. During the passage, users will have to create working groups of different characters that can argue or come into conflict with each other. Misunderstandings will have to be cleared up to increase productivity and improve the quality of life for the entire settlement.

item.title: Dungeon Inn
item.description: Game Description Dungeon Inn is a turn-based strategy puzzle game set in a world where adventurers, guilds, and dungeons collide in a unique, sometimes confusing world. In the title, you will find yourself in the shoes of Sarah, the owner of an inn strategically located next to the dungeon. Your job is simple: keep the inn running smoothly, manage resources, and manage the uneasy relationship between the two rival guilds that send their members to the inn.

item.title: Little Big Adventure – Twinsen's Quest
item.description: Game Description Little Big Adventure – Twinsen’s Quest, a reimagining of the classic adventure game, opens up new horizons of exciting virtual travel. This is a unique opportunity to plunge into a completely new world, full of exciting effects, rich musical compositions and deep gameplay mechanics. According to the plot, you have to go on a journey with Twinsen, an ordinary inhabitant of the Citadel Island. His calm life changes after a disturbing dream about the end of his planet and a meeting with the forbidden goddess Sendell, after which our hero finds himself imprisoned in a psychiatric clinic.

item.title: Mindcop
item.description: Game Description Mindcop is a detective story where gamers go on a journey through a tangled web of secrets and deception. The action takes place in the small, seemingly calm town of Merrilin Crater Camp, and at the center of events is a murder that disrupts the peace and quiet of the village. Players take on the role of a detective with an unusual ability: he can penetrate the minds of suspects.

item.title: PARKOUR CIVILIZATION
item.description: Game Description Parkour Civilization invites players into a high-stakes world where every jump or wall run tests their accuracy and timing. At its core, the game challenges you to master increasingly difficult parkour tracks. Every successful jump propels you forward, and every fall serves as a reminder of the unforgiving nature of this fast-paced environment. The path from beginner to expert comes through practice, persistence, and the willingness to accept failure as part of the process.

item.title: 49 Keys
item.description: Game Description 49 Keys is an adventure game that takes gamers into a world of mystery, intrigue and dark secrets. The story begins with the discovery of a letter - the last message from a long-lost mentor, which informs that the user is now the heir to a mysterious legacy. This letter becomes the starting point on a journey that leads to an isolated island where the mentor spent his last days.

item.title: Shave and Stuff
item.description: Game Description InShave and Stuff, gamers find themselves in a lively and practical simulator, where two roles come to the fore - a hairdresser and a tattoo artist. The title combines hairdressing and paint work, which promotes creativity and experimentation. Whether performing precision cutting tasks or plunging into the complex world of body art, users are immersed in a world of tools, techniques and client preferences. A constant flow of tasks and light humor provide the basis for an original approach to customization and self-expression.

item.title: Songs of Silence
item.description: Game Description Songs of Silence immerses players in a fantasy world under the threat of an impending Silence. This strategy game combines kingdom management, hero development and auto-combat elements, culminating in exciting real-time battles. Immerse yourself in a rich narrative as you lead your kingdom against the encroaching darkness. Manage resources, explore vast maps, and outsmart your opponents to achieve victory. Experience varied gameplay with turn-based strategic maneuvering and fast-paced, action-packed combat.

item.title: The Rise of the Golden Idol
item.description: Game Description The Rise of the Golden Idol is a point-and-click detective game set in the 1970s. In it, gamers will have to take the place of a tireless relic hunter. Target? Find the Golden Idol, a mysterious artifact destroyed three centuries ago. The search is complicated by a series of complex cases involving death, crime and corruption. This is not just a search for a lost object, it is the uncovering of a tangled web of secrets, lies and long-forgotten truths.

item.title: XENOTILT: HOSTILE PINBALL ACTION
item.description: Game Description XENOTILT: HOSTILE PINBALL ACTION transports gamers to a high-octane world where the classic game of pinball meets hostile forces for an intense blend of arcade action. The adventure follows the path of its predecessor, Demon’s Tilt, and brings familiar gameplay mechanics while adding many new challenges. Each new table offers a new set of obstacles, targets and bonuses that force users to be on their guard. Pinball here is not just about throwing a ball, it is a battle against time, enemies and your own reflexes.

item.title: Sea Power: Naval Combat in the Missile Age
item.description: Game Description Sea Power: Naval Combat in the Missile Age is a naval combat game in which you control two warring factions: NATO forces and representatives of the Warsaw Pact. Take part in the naval conflicts of the 80s. Control a huge number of different ships, use all modern types of weapons and technologies. Your main task in Sea Power: Naval Combat in the Missile Age is to defeat the enemy army.

item.title: Void Sols
item.description: Game Description Void Sols places gamers in a minimalistic, top-down world that redefines the essence of soulslike gaming. The world is a huge, abstract labyrinth in which users will have to explore its depths and survive in harsh conditions. From the very beginning, you find yourself in a dark and confusing maze, where there is no map, no directions - only an inexorable desire to move forward. All you control is a triangle-shaped character, and there are no words to explain why you are here and what your goal is.

item.title: Elements and Build
item.description: Game Description Elements and Build is an adventure game that combines strategy and creativity, asking gamers to design their own paths to victory. The idea is simple: survive waves of monsters by building a labyrinth that will keep them at bay. However, the mechanics and challenges that adventure games offer make the process of building and surviving something that requires skill and insight. Each level is randomly generated, meaning players are faced with new obstacles and opportunities each time they play through.

item.title: Everholm
item.description: Game Description Everholm, a delightful indie game, is an RPG that seamlessly blends farming, friendship, and mystery. The plot centers on a girl, Lilly, who finds herself on a magical island, where everyone recognizes her, but her own memories elude her. As she delves deeper into the story, she discovers a startling truth - her sister, Melanie, has gone missing, and the island holds the key to her whereabouts. One of the hallmarks of Everholm is its open-ended nature, allowing players to determine the pace of their adventure.

item.title: Take Me
item.description: Game Description Take Me is a title that is a distinct fusion of stealth, horror and dark humor. The story centers on Maria, a young woman who finds herself in an unexpected and somewhat strange situation. After attending a masquerade, Maria loses consciousness and wakes up in a strange situation - in the house of a mysterious man named Vitaly. From the very beginning, the gamer finds himself in the role of Maria, trying to get out of a place that seems both mysterious and dangerous.

item.title: Locuras en el Banverso
item.description: Game Description Locuras en el Banaverso is a single-player platformer that takes gamers on a chaotic adventure through a bizarre multiverse. The game follows the eccentric YouTuber El Bananero, who not only plays the role of the main character, but also voices him. From the very beginning, El Bananero finds himself in an unexpected situation - he is kidnapped by none other than Santa Claus and his gang of henchmen. As fate would have it, the kidnapping turns into an escape through a portal that leads him into the depths of the multiverse.

item.title: Dawn of the Ashen Queen
item.description: Game Description Dawn of the Ashen Queen is an online dungeon crawler that invites gamers to journey through a world rich in history, secrets and conflict. The action takes place on the land of Eshavon, a continent still reeling from the effects of the Great War, where the effects of a thousand-year curse continue to manifest themselves. As an emissary of the Grand Marshal, the player is thrust into a tense political environment where the task of rebuilding a fragmented empire takes an unexpected and dangerous turn.

item.title: Odd Remedy
item.description: Game Description Odd Remedy invites users into an action-packed multiplayer adventure where teamwork and survival go hand in hand. The story takes place on an isolated island overrun by mutated spider monsters, and your mission? Escape with your fellow prisoners. Although you start out as prisoners, the island’s wild dangers offer a strange freedom as you scavenge for supplies, pillage towns, and destroy enemy-infested caves. The island itself becomes your playground, filled with challenges, obstacles, and the constant threat of the Black Fang Corps lurking around every corner.

item.title: Bunker Invaders
item.description: Game Description Bunker Invaders throws you into the middle of a post-apocalyptic scenario. The surface world has been destroyed, and your only hope is a rickety bunker. This is not a luxurious fallout shelter, but a situation where leaving the lights on is already a victory. Welcome to the new life of a bunker manager, where creepy creatures from the outside world are constantly trying to destroy your shelter. Here you have to solve two problems: patch up the crumbling infrastructure and at the same time repel the attacks of the inexorable invaders.

item.title: The Memory Thieves
item.description: Game Description The Memory Thieves is a co-op adventure with horror elements that immerses 1 to 4 players in exploring the mysterious Ravenwood Cemetery. Portals open here leading to the memories of the deceased, where priceless treasures are hidden. The task of daredevils is to penetrate these ephemeral worlds in order to steal valuables, but each foray is fraught with mortal risk, because the past is jealously guarded by its ghostly inhabitants.

item.title: Aquatic Store Simulator
item.description: Game Description Aquatic Store Simulator immerses users in the vibrant world of aquatic retail. In this game, participants take on the role of a store manager, learning the ins and outs of running an underwater themed supermarket. The title combines business management and the exciting aspects of marine life. Gamers throw themselves into the challenges of stocking shelves with a variety of fish and decorations, setting prices, negotiating deals, and keeping aquariums healthy and attractive.

item.title: Gods Wars: Infinity Epic
item.description: Game Description Gods Wars: Infinity Epic is a pixelated roguelike that invites gamers into a world filled with relentless combat, strategic decision-making and rich customization. From the very beginning, the adventure game offers significant flexibility, allowing gamers to create their characters according to their playstyle and preferences. The plot is simple and at the same time fascinating: users will have to overcome waves of monsters, defeat powerful bosses and ultimately challenge the formidable evil gods.

item.title: Metal Slug Tactics
item.description: Game Description TheMetal Slug Tactics player chooses his warriors to create a suitable powerful team capable of stopping the hostilities. Run n' Gun has roguelike elements as well as intense combat. The continuation of the series of the same name allows you to look at the war from a new angle with a greater share of adrenaline, gaining experience after each fight, which helps to unlock additional skills or weapons. The game was the first tactical RPG, unlike its predecessors, and features replayability, pixel graphics and complex replay mechanics.

item.title: One Socket
item.description: Game Description One Socket puts the player before the need to charge the generator to power vital devices, which is complicated by the presence of only one working outlet. This critical restriction makes us make constant strategic decisions about which equipment to use, while the monster is hiding in the surrounding darkness. To get out of imprisonment, you need to dispose of meager resources, solve the secrets of the location and survive a constant threat.

item.title: Touch Type Tale - Strategic Typing
item.description: Game Description Touch Type Tale - Strategic Typing immerses users in battles between armies that take place during the Dark Middle Ages. The game is made in the genre of real-time strategy, where you have to deal with printing and solving multi-task missions. The protagonist is a guy named Paul who wants to prevail over the evil forces. Gameplay mechanics allow you to test the typing speed of users, where the ability to type the necessary keys blindly is useful in order to keep control over the events that are happening.

item.title: Scarlet Key
item.description: Game Description Scarlet Key is a horror adventure puzzle game in which gamers will have to help a young woman escape from the mansion of her abusive husband. Trapped in a labyrinthine house full of secrets and hidden dangers, she must uncover secrets and solve challenging puzzles to find her way to freedom. The stakes are high and the tension escalates as gamers navigate creepy rooms and dark corridors, each new puzzle bringing them one step closer to the truth.

item.title: Elin
item.description: Game Description Elin is a two -dimensional role morned in which you can completely immerse yourself in an exciting world, where each solution matters. Choose your hero and go on a dangerous trip to Ylva’s lands, exploring mysterious places, meeting unique characters and fighting various dangers. You will find unforgettable adventures, where you will create your own story, influence the world and leave your mark on Ylva Earth. You have to fight for survival, find and create resources, build houses and manage your city.

item.title: Emberdrift
item.description: Game Description Emberdrift is a fast-paced roguelike platformer that focuses on movement and upgrades. From the very beginning, gamers find themselves in an ever-changing world that requires quick reflexes and the ability to find new opportunities. The gameplay is built around speed, requiring users to navigate through a variety of levels with a range of mechanics designed to keep them on their toes. As players move through a randomly generated world, they can slide, wall jump, move diagonally, and even grab onto surfaces.

item.title: Ratshaker
item.description: Game Description Ratshaker stands out with its non -standard approach to the genre of pest combat. Unlike typical games, in which strategies or battle are given the main attention, this one goes along a rather unusual path: the gamer has to subjugate a virtual rat. The process is simple, but strangely exciting: shake the rat, watch how the submission counter is growing, and continue to shake until you finish the work.

item.title: Widget Inc.
item.description: Game Description Widget Inc. - This is a hybrid of the designer of factories and an incremental clicker, who invites users to the kingdom of crafts and production. Starting with basic resources, people go on a trip to master various craft processes. Target? Build a huge factory capable of producing advanced technologies, known as widgets. These widgets serve as a key element of the revival of civilization after the apocalypse. Users perform many tasks, each of which helps to build an empire extending to the stars.

item.title: Rusty's Day Off: Episode One - Janitor on Duty
item.description: Game Description Rusty’s Day Off: Episode One - Janitor on Duty offers an original take on the first-person shooter (FPS) genre. The gamer will have to step into the shoes of Rusty, a janitor who is tasked with sorting out a situation at a workplace where a malfunction has occurred due to rogue robots. It’s not just running and gunning, there’s more to it than that. You’ll have to solve puzzles, interact with strange gadgets, and figure out how to stay alive while coping with mechanical chaos.

item.title: Abnormality
item.description: Game Description Abnormality immerses users in a world where urban exploration meets paranormal phenomena. In this multiplayer ghost hunting horror game, people form teams to explore abandoned places, armed with a variety of ghost hunting tools. The core experience revolves around collecting evidence of supernatural activity, creating a sense of urgency and curiosity. Gamers often find themselves in places with a rich history, and each location poses its own unique challenges.

item.title: Bad 2 Bad: Apocalypse
item.description: Game Description Bad 2 Bad: Apocalypse is an open-world role-playing game that immerses gamers in a post-apocalyptic environment. The story centers on Delta Team, led by Major Pan, as they navigate a world devastated by a virus. Users are faced with a vast landscape where exploration becomes necessary. They will collect resources, fish and create equipment necessary for survival. The environment presents gamers with numerous challenges and pits them against various enemy forces.

item.title: Devilated
item.description: Game Description Devilated - brutal and cruel shooter in the first person with elements of role -playing game. You have to survive among mystical creatures and fry your asses to all enemies in your path! As you pass, get access to new types of weapons and open additional abilities. Use auxiliary objects and overcome obstacles. After the end of the storyline, a new game will open+, which will allow you to start a new trip, having in your hands all previously open skills and trunks.

item.title: Outbreak: Shades of Horror Chromatic Split
item.description: Game Description Outbreak: Shades of Horror Chromatic Split takes users into the disturbing environment of Cypress Ridge, where chaos reigns amid a zombie outbreak. Set in the early moments of this disaster, gamers are given the choice of one of two different characters: Lydia, a seasoned police officer, or Hank, a figure shrouded in mystery whose goals differ sharply from Lydia’s. These choices affect how users interact with the narrative, resulting in different experiences as they navigate a city filled with danger.

item.title: Quadrober Simulator
item.description: Game Description Quadrober Simulator invites users to test themselves as a four-legged creature in a diverse environment. There is a lot of choice in this game. Users can choose from a variety of animals, each with specific traits and skills. These choices set the stage for a unique journey through different ecosystems. As gamers navigate these landscapes, they are faced with opportunities to explore, survive, and interact with the environment. Gameplay revolves around several key activities, including hunting, foraging, and building shelters.

item.title: Quarterstaff
item.description: Game Description Quarterstaff is a turn-based action strategy game that invites gamers into a fantasy realm full of intrigue and conflict. Set against the backdrop of a land under siege by a ruthless sorcerous conqueror, the adventure revolves around the character of Kalresh, a wizard skilled in the arts of magic and acrobatics. Having taken control of Kalresh, users are tasked with liberating the kingdom through a series of strategic battles.

item.title: Creepy Shift: Roadside Diner
item.description: Game Description Creepy Shift: Roadside Diner is a first-person horror game that draws users into the disturbing world of a roadside diner at night. The plot centers on a young man who takes up the night shift at this creepy diner, coincidentally ending up on the night of a blood moon. But this isn’t just any ordinary night shift - soon after the diner’s doors close, the usual routine begins to turn into something much darker.

item.title: Fruitbus
item.description: Game Description Fruitbus is an open world culinary adventure game that invites gamers into a vibrant world full of culinary possibilities. Here, players control a customizable van as they explore the Gustum Archipelago. Each island presents a new selection of fruits and vegetables. During the journey, users collect ingredients that can be combined to create unique menus. These dishes serve not only to feed, but also to bring happiness to the inhabitants of the island.

item.title: NIMRODS: GUNCRAFT Survivor
item.description: Game Description In Nimrods: Guncraft Survivor, gamers have to take on the role of consumable clones, which are entrusted with testing an outlandish weapon in the galaxy, teeming with chaos. The plot creates the basis for a unique combination of action and creativity. As part of the test detachment of the manufacturer of weapons, participants are sent in search of new technologies and resources for alien landscapes. Each entry is a combination of survival tasks and craft opportunities, emphasizing the importance of experiments.

item.title: Sulfur
item.description: Game Description Sulfur is an adventure adventure, in which the elements of the first -person shooter are combined with traditional role -playing games and mob. Gamers take on the role of a character, moving around a complex world, filled with problems and capabilities. The gameplay is focused on battles and research, forcing users to think strategically, faced with various enemies. Each collision requires a different approach, which makes the adaptation key.

item.title: Vengeance Hunters
item.description: Game Description Vengeance Hunters is a side-scrolling beat-‘em-up that captures the essence of classic arcade action. Here users can choose one of several characters, each of which has different abilities and fighting styles. These choices play an important role in how gamers approach gaming challenges. Going through various stages, users encounter many enemies, each of which has unique behavior and attack style. With a variety of characters, gamers will be able to find the fighting style that suits their preferences.

item.title: PSYCHOPOPP GOLD
item.description: Game Description Psychopomp Gold - This is a remasted version of the popular horror game that sends gamers on a trip along terrible catacombs filled with strange creatures and hidden secrets. In the remaster there are new levels and modes that expand the concept of the original. Adding a third-person species changes the perspective, allowing users to navigate the environment differently. Each corner is fraught with a new test, because gamers must maintain vigilance, making their way through the dark depths.

item.title: Roots of Harmony
item.description: Game Description Roots of Harmony is a text-based 4X strategy game in which users guide a newly founded colony through various stages of survival and development. Set on a procedurally generated island, the project introduces gamers to a variety of unique environments, including tundra, forests, deserts and swamps, each offering their own challenges and content. The focus is on exploration, resource management, and making important ideological decisions that determine the direction of the base’s development.

item.title: Dollmare
item.description: Game Description Dollmare is a psychological horror adventure in which gamers have to work in a mysterious doll factory. The factory is not just a background, it is a character in its own right, filled with secrets waiting in the wings. Entering the role of a factory worker, users quickly realize that there is more to this place than meets the eye. Strange occurrences become the norm, and the unsettling nature of the dolls hints at deeper secrets lurking in the shadows.

item.title: Forgive Me Father 2
item.description: Game Description Forgive Me Father 2, an FPS action game, takes users on a journey through their darkest nightmares in search of an opportunity to regain their sanity. Drawing inspiration from the myths of G.F. Lovecraft, where madness is ever present, the game continues the exciting story of the hero Priest from its predecessor. As players walk the fine line between sanity and madness, distinct, eerie visuals reminiscent of hand-drawn graphics create a striking and eerie atmosphere that feels like a page ripped out of a haunted comic book.

item.title: IDILI
item.description: Game Description IDILI is a first-person survival horror game where the main goal is to uncover one of Sardinia’s darkest secrets. John and his companion Ellie’s initial journey, intended to be an immersion in the island’s vibrant culture, is suddenly interrupted. The main character finds himself completely alone on the territory of the ominous archaeological park Nurage Is Paras. Frightened and isolated, he is determined to find Ellie, which becomes the central plot objective.

item.title: Windblown
item.description: Game Description Windblown is a fast-paced action game developed by Motion Twin, known for its work on Dead Cells. Here users take the place of Leapers, anthropomorphic warriors moving across huge dynamic islands suspended in the sky. Each session offers unique secrets to discover and formidable enemies to battle, setting the stage for an engaging experience. The environment changes, so no two tasks are the same. As gamers dive into this expansive world, they can expect a combination of exploration and combat.

item.title: The Scourge | Tai Wang
item.description: Game Description The Scourge | Tai Uong is a puzzle RPG that takes gamers into the eerie setting of Saigon, Vietnam, capturing the essence of urban legends from the 1990s. The story centers on a protagonist who must navigate a tragic family history and is haunted by a dark, supernatural presence that is the result of past choices. Users will have to go through a series of complex puzzles, exploring various locations of the city, in an effort to uncover hidden truths and confront otherworldly threats.

item.title: Amanda the Adventurer 2
item.description: Game Description Amanda the Adventurer 2 picks up where the first game left off and puts gamers back in Riley’s shoes. This time, a mysterious masked figure throws a wrench into Riley’s plans, sending them on an escapade through the library. This is where the game simply shines. Unlike other games, the title relies heavily on user input to not only solve puzzles, but also radically change the environment and the story itself.

item.title: AWAKEN - Astral Blade
item.description: Game Description In AWAKEN - Astral Blade you will need to do everything possible to finally get to the bottom of the truth. But it is unlikely that she will turn out to be as positive and rosy as the main character expects. You have to make every effort, fight against ill-wishers, and also go through dark and dangerous locations. But the main character Loretta is ready to do it. The dark-haired girl decides to go through the mists and places covered with a strange dark aura, in order to ultimately find out about her past and life in general.

item.title: October Panic
item.description: Game Description October Panic is a platform in an arcade style that requires passing five levels in one continuous session. The plot of the game begins with Rita of the resuscitator, whose occult experiments create a break in reality, flooding the streets of a small city with supernatural entities. This chaotic event releases the Horde of Creation, among which witches, werewolves, mummies, vampires and walking dead. The player will manage the young collector of sweets named October to pave the way through the captured streets to the old ghost mansion and put an end to the annual curse.

item.title: Nuclear Nightmare
item.description: Game Description InNuclear Nightmare, gamers join a specialized team on a mission in a challenging arctic wasteland. The task is to find secret materials while overcoming various threats, including the Black Goo virus. This virus creates menacing entities that raise the stakes, forcing users to act quickly. The backdrop is a race against time as the US government prepares to launch a nuclear strike, adding urgency to every decision the team makes.

item.title: Speedollama
item.description: Game Description Speedollama is a fast-paced platform shooter that takes gamers into a world where llamas battle an army of alpacas. The unusual premise draws users into a chaotic world where humor and action collide in the most unexpected ways. The goal is simple: control a llama equipped with a mining machine and destroy waves of alpaca enemies. The title features a vibrant environment filled with quirky characters and varied challenges, making every moment exciting.

item.title: Citadelum
item.description: Game Description Citadelum throws its hat to the ring of strategic games, offering the experience of building cities with an admixture of mythology and strategic conquests. Ancient Rome serves as a background for the game: gamers take control of a nascent settlement and should turn it into a lively metropolis. Resource management is a paramount task for any novice urban planner. But Citadelum is not only overgrown suburbs and towering monuments.

item.title: Eden Crafters
item.description: Game Description Eden Crafters throws glove in the hands of survival and automation lovers. In this cooperative adventure with the open world, players will turn to turn a hostile planet into a hospitable refuge for humanity. Think about this as a space project of reconstruction - harsh conditions, fluids of the house of dreams. Task? Overcome the unpleasant habits of the planet and build a new house for humanity. Imagine radioactive zones and insidious landscapes are not the best real estate.

item.title: You Are Grounded
item.description: Game Description You Are Grounded places gamers in a tense environment where a teenager is locked in his room on Halloween night. The story is set against the backdrop of a community celebrating a holiday while the protagonist contemplates the consequences of his actions. The night takes a dark turn when the news reports of an escaped maniac dressed as a clown, adding extra urgency to the situation. With parents punishing the teenager, his predicament becomes a major theme as he moves around the house looking for items that might help him survive.

item.title: Drova - Forsaken Kin
item.description: Game Description Drova - Forsaken Kin is a role -playing game with a view of the top. This RPG transfers users to the fantasy world of Draheim. The main character enters a certain order and becomes a novice. Once the organization sends a protagonist to the land unknown to him. There is a conflict between representatives of this faction and the local group. The hero’s path to Drova - Forsaken Kin begins with short learning.

item.title: The Dawn: Sniper's Way
item.description: Game Description The Dawn: Sniper’s Way crosses a post-apocalyptic setting with a post-Soviet atmosphere. The game invites you to wander around Seversk. This is the name of a fictional industrial city. Previously, research laboratories and a nuclear power plant operated on its territory. In 1981, a disaster occurred there due to floods. After this, all residents were evacuated, and the settlement was abandoned. The video game itself takes place many years later, in 2025.

item.title: Up to Par
item.description: Game Description Up to Par is more than just minigolf! Take on procedurally generated levels with up to 16 friends or alone, but remember that every hit counts. Stay below par to avoid being eliminated from the game! You will have to show your skills and planning to progress as far as possible and unlock the next course. Can you beat your record? Will you be able to defeat your friends?

item.title: Tech Store Simulator
item.description: Game Description Tech Store Simulator immerses gamers in the fast-paced world of tech retail, giving them hands-on experience in running their own electronics store. The title’s focus is on strategic decision-making, requiring users to balance inventory management with customer satisfaction. Gamers will have to navigate the ins and outs of running a successful tech business, from stocking shelves with the latest gadgets to setting competitive prices. Hiring and managing staff is another key aspect of the game to keep the store running smoothly and efficiently.

item.title: Thronefall
item.description: Game Description Thronefall is a game that truly captures the essence of strategy and action. Here, players are tasked with balancing resources, armies, and defenses while constantly facing waves of relentless enemies that relentlessly attack their base every night. The project offers users the freedom to choose their style, allowing them to either hold positions behind fortified walls and rely on archers and catapults to repel invaders, or take charge and lead their knights into exciting combat.

item.title: Storage Hunter
item.description: Game Description An exciting auction of old things in Storage Hunter. Gamer will be able to take part in the auction, where abandoned warehouses are played, which are perfect for perestroika and old containers. Of all these things killed over time, you can make brand new things suitable for everyday use. The user’s task is extremely simple, just that you need to correctly and wisely assess the cost of each item that is in this room.

item.title: Storage Hunter Simulator
item.description: Game Description An exciting auction of old items in Storage Hunter Simulator. The gamer will be able to take part in an auction where abandoned warehouses, which are perfect for reconstruction, and old containers are being raffled off. From all these things killed over time, you can make new things suitable for everyday use. The user’s task is extremely simple; all you need to do is correctly and wisely assess the cost of each item that is in this room.

item.title: Heavy Cargo - The Truck Simulator
item.description: Game Description Heavy Cargo - The Truck Simulator is an opportunity to feel like a real trucker who is forced to transport goods through the huge open world. It is necessary to search for orders, loading, unloading and accompanying a variety of cars in convoys. It will be possible to test several types of trailers that can transport the tractor. Juzerov is waiting for the gameplay of the classic driver’s simulator, which controls a big truck.

item.title: Hidden in My Paradise
item.description: Game Description Hidden in My Paradise is an adventure game with hidden objects that offers fascinating experience for players looking for a combination of research and creativity. The main character, Lali, goes on a journey with Fairy Crown, creating a bizarre atmosphere from the very beginning. The purpose of the duet is to find hidden objects scattered in various zones, each of which has its own unique taste. Such an environment encourages gamers to plunge into various conditions, to look for objects, solving small stories that accompany each mission.

item.title: Shady Knight
item.description: Game Description Shady Knight is a first-person hand-to-hand combat game. The environment is interactive and contains a huge amount of dynamic combat. The gameplay combines elements of platforming. You will need to go through many towers and brutally tear apart your enemies. You use a sword with which you kill your enemies. You can also kick opponents onto spikes, shoot enemies with fire, and throw swords at their bodies to pin them to walls.

item.title: Whimel Academy
item.description: Game Description Whimel Academy immerses gamers in the everyday life of a magic school student. This time management simulation game offers a fun environment where users juggle classes, extracurricular activities, and social interactions. Every day is a combination of learning and personal growth as gamers navigate the complexities of school and relationships. By taking on the role of a student, users will experience the ups and downs of managing schedules and developing skills in various magical disciplines.

item.title: 7 Minutes in Hell
item.description: Game Description 7 Minutes in Hell places the player in dangerous arenas where survival requires quick decisions and the ability to deal with threats. In the project, up to four gamers move through areas filled with traps and creatures that hinder progress. The focus is on teamwork and tactics as participants search for resources while battling a time limit of only 7 minutes to find a way out. 7 Minutes in Hell’s environments are full of hazards, including spikes and fire traps that make movement difficult and punish mistakes.

item.title: Beloved Rapture
item.description: Game Description Beloved Rapture is a custom JRPG that combines modern themes with classic gameplay. Travel through beautiful landscapes, fight turn-based battles and uncover many secrets. This mid-length adventure balances the protagonist’s personal story with the larger threats facing Alexandria. The main focus is on the plot and the interpersonal relationships between the characters. Each hero must go through their own personal trials before facing the bosses in the following dungeons.

item.title: Ghostbane
item.description: Game Description Ghostbane invites users into a realm filled with the eerie and inexplicable, offering a cooperative horror experience designed for groups of one to four people. Gamers set out to find and capture the ghosts that haunt the city, creating an environment for teamwork and strategy. In this game, users take on different roles, each of which contributes to the paranormal investigation mission. Communication is important; sharing observations can mean the difference between success and failure.

item.title: The Killing Antidote
item.description: Game Description The Killing Antidote is a third-person shooter that combines action, puzzle and survival elements. The action takes place in a dystopian future, in the center of which there is a world affected by a special microbe that causes constant infections and mutations among people. Users take on the role of Jodie, a journalist who embarks on a dangerous journey to find a legendary antidote that can save humanity. The narrative unfolds through various missions in which players must navigate dangerous environments, solve intricate puzzles, and engage in intense combat.

item.title: Diplomacy is Not an Option
item.description: Game Description InDiplomacy is Not an Option the player becomes a feudal lord in the Middle Ages. The main character is going through a midlife crisis. Every day the protagonist comes up with hundreds of ways to improve his own economy, how to properly lead his subjects and competently develop the city. He lived like this for a long time. He was tired of monotonous and meaningless intellectual stress. New adventures in the life of the central character begin when hordes of monsters began to attack settlements, and the townspeople rebelled together.

item.title: Monomyth
item.description: Game Description The narrative inMonomyth takes you to dark and gloomy times, immersing you in a dark fantasy atmosphere. Strong natural forces in the form of storms devastate the surface of the earth, which is why humanity has to go underground. The world is plunging into a period of chaos and hopelessness, making it increasingly difficult for ordinary people to survive; strife and civil strife begin, followed by the decline of civilization and culture of the human race.

item.title: Kvark
item.description: Game Description KVARK, the first-person shooter (FPS), immerses the players in the fascinating storyline, the action of which takes place in the alternative Czech Republic of the 1980s. The action of the game unfolds within the destructive underground object, offering an exciting journey through the dimly lit tunnels, replete obstacles and formidable opponents, which makes the players experience their skills for strength. For the company “Quark”, security is of paramount importance, and our commitment is unshakable to it.

item.title: The Last Plague: Blight
item.description: Game Description The Last Plague: Blight is a survival simulator in the open world, which is generated randomly. The user controls one character and watches what is happening from above. The camera is tied to the hero. It is allowed to rotate. Indi-project uses medieval setting with a light fantasy raid. The events of the Blight game occur in a world where there is a filth. This is the name of a mysterious disease.

item.title: Victory Heat Rally
item.description: Game Description Victory Heat Rally is a retro racing game inspired by arcade games of the last century, such as Hang-On and OutRun. You have to take control of small cars to rush along various difficult tracks at high speed. The gameplay is hardcore and pays homage to the classic games of yesteryear. To fully master the mechanics of Victory Heat Rally, you will need to learn how to glide around the track, take corners correctly, and feel the road.

item.title: Aim Camp
item.description: Game Description Aim Camp is an adventure game that combines military simulator and interactive gameplay. It immerses gamers in a variety of training exercises aimed at honing their aiming and accuracy skills. Each exercise presents users with unique challenges, including scenarios such as close combat, sniping and drone operations. Gamers immerse themselves in these drills, where the goal is not only competition, but also a deeper understanding of accuracy. The design of each scenario encourages a focused approach, requiring players to constantly adapt and improve their techniques.

item.title: Kill Knight
item.description: Game Description Kill Knight paves his way to the arena of action-players, promising a cruel ballet from trials and strategy. Fasten the belts because this adventure throws you into a deep abyss - quick reflexes and acute thinking - your only life circles. Forget about sitting aside and interrupting enemies one by one. Here the aggressive style of the game is encouraged, but do not shoot with a fright. Resource management is a key point.

item.title: Liar's bar
item.description: Game Description Liar’s Bar is a multi -user online game, whose action takes place in a bar, where deception and strategy play a key role. Users are united at tables of four people to take part in games such as Liar’s Dice and Liar’s Deck. The goal is to outwit rivals using bliff and strategic moves. Each session is filled with stress, as gamers are trying to unravel each other’s intentions and make the right moves to win.

item.title: Recycling Center Simulator
item.description: Game Description Recycling Center Simulator puts gamers in the role of a recycling center manager. The adventure game focuses on collecting raw materials from various locations. Users sort these materials using specialized machines. The goal is efficient processing and production of new products. Users start with basic hardware. They must upgrade their equipment to handle more complex materials. There is a special focus on time management and strategic planning. Gamers must decide which materials to choose.

item.title: Into the Necrovale
item.description: Game Description Into the Necrovale plunges you into a desperate fight for survival. As the Outsider, a doomed soul chosen by the All-Father, you hold the fate of a tormented world in your hands. Will you be his savior or his harbinger of doom? The choice is up to you. In the desolate Necroval, generations of exiled criminals fight for their existence. Hopeless, lost, forgotten - they are all bound by one rule: survive.

item.title: Moving Houses
item.description: Game Description Moving Houses is a physics-based game that revolves around the seemingly simple task of packing things in a house. Gamers are given the freedom to approach a task however they see fit, whether that means carefully organizing items in boxes or throwing items into chaos. The title presents a deceptively simple goal that soon turns out to be anything but simple. As gamers delve into the title, they are faced with various household items that need to be packed.

item.title: The Devil is in the Details
item.description: Game Description The Devil is in the Details is an adventure game that takes gamers into a labyrinth full of secrets and tension. Set in a mansion filled with traps and cursed objects, it takes participants on a journey of survival and strategy. The challenge is not only to escape, but also to clean up the environment. Gamers must find and place talismans on various cursed objects scattered throughout the mansion.

item.title: exclusive memory
item.description: Game Description Exclusive Memory draws gamers into a narrative where every choice and interaction can change the storyline. The protagonist finds himself in a maze of memories, each of which serves as a puzzle box that needs to be opened. As users delve deeper, they uncover layers of the character’s past, encountering various figures that are pieces of a larger puzzle. These interactions not only move the narrative forward, but also provide insight into the protagonist’s psyche, shaping his journey.

item.title: Halluci-Sabbath of Koishi
item.description: Game Description Halluci-Sabbat of Koishi immerses users in a fantasy setting where they will have to take control of the monster Satori Komeiji Koishi, who is an adventurer and a trained soldier. During the adventure, the hero meets a human witch who is looking for rare ingredients to create potions. Traveling together, the protagonists stumble upon a dangerous mushroom family and undead that they have to fight. Players will explore the forest with miasma and encounter many opponents.

item.title: Prison Alone
item.description: Game Description Prison Alone is a psychological horror game that immerses gamers in the chilling setting of an abandoned prison. Against a backdrop of decay and desolation, users take on the role of a prisoner who makes the questionable decision to remain in prison during a mass transfer of prisoners. This choice sets off a chain of eerie events that drive the narrative forward. While exploring dark corridors and confined spaces, users encounter a number of unsettling moments.

item.title: Axon TD: Uprising - Tower Defense
item.description: Game Description Axon TD: Uprising - Tower Defense is a fast-paced and fun tower defense game that gives users the freedom to create their own mazes and paths using a tile-based system. With the ability to connect to different islands and control your destination, players can strategize and customize their defenses to fend off the relentless waves of enemies. The main difference between Axon TD: Uprising - Tower Defense is its authentic modes.

item.title: Realm of Ink
item.description: Game Description Realm of Ink immerses in an ink adventure in the role of RED, a fencer hunting for a demon leis. Here, fate unfolds on the pages of the book, and it is the Red to break free and rewrite his fate. Gamers take on the role of Red, opening additional characters along the path. Based on the immortal power of the fox, they will pass dangerous plot relics, fight with unique bosses and try to get out of the constantly changing kingdom of ink.

item.title: Start Over
item.description: Game Description Start Over is a multiplayer survival simulator set on a desert island, providing an immersive experience. You have to build a base, make the necessary equipment and defend against waves of enemies. The game features a realistic and dynamic environment where you need to adapt to constantly changing weather conditions, hunt animals, collect resources for survival and engage in trading items to earn money. As you explore the island, you can discover hidden secrets such as secret caves, ancient ruins, and even military camps.

item.title: Ultimate Zombie Defense 2
item.description: Game Description Ultimate Zombie Defense 2 throws you headlong into the tireless struggle for survival. Strengthen your positions against the wave waves with the help of a reliable base construction system. Classes from chains, sandbags and concrete barriers - it is time to show ingenuity and build an impenetrable fortress. But defense is only one side of the coin. The main thing here is the strategy. To restrain the inexorable hordes, you will have to cunningly arrange turrets, mines and even fog lights.

item.title: Beyond Hanwell
item.description: Game Description Beyond Hanwell takes players to a post-apocalyptic London. Westminster, once a bustling hub, now serves as the backdrop to a complex journey of survival. Anomalies, a growing threat, inhabit the ruins of Hanwell. Gamers fight them using collected weapons or gadgets from the environment. The title offers more than just survival. She is a mystery. The director, a shadow figure, holds the clues. Side missions and hidden areas enrich the narrative.

item.title: Iron Meat
item.description: Game Description Iron Meat is a dynamic platformer made in the style of arcade shooters of the last century. The game takes place on Mars, when a group of scientists disappeared from radar without a trace. The case is entrusted to a member of an elite squad who goes in search of missing people. He must find out what really happened and who is behind this mysterious event. The gameplay takes inspiration from classic action games such as Contra.

item.title: Mechabellum
item.description: Game Description Mechabellum is an epic auto battler set in a sci-fi setting that puts you in the shoes of a commander leading an army of mechs on the newly colonized planet Far-Away. Your opponents will tremble in fear as you customize and level up your units, strategically place them on the battlefield and watch them ruthlessly destroy your enemies. You’ll have an arsenal of unique ‘Mechs at your disposal, from the nimble light craft of Wasps to the massive Vulcans.

item.title: Mouthwashing
item.description: Game Description Mouthwashing is a title in the Survival Horror genre, the action of which unfolded in the inexorable depths of the cosmos. History talks about a team of five astronauts who are on board the Tulpar spacecraft of a focus on the spacecraft. In the conditions of depletion of resources and the lack of hope of salvation, the crew has a desperate struggle for survival. In the center of the story is the psychological struggle of the crew with isolation, fear and constant threat of death.

item.title: Night Slashhers: Remake
item.description: Game Description Night Slashhers: Remake is a revival of the classic Beat ‘Em Up genre on horror, carrying players to the world where the supernatural reigns. From the very beginning, gamers are faced with a nightmare environment inhabited by zombies and other monstrous creatures. The action takes place in seven separate stages, each of which consists of many sections requiring the user to move forward, moving from left to right. Each stage turns into the battlefield, where the screen freezes, until all enemies are destroyed, which leads to tense fights with bosses at the end of each level.

item.title: Ravenswatch
item.description: Game Description Ravenswatch is a hardcore adventure in which you will need to explore a world captured by a terrible Nightmare. The gameplay is an isometric action role-playing game with procedurally generated locations. Battles are distinguished by their increased complexity and take place in real time. The gameplay is aimed at the player’s skill and creating a unique character build. Depending on the choice of the protagonist, weapons, equipment and a set of auxiliary items, the strategy of fights completely changes.

item.title: Shadows of Doubt
item.description: Game Description Shadows of Doubt allows gamers to plunge into the world of dark noir, which is shown in a sci-fi setting. Gamers will take control of a detective who is forced to deal with the case of a serial killer. The criminal is at large, committing hidden murders. The game is a first-person role-playing stealth adventure where you need to examine the surrounding area and interact with objects to find clues to the case.

item.title: The Nameless: Slay Dragon
item.description: Game Description The Nameless: Slay Dragon is a turn-based role-playing adventure game that immerses gamers in a world of strategic combat and deep storytelling. In the center is a young protagonist who must take revenge on a powerful dragon. Users will have to go through a series of battles and clashes, each of which requires careful planning and tactical execution. The title emphasizes the importance of choice; every decision can change the course of the plot.

item.title: An Everyday Story
item.description: Game Description An Everyday Story is a narrative puzzle platformer where gamers explore the life of one person through three meaningful objects. Each of these items acts as a portal, opening up different stages of the protagonist’s life. Users navigate memories associated with these items, which makes the gameplay fresh and exciting. The premise invites curiosity as each puzzle provides insight into a character’s past and the emotional weight these objects carry.

item.title: Cyberwar: Neon City
item.description: Game Description Cyberwar: Neon City immerses players in a neon-drenched cyberpunk world ruled by mischievous monkeys. As a brave hero armed with a weapon in the form of a living shark, you will fight against fearsome cyber-monkeys and go through various floors, each of which has unique enemies and mini-bosses. Thanks to its roguelike structure, the games will not be similar to each other. Procedurally generated levels keep the game fresh, and a huge number of items and upgrades open up endless possibilities.

item.title: DreadHaunt
item.description: Game Description DreadHaunt is a 4v1 multiplayer horror and deception game in co-op and PVP. Here one of the users becomes possessed and turns into a ghost, and the rest must survive. The action takes place in a country plunged into chaos as a result of mass demonic possession. Gamers take on the role of an E-Class field agent tasked with securing, containing and protecting the source of evil to investigate and save the country.

item.title: Echo Point Nova
item.description: Game Description Echo Point Nova is a first -person shooter with an open world that offers players to explore a vast territory. In the center of the plot is a researcher who crashed on a mysterious planet, where a hired detachment dominates. These forces use ancient technologies to create powerful weapons. Users can follow the main quest to destroy the mercenaries, or explore the world at their own pace. The gameplay is dynamic and offers many variants of movement, such as grab hooks, hoverboards and double jumping.

item.title: Halls of Torment
item.description: Game Description Halls of Torment invites you into the world of terrifying monsters in this unique action game with roguelite elements, where you will face new challenges and dangers in each game. Dive into the dark and ruthless dungeons where the lords of the underworld await you. Find treasures and magical artifacts, and assemble a team of heroes who will help you defeat the horrors emanating from the depths of the earth.

item.title: Anomalous
item.description: Game Description Anomalous takes users to the fictional and totalitarian city-state of Kosolov. Local authorities were able to brainwash the population and forced residents to work until exhaustion in order to get rich at the expense of others. One day, the leaders of an industrial and closed country began to experiment on people. They decided to increase the military potential of the power and began to conduct experiments on dead workers in order to revive them and force them to perform their duties again.

item.title: City 20
item.description: Game Description City 20 is not an ordinary survival game where you need to search for resources. Of course, there is the usual wasteland after a disaster, the constant struggle for survival, the excitement associated with finding decent scrap metal. But the title adds a twist to the story - your choices rewrite the rules. Every decision you make sends ripples through this broken society, pushing NPCs in new directions and changing the course of events.

item.title: Class of '09: The Flip Side
item.description: Game Description Class of ‘09: The Flip Side is the final chapter of the visual novel series that follows the characters’ lives as they navigate their post-high school struggles. This installment puts the spotlight on Jack, a character who was previously seen in a supporting role. The adventure focuses on her experiences and the emotional difficulties she faces, which contrasts with the more light-hearted approach of the previous protagonist, Nicole. The narrative structure of Class of ‘09: The Flip Side allows gamers to make choices that affect the storyline and offers multiple endings depending on the decisions made.

item.title: Rally Arcade Classics
item.description: Game Description Rally Arcade Classics takes gamers into the heart of rally racing history, bringing classic arcade gaming to the world of motorsports. With 44 cars from four different decades - the 70s, 80s, 90s and 00s - you’ll get a look at the cars that helped shape the rally scene. There’s a wide variety of iconic cars here, each offering its own set of challenges and driving features. In addition to the impressive list of cars, there are 48 tracks, each designed for a different type of racing.

item.title: Tiny Glade
item.description: Game Description Tiny Glade is a fun game that lets you unleash your creativity and build adorable scenes using simple, easy-to-use tools. Here the possibilities are endless, because the user can build whatever his heart desires - from magnificent castles to serene gardens. What sets the project apart is its ability to transform ideas into cozy and captivating dioramas, capturing the imagination and senses. One of the great aspects of Tiny Glade is that there are no fixed rules or goals.

item.title: Bloody Hills
item.description: Game Description Bloody Hills invites gamers into a gripping survival horror scenario set within the walls of a remote forest camp. Here, calm gave way to horror, turning the camp area into a chilling place where danger lurks at every step. At the center of the story is a relentless killer, known only by the nickname Hiker, who wanders through the forest with sinister intentions. As night falls, the atmosphere changes, creating an oppressive heaviness that seems to tighten around users, intensifying the fear that grips them to the core.

item.title: Copycat
item.description: Game Description Adventures inCopycat allow you to look at the world through the prism of a cat’s perception. Players will take control of a cat, which must be controlled from a third person, and go on adventures. The project aims to create a creative and solitary journey. Through which representatives of the cat family pass. The main character will be Don, a spoiled house cat who lives his 9 lives. One day, the protagonist encounters a homeless doppelgänger who tricks his way into the house and replaces Don.

item.title: Lorn's Lure
item.description: Game Description Lorn’s Lure is a dynamic action platformer with a first-person view, which was developed using retro graphics, reminiscent of the project of the 90s of the last century. The user is invited to try himself in the role of a lost android, who is forced to challenge himself with a difficult, almost impossible challenge, exploring a giant cave that has not been explored by his people before. It is quite difficult to move around the available locations, because the player is constantly surrounded by abysses, falling into which will mean returning to the control point, of which there are very few.

item.title: Pneumata
item.description: Game Description InPneumata, residents disappear without a trace in the dimly lit corridors of Clover Hill. Their screams echo through the walls and blood seeps into the cracks. Your task as a detective is twofold: unravel the hidden truth within and reconstruct your fragmented memories, or succumb to the hidden horrors. Welcome to a game that defies reality and plunges you into a cosmic nightmare. Psychological and cosmic horror: Pneumata blurs the line between reality and alternate worlds.

item.title: Rats in a Cage
item.description: Game Description Rats in a Cage proposes to solve puzzles in the form of a corporate certification. The player will manipulate colleagues, strategically placing coffee or spreading gossip, changing their routes and assigning other people’s merits to himself. The whole process oversees artificial intelligence, actively interfering with passage and sometimes interacting with elements outside the game window. Such a gameplay constantly experiences the willingness to sacrifice others for the sake of personal benefits and career growth.

item.title: Scary Shadow Spot: Last Farewell
item.description: Game Description Scary Shadow Spot: Last Farewell is a first-person psychological horror game that explores themes of grief, guilt, and the paranormal. Players take on the role of Mark, a man coping with the recent loss of his wife Jane. The game begins with Mark returning to his and Jane’s old country house to prepare for her funeral. However, what is meant to be a grim homecoming quickly turns into a terrifying ordeal.

item.title: Broken Sword - Shadow of the Templars: Reforged
item.description: Game Description Broken Sword - Shadow of the Templars: Reforged follows the curious and slightly unlucky George Stobbart, an American tourist who never seems to have a dull day, and Nico Collard, a witty French journalist with a knack for riddles. The story begins in Paris, a city known for its rich culture and cafe scene, but for George this time it means dodging an explosion outside a charming little cafe.

item.title: Psycho Fear
item.description: Game Description Psycho Fear is a puzzle game that immerses users in a world filled with challenging tasks and life-threatening obstacles. Finding themselves in this tense environment, gamers quickly realize that survival depends on their ability to solve problems. The title offers a buffet of puzzles, each designed to engage the users' minds, testing their intelligence and creativity while requiring quick thinking and adaptation. From the moment they enter, gamers are overcome with a sense of urgency, prompting them to explore their surroundings for clues and solutions.

item.title: Toy Tactics
item.description: Game Description Toy Tactics is a colorful action strategy game that will take you into the world of exciting strategies and physics experiments. Here you will become the main general, tasked with controlling little toy soldiers and defeating the enemy. You will have to place units on the battlefield and create various formations to guide your toy army towards victory. But don’t forget that physics plays an important role here! When the toy soldiers collide with each other, their helmets will fly in all directions, just like in a cartoon.

item.title: Seed of Heroes
item.description: Game Description Seed of Heroes is a game where the player controls a detachment of warriors, moving through numerous worlds with a view of the top. The goal is to defeat opponents and earn the right to enter the halls of Valhalla. During this trip, it is necessary to participate in the battles of the Bullet Heaven genre, to resist many enemies and collect treasures to strengthen their power. Progress is built on Roguelite elements, discovering after several attempts to access new heroes, objects and other game capabilities.

item.title: Slackers - Carts of Glory
item.description: Game Description Slackers - Carts of Glory is a racing adventure game that is something out of the ordinary. Instead of racing along the highway in luxury cars, you’re pushing a shopping cart. Yes, you heard right. It’s like playing supermarket, but with more fun and chaos. The basic idea is simple: you are part of a group of friends and try to get to the store before it closes. But what is the difficulty?

item.title: TOUHOU GENSOU MAHJONG
item.description: Game Description TOUHOU GENSOU MAHJONG is not an ordinary mahjong game. Of course, the core mechanics remain the same - matching tiles, building chalks, challenging Riichi - but here’s the kicker: Touhou Project throws its huge cast of characters into the game. Over 120 familiar faces spanning two decades of history bring a new layer of strategy to the classic four-player format. Do you think you have everything figured out with Riichi?

item.title: UFO 50
item.description: Game Description The UFO 50 project is a collection of single and multiplayer games made in different genres, such as platformers, shooters, puzzles, roguelike or role-playing adventures. The style is made in old school retro graphics, which creates an 8-bit aesthetic in the design of locations. Each of the fifty video games gives you the opportunity to try out full-fledged gameplay with different levels, where there is a beginning and an end to the single-player campaign.

item.title: Wild Indigo Ranch
item.description: Game Description Wild Indigo Ranch invites you to step into the boots of a cowboy and travel to the fictional and humorous Wild West. Whether you prefer single-player play or join forces with up to three friends in online co-op, flexible options are offered. Personalization is key, allowing you to customize your character, horse, and ranch to suit your unique style. Freedom reigns in the vast world of the game. You can roam the wild, hunt animals, search for gold mines, trade goods with other settlers, or engage in intense shootouts with bandits and lawmen.

item.title: Fera: The Sundered Tribes
item.description: Game Description Fera: The Sundered Tribes throws its hat into the action-RPG ring, but with a twist. You will not only have to smash the skulls of monsters, but also lead your tribe to restoration in a world devastated by magic. Imagine: A monster hunter by day, a mayor by night. The world of Fera is a post-apocalyptic mess, twisted by magic and infested with giant monsters that are eager to add your tribe to their menu of creatures.

item.title: Chains of Fury
item.description: Game Description Crazy shooterChains of Fury with completely destructible levels. Lost or lost in the corridors? Just destroy all the walls with a shotgun! Up to 80% of the entire location will be broken, which will give complete freedom of movement. But you can’t fight with concrete alone. Aliens robots, creepy monsters and huge bosses - all this will need to be turned into bloody stains on the concrete. The main character of “Chains of Fury” was a slightly distraught mercenary.

item.title: Enotria: The Last Song
item.description: Game Description Enotria: The Last Song is not your typical push-button machine. This action RPG throws you into a world bound by a twisted, timeless game. You take on the role of Maskless, a wild card free of the scripted roles that everyone else follows. What is your task? Challenge the powerful Authors who support this disorderly spectacle. Masks are the main thing. Each of them gives you its own role and a unique set of abilities.

item.title: Hands of Necromancy 2
item.description: Game Description Hands of Necromancy 2 is a dark fantasy first-person shooter that picks up where its predecessor left off. You can play as one of two characters, each with their own special abilities and spells. The game has reworked the necromancy system, so you can use new weapons and learn powerful spells. Transformations are important, allowing you to transform into various creatures to overcome obstacles and defeat enemies. The game has many different environments: ancient castles, dry deserts, beautiful villages and creepy caves.

item.title: Judero
item.description: Game Description Judero immerses you in the world of strategic decisions and tactical battles. The title combines elements of role-playing and strategy, requiring gamers to go through various challenges and opponents. Users must manage resources, create alliances and make important decisions that will affect the outcome of their journey. In Judero, users encounter a variety of characters, each with unique abilities and history. These characters can be recruited into the player’s team, giving them various tactical advantages in battle.

item.title: Starstruck: Hands of Time
item.description: Game Description Starstruck: Hands of Time is an action role-playing game with rhythm game elements. Immersed in a vibrant world, you need to pick up a guitar to explore the rich environment. At the center of the story are two child guitarists. They confront three villains who want to rewrite the history of the world. The gameplay is based on time travel. In the year 30XX, humanity will disappear from the face of the earth.

item.title: The Spell Brigade
item.description: Game Description The Spell Brigade is a cooperative online game in which gamers are united for battle with dark creatures. Title supports up to four players, which allows friends to join forces as wizards. Users encounter hordes of enemies, performing various command tasks. Here, special attention is paid to strategic cooperation and the creation of powerful combinations of spells. As you pass The Spell Brigade, users can open new improvements and abilities.

item.title: Trail of Ayash
item.description: Game Description The world ofTrail of Ayash is based on the myths and legends of the inhabitants. An open game location allows you to freely explore the area and learn more about the life of Native Americans. The player will encounter various tribes competing with each other, participating in diplomacy, organizing wars and expansion. The main character is Ayash, a respected man in his own faction. One day, a close person frames Ayash, and after that he is expelled from the tribe.

item.title: Train Yard Builder
item.description: Game Description Train Yard Builder invites gamers into a miniature world where they can build and manage their own train yards. With a diverse selection of trains and carriages, users can create unique and personalized collections. The title provides customization tools, allowing users to paint and decorate their trains, adding a personal touch to their creations. In addition to trains, users can design and decorate their yards. Using landscaping tools, they can build intricate paths and create beautiful surroundings.

item.title: Pyrene
item.description: Game Description Pyrene is a fast-paced roguelike dungeon-crawler in which gamers must plunge into the depths of hell and rebuild their home. With a variety of heroes and spells, users can experiment with different strategies and find their own unique approach to the game. As they progress, they will collect powerful relics to upgrade their deck, increasing their abilities and chances of survival. The narrative unfolds as users uncover the secrets behind the destruction of their village, adding depth to the gameplay.

item.title: Archons: Arena
item.description: Game Description Archons: Arena combines deckbuilding and RPG elements, throwing gamers into a harsh world where skill, equipment and tactics are crucial. There are several character classes, each with their own special abilities, allowing users to customize their style to suit their preferences. Whether you’re a secretive rogue, a stalwart knight, or a powerful sorcerer, there’s a class for you. The main mechanic is deckbuilding, in which gamers create their decks without any random elements.

item.title: Edge of Sanity
item.description: Game Description Edge of Sanity immerses you in a chilling narrative. It’s not just about surviving the rugged Alaskan wilderness, it’s about battling with your own sanity as the harsh conditions erode your sanity. Imagine: you are cold, hungry and lost. Night falls and the only thing keeping the encroaching darkness at bay is the flickering fire. But wait, is that a growl in the distance or just the wind playing with your already frayed nerves?

item.title: Head To Hell
item.description: Game Description Head To Hell begins with the main character waking up on a moving train with no memory of how he got there or what lies ahead. The only thing that gives any semblance of direction is a text message. Not the most pleasant thing when you’re on a train that never seems to stop. The message gives clues, but they are vague and mysterious, leaving the user guessing about what it really is.

item.title: Hollowbody
item.description: Game Description Hollowbody throws you headlong into the dark world of techno-noir. Imagine a short story, but you control the main character as he navigates a crumbling metropolis, a ghost town of a once bustling city. Forget the fancy graphics and pumping music, this is just an environmental story. Deserted streets and abandoned buildings speak volumes, whispering about a forgotten past. You wake up in this nightmare, ill-equipped and alone. Survival depends on your intelligence.

item.title: Lucky Tower Ultimate
item.description: Game Description Lucky Tower Ultimate combines roguelike mechanics with a unique sense of humor. Gamers move through a dangerous tower, where every item can be used as a weapon. Here users will have to get out of the tower, overcoming various obstacles and enemies. Procedurally generated levels make each playthrough different, so no two are alike. The main character, von Vanst, continues his adventures in this part. Comedy and strategic gameplay are mixed here.

item.title: Mexico, 1921. A Deep Slumber.
item.description: Game Description **Mexico, 1921. A Deep Slumber. **begins with gamers stepping into the shoes of Juan Aguirre, a young and ambitious photojournalist making his way through the streets of post-revolutionary Mexico City. At this time, the dust from the Mexican Revolution was just beginning to settle, and the political landscape was still in flux. Here users find themselves in the thick of things, following Juan, who is trying to uncover the truth about the murder of President Alvaro Obregon.

item.title: Nocturnals
item.description: Game Description Nocturnals is not your typical action thriller. Instead, he dives into the narrative, telling the story of Ted, a lonely soul stranded in the desert town of Ruddleside. Together with his newfound companion Diego, Ted fights for survival in a world devastated by an unknown force. The Heart is an exploration of the ghostly atmosphere of Ruddleside. No need to blow up aliens or collect coins, here you have to solve puzzles and reveal the secrets of the city.

item.title: Caravan Sandwitch
item.description: Game Description Caravan Sandwitch takes you to a fictional desert planet where the protagonist ends up as a result of a spaceship crash. The only thing that survived the fall was a small truck. It turns out that the new world is also inhabited by people who have exactly the same problems as on Earth. As part of the journey, the protagonist needs to explore a huge planet in search of secrets.

item.title: Drill Core
item.description: Game Description Drill Core throws you headlong into the unforgiving depths of alien planets. You are in charge, tasked with managing a motley crew of miners and security guards. Their task? Extract valuable minerals and maintain the drill in working condition. Every swing of the pickaxe, every mounted turret - everything depends on your decisions. One wrong move can spell disaster for your team and the entire mission. But hold on, sunshine and cosmic rainbows don’t last forever here.

item.title: Fealty
item.description: Game Description Fealty is a tactical turn-based strategy game that has gamers chasing the throne. The action takes place on a procedurally generated island, where a new location appears with each playthrough. At first glance, the goal is simple - to build your lands, expand power and force your rivals to bend the knee, but the adventure game does not let you off the hook so easily. From the very beginning, users have to think ahead.

item.title: Grapple Dogs: Cosmic Canines
item.description: Game Description Grapple Dogs: Cosmic Canines is a 2D action platformer that follows the adventures of Pablo and Luna. Users move through different dimensions, using unique abilities to overcome obstacles and enemies. It combines swinging, jumping and explosions to provide dynamic gameplay. In the title, gamers alternate between the characters Pablo and Luna. Pablo uses a grappling hook to progress through levels, while Luna brings her own set of skills to the table.

item.title: REKA
item.description: Game Description REKA is an atmospheric adventure game that takes you on a journey through the breathtaking nature of central Europe. Embarking on an adventure as a witch, you’ll wander through forests and swamps, collecting plants and creating magical items for the locals. Experience rural Europe in the late 19th century as you play as a herbalist witch traveling through the countryside with her homemade chicken-legged house. With an extensive witch’s cottage base building system, you can build and furnish your own witch’s house, making it unique with a variety of furniture and decorative elements.

item.title: Stardiver
item.description: Game Description The underwater world ofStardiver amazes with its diversity. Under the water column lies an entire civilization that has adapted to this way of existence so that other forms of life do not bother them and do not start wars. Nevertheless, for humanity, a planet completely covered with water turned out to be more than a curious subject of research. The main character is the head of a scientific group for the study of extraterrestrial forms of civilization.

item.title: Turbo Sliders Unlimited
item.description: Game Description Turbo Sliders Unlimited is an opportunity to plunge into racing competitions in multiplayer or single player mode, where users can tune cars. The gameplay is made in the form of arcade races with a top view, where users will compete with racers on various professional tracks. The game has a special editor, which allows you to design your own levels, locations, vehicles and flexibly customize tournament modes. In the multiplayer “Turbo Sliders Unlimited” up to 20 people (including observers) can participate simultaneously, which is suitable for creating e-sports tests.
