The main character is a teenage black kitten who got lost in a big city and now has to urgently find his way home.

item.title: Rabbit and Steel
item.description: Game Description Rabbit and Steel is a co-op action roguelike that will take you into epic battles. Choose your class, gather your bunny friends and fight to the top of Moon Peak. Months ago, all ties with the Moonlight Kingdom were severed. It is reported that the city’s residents are attacking all newcomers. Exploratory expeditions are repulsed or go missing. Every night, a huge white tower appears in the center of the city, reaching towards the stars.

item.title: Genome Guardian
item.description: Game Description Genome Guardian transfers gamers to the environment, where a microscopic becomes a scene for a high -octane action. This is a game where the usual meets the unusual, offering the world filled with microscopic organisms, some of which are harmless, while others are far from the case. A distinctive feature is that it is based on the mixing and selection of DNA nucleotides to create bio -weapons, which serves you the main protection from the hostile environment.

item.title: Hades 2
item.description: Game Description Hades II, the sequel to the award-winning roguelike dungeon crawler, takes players beyond the underworld. You play as Melina, a princess of the underworld who, using dark sorcery, battles the Titan of Time. Supergiant Games builds on the success of the original game with intense action and endless replayability. Explore a deeper mythical world rooted in Greek myth and witchcraft. The story unfolds through victories and failures, keeping you on your toes.

item.title: Card Engine
item.description: Game Description Card Engine offers an intuitive platform for creating custom cards, whether for games, collectibles, or personal projects. From the very beginning, users can immerse themselves in design without having any artistic experience. The program has a simple interface that allows you to quickly create maps. You can import images from your own collection or choose from a large library of assets. Built-in tools enable smooth and accessible map design.

item.title: Chrono Ark
item.description: Game Description Chrono Ark is a classic Japanese-style RPG adventure that supports high-resolution textures, but uses similar camera views and turn-based dialogue and battle system rendering. The story campaign is available for completion only in single-player mode; multiplayer is not provided in this project. The gameplay is based on gathering a team, which includes 4 characters, for further leveling up and creating an invincible squad, ready to fight on equal terms with all opponents presented in the locations of the bizarre Distorted World.

item.title: I Commissioned Some Mice 4
item.description: Game Description In the I Commissioned Some Mice 4, gamers have to find 750 hidden mice and 750 pieces of cheese scattered into 15 unique canvases. Each fantasy illustration is a search task, and all 15 levels are available from the very beginning of the game. Progress is monitored automatically: each found object after click is removed from the scene. The main goal is to systematically clear all the images from their hidden contents.

item.title: Footgun: Underground
item.description: Game Description Footgun: Underground throws you into a chaotic mix of football and roguelike action. You emerge from cryogenic sleep into a strange post-apocalyptic future, equipped with a cybernetic leg, a ball and amnesia. This underground world is infested with mutants, and your trusty ball is your only defense. Footgun: Underground offers a unique twist. Instead of swords, guns or magic, you rely solely on your ball skills. Think classic roguelike: explore procedurally generated rooms, fight a variety of creatures, and upgrade your gear.

item.title: Echoes of the Plum Grove
item.description: Game Description Echoes of the Plum Grove is a casual adventure that promises you to transfer you to the calm town of Hanwood, where a new life awaits you. But keep in mind, this is not an ordinary farm simulator! Get ready for surprises, because you have to build a flourishing farm community that will exist for many generations. You will begin your journey as a newly -made owner of a modest plot of land on the island.

item.title: MoonLight Pulse
item.description: Game Description MoonLight Pulse is an adventure action, the action of which takes place inside the biological systems of a colossal cosmic turtle. The player will send a team of healing agents in the surrealist world, protecting the arrangement of the alien parasites. The basis of the gameplay lies in instant switching between the heroes, which allows you to tactically apply their special movements and battle skills. The task will fail if at least one agent perish, but the members of the detachment can save each other out of dangerous situations.

item.title: Nordic ashes: Survivors of Ragnarok
item.description: Game Description Nordic ashes: survivors of ragnarok - Dynamic adventure with elements of action and simplified cuckle. The plot is inspired by Scandinavian legends and motives. The main character finds himself in a dangerous environment in which he will face hordes of enemy and deadly creatures. He needs to stay alive among hundreds of opponents and traps, gradually pumping his abilities and finding more powerful equipment. The central character will move between worlds, fight with powerful bosses, overcome traps and find objects of equipment.

item.title: POOLS
item.description: Game Description POOLS offers an unconventional gaming experience. Forget about blowing up aliens or conquering kingdoms. This is where exploration and atmosphere come to the fore. Imagine yourself in a huge, eerily empty water center. Sunlight barely breaks through the humid air, casting long shadows on the deserted tiled floor. The only sounds are your steps, reflected from the damp walls, and rare drops of water. There are no monsters or puzzles to overcome, just unsettling silence and frightening architecture.

item.title: Rusty's Retirement
item.description: Game Description Rusty’s Retirement allows players to experience farming on the go. Designed as a project for idlers, it allows you to manage a virtual farm while doing other things. Gamers take on the role of Rusty, a retired robot who tends to his crops. The game develops automatically: Rusty plants, waters and harvests crops without constant player interaction. As you progress, you can discover new cultures, adding variety to your virtual fields.

item.title: Another Crab's Treasure
item.description: Game Description Another Crab’s Treasure is an exciting underwater adventure created by AGGRO CRAB. You take on the role of a hermit crab named Creel, who goes on a dangerous treasure hunt to get back his stolen shell. In this unique underwater kingdom, on the verge of destruction, garbage is not only part of life, but also a valuable resource used to create fashionable outfits and weapons. However, with the garbage comes a mysterious danger - “slurry” - which threatens to destroy the entire ocean.

item.title: Minicology
item.description: Game Description Minicology drops you into a universe of tiny planets after a crash landing. This interstellar survival sandbox features crafting, combat, and automation. Travel through a procedurally generated universe, visiting a variety of planetary clusters with unique biomes. Build a base, defend against invaders, and even change the planets themselves using terraforming. Minicology encourages creative problem solving, from growing crops to fighting enemies. Gather resources, automate processes, and protect your water source.

item.title: The Hungry Lamb: Traveling in the Late Ming Dynasty
item.description: Game Description The Hungry Lamb: Traveling in the Late Ming Dynasty is a visual novel set in China during the turbulent reign of the Chongzhen Emperor. Players take on the role of Liang, a former merchant turned bandit tasked with escorting four girls to the prosperous city of Luoyang. The journey is fraught with danger and moral problems. Liang struggles with the truth behind his mission when one of the girls, Sui, reveals a terrifying secret: their goal is not a luxurious life, but an encounter with a monstrous pig demon.

item.title: Altushka for skufa
item.description: Game Description In the gameAltushka for skufa the state provides a tart for skufa through a special service using personal data. For men who have reached forty years of age, do not have a wife and have a stable outlook on life, the project provides the opportunity to receive a legal altushka through the online service Skufuslugi, using the password from your account. The game is an immersive first-person scoof simulator created by comic artist Vitaly Terletsky and the author of viral anime videos RIKANI in a short time.

item.title: Next Jianghu 2
item.description: Game Description Next Jianghu 2 offers a single-player adventure in an open martial arts world. The title emphasizes freedom of action through character development in a sandbox format, offering a plot of over 1 million words with dozens of possible endings. Gamers begin their journey by choosing one of a variety of unique backgrounds: scion of a general exploring the world, diligent scholar, wandering fighter, or young lady escaping an arranged marriage, with each line providing a significant, independent story.

item.title: Rauniot
item.description: Game Description Rauniot is an adventure quest presented in an old-school isometric perspective. Events take place in a post-apocalyptic alternative world of the past. Explore the mysterious lands of Northern Finland. In 1975, a large-scale disaster occurred that dealt a huge blow to civilization. Humanity has never recovered. Massive conflicts and wars have turned the once powerful human race into mere slaves of nature. The continents have been flooded by the oceans, and the remaining parts of the land are under poisonous waste from nuclear power plants.

item.title: Our Adventurer Guild
item.description: Game Description Guild in Our Adventurer Guild puts you in the shoes of a new guild master. Inherit a struggling fortress and change it for the better. Complete quests to increase your reputation and send heroes to explore and fight. Manage your team carefully and monitor their morale and relationships. The game features turn-based tactical combat on a grid. Fight a variety of enemies with unique abilities. The Bravery system allows you to push your protagonists to potential excellence, but at the risk of them cracking under the pressure.

item.title: Infection Free Zone
item.description: Game Description Infection Free Zone is a strategic survival game where the player will be responsible for the last remnants of humanity and try to return them to power, at least over the city. All resources are very limited and population expansion is both good and catastrophic, since the consumption of all food increases significantly, which means it is necessary to expand territories and increase production. All the rooms around can be used for your own purposes, restored for comfort, or inventing new uses for them.

item.title: Underspace
item.description: Game Description Underspace is an adventure action in the open world. The gameplay proposes to explore the open spaces of the open space, fighting with other combat shuttles, alien creatures, etc. Take the trading and pumping of your own ship. Openvorld Underspace is fully created manually. Each star system includes its own characteristics and biomes. You have to explore the galaxy called CROFT. You can go to the adventure as alone, so with friends.

item.title: Spirit City: Lofi Sessions
item.description: Game Description Spirit City: Lofi Sessions is not an ordinary adventure game. It combines game elements and practical tools to improve focus and reduce stress. You will find yourself in a virtual world filled with a variety of activities, the essence of which comes down to collecting and interacting with spirits. These aren’t just pretty additions to your virtual homes - they play an important role in achieving the goal of making you more productive.

item.title: The Lost Village
item.description: Game Description InThe Lost Village you have to restore a once great sect. You take on the role of the heir to a leader who has returned to an abandoned mountain and is tasked with restoring it to its former glory. The game combines a management simulator with roguelike elements. Gamers will guide students by collecting resources, building structures and cultivating the land. Students have unique personalities and talents, allowing assignments to be specialized.

item.title: Buckshot Roulette
item.description: Game Description Two enter, one leaves. That’s the motto ofBuckshot Roulette, a horror game that takes the classic game of Russian Roulette and turns it into a high-stakes shotgun game. Immerse yourself in the dark atmosphere of an underground nightclub, where metal railings beat to the beat of forgotten drum kits and the stakes couldn’t be higher. This is not Russian roulette. This is where you swap the revolver for a 12 gauge shotgun, because shotguns are just better, right?

item.title: Moorhuhn - Crazy Chicken Traps and Treasures
item.description: Game Description Moorhuhn - Crazy Chicken Traps and Treasures is a fast-paced arcade adventure full of danger and ancient secrets, set in an impenetrable jungle. On the way to his cherished goal, the main character is confronted not only by ingenious traps, but also by a whole string of colorful opponents. The path is blocked by evil gorillas, ferocious crocodiles, mysterious shamans and even forest spirits, along with aliens stuck in the thicket.

item.title: SILENT BREATH
item.description: Game Description SILENT BREATH is a new survival game that takes gamers into a mysterious forest. Here, the unknown lurks around every corner, making exploration a tense and uncertain experience. Users take on the role of search engines tasked with finding missing people in this mysterious forest. The journey will not be a cakewalk; it requires strategic thinking and nerves of steel to overcome the challenges that lurk among the trees.

item.title: Quit Today
item.description: Game Description QUIT TODAY is a 2D sid-screen in the action genre with a setting of a corporate workplace. The plot starts on ordinary morning, when the central character enters the office and finds out that all colleagues are confident in his imminent dismissal. Employees perceive this as a betrayal and communicate with him. First, the hero fights off his portfolio, trying to figure out what is happening. Upon learning of the dark affairs in the company, he decides to break through all departments with a battle in order to submit an application for care.

item.title: Touhou Hero of Ice Fairy
item.description: Game Description Touhou Hero of Ice Fairy introduces the user to a fairy-tale universe inhabited by beautiful princesses, fairies, majestic heroes and, of course, very dangerous universal evil that is unable to leave the world alone. The main character is a warrior named Tuohou Cirno - he serves the very kind heir to the throne of Gansoke. She is such a bright person that even birds and butterflies dance around her when she goes out into nature.

item.title: Mouthole
item.description: Game Description Mouthole - adventure game combines the study elements with complex tasks, requiring navigation from confusing routes to open and unraveling secrets from gamers. The project will require people to manage temporary resources, while solving everyday problems. The fundamental prerequisite includes literal penetration into its own mouth. Inside, the Mouthole environment offers a variety of directions for the action of the user and their consequences. Individuals determine how to spend their limited time, choosing specific classes and research lines.

item.title: Saviorless
item.description: Game Description Saviorless is an impressive action-platformer set in a fantasy setting, featuring unique characters, beautiful hand-crafted graphics, and a gripping story. You will go on a difficult adventure to save your life on the mysterious and dangerous Smiling Islands. Immerse yourself in a world filled with mystery and darkness, where you will find incredible enemies and many mysteries to solve in order to survive. You will be able to enjoy stunning animation and an emotional soundtrack that will accompany you throughout your journey.

item.title: Content Warning
item.description: Game Description Content Warning throws players into the world of horror content creation. Team up with friends, create your own pixelated face using the in-game ASCII customizer, and grab your gear. Then descend into the spooky Old World using the diving bell. The Old World is crawling with creepy, physics-based monsters and cursed relics just waiting to be captured on camera. Capture as much creepy content as you can before you run out of oxygen, your camera dies, or worse, your friends become fodder for the monsters.

item.title: Aquarist
item.description: Game Description Aquarist is an immersive simulator that allows you to enter the world of aquariums. Build your aquarium empire by stocking up on shelving, quality glass, rare fish species and much more. Constantly update and improve your store, attracting visitors. Watch the development of the fish, cross species, feed them and make sure they don’t get sick. Aquarist allows you to build your own personal aquarium paradise! If the fish dies, pick up a net and remove the dead body so as not to infect other cold-blooded fish in the aquarium.

item.title: Knowledge, or know Lady
item.description: Game Description Knowledge, or know Lady throws you into the heart of a unique dating simulator. As the only guy at an all-girl university, you’ll find yourself caught up in a whirlwind of romance and college life. Will you succumb to the charms of the beauties around you or forge your own path to become a campus legend? Ladies School Prince unfolds through your eyes, offering a first-person perspective. Your

item.title: BulWark: Falconeer Chronicles
item.description: Game Description The town -planning simulator Bulwark: Falconeer Chronicles transfers the user to a fantasy universe called the Great Ursa. This project proposes to build powerful fortresses and strongholds from literally improvised materials. In addition, it will be necessary to act on not classic hills and plains, where fortifications were actually built, but on the peaks of mountain peaks that look frightening for any enemy and siege guns. Bulwark: Falconeer Chronicles offers absolute freedom of action to gamers and the architectural style of buildings can be limited only to their imagination.

item.title: Geneforge 2 - Infestation
item.description: Game Description GeneForge 2 - Infestation invites players to a unique role -playing adventure, developing concepts presented in its predecessor. In a world where shepers have the ability to create life forms and manipulate them, in the center of the narrative - the search for the protagonist who is trying to find out the reason for an incomprehensible infection. This infection is jealous of environmental stability and the balance of forces between the factions.

item.title: Rise of Gun
item.description: Game Description Rise of Gun invites gamers to immerse themselves in a post-apocalyptic world where survival depends not only on finding food or fighting zombies, but also on the ability to create weapons from garbage. After a global epidemic turns most of humanity into mindless undead, the protagonist, having lost everything, sets off on a journey to find other survivors. Along the way, he stumbles upon a settlement in which there is hope for the restoration of civilization.

item.title: Scarlet Tower
item.description: Game Description In Scarlet Tower, players have to take control of brave hunters who will hunt down and destroy crowds of evil spirits and other monsters that live in a fantasy world, thus earning their living. You will enjoy the gameplay mechanics, made in the form of an action RPG with roguelike elements. You need to pump up your character and gradually strengthen his combat characteristics and equipment, and also face creatures in battles using a wide range of skills.

item.title: Machick
item.description: Game Description Machick puts a player against the organized force of anti -magic toads aimed at destroying the forest. The main task is to stop this army and regain control of the territory. The gameplay is built on the cycle: Gamer creates personal magic sticks, crushes enemies and gets experience from them. The experience gained is to buy improvements that allow each attempt to move further deep into the conflict. The whole trip is a process of collecting resources to approach the ultimate goal.

item.title: Midnight Ghost Hunt
item.description: Game Description Midnight Ghost Hunt is a creepy version of hide and seek in which players will have to catch ghosts or, on the contrary, drive away people who disturbed the peace of the spirits. 4v4 confrontation takes place between friends or random users. The main task of the hunters is to catch all the evil spirits with the help of their equipment, and the ghosts are to kill all living things by any means.

item.title: Momo and the Mine
item.description: Game Description Momo and the Mine sends a mole-protagonist to a dangerous, abandoned network of dungeons for collecting matches. The player will have to conduct a character through a series of difficult jumping tests, where accuracy is the key to survival. The gameplay requires accurate movement through the hostile surroundings filled with ghosts of tunnels. Success directly depends on mastering responsive controls to overcome each obstacle in the dilapidated structure of the mine, which creates a constant test of skill.

item.title: Scott Whiskers in: the Search for Mr. Fumbleclaw
item.description: Game Description Scott Whiskers in: the Search for Mr. Fumbleclaw is a point-and-click adventure game based on the adventures of cat and science fiction lover Scott Whiskers. The story begins with the mysterious disappearance of Mr. Fumbleclave, a distinguished cat who is scheduled to compete in an upcoming feline beauty contest. This situation prompts Scott to go on a quest, during which he passes through various locations, each of which has its own characteristics.

item.title: Bingle Bingle
item.description: Game Description Bingle Bingle is a unique roulette maker that allows you to create your own roulette to achieve incredible results. The passage begins with a basic wheel and a simple ball, but each successful round opens up new opportunities for modifications. By earning points for successful spins, gamers gain access to upgrades for their inventory. This process requires careful planning after each step. The main goal is to build an effective strategy that allows you to create powerful synergies.

item.title: Lightyear Frontier
item.description: Game Description Lightyear Frontier offers farming in a completely open world. In the farmer simulator, you are asked to explore the planet, create your own home, upgrade your transport, growing various non-standard types of plants in order to provide yourself with resources. Multiplayer is implemented here with a capacity of up to 4 gamers. The game has a well-developed storyline, where you will learn about the mysterious past of the world by studying the ruins of buildings created by unknown creatures.

item.title: Raw Metal
item.description: Game Description In Raw Metal, in the desert regions of the exoplanet Charybdis, a lone scavenger embarks on a treacherous journey. Their target: Battery 6, a vast mining complex run by the corrupt megacorporation Orpheus Tech. Welcome to a sci-fi stealth action dungeon crawler that combines fluid gameplay with high stakes. Your mission as a scavenger is clear: infiltrate Base 6, recover the equipment, and challenge the oppressive regime. Shadows hide your movements, and you’ll need every trick to slip past the guards.

item.title: Mythical Mayhem
item.description: Game Description Mythical Mayhem is an exciting game where heroes from neighboring kingdoms battle formidable enemies and villains. With a wide variety of scenarios to choose from, as well as the ability to create your own game using unlocked decks, the possibilities are endless. The focus here isn’t just on building a powerful deck. It also involves skillful management of the strengths and weaknesses of each kingdom. Balancing states becomes a crucial factor in the progression process, given their interaction with each other.

item.title: Backpack Battles
item.description: Game Description Backpack Battles is a unique PvP game where everything depends on the contents of your backpack. Forget about deft kicking or pressing buttons - here, winning is achieved by assembling the perfect bag arsenal. The core gameplay revolves around purchasing and arranging items in your inventory. These items come in different shapes, sizes and rarities, presenting a strategic puzzle as you put them together for maximum effectiveness. Don’t limit yourself to simply stockpiling - by combining these items, you can unlock even more powerful equipment, such as brewing a potion or forging a legendary weapon.

item.title: Barbotine
item.description: Game Description Barbotine is an experimental horror, the plot of which tells the story of the creepy seven-day transformation of the protagonist. After an unfortunate incident at a party, the hero falls ill and his body begins to undergo grotesque changes. In parallel with the physical mutations, the surrounding reality is also distorted: the familiar apartment becomes an increasingly strange and hostile place every day. Surreal visual images and a disturbing atmosphere plunge you into a state of increasing anxiety, making you feel alienated from your own body and the world around you.

item.title: Between the Stars
item.description: Game Description In Between the Stars, a space simulator, the gamer discovers new territories, fights with numerous opponents and upgrades his own ship. The hero’s goal is to save the Interstellar Republic. The game has procedural generation of the environment, enemies and stations. The protagonist’s universe is suffering from attacks from the Children of the Sun clan. Enemy representatives have appeared from other worlds and are trying to capture these spaces.

item.title: Dawnsbury Days
item.description: Game Description Dawnsbury Days provides a turn-based tactical RPG experience based on the PF2E ruleset, a system derived from tabletop entertainment under the Open Game License. Gamers take control of four childhood friends as they embark on their first meaningful adventures in this strategic environment. The main goal requires protecting the characters' hometown from many dangers that threaten its stability. Gameplay mechanics emphasize grid positioning and calculated combat, stemming directly from the established rules system.

item.title: Quilts and Cats of Calico
item.description: Game Description Quilts & Cats of Calico is a unique, warm and cozy puzzle game. Here you will have the opportunity to work as a tailor and create a unique quilt from scraps. Combine colors and patterns on your scraps to not only score points, but also attract cute cats who will decide where to snooze on your creation. If you’re a board game fan, you’ll be happy to know that this is a digital version of the already beloved board game.

item.title: KeepUp Survival
item.description: Game Description KeepUp Survival is a realistic survival simulator set on a long-abandoned island. The main characters, brother and sister, traveled with the crew on a large ship transporting containers. As a result of a storm, the ship is in distress and the protagonists are thrown ashore, after which they lose consciousness. Then one of them disappears, and the second must be found. But the task is not so simple, because the island is teeming with dangers.

item.title: The Outlast Trials
item.description: Game Description The Outlast Trials - first-person horror game in the Outlast universe. The difference from the main series is that you can play both alone and in a company. At the center of the story is the Murkoff company, which is engaged in inhumane and sadistic experiments. You will play as one of these crazy organizations. You can join forces with up to 4 people and try to survive this nightmare together.

item.title: Mortal Glory 2
item.description: Game Description Mortal Glory 2 is a fantasy RPG in the Roguelike genre, which combines a step -by -step tactical battle and team management. It is proposed to be in the role of the leader of the team of wandering gladiators, and your ultimate goal is to take part in the tournament, the victory in which guarantees glory and wealth. One of the main features of the game is the variety of available races, each of which has its own unique advantages and disadvantages.

item.title: ChronoDojo
item.description: Game Description ChronoDojo is a co-op adventure in which a group of humble heroes embark on a journey through time to save the world. Under the guidance of their mentor Sensei, the characters will have to master the martial art of Chrono-Fu. Their headquarters is ChronoDojo itself, a martial arts school that can travel between eras and doubles as a tea house. You will have to confront waves of bizarre enemies in three different historical periods, using unique abilities and well-coordinated teamwork.

item.title: Secrets of Grindea
item.description: Game Description Secrets of Grindea is an interesting adventure game in which you will need to take control of a hero and go on a long journey through a huge fantasy world in search of new adventures. The game begins with character generation. You will have to create it, change its appearance using an advanced editor, and then decide on the basic skills. After this, you can begin to explore the world around you.

item.title: LOLI RACING
item.description: Game Description LOLI RACING is a dynamic arcade racing game in which anime characters compete for championship on a variety of tracks. The project invites gamers to plunge into the world of high-speed racing, where not only reflexes play a key role, but also the ability to enter a controlled skid. The competition takes place on 38 unique tracks, each with its own style, from Japanese temples and historical sites to futuristic metropolises and urban landmarks in Taiwan.

item.title: Spiritfall
item.description: Game Description Spiritfall - an action -platformer with elements of a sling, which is based on the gameplay of which is a worked out combat system. It will be necessary to beat enemies, chop everything in their path and throw enemies into the wall. The gameplay is released by speed and concentrated dynamics. Opponents attack every second. At the end of the stage, a fight with a unique boss is waiting.

item.title: Primitive Society Simulator
item.description: Game Description Primitive Society Simulator will transfer you to the inexorable cradle of civilization. In the role of the leader of the ancient tribe, you will lead your people through the torment of the prehistoric period, controlling the subtle dance between survival and progress. Guided by Chinese legends, Primitive Society Simulator echoes Rimworld and Dawn of Man. You will move to those days when every sunrise was like victory, and every hunt is the risk of extinction.

item.title: Sons of the Forest
item.description: Game Description Sons of The Forest is a first-person multiplayer horror game with survival elements. The game is a sequel to the acclaimed hit The Forest. As in the previous part, you need to explore a mysterious forest inhabited by bloodthirsty monsters. Survive by hiding from enemies and carefully study the surrounding areas. Arm yourself with powerful weapons to face numerous opponents. The story centers on a special forces soldier with a Fight Demons tattoo.

item.title: Last Epoch
item.description: Game Description Last Epoch is an action-adventure game with a deep leveling system in a dark style, gameplay repeating the legendary Diablo. The camera view is also taken from there, it is isometric for a better overview of the surrounding areas. The story campaign for one person (multiplayer is not provided) invites you to explore the rich world of Eterra, with various picturesque places and dark dungeons. It contains many different oddities, secrets, many demons and other fiends of hell.

item.title: Myth of Empires
item.description: Game Description The goal ofMyth of Empires is to teach the user to fight for their own place in a huge world. The game is positioned as a multiplayer sandbox in which the user creates an Empire, forming troops that participate in massive battles and sieges of cities, and also builds their own fortresses for defense. The action takes place in the East during the era of antiquity, when many states constantly fought among themselves, which led to chaos, famine and destruction.

item.title: Pacific Drive
item.description: Game Description Pacific Drive is an atmospheric car survival adventure in the Olympic Exclusion Zone. Here you will not find the usual racing tracks, but there will be supernatural dangers waiting for you that will make you very tense. The only chance of salvation is your car, which will have to be strengthened and improved throughout the game. You will have to look for resources in abandoned laboratories, set up a base in the garage, research new spare parts and construct new stations.

item.title: Rail Route
item.description: Game Description Rail Route is an economic simulator in which the user will encounter railway dispatching. Training will help you understand difficult mechanics and terms. The passage begins with a small railway system with limited terrain. The player will have to expand the paths, increase profits by creating new roads, shortening them and using different chips. To improve business, you can accept new train contracts, modernize trains and modify the railway network.

item.title: Supermarket Simulator
item.description: Game Description Supermarket Simulator puts you in the shoes of a retailer tasked with reviving abandoned grocery stores. Roll up your sleeves and get ready to breathe new life into forgotten stalls. First of all, assess the damage. Broken freezers? Leaky windows? Collapsing shelves? Throw away what’s irreparable and develop a repair strategy for the rest. Imagine a bright future filled with colorful products - this will become the basis of your renovation plan.

item.title: Balatro
item.description: Game Description Balatro - the word “poker” crackles with energy, whispering promises of high stakes and cunning deals. This poker roguelike beckons players into a deck-building odyssey where bluffing becomes the spell and chips become your lifeblood. Forget about limping into pots with low pairs. Here you create powerful synergies by weaving intricate combinations that unleash explosive power. Valid poker hands dance with unique wild cards, their abilities changing the course of the game like a magician.

item.title: Fossilfuel 2
item.description: Game Description Fossilfuel 2 throws players into a flooded research center in Alaska, teeming with prehistoric predators. Jack Allen, a participant in the ill -fated expedition, must pave his way through dangerous puzzles, flooded tunnels and frightening darkness. Armed with the arsenal of deadly weapons, gamers pave their way through dinosaurs in terrible details on the Unreal Engine 5 engine. Equipment for underwater swimming becomes necessary when players plunge into underwater sections, confronts water threats along with their ground colleagues.

item.title: Craftomation 101: Programming and Craft
item.description: Game Description CraftMATION 101: Programming and Craft offers to gamers to be on an unknown planet, in the company of the right robot and many mechanisms that will help you make it viable. You will find endless opportunities for the extraction and combination of resources, programming robots, creating tools and terraforming the planet. You can create your own army of robots that will work for you, collect resources, perform tasks and even create new robots.

item.title: Furnish Master
item.description: Game Description Furnish Master’s gameplay focuses on furnishing apartments, furnishing houses, and improving other commercial properties. The player is even able to take care of the local areas, installing on them the objects he wishes. The project allows you to realize any designer’s dreams thanks to hundreds of objects and things. The user will purchase real estate, which will gradually generate profit. Money is needed in order to expand your own business and buy furniture to place inside your home.

item.title: Medieval Machines Builder
item.description: Game Description Medieval Machines Builder transfers players to the era of constant siege, where their innovative valor is their greatest weapon. As a novice ballistic engineer, you must develop a concept, collect resources and build the most powerful and destructive machines known in the Medieval War. The fate of many conquered castles will depend on the effectiveness of these devices. You start from scratch, but as your inventions come true and prove their effectiveness in battle, you get experience.

item.title: Nexus Defenders
item.description: Game Description Nexus Defenders involves deploying a varied arsenal of towers to stop invading enemy forces. The player augments these stationary fortifications with special abilities such as napalm strikes, EMP blasts, and orbital lasers. Real-time tactical action combined with a visual novel structure. By making decisions in branching dialogues, you can directly influence the development of the plot and its central conflicts, thereby shaping the further course of the narrative. The story of Nexus Defenders follows a newly minted captain tasked with protecting the planet after the Spinal Nexus is suddenly compromised.

item.title: Blaz Blue Entropy Effect
item.description: Game Description BlazBlue Entropy Effect is a 2D adventure game set in the BlazBlue universe, but with a different genre and style than previous fighting games. It features roguelite elements such as procedurally generated maps, permadeath, and character customization. There is also a rich plot with several endings depending on the choice of the gamer. In the game you can choose one of seven unique characters, each of which has its own abilities and character.

item.title: Smalland: Survive the Wilds
item.description: Game Description InSmalland: Survive the Wilds the player takes on the role of a hero who has been diminished under unexplained circumstances. The protagonist woke up in the forest, not knowing whether other people had the same fate. With a head full of questions, he begins a struggle whose goal is not only to find out the truth, but, above all, to survive in a new inhospitable world. The player watches what is happening from the first person.

item.title: News Tower
item.description: Game Description News Tower transports gamers to the bustling streets of 1930s New York, where the world of newspaper publishing becomes the stage for a complex game of strategy and decision-making. The action takes place at a time when the country was experiencing major social and political changes, and users are asked to take on the role of a newspaper publisher. The challenge is to manage a successful operation while balancing the rapidly changing demands of the media industry and navigating the complexities of the era.

item.title: Airhead
item.description: Game Description Airhead differs from other metroidvanias in that you have to play with two creatures at once. The plot is told through silent cutscenes. The body falls into the abyss and ends up in the caves. A mysterious humanoid, while exploring a dungeon, suddenly finds a dying head after being attacked by a machine. And not simple, but airy and living separately. He teams up with her and becomes Airhead.

item.title: Touhou Danmaku Kagura Phantasia Lost
item.description: Game Description Touhou Danmaku Kagura Phantasia Lost is a rhythm -game built on the foundation of his predecessor. Two different rhythm games have to be passed: traditional and innovative. In Kagura, players check their skills in repulsing the fingers of notes, sequentially hitting six paths. Combinations accumulate with each successful press, which leads to high points. This mode presents more than 160 popular arrangements at four levels of complexity, which will allow you to cope with the task of both beginners and experienced rhythm veterans.

item.title: Arms Trade Tycoon: Tanks
item.description: Game Description ARMS TRADE TYCOON: Tanks is a full -fledged simulation of the life of a magnate, managing the beginner company in trade and distribution of weapons. The company specializes in the creation and sale of tanks, on the technical characteristics of which the user will work. The game allows you to create unique engineering solutions by exploring new technologies and production methods. It is necessary to engage in the formation of the history of tank wars, where the created cars will be involved.

item.title: Hellcard
item.description: Game Description Hellcard is made in the same style as the original book of demons. Their universe is also common. The first game was a simplified diabloid and narrated about the fight against evil awakened in the catacombs under the city. The spin-off changed the genre, turning from Hack and Slash into a step-by-step card RPG. One of the chips in the form of cardboard graphics has not gone away. The elements of the sideline remained.

item.title: Legendary Hoplite
item.description: Game Description Legendary Hoplite uses a setting inspired by Greek mythology. The project has its own history, lore and secrets that are revealed as you earn achievements. In the story, Odysseus, who returned from Troy, did not rule Ithaca for long, because he was killed by his own illegitimate son. After this, the city-state was besieged by legions of the dead. Dio volunteered to defend the policy. The young commander can build objects, summon units, use ordinary equipment and use artifacts blessed by the ancient gods themselves.

item.title: GU LONG FENGYUN LU
item.description: Game Description GU LONG FENGYUN LU is a massive martial arts RPG based on the classic works of Gu Long, the famous Chinese writer. The plot tells about the turbulent times of the end of the Ming Dynasty, when various heroes and factions fought for power and glory. The main character is Feng Yun, a young martial artist traveling across the country, encountering friends, enemies, love, hate, loyalty and betrayal.

item.title: My Recycling Center
item.description: Game Description My Recycling Center puts you in the place of the owner of the waste processing enterprise, which is instructed to sort, compact and ultimately turn garbage into valuable resources. In this first -person simulator, you will plunge with your head into the world of waste management. Clients arrive with various loads - from crumpled paper to bulky furniture. Your task is to quickly evaluate and sort their garbage to special containers.

item.title: Murders on the Yangtze River
item.description: Game Description Murders on the Yangtze River takes you to early 20th century China. Think “Ace Attorney” and historical detective. Channel your inner Sherlock Holmes as you unravel a series of mysterious cases along the banks of the legendary Yangtze River. Step into the shoes of John Shen, a law student turned detective. Grief and a thirst for justice force him to return to China after his brother’s mysterious death is ruled a suicide.

item.title: Twilight Oracle
item.description: Game Description Twilight Oracle invites users to embark on a whimsical journey of adventure and discovery. This point-and-click fantasy comedy game puts users in the shoes of Leo, a student with an unusual talent for underwater breathing. As Leo, the quest begins on a desert island, gradually uncovering layers of secrets surrounding his school’s hidden past. The action takes place in a richly detailed world that offers a combination of exploration and puzzle solving.

item.title: Project 13
item.description: Game Description Project 13 immerses players in the life of a probant, one person from many people stolen and enslaved by the structure, known as the group of project 13. deprived of the right to choose and is considered consumer material, the subject will be crossed by the corridor of a psychiatric hospital, which is constantly bocked. With the first -person view, the main task for subjects is the discovery of inconsistencies of the environment during their forced rounds.

item.title: A night at the Watermill
item.description: Game Description A Night at the Watermill represents to gamers a narrative experience unfolding in an old water mill. Waking up, the players find themselves in an unfamiliar environment, fighting amnesia about their arrival. The task is to navigate in space, solve puzzles and collect a plot line that connects the protagonist with a water mill. Each interaction reveals more information about the circumstances of the character’s life and the secrets surrounding him.

item.title: Rogue Fable IV
item.description: Game Description Rogue Fable IV is the latest installment in the long-running rogue series. This iteration manages to strike a balance between complexity and brevity, offering gamers a focused yet deep experience. The goal is simple: navigate the Dungeons of Fate, a dangerous labyrinth full of traps, enemies and secrets, in pursuit of the legendary Cup of Yendor. This cup, a coveted artifact, is believed to grant immortality or drive madness to those who seek it.

item.title: Underdogs
item.description: Game Description Underdogs - this is the Title in virtual reality, in which gamers fall into the very heart of the gloomy Cyberpanovsky world, where the fight of the furs reigns. The project does not hold back itself, pushing you with fierce enemies in cruel contractions. From the very first minutes, gamers plunge into the world of risk, where every step can mean the difference between life and death. Here you need to not just fight, but survive in conditions when the danger lurks around every angle.

item.title: Anomaly Agent
item.description: Game Description Anomaly Agent is a fast-paced 2D action platformer that places players in the heart of a bustling cyberpunk metropolis. As the titular character, Anomaly, players take on the role of an agent on a mission to investigate and eliminate temporary anomalies wreaking havoc on the city. The narrative unfolds gradually, revealing a complex web of interconnected areas with their own unique challenges and mysteries. At the core of Anomaly Agent’s appeal is its innovative combat system, which relies on Anomaly’s unique ability to manipulate time.

item.title: Enshrouded
item.description: Game Description Enshrouded is an exciting game set in the kingdom of Embervale, taking players on an exciting journey through a land once devastated by a devastating magical plague. The user will have to explore the remnants of the lost kingdom, fight mutated creatures and unravel the mysterious secrets of the ancient Flame. One of the distinctive features of the project is the emphasis on the independence of the hero.

item.title: The Universim
item.description: Game Description A simulator of city construction, the development of an entire planet and a ward civilization -The Universim is a short sand strategy in which you have to try on the role of God. The game begins with the fact that you settle several people on one of the planets, give them food, indicate what needs to be done - set priorities. And then watch how people develop on their own, without your help.

item.title: Snake Crush
item.description: Game Description Snake Crush begins after the death of a ghostly dragon, an event that breaks the passage between the world of people and the world of spirits, releasing the flow of power. A powerful influx of mystical energy and dark forces fills the metropolis, giving power to countless monsters and demons, who again carry destruction. The Bureau of Investigations, a special organization, is forced to intervene in this anomaly and sends its agents that are most resistant to unbridled energy.

item.title: Gordian Rooms 2: A curious island
item.description: Game Description Gordian Rooms 2: A curious island takes the player to a mysterious island that will need to be explored and its mysteries revealed. The second part continues the story of the first, where the main character gets to the main secrets of the Gordian society. In the gameplay you will need to solve puzzles, explore various territories and communicate with minor characters who will help with their valuable information.

item.title: Once upon a Dungeon 2
item.description: Game Description Once upon a Dungeon 2 is a continuation of the indie roguelike with new elements and mechanics in the gameplay. The developer took into account many errors in the creation of the first part, changing most of the process in this project. The user will play the role of a powerful fighter who will have to travel through dark dungeons and fight cold-blooded creatures. As the game progresses, the main character obtains equipment and consumables.

item.title: Palworld
item.description: Game Description Palworld offers you to find and use friends as helpers in a huge and dangerous world. The multiplayer survival game has elements of crafting, and the creatures themselves, discovered by the user in the process, become his pet friends, which help him at all stages of the passage, including the ability to move on them, construct buildings, engage in farming, production, and explore dungeons. The user finds himself in a virtual universe inhabited by bizarre animal creatures, which in this world are simply called Friends.

item.title: Rising Lords
item.description: Game Description Rising Lords presents a mixture of a strategy with a card game in medieval setting. Fights are implemented using step -by -step mechanics. The player collects slaves and uses them for his personal purposes. As in any economic strategy, the gameplay is based on the collection of resources and taxes. The player is free to set the amount of duties depending on the solvency of units. It is required to set tasks and work to the peasants for the whole day.

item.title: Stay
item.description: Game Description STAY tells of the maid motel Kes, plunging into the abyss of obsession and horror. The unknown is imbued with a dangerous sympathy for her and begins the affair campaign with letters. Correspondence becomes a threatening character, forcing the kes to enter into a dangerous game of survival against an invisible, but relentless threat. The narrative unfolds in the walls of its secluded workplace, creating a claustrophobic atmosphere for subsequent events, and the decisions made determine the finale.

item.title: All Quiet in the Trenches
item.description: Game Description In All Quiet in the Trenches, gamers find themselves in the complex environment of the First World War. The title revolves around managing a group of soldiers during a war, balancing the harsh realities of the battlefield with the personal needs of the men under your command. Users take on the role of a German non-commissioned officer, a non-commissioned officer, and control a unit in the trenches. Combining tactical decisions and human interaction, the title unfolds through a series of decisions that affect the fate of soldiers.

item.title: Dogs Huddled Together
item.description: Game Description Dogs Huddled Together has to solve puzzles where each fragment is a separate figure of a dog. The main task is to combine these dog forms drawn by hand using a mouse to compose a whole picture. In total, the game of 32 levels that differ in the number of unique elements. Gamers move parts along the two -dimensional field, placing each in their place to complete the image.

item.title: New Cycle
item.description: Game Description New Cycle is a dark city building sim and colony management simulator. This project is made in a post-apocalyptic setting. It takes place in the near future, where people are divided into tribes. In the story, after a powerful solar flare, the planet plunged into chaos. The player is offered to create a new civilization on the ruins of the old one and restore the unity of humanity. The user leads a group of survivors.

item.title: Just Click The Button
item.description: Game Description Just Click The Button is an unusual project where the central element is a single button, and pressing it multiple times launches a whole chain of gameplay transformations. The whole process comes down to a choice between endless development and the desire to achieve one of the four available endings. The path to each of the finals directly depends on the chosen strategy. The combination of acquired abilities determines the ease of passing and achieving a specific outcome, which encourages the deliberate formation of your style.

item.title: House Builder
item.description: Game Description House Builder begins with a monologue about how a person must do three things in life: plant a tree, conceive a son, and build a house. In the gameplay you cannot grow plants and have children, but the main character is able to build countless houses, mansions or other establishments. The player will play the role of a builder and will build houses: typical African huts or ultra-modern architectural wonders.

item.title: KinitoPET
item.description: Game Description KinitoPET promises a world of endless fun and communication with your virtual assistant Kinito. This early 2000s wonder can walk, talk, browse, adapt, and play games, making him a friend like no other. But beneath the surface of this seemingly perfect companion lies a disturbing truth. Step into “Eternal Fun!”, and Kinito will become your personal assistant, ready to fulfill your every request. Its cutting-edge technology promises a “truly unique experience” designed just for you.

item.title: Dino Hazard: Chronos Blackout
item.description: Game Description Dino Hazard: Chronos Blackout - an adventure action in which a group of people falls on a tropical island equipped with high -tech objects. The territory is governed by AI, which produces a huge number of combat robots and artificially nurtures of dinosaurs. The game is made in the Cyberpanus setting and contains elements of metroid. Once on the island, it must be examined by opening the results of a monstrous experiment.

item.title: World Warfare and Economics
item.description: Game Description World Warfare and Economics is a fascinating and large -scale strategy that offers to take control of any country on Earth, finding himself at the helm of world history. Having the opportunity to manage politics, economics and the armed forces of the country, players go through many trials, including the impending ghost of the Third World War, the inexorable procession of global pandemia and even scenarios created at their own discretion.

item.title: The enjenir
item.description: Game Description The Enjenir is a funny simulator based on physics in which players get used to the role of a clumsy Stone Age Engineer. This is a sandbox where you can build without restrictions and create unique structures using a wide selection of building materials and your own unique approach to design. In this game, you are not limited by standard construction methods - give the will to your imagination and create unusual, complex and functional constructions.

item.title: House Flipper 2
item.description: Game Description House Flipper 2 is a real gift for those who like to improve and create something new! Forget about boring and monotonous tasks - here you will find many new mechanics and features. Buy an abandoned building and give it a new life! Or maybe you prefer to build your ideal home from scratch? Everything is possible here, and they will show you how it’s done! Get back to your favorite tools - hammer, paint roller, squeegee, and let’s get to work!

item.title: Ready or Not
item.description: Game Description Ready or Not is a tactical shooter that positions itself as a special forces simulator. The project is designed for fans of SWAT 4. The creators tried to focus on realism and cruelty. The game has single player, co-op and PvP. The main gameplay consists of conducting a special operation within the campaign or individual missions. Before you begin, you need to listen to the briefing, study the map of the building, decide on points for the assault and select equipment.

item.title: SeaOrama: World of Shipping
item.description: Game Description SeaOrama: World of Shipping is a game that puts you in the captain’s chair of your own growing maritime empire. Forget romantic notions of rolling waves and salty sunsets; it’s a game of hard hats and spreadsheets where strategic instinct reigns supreme. Start with the only reliable tug - your gateway to a global network of 90 ports, each a microcosm of supply and demand. Analyze the ebb and flow of trade winds, not only marine, but also economic and political.

item.title: HunterX: code name T
item.description: Game Description HunterX: code name T is an action-adventure game in which players take on the role of Tayo, a devil hunter who is destined to hunt devils and unravel his own identity. The game features fast and stylish combat mechanics in which players use a variety of weapons and magical abilities to destroy enemies, creating a fast-paced and fun experience. The dynamics of the battle are simply breathtaking. Responsive controls allow players to easily create combos and perform special moves, enhancing the thrill of battle.

item.title: Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader
item.description: Game Description Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader is an isometric role -playing game made based on the cult universe of a fighting hammer. In her setting, the Grimard is mixed with science fiction. This product offers to travel through space on a huge ship, visit different places, chat with colorful non -pains, pump, perform quests, participate in battles. All the battles here are step -by -step and tactical. They are divided into 2 types.

item.title: Revive and Prosper
item.description: Game Description Revive and Prosper combines the challenge of building a factory with the tension of surviving in a post-apocalyptic world. Users find themselves at the head of a mission to restore civilization after a catastrophe that changed the world. With limited resources and a barren landscape, the game requires careful planning, strategy, and a fair amount of resilience. As gamers progress, they must build automated factories to manage major production lines, keeping their new world functioning in the face of natural disasters and ever-changing environmental conditions.

item.title: Soulash 2
item.description: Game Description Soulash 2 is an intriguing RPG in which you step into the shoes of an exiled god seeking revenge. The expansive procedurally generated world is a playground replete with simulated history, a dynamic economy, and a huge number of races, factions, and creatures just waiting to be interacted with. The power to conquer and rebuild this world lies in the hands of the player, who wields divine powers and abilities.

item.title: Rogues of Europe
item.description: Game Description Rogues of Europa is a gothic roguelike role-playing game in which gamers take on the role of Augustus Hellsing, a man who must confront the forces of evil that threaten a rapidly changing world. In a title where the boundaries between the physical and metaphysical are blurred, users will have to explore huge procedurally generated environments. Every corner of this world is fraught with potential dangers, including monster lairs, strange occurrences, and the remnants of a world trying to find a balance between progress and the dark sides of its past.

item.title: Tunnet
item.description: Game Description Tunnet offers a unique gaming experience. Its core mechanics differ significantly from traditional games. Gamers move through a digital space devoid of familiar landmarks. The lack of clear goals forces introspection. This minimalist approach invites exploration rather than dictates direction. The world is unfolding gradually. Every interaction, every piece of the puzzle contributes to the overall tapestry. The title resists linear progression. Instead, users create their own paths.

item.title: TEVI
item.description: Game Description TEVI is a fun 2D platformer that combines various gameplay elements such as Metroidvania, bullet hell and spectacular action. The action takes place in a vast interconnected world, which is characterized by conflicts and strife. As the protagonist, you have to explore this place and discover the secrets hidden in it. A vast cast of characters is featured, including angels, demons and adorable big-eared animals. You can upgrade your equipment and collect new ones to expand your capabilities.

item.title: Noctuary
item.description: Game Description Noctuary - an alloy of visual novel and adventure action, which immerses abortor in the bright world, following the intertwined travels of Fanny and Alina. Being novice arbarars, the duet passes through the rich tapestry of characters, quests and enemies in this colorful kingdom. Distinguished by the inventive mechanics of the battle, the game allows you to smoothly switch the characters between fanchia and Alina, each of which is endowed with various skills and styles of battle.

item.title: Pygmalion
item.description: Game Description Pygmalion represents the levels-pungent levels built for manipulations with colored blocks. The main task is to clear the field, pushing these figures and thereby starting the synthesis or separation of colors based on their properties. Each stage has a strict limit on the number of available moves, which requires a gamer of foresight and strategic planning. Success is counted after the complete removal of all elements for the allotted amount of actions in the system that combines simple rules with complex, multi -stage solutions.

item.title: Below The Stone
item.description: Game Description Below The Stone is an exciting indie game that immerses in the depths of the mysterious kingdom. Taking the role of a brave gnome, the user will go to insidious searches for rare resources, reveal ancient secrets and create formidable equipment. However, it is worthwhile to beware of dangers that are in wait for as an adventurer descends further into the abyss. Covering more than 25 different biomes that differ in visual and design, the project offers a variety of enemies, treasures and dangers in each area.

item.title: Anode Heart
item.description: Game Description Anode Heart is a monster taming RPG set in a futuristic digital environment. This universe is characterized by the interweaving of physical and virtual reality, where the boundaries between them have become almost indistinguishable. Gamers travel through this semi-open space, immersing themselves in its plot and mechanics. The gameplay is focused on exploring its vastness. The story in Anode Heart is about Sika, a robot who wakes up unconscious near a metal capsule on a foggy coast.

item.title: Astral ascent
item.description: Game Description Astral Ascent transfers gamers to the modern phenetesic world, where everything looks completely different from in reality. Here, the main characters were imprisoned in an astral prison called the garden. At first glance, it seems that cute lawns and paths do not conceal anything dangerous in themselves, but in reality this is not so. There are 12 strong bosses called zodiacs as guards. Moreover, at every step there will be small enemies that can deliver a lot of trouble.

item.title: Death Must Die
item.description: Game Description Death Must Die, a journey into the world of evil spirits to battle Death himself, promises a divine combination of action and strategy. In this roguelite hack and slash survival game, you must master the powers of the gods and battle legions of minions in pursuit of the grim reaper. However, the battle with Death is not the only test. As gamers delve deeper, they will encounter a diverse cast of heroes to discover, a treasure trove of powerful artifacts, and a variety of synergies.

item.title: SUPER CRAZY RHYTHM CASTLE
item.description: Game Description SUPER CRAZY RHYTHM CASTLE will take you to a bizarre world filled with absurdity and frivolity. The mission is clear: defeat the eccentric King Ferdinand and restore rhythmic order to the kingdom. The game features a motley crew of unlikely heroes who must overcome bizarre challenges. From launching beans in an ancient summoning ritual to drowning out a colossal eggplant DJ and smearing gravy on tiny meat people - all while keeping the beat - the journey is a surreal mixture of music and adventure.

item.title: Cuisineer
item.description: Game Description Cuisineer is a delightful mix of dungeon crawling, cooking, and restaurant management that takes you into the captivating story of Pom, an energetic adventurer who must save her family’s diner in Paella. Armed with her culinary skills, she travels beyond her hometown, engaging in culinary battles with monsters and collecting ingredients to prepare delicious dishes for her visitors. Offering a variety of culinary adventures with an extensive repertoire of over 100 recipes spanning the globe, from savory Popiah rolls to sweet Kaya jam and crispy chicken delicacies.

item.title: Higurashi whether They Cry Hou+
item.description: Game Description Higurashi When They Cry Hou+ is the final part of its franchise, representing 4 new chapters for playing players. The people who were in the grip of Hinamidzava are now exempted from fate, which riveted them to the repeating events of June 1983. Despite this permission, the story of the region is not completed, and this project proposes to explore many previously hidden worlds. The narrative Higurashi When They Cry Hou+ departs from the established secret, representing alternative scenarios full of both psychological stress and unexpected humor.

item.title: Bem Feito
item.description: Game Description Bem Feito transfers to gamers the control over Reginaldo, the only inhabitant of his house on the tiny planet B-613. The gameplay is built around the routine of households and management of resources. Gamers are immersed in a cycle of activity, including fishing, cooking, watering plants and collecting fruits in the garden. These troubles form the main mechanics, setting the rhythm of everyday care for the protagonist and his house.

item.title: Lost Hope: Backrooms
item.description: Game Description Lost Hope: BackRooms offers a single first -person adventure in the alarming locations of backstage. Key classes include navigation for these confusing, interconnected places and active interaction with the environment for solving logical puzzles, which contributes to the development of the main plot. The area often demonstrates strange and inexplicable phenomena, which are difficult to immediately comprehend. Gamers have to carefully study these elements in order to reveal the secrets hidden in this tense journey.

item.title: Of Blades and Tails
item.description: Game Description Atmospheric adventures in Of Blades and Tails take gamers into a fantasy world where the main character is a sly fox. The game is made in the genre of role-playing adventure, which is drawn in old-school pixel graphics. A cunning and savvy fox named Riff sets off on a long journey due to the events that have occurred that affected his native clan and other inhabitants of the kingdom living in the territory of a large state.

item.title: Polylithic
item.description: Game Description Polylithic takes players into the heart of the Paleolithic/Neolithic era, where survival depends on cunning, resourcefulness and ingenuity. As the newly minted leader of your tribe, you’ll face the daunting task of leading your people through a vibrant, low-poly wilderness teeming with both opportunity and danger. You will spend the first days in a frantic struggle for survival. Hunger gnaws at your belly, the elements threaten your fragile existence, and every rustle in the underbrush can attract a predator.

item.title: SANABI
item.description: Game Description SANABI is a pixel action game with retro style and unique locations. The game takes place in the distant future, where cybernetic prosthetics have become the norm, even if the person has not lost a limb. After all, they can be equipped with various useful technical devices and overcome human abilities. But it has also become a convenient opportunity for criminals to gain easy access to sophisticated weapons.

item.title: Concealed
item.description: Game Description Concealed begins with the fact that Maine Jiannan returns to the secondary school of Diinlin after the student exchange program. Her return to school life is interrupted when classmates begin to disappear without explanation. These events are correlated with old, unsolved matters and city legends circulating in the territory of the educational institution for years. Maine Jiannan has to face incidents and find a way to reveal the secrets hidden behind the facade of the school.

item.title: Redgar: The Space Viking
item.description: Game Description Redgar: The Space Viking places the player in a setting that combines elements from different time periods. The character navigates castle-like starships and neon fortresses from above. This universe is an alternate history where futuristic technology and medieval aesthetics coexist. The action takes place over a series of levels, including spaceship corridors and dungeons. The main activity is to navigate these locations and confront hostile inhabitants. Combat encounters in Redgar: The Space Viking offer straightforward method choices.

item.title: Living Cell
item.description: Game Description Living Cell is a dark adventure game with survival elements that immerses you in the atmosphere of Samosbor - a dystopian world where residents live in endless apartment buildings called “Gigahrushchevkas”. In this exciting story, you will take the place of the liquidator, who is entrusted with the responsibility of maintaining order and security in the quarter. At the beginning of the story, players find themselves the only survivors in block G-326 after a mysterious incident.

item.title: The Elephant Collection
item.description: Game Description The Elephant Collection is a collection that features the blue elephant in ten different games. These adventure games span a variety of genres, including puzzle platformers and fast-paced arcade games. Gamers are faced with various mechanics, each of which offers its own set of obstacles and challenges. An overarching narrative runs throughout the collection, tying the individual adventures together and creating a cohesive experience for those who immerse themselves in the game.

item.title: Back to the Dawn
item.description: Game Description The prison atmosphere in Back to the Dawn shows the life of an anthropomorphic animal that is forced to fight for the right to exist in a zone. Gamers will explore prison laws, rules and locations in which a protagonist finds himself. The main character will pump and make new acquaintances, relying on his own social skills. It will be possible to use cunning and intelligence to solve many problems, where the main task is an attempt to escape from imprisonment.

item.title: Ebenezer and the Invisible World
item.description: Game Description Ebenezer and the Invisible World lets you take on the role of one Ebenezer Scrooge, the once miserly character from Charles Dickens' timeless classic A Christmas Carol. Featuring breathtaking handcrafted artwork, this 2D metroidvania transports you to a reimagined Victorian fantasy world. In this enchanting world, Scrooge transforms from a miser into an unlikely hero. The story takes place in steampunk London, dominated by wealthy industrialist Caspar Malthus and his formidable personal guard.

item.title: For the king 2
item.description: Game Description For The King 2 is a continuation of an unforgettable adventure RPG with elements of the board game and Roguelike, where you can defeat the formidable queen alone or together with three comrades. You have to explore the world and increase your level in order to reveal the secrets of the past and overthrow the despotistical queen. Try to avoid the queen fanatical guards who control everything around, and combine their forces with their apostates to conquer this world.

item.title: Achilles: Legends Untold
item.description: Game Description In Achilles: Legends Untold, users are included in the image of the famous mythological character, which goes to the next fateful adventure. This time, Achilles is in the center of the conflict between Aid and Ares. Its main goal is to defeat phobos - the child of the god of war. But this does not mean that he himself will come and offer to converge in the battle. To find it, you will have to go a long way, faced with the most dangerous and vile creatures that have ever existed on Earth.

item.title: Magicraft
item.description: Game Description Magicraft throws you into a world overrun by ancient gods. As a lone hero, you wield a legendary staff - your only hope for salvation. This roguelike focuses on spells that can be combined to create devastating effects. The developers themselves admit that the number of possibilities exceeds their own imagination! The game world is strange and whimsical, filled with unusual creatures and riddled with a ridiculous plot. Magicraft doesn’t take itself too seriously, but rather offers a light-hearted adventure with an emphasis on fun and flashy combat.

item.title: You Will Die Here Tonight
item.description: Game Description You Will Die Here Tonight is an action role-playing game with turn-based elements. Finding yourself in a mysterious mansion, you will have to face the real horror of the estate. You Will Die Tonight is a chilling horror film made in the spirit of the original Resident Evil parts. Face evil spirits in the depths of an ancient estate and try to get out of the mansion alive.

item.title: Mostroscopy
item.description: Game Description Mostroscope is a title that draws heavily on the traditions of classic arcade combat, combining elements of the horror genre and Mexican luchador films of the 1950s. Set against a backdrop of monsters and masked wrestlers, this adventure game has a distinctive atmosphere reminiscent of old movies, while offering simple but fun combat mechanics. Most of the time, fighting games tend to be cluttered with overly complex systems. However, the gameplay here is accessible, and the control scheme, inspired by classics like Smash Bros and Street Fighter x Tekken, allows users to quickly jump into the action without requiring a steep learning curve.

item.title: DON'T SCREAM
item.description: Game Description DON’T SCREAM is a thrilling indie horror game that plunges you into the heart of an eerie forest with a nerve-wracking twist: silence is the key to survival. The basic concept is simple, but fiendishly difficult: survive in a creepy forest for 18 minutes without letting out a single scream. An integral component of the game is a functional microphone, and any flash, scream or loud noise will result in the character’s untimely demise, causing an unfortunate restart.

item.title: Mining Mechs
item.description: Game Description Mining Mechs invites players to the intriguing world, where they take control of the latest mining fur and reveal their inner world of Shakhtar. The game allows you to plunge into the depths of the underground subsoil, extract valuable resources and modernize your fur for more significant extraction. Regardless of whether you prefer single adventures or joint actions, up to 7 friends can participate in the network multiplayer cooperative game.

item.title: AI Roguelite
item.description: Game Description AI Roguelite is a text role -playing game where artificial intelligence generates all content and controls all game mechanics. The system determines each location, a non -game character, an enemy and an object that a player faces. In addition, recipes for creating things and fundamental rules of interaction also come from the neural network. As a result, the gamer has to explore the Universe, 100 percent consisting of elements created by a large language model, which provides a procedural adventure as a procedurally generated.

item.title: Fish Game
item.description: Game Description Fish Game is a freshwater aquarium simulator focused on enthusiasts who seek to create a flourishing water environment. The title presents more than 130 species of fish, each of which is characterized by individuality and behavior, which allows you to study life in detail under the surface of the water. These fish form complex relationships with each other, from training to hunting, creating a dynamic ecosystem that develops over time.

item.title: Peaks of Yore
item.description: Game Description Peaks of Yore is an exciting action-adventure game that immerses you in the complex world of mountaineering. Set in 1887, at a time when mountaineering was in its infancy and craze, it offers a unique experience for anyone who embarks on a virtual climb. Players explore the breathtaking landscapes of the Great Gauls, a region reminiscent of the majestic Alps. Here they meet fellow climbers who share their desire for adventure and conquering peaks.

item.title: Black Lily's Tale
item.description: Game Description Black Lily’s Tale is a story about feelings torn apart by the noose of tragedy. The story revolves around a girl whose love for another student on the eve of graduation turns into a series of bitter events. The early black lily’s curse forces her to experience misfortunes over and over again, testing her pure intentions. The only way to break this vicious circle is to directly intervene in the narrative fabric, changing the intended course of things.

item.title: Buildement
item.description: Game Description Builderment is a fun factory-building game that puts you in a world on the verge of running out of resources. In this virtual world, your mission is clear: go to a distant planet, collect vital materials and build a modern factory capable of teleporting these resources to Earth, thereby saving our precious planet. Automation and craftsmanship are at the heart of the project. You start by extracting valuable resources and gradually move on to creating complex items.

item.title: Slay the Princess
item.description: Game Description Slay the Princess is a dark and daring adventure that will put your skills to the ultimate test, combining the genres of psychological horror and dating simulator. Your mission is simple: kill the princess and save the world from destruction. But don’t be fooled by her charms and promises. She will stop at nothing to stop you from completing your task.
