Make your way through the dense forest and find the hut at the end of the path.

item.title: Cavalry Girls
item.description: Game Description Cavalry Girls is an exciting top-down shooter that immerses you in a futuristic world where brave and fearless girl soldiers fight unforgiving enemies. This addicting game seamlessly combines action, strategy and customization to deliver an immersive gaming experience. In a world where the versatile mineral “jade” fuels a bionic revolution and sparks conflict, players take on the role of commander of a team that directs mechanized armor-piercing girls to defend a besieged city from enemy forces.

item.title: Farmer's Life
item.description: Game Description The main character Farmer’s Life was Kashmir - a middle -aged bachelor living in the outback of Eastern Europe. It contains a small farm and is often applied to the bottle. The realism of what is happening does not end there. The character of the character is affected by the change of seasons and wild animals. Help Kashmir cultivate the land and survive in a harsh environment. Perform the hero’s natural needs, making sure that he is always fed, filled and laid to sleep.

item.title: Out of Orbit
item.description: Game Description Out of Orbit offers space experience, focused on the liberty of the player in accidentally created universes. Gamers design, build and command their own starships, or can attack, disassemble or capture the vessels of others. People base planetary bases to expand the influence and extraction of materials. The actions of the gamer affect the game world and have long -term consequences. Any ship met can be taken on boarding and destroyed.

item.title: Hexarchy
item.description: Game Description Hexarchy is a turn-based strategy game that combines elements of battle royale and TCG. You are given only an hour of real time to build a new civilization and lead it to greatness. The gameplay is based on classic 4X mechanics. Train your army to destroy your enemies. Engage in trade and build wonders of the world. Both single-player and multiplayer modes are available. In online battles, it can host up to 10 people at the same time.

item.title: Alaskan Road Truckers
item.description: Game Description ALASKAN ROAD TRUCKERS - A car simulator in which you will become a driver of huge trucks, being a trucker in snowy Alaska. Call a challenge of one of the most severe and dangerous environments that could only be in such simulators. Test your strength and try to survive in a harsh environment. At the same time, you will have the opportunity to see the stunning beauty of this northern region.

item.title: Executive Assault 2
item.description: Game Description Executive Assault 2 is an ambitious blend of first-person shooter and real-time strategy genres, where you build and maintain a vast base on the planet you are trying to conquer. Design and deploy your robotic troops wisely and manage available resources wisely to achieve victory. Visually the game looks much better; with shiny surfaces and a sleek new UI design, it’s certainly not cutting-edge graphics, but at least the series doesn’t look noticeably dated now.

item.title: Kona 2: Brume
item.description: Game Description Kona 2: Brume sees how, in the harsh conditions of Northern Quebec in 1970, a close-knit mining community becomes enveloped in an inexplicable and eerie phenomenon known as Brume. As you delve into the game’s twisted narrative, you take on the role of detective Carl Fobert, tasked with unraveling the mysterious origins of the mysterious fog. Your path takes you through a snowy landscape marred by the aftermath of a devastating avalanche, where you will encounter both unconscious victims and survivors.

item.title: Empty Shell
item.description: Game Description Empty Shell will send you to the very heart of a dark and dangerous industrial environment at a secret facility on the Japanese island. You have to perform a “recovery operation”, which you know a little about, but this is only the beginning. You will find yourself at an object that was abandoned for decades, but something is wrong in it. Solve dark secrets, dig in the documents and magazines of the 1950s and find out the stories of the people who worked there.

item.title: Mosa Lina
item.description: Game Description Mosa Lina challenges the established rules of the immersive sim genre, where the tools often directly correspond to the obstacles. This title uses deliberate randomization, meaning there is no predetermined way to progress through the hand-crafted stages. Gamers move through these locations with the task of collecting fruit, which opens a portal to the exit, but the means of achieving the goal are not predetermined. The gameplay forces improvisation, relying on unpredictable elements and physical interactions.

item.title: Sumerians
item.description: Game Description The gameplay of Sumerians is based on the story of 3000 BC in Mesopotamia, a time of rapid settlement growth and the development of Sumerian cities. The player will play the role of a ruler and will build his own city, manage resources, plan future infrastructure and try to cope with the economy. In the process you only have to improve the city, build and manage the economy, there are no wars or attacks, but there will be numerous obstacles created by the population or nature.

item.title: Nuclear Option
item.description: Game Description In the game** Nuclear Option** you will find yourself in the cabin of modern combat aircraft on the battlefield of the near future, where the roar of engines and the crackling of tracers draw a bright picture of air battles. Each plane, from agile fighters to bulky bombers, is asked in hands, and its cabin pulsates with vital information while you scan targets and evade fire. The world unfolds under you - a dynamic tapestry of vast landscapes, raging seas and bristling enemy objects.

item.title: Subpar Pool
item.description: Game Description Subpar Pool combines golf and billiard elements on a table of tables. The player will have to remove all balls for a limited number of blows at each procedured level, consisting of a sequence of connected surfaces. Gameplay based on physics requires strategic planning to roll objects. Classing and scattering balls often require adjusting the original plans, forcing to adapt the next move to complete the stage. As you pass, gamers build a course, choosing cards from the deck to change experience.

item.title: The Front
item.description: Game Description In The Front, your task, as a resistance fighter, boils down to go into the past in order to prevent the formation of a tyrannical empire that threatens the very existence of mankind. The game is a craft shooter with an open world, immersing a player in a post -apocalyptic sandbox, teeming with mutants and hostile groups. In this terrain destroyed by the war, you have to fight with tyrannical imperial forces, exiles, bandits and rebels in an epic battle, which will determine the future of mankind.

item.title: Athos
item.description: Game Description Athos is an immersion into the harsh realities of survival in a wild and dangerous world. Finding themselves in an unpredictable environment, migrants are forced to create living conditions from scratch. The construction of a fortified outpost from available materials, such as stone and wood, becomes a priority task for protection from aggressive fauna. To counter threats, you must constantly learn new skills and collect blueprints that allow you to create more advanced weapons and armor.

item.title: Midnight Girl
item.description: Game Description Midnight Girl is a point-and-click adventure. The game takes place in France in the mid-1960s. Its history, atmosphere and stylistic decisions originate in the city of Paris, and are also influenced by Belgian comics and cinema of the sixties. Gamers are immersed in this narrative primarily through investigation and exploration of the environment within a 2D side-scrolling perspective. Midnight Girl is available for single player playthrough on mobile platforms, computers and console systems.

item.title: Virtual Circuit Board
item.description: Game Description Virtual Circuit Board is a logic simulator that uses a drawing interface within the sandbox. Here, gamers construct, program and activate creations, from individual circuits to full -scale computers. The entire gameplay is concentrated in this sandbox, since it does not have training, levels or pre -prepared tasks. Players set their own goals, working with a system designed for people with a basic understanding of logical elements and their functions.

item.title: Stop Dead
item.description: Game Description Stop Dead takes you to a future where urban landscapes are spreading across the planet and artificial intelligence is becoming ubiquitous. In this world, you will find yourself embroiled in the dark plots of a rogue AI bent on destroying its creators. Your job as a player is to become a disruptive and powerful force against the AI, with a unique set of abilities to help you counter it.

item.title: Dotage
item.description: Game Description Dotage offers a unique game experience. Michele was feasted and others developed the concept of this digital kingdom. Players move around the world devoid of clear goals. The gameplay rotates around simple mechanics: pressing one button moves the protagonist forward. This seemingly simple action becomes the basis for a trip, rich in interpretation. The visual language of the game consists of abstract landscapes and mysterious symbols. The narrative unfolds through these elements, inviting to introspection, and not giving obvious explanations.

item.title: Quasimorph
item.description: Game Description Quasimorph, an immersive, dark turn-based RPG with loot elements, puts you in the shoes of a seasoned PMC fighter embarking on an arduous journey. In this project, your main goal is to unravel the sinister mystery that threatens all life, and you will do this by accumulating the corpses of your clones. Set in a future where space has been privatized and corporations seek control of the solar system and beyond, the game delves into a world of corporate warfare and dark secrets.

item.title: Saleblazers
item.description: Game Description Saleblazers offers to enjoy the exciting experience of survival in the multiplayer action, in which you have to create a store and survive in a dangerous world filled with various dangers. On this dangerous island you will have to build cozy cafes or huge shopping centers in the company with other players. The whole world of the game is a reactive sandbox, where each buyer has his own character, tastes and preferences.

item.title: Super Buff HD
item.description: Game Description Super Buff HD is a high-octane shooter that plunges you into a world of absurdity, where battles with bizarre bosses await. The player will have to overcome a tower with sculpted biceps, crush a sword-wielding garbage can titan, or turn a mushroom king into mince with a belly-fall attack. To combat this madness, an arsenal is available, including a rotating potato cannon with basketball bombs and a hammer that invariably returns to the hands after a throw.

item.title: Rus against lizards
item.description: Game Description Rus vs. Lizards is a game in which users go on a journey to Ancient Rus' - a world plagued by an invasion of lizards and unholy creatures. In this epic adventure, you take on the role of a blessed hero, charged with the sacred duty of protecting the holy places of the Ancestors from the green plague. In the game you will find intense battles with hordes of lizards and other evil spirits, in which you will be able to show your heroic strength in the name of the Ancestors.

item.title: AFTERWAR
item.description: Game Description AFTERWAR represents a global scenario unfolding in 2028, after a centuries of conflicts. The alternative version of the future left behind historical wars, laying the foundation for universal interaction. In the role of the national leader, the player will have to unite the states and dispose of resources to build a new society. Any step, from the distribution of the budget and the introduction of advanced technologies to the conclusion of international agreements, directly affects the balance between stability and chaos.

item.title: Black Forest
item.description: Game Description Plunging players into a world of danger, death and despair, Black Forest offers a unique twist on the city-building genre. As the headman of an ill-fated village, your only goal is to survive. The journey begins with gathering resources and fortifying the village to prepare for the terrible night ahead. Will you emerge victorious, enduring all horrors until salvation comes, or will you give in in the face of insurmountable challenges?

item.title: Railgunners
item.description: Game Description Railgunners puts players in the script of a rail shooter, where humanity is fighting an alien invasion. This title represents battles through customizable complexity parameters, allowing gamers to regulate the intensity of contractions. Gamers move in a two -dimensional perspective with lateral scrolling, faced with hundreds of enemy units in numerous conflict zones. The main task includes a breakthrough through the vast lines of the enemy in order to get to the mother vessel of the aliens and begin its destruction.

item.title: InfraSpace
item.description: Game Description InfraSpace gives users the opportunity to become mayors of the cities of the future. This city-planning simulator uses a sci-fi setting. Users manage Martian colonies. Gradually, these settlements grow into megacities. The indie title offers relaxing gameplay. In InfraSpace, gamers mine resources, build buildings, and satisfy the needs of the population. There is training and sandbox mode. You can place residential buildings, set up concrete steel mills and other factories, and build roads.

item.title: Evolutions
item.description: Game Description Evolings, a turn-based role-playing game, takes you on an exciting journey through a setting teeming with fearsome monsters and cute creatures. Your main task is to assemble a formidable team of Evolings, each with their own abilities and personalities, to face the dangers that lurk on each level. What distinguishes the project from standard RPGs is the ability to gain new, unique impressions from each level completed. New tasks, objects and plots are constantly appearing in the title.

item.title: Moonstone Island
item.description: Game Description Moonstone Island is a life-sim with collecting creatures, immersing you in a huge open world full of adventures. The game has 100 islands to explore, promising an exciting journey like no other. As someone who has visited this enchanting world, I can say that Moonstone Island offers a truly unique and exciting experience. You step into the shoes of a novice alchemist, following village traditions. Your task is to undergo alchemy training on a floating island in the sky.

item.title: The Backrooms: Last Expedition
item.description: Game Description The BackRooms: Last Expedition is a cooperative in the horror genre, in which from 1 to 4 gamers are united in teams to survive in an alarming world. The main attention is paid to the passage of a series of dangerous, constantly changing levels, each of which is filled with mysterious creatures. Together, players should try to escape from the horror surrounding them, using their collective forces to resist the unknown.

item.title: Galaxy Pass Station
item.description: Game Description Galaxy Pass Station, a comical space station colony simulation, takes players on a whimsical journey into the bustling world of intergalactic hospitality. We will take on the role of the first stationmaster, who will provide excellent service and build the most wonderful center in the galaxy for a variety of alien guests. Here are 13 alien races, each of which has its own quirks and characteristics: the mysterious Tintukians, funny Zubenoids, curious Martians, mischievous Slu, incomprehensible Grays and many others.

item.title: Pumping Simulator 2
item.description: Game Description Pumping Simulator 2 sends you on a trip to the world of management of gas stations. Start your entrepreneurial adventure by the sale of a classic car to get the funds necessary for the reconstruction of an abandoned gas station in a busy city. Your goal is to turn an abandoned station into a prosperous center for local residents and travelers. From the very beginning, you will build, expand and modernize your gas station.

item.title: The Impossible Game 2
item.description: Game Description The Impossible Game 2 is a rhythm-platformer that offers not only single-player challenges, but also large-scale online competitions. For the first time in the series, a battle royale mode has been implemented, in which up to 60 people simultaneously compete in high-speed passage of tracks. In addition, for creative gamers, there is a built-in editor with an intuitive interface that allows you to design your own levels and share them with the community.

item.title: Eternnights
item.description: Game Description Eternnights, a unique action dating game set in an apocalyptic world, offers an exciting blend of romance, survival and adventure. In this gripping story, participants encounter a world upended by an unknown force that turns people into menacing monsters driven by violence and power. Not only is your own survival at stake, but also the future of those you care about. The project’s structure is a well-thought-out routine that keeps gamers on their toes throughout the week.

item.title: Enchanted Portals
item.description: Game Description Enchanted Portals invites you to take part in the adventures of Bobby and Penny, two aspiring magicians trapped in different dimensions. The game is inspired by the popular game Cuphead and has a similar gameplay style, featuring challenging platforming stages and exciting boss battles. The game features both single-player and co-op modes in which players can use various spells and techniques to overcome obstacles and enemies. The game has a humorous tone, witty dialogues and funny situations.

item.title: ABRISS - build to destroy
item.description: Game Description ABRISS - build to destroy is a simulator based on physical laws. The gameplay is focused on building an atmospheric layer that destroys physics. The user has access to many designs that can crash into specified targets and destroy them. The story campaign gradually opens up access to new details, which will allow you to destroy large creations and observe entropy in digital and futuristic landscapes. Opportunities in construction and destruction:

item.title: Chants of Sennaar
item.description: Game Description Chants of Sennaar is an adventure game with peaceful gameplay, set in an incredibly beautiful universe. It is incredibly reminiscent of Ancient Babylon in the years of its dawn. In this fantasy world, there are several powerful ethnic groups and for a long time they interacted with each other and shared knowledge. These tribes call themselves the Peoples of the Tower and are gradually weakening every year due to hostility.

item.title: Shalnor Legends 2: Trita of Thunder
item.description: Game Description Shalnor Legends 2: Trita of Thunder tells about the journey of a young orc named Madren after his ship crashes off the coast of the Thunder Island. There he finds an artifact, melting in himself significant power, which forces him to go through a series of trials to disclose all the capabilities of the find. The island is the main game location for a study filled with its population and secrets.

item.title: Dogu the Adventurer
item.description: Game Description Dogu the Adventurer tells the story of a protracted confrontation in worlds filled with ancient technology. The main character, Dogu, finds himself embroiled in a conflict with ruthless bandits who pursue him at every turn. The deceptively cute style of the locations hides serious threats: from traitorous pigs to ancient demons and powerful bosses guarding secrets. The survival of the protagonist directly depends on improving his equipment and timely repair of equipment.

item.title: High Sea Saga DX
item.description: Game Description High Sea Saga DX immerses players in the marine environment, focused on the accumulation of wealth and global research. In this Title, gamers control the pirate team crossing the oceans in search of hidden treasures scattered through a variety of geographical zones. Each such journey entails a clash with various wild creatures and battles with warring pirate fractions that pursue similar goals. Success requires the collection of an effective detachment and the construction of a swimming agent, ready for long -term crossings by open waters.

item.title: Pocket Bravey
item.description: Game Description Pocket Bravey is a dynamic fighting game that acquaints charismatic characters with a unique battle style and abilities. The gameplay is inspired by the classic fatings of the 90s, but containing a number of modern mechanics and functions. The visual style is represented by retro design. The environment is made in bright colors that refer to various Japanese projects. The heroes of Pocket Bravey are represented by several types of shocks, combinations, block and supervision.

item.title: Sandtrix+
item.description: Game Description Sandtrix+ is a puzzle structure built around falling blocks with a special physical property. These elements do not join firmly, but are broken in a collision, turning into streams of bulk substances that obey the laws of physics. The task is to strategic placement of these figures to manage the formed sand masses. The player removes the pixels from the screen, forming a continuous horizontal line from one -color granules from one edge of the field to the other as part of the competition for glasses.

item.title: The Matchless KungFu
item.description: Game Description The Matchless KungFu immerses users in a world where martial arts are at the forefront. The gamer can choose the path of any warrior he likes and go on a journey through these lands. Be a loner or join a group of like-minded people - you can choose any convenient way. Only the decisions made will shape the character’s story, throwing him into different circumstances, giving him complete freedom of action in certain aspects.

item.title: Looper Tactics
item.description: Game Description Looper Tactics is a card role-playing strategy, the gameplay of which is built around exploring the world and revealing the secrets of an ancient civilization. With the advent of the human faction, gamers have new tactical options at their disposal based on 5 unique combat mechanics. These skills allow you to temporarily unite creatures, sacrifice some fighters to strengthen others, and activate special skills when calling allies. This race is led by a hero named Jester, and some units even receive the status of immortals, which radically changes the approach to battles.

item.title: Bee Island
item.description: Game Description In Bee Island, you will become the head of a prosperous hive, taking on the role of a defender from impending threats. The main attention in the game is paid to defense and strategic construction. Enemies make sporadic attacks, and your task is to protect the hive. They are armed with bombs, poisonous aerosols and missiles, their strength is constantly growing. To reflect their attack, you have to build a whole complex of protective structures - ballists, machine guns, anti -aircraft missile systems and much more.

item.title: Sunkenland
item.description: Game Description Sunkenland is a fun adventure game that offers a unique take on the survival genre. The game immerses us in the world of the water element, which is both beautiful and dangerous. It involves mining resources, crafting items, building bases, trading and fighting pirates to survive in an aquatic environment plagued by hunger and violence. The game features a variety of locations such as sunken cities, atolls, floating bases and abandoned structures.

item.title: Blasphemous 2
item.description: Game Description Blasphemous 2 returns players to the dark and scary world of The Penitent One, the protagonist of the first part. This highly anticipated sequel to the critically acclaimed action-platformer once again delves into a nightmarish realm of brutal combat, twisted religious themes and terrifying visuals. Continuing the events of the Wounds of Eventide DLC, the plot delves into the story of the Penitent One who confronts the Miracle, a mysterious force that has tormented him throughout his journey.

item.title: Hadean Tactics
item.description: Game Description A strategy with elements of the card game Hadean Tactics invites you to choose one of the Heroes and go fight the creatures of darkness, descending into mystical dungeons. Dungeons in Hadean Tactics are randomly generated. The combat system is represented by turn-based elements, where the assembled deck plays the main role in building tactics. Not a single fight will be similar to the previous one. Enemies are represented by a huge variety of monsters, ranging from weak units to demon lords.

item.title: Orbo's Odyssey
item.description: Game Description Orbo’s Odyssey offers to become in place of the eccentric Orbo of Stetson, an ordinary personal assistant with unusual abilities. This 3D platformer will send you on a surreal journey through the office of your boss, where running, jumping and drilling is just an iceberg top. A project with notes of comedy and oddities promises a unique experience. Adventures begin with the fact that Orbo and his colleague Pibe are locked in the office of his boss due to a malfunction of the door to open the door.

item.title: Golf it!
item.description: Game Description The simulator of a real golf - Golf it! - It is a sports, but ridiculous brainchild of the studio of developers who want to turn American sport into a kind of fantastic game. The player’s career begins with simple levels, where to calculate the trajectory and the impact of the impact is easier, but gradually we will approach the complex levels at which even pushing the ball will be difficult.

item.title: Bomb Rush Cyberfunk
item.description: Game Description Bomb Rush Cyberfunk is a dynamic 3D platformer that invites you to explore the world of the near future. Cyberfunk has a huge number of techniques, including high speed movement, parkour, dancing, tags, stunts and much more. This is funkstyle! Find your unique handwriting and font. Fight against law enforcement officers and claim your rights to compete in a huge dystopian metropolis. The game is distinguished by a cartoon style, made to look like a comic book.

item.title: BOOK OF HOURS
item.description: Game Description BOOK OF HOURS is a role-playing game with point-n-click elements, the events of which take place in an occult library. The ancient building is located right on the seashore. Sitting within its walls you can hear the sound of the surf and the rain hitting the roof. For five centuries, the Hush House Library has been a center of knowledge. But one day there was a terrible fire. Many books burned, and the librarian himself died under a huge rubble of shelves with books.

item.title: Daisy Flies to the Moon
item.description: Game Description Daisy Flies to the Moon takes you on a journey beyond Earth, set in the year 2083. The title tells the story of Daisy, an engineer who, after an unfortunate failure in her studies, ends up at a lunar outpost. She originally went there to study lunar rock formations, but the yearlong internship turns into a much longer ordeal when the outpost loses contact with Earth. Over time, the colony is divided into those who remained uninfected and those who were consumed by a strange virus of plant origin.

item.title: Labyrinthine
item.description: Game Description Labyrinthine is a first-person horror game that you can play alone or with friends. You find yourself in the mysterious labyrinths of a mysterious mansion on the outskirts of the forest. Try to find a way to escape from these cursed lands. Collect useful items, solve puzzles and run away from bloodthirsty monsters that are always on your heels. The main goal is to survive! Team up in co-op and play with up to three players as you try to unravel the mysteries of this cursed forest and find a way out of the mystical Heppiesburgh Hedge.

item.title: Mist Slayer
item.description: Game Description Mist Slayer, an action roguelike game, puts you in the shoes of a time-traveling hero in a mystical war. Armed with unique weapons and skills, gamers find themselves in parallel universes, fight amazing opponents, collect bonuses and go on quests. You can play alone or in co-op with friends. Mist Slayer features: 4 different characters, and even more hidden. 13 levels, including at least 36 randomly generated maps. A collection of over 10 bosses and a variety of enemies.

item.title: Ship Graveyard Simulator 2
item.description: Game Description Ship Graveyard Simulator 2 is a fascinating and realistic first -person construction simulator. If you are ready to pick up a cutter and a hammer again, then it’s time to go to the new coast with the largest cemetery of ships in the world and start dismantling huge details of ships. In this continuation, you will find new, even larger vessels, new gaming mechanics, functions and improvements, as well as improved mechanics that you loved in the first part.

item.title: Eon Fighter
item.description: Game Description Eon Fighter is an action game with a top view with Roguelite systems where the player pilots the fighter through the hostile sectors of the cosmos. The gameplay is focused on a collision with continuous waves of opponents and collecting resources for promotion. In the role of the last representative of mankind, it is necessary to carry out tasks, confronts the constant enemy. The structure of the Shoot ‘Em Up genre requires continuous movement and tactical ingenuity to survive in the conditions of the onslaught.

item.title: Standbox
item.description: Game Description Standbox, a bizarre single -user physical sandbox, invites players to indulge their children’s impulses to expand borders and experiments. Imagine a virtual world in which the central place is occupied by an elastic doll, which, on your order, passes all kinds of tests and hardships. In this interactive digital site, you can interact with ragongollah in a variety of ways. It doesn’t matter what you choose - to lightly push it or throw out your most daring whims on it - you can observe the reaction and stability of Ragdollah.

item.title: VIDEOVERSE
item.description: Game Description VIDEOVERSE invites gamers into a nostalgic digital realm that echoes the early days of online social networking. Set in the fictional online community Videoverse, it follows Emmett, a young gamer and aspiring artist. Gamers navigate a landscape rich with interactions, choices, and character development that are central to the unfolding narrative. Emmett’s journey isn’t just a game; it explores the intricacies of friendship and the weight of decisions. Each choice can lead to different consequences, allowing users to shape the story in different ways.

item.title: Cornucopia
item.description: Game Description Cornucopia is a 2.5D farm life RPG that uniquely combines pet combat, animal breeding, and lush cropping. With over 49 NPCs to interact with and 200+ recipes to master, there’s never a dull moment. You’ll be able to form lasting relationships, master exciting mini-games, and enjoy holiday celebrations as you uncover the fascinating secrets of this dynamic world. By focusing on love, family, and agriculture, you can find true love, create a thriving family, and grow a variety of vegetables, fruit trees, and berry bushes.

item.title: Super Raft Boat Together
item.description: Game Description Super Raft Boat Together is an adventure for those who love danger and teamwork! In a world inundated by a mysterious flood, you and your trusty boat are all that’s left. But don’t be afraid! Along with three friends, you’ll battle ruthless sea creatures as you build and expand your raft to reach the final island, where the truth about the flood will finally be revealed. This multiplayer roguelike shooter offers endless excitement as you navigate a variety of breathtaking biomes, strategically choosing trinkets to create the ultimate, super-powered structure.

item.title: Gorebox
item.description: Game Description Gorebox is an exciting sandbox that allows you to reveal its creative potential and create a world full of tense moments on the basis of physics. Various types of weapons and explosives are offered a choice, as well as a special device called Reality Crusher, which makes it possible to interact with surrounding objects. In addition, you can configure your character using skins and accessories, as well as create or explore user cards through the built -in editor and workshop.

item.title: Δv: rings of saturn
item.description: Game Description Rings of Saturn is a two -dimensional cosmoster, whose events are transferred to the distant future of 2273. Humanity began to extract important resources on the rings of Saturn. This event began to be called the golden fever of the new century. You control the ship that is engaged in the prey of fossils in the open spaces of the open space. Your main goal was only one - to get rich.

item.title: Punch Club 2: Fast Forward
item.description: Game Description Punch Club 2: Fast Forward is a 2D action fighting game for real fighters who are not afraid of difficulties and are ready to fight their way through life’s challenges. You, as the main character, have spent 20 long years patiently waiting for your moment in your mother’s cramped garage, dreaming of a better life and searching for your missing father. But life doesn’t give you anything for nothing, and there will be many obstacles and troubles on your way.

item.title: Techtonica
item.description: Game Description Techtonica is a factory construction and management simulator. Compared to many other similar games, this title stands out in that all actions here must be carried out from a first-person view. The second feature is that the plant itself is underground. Unlike most sandboxes, there is an end goal. There is also end-game content. Here you need to extract resources, build and move objects, stretch conveyor belts, automate production, craft improved tools to be able to go even deeper.

item.title: My Friendly Neighborhood
item.description: Game Description My Friendly Neighborhood immerses users for the role of a simple repairman Gordon, which is forced to cope with gloomy and revived puppets attacking the hero during the play “Our friendly neighborhood.” The protagonist is forced to survive and cope with various puzzles to find a way out of the trap. The MFN game is an action horror where you have to cope with dynamic levels, using a variety of weapons for self -defense.

item.title: Viewfinder
item.description: Game Description More than just a first-person puzzle platformer, Viewfinder is a true immersion into a world of mystery and mystery in a bizarre, surreal environment. You will have to use the camera to change reality and question your perceptions. This single player game will be a real challenge for your intellect and imagination, captivating you for many hours. You’ll bring paintings, screenshots, and postcards to life as you uncover long-forgotten secrets and explore connected worlds.

item.title: Sticky Business
item.description: Game Description Sticky Business immerses users in the art of running a sticker store, where creativity and organization intertwine. Gamers are immersed in the daily work of creating original sticker designs and fulfilling customer orders. The title presents many options for combining elements, which allows users to focus on different tastes and preferences. From whimsical illustrations to fashionable motifs, the potential for creativity is at the forefront. Players quickly realize that creating something attractive is just the beginning; running a store requires careful planning and resource management.

item.title: Stonks-9800: Stock Market Simulator
item.description: Game Description Stonks-9800: Stock Market Simulator immerses gamers into the dynamic landscape of the Japanese stock market of the 1980-1990s. This era, marked by quick economic changes, serves as a background for the game in which strategy and financial management are mixed. Users are in place of a businessman, where each decision made can lead to potential wealth or destructive losses. The Title is a complex web of opportunities, encouraging users to buy and sell shares, carefully monitoring the constantly changing market prices.

item.title: Yet Another Zombie Survivors
item.description: Game Description Yet Another Zombie Survivors is an action roginal for those who are ready to fight with the horde of undead! Humanity can be on the verge of extinction, but this does not mean that you will fall without a fight. This is not a typical game with long scenes and complex management - here you need to immediately join the battle and see how sparks fly! Regardless of what your level of game experience you have, you will enjoy this game.

item.title: GLASS
item.description: Game Description GLASS is a surreal journey through the fragments of someone else’s memory, where the protagonist finds himself trapped in a dark and unstable world. The narrative leads the hero through a series of bizarre and frightening locations, including a city engulfed in flames, an estate with dark secrets, an ominous carnival and even a location with floating hot air balloons. Each of these places is filled with strange objects and puzzles, the solution of which gradually brings us closer to solving the tragic story of the mysterious author, known only by the initials T.

item.title: Survival and Horror: Mortanis Prisoners 1
item.description: Game Description Survival and Horror: Mortanis Prisoners #1 occurs in the Nazi concentration camp, where the main characters are prisoners who are going to execute for participation in the conspiracy of the rebels. However, they soon find out that death is not the worst thing that can happen to them, because they will find an even more terrible fate. They must find a way to escape from the nightmare that awaits them in the camp.

item.title: Dave The Diver
item.description: Game Description Dave The Diver - a sea adventure about a diver named Dave. Events take place in a mysterious place called the Blue Hole. During the day, the protagonist explores the ocean, diving to the very bottom in search of treasures, and at night he manages a sushi restaurant. Dave is partnered with 3 charismatic friends to help him on his adventures. Each character has an individual character, introducing dynamics into the relationships between the characters.

item.title: Choo Choo Survivor
item.description: Game Description Choo Choo Survivor is an exciting adventure in the world, teeming with a zombie, where you have to take the train and break through the endless waves of undead. Chu Chu Survaivor is a unique mixture of Bullet Hell and Horde Survival genres, where you can configure your weapons and abilities in accordance with your game style. You can choose one of different trains, each with their own characteristics and weapons, and improve them as they move.

item.title: SLUDGE LIFE 2
item.description: Game Description SLUDGE LIFE 2 is a graffiti adventure that will make you laugh, think and splash. The sequel is bigger, badder and dirtier than ever, with a huge open world full of secrets, jokes, strange characters and places to check in. But there’s one catch: your best friend and rap star Big Mud has disappeared, and you must find him. You play as Ghost, a graffiti artist who is on Big Mud’s trail at Ciggy City Suites, a luxury hotel complex owned by the evil GLUG corporation.

item.title: Brotato
item.description: Game Description In the shooterBratato you have to take control of a potato using a variety of guns while fighting alien creatures. The gameplay includes roguelite genre elements. Locations are procedurally generated, and each run can take up to 30 minutes of real time. There are dozens of types of weapons and additional items of equipment to choose from, allowing you to progress at your own pace and combine the effects of items.

item.title: Feed All Monsters
item.description: Game Description Feed All Monsters invites you to join a team of hardworking delivery people who are trying to deliver delicious food to all the little monsters. These creatures are always patiently waiting for someone to come and feed them, but not all of them remember to take lunch with them. Luckily, you’re here to help! As the proud owner of a monster food delivery service, you must dispatch your trusted team of three to visit all the floating islands and feed all the monsters with delicious food.

item.title: Nimbus INFINITY
item.description: Game Description Nimbus INFINITY depicts an alternate future where humanity lives on a war-torn Earth. There is a struggle in the world between space factions that use flying robots in battles. Events take place in 2100, where some people moved to other planets, and the central government of the CFN created an association of warring factions. Battle Frame technology is falling into disuse as elite fighters begin to create neural links with powerful ‘Mechs, enhancing their abilities during battle.

item.title: The Bookwalker: Thief of Tales
item.description: Game Description The Bookwalker: Thief of Tales invites players to take on the persona of a book traveler. He is a thief whose special ability is to immerse himself in the worlds of books. In his interpretation, they look like dreams, but at the same time they are completely material. Due to this, the hero can take things directly from dreams and drag them into the real world, which is his main task.

item.title: The Pegasus Expedition
item.description: Game Description The Pegasus Expedition is a 4X strategy game in a sci-fi setting in which humanity is faced with the threat of extermination. The action takes place in the world of an alternative future, in which people unintentionally started an intergalactic war and they are unlikely to emerge victorious from it. Civilization must leave its home and go to the constellation Pegasus, where they will not be reached by numerous opponents from among intelligent alien races.

item.title: Miwa: The Sacred Fox
item.description: Game Description Events Miwa: The Sacred Fox begin during the Canaloa festival when night ghosts come out of the ocean shells. These processions move to desecrated sacred places, and this time the village of Kamijima becomes their goal. Sima Nobu, one of the survivors, remembering the cries of dying friends, sets the goal of sanctifying his native settlement again. To fulfill this mission, it is necessary to unite with a holy fox named Miva in order to explore the dark caves and ruins of ancient cities in the world, drawing inspiration from Japanese-Gawaian myths.

item.title: It's Only Money
item.description: Game Description It’s Only Money will immerse gamers in the realistic story of a resident of the underworld, who, by order of the mayor of Rockhaven, was thrown into a huge pit. But don’t despair! Together with other inhabitants of the underground, you can return to the surface and begin your path to wealth and power. You must steal from the rich, fight tycoons, and regain control of the city block by block.

item.title: Space Reign
item.description: Game Description Space Reign is an exciting project that combines several colorful formats. In addition to the main storyline, there is a sandbox mode in which you can freely explore the universe and engage in open-ended gameplay. Here you need to try different strategies, experiment with the configuration of ships, discover hidden secrets and rare resources. One of the product’s strengths is its attention to detail and immersion. The universe feels alive - bustling space stations, bustling trade routes, clashes with friendly and hostile factions.

item.title: Age of Fear: Total
item.description: Game Description Age of Fear: Total is a comprehensive package that combines the titles in the series into a single whole. It brings together past releases, future updates and downloadable content - all designed to provide a rich experience. Whether you’re a longtime fan or a newcomer, the set offers a unique opportunity to delve into the series' expansive universe. Over 100 hours of gameplay promise a world filled with different characters, factions and challenges.

item.title: Army of ruin
item.description: Game Description Army of Ruin is a hybrid of a shooter, a horned, action and an auto -waist. It has a meta-progression. For the collected coins, you can forever pump the stats in the breaks between the races. According to the plot, legendary heroes fight the Evil Army. Before starting the game, you can choose a character and a card. Some fighters and locations are originally blocked. They become accessible in the fulfillment of certain conditions.

item.title: Nocturnal
item.description: Game Description Nocturnal is an exciting action platformer in which you will plunge into a world of mysterious mysteries and dangers. You play as Ardeshir, a warrior of the Unquenchable Fire, who has returned to his home island of Nakhran, only to find his land engulfed in a dark haze. Your task is to uncover the secrets of this mysterious darkness, defeat it and return your people to the light. Caution is your main ally in this campaign.

item.title: Driftwood
item.description: Game Description Driftwood is a fascinating journey into the world of high -speed descent on Longboard. The main character is Eddie, a cool sliven who loves to ride in beautiful landscapes. This game provides an ideal balance of speed and control, bringing a feeling of relaxation and calm, despite a high -speed action. The project offers minimalistic experience, focusing on skating on magnificent landscapes, and not on building a story campaign.

item.title: Tale of Immortal
item.description: Game Description Tale of Immortal, an open-world sandbox deeply rooted in Chinese mythology and cultivation, invites players into an immersive experience where the path to immortality is paved through strategic choices and the conquest of mythical monsters from the Classic of Mountains and Seasons. Your journey as a novice Qi Refinement Stage cultivator begins in Yukong Village. A world filled with unpredictable monsters, mystical kingdoms and treasures waiting in the wings will open before you.

item.title: Dead Monarchy
item.description: Game Description Dead Monarchy is an addictive gameplay that puts you in the role of captain of a mercenary company, taking command and navigating a dangerous open world sandbox. This game offers a huge number of opportunities and dangers lurking around every corner. From fields to camps, caves to ruins, cemeteries to fortresses, the varied locations provide exciting environments for you to explore. The combat system in Dead Monarchy is where the game really shines.

item.title: Fly Corp
item.description: Game Description The development of routes in Fly Corp allows you to feel the work of real airports located throughout the globe. Players get the opportunity to create transport routes in the airspace, setting up the uninterrupted transportation of passengers who want to fly from one city to another. The task of the user will be to establish the right nodes and the implementation of flights that can most profitably and effectively transport the inhabitants of the planet to the necessary destination.

item.title: Elypse
item.description: Game Description Elypse is an atmospheric metroidvania, which is a mixture of classic platformer and 2D action. The action takes place in the very depths of hell. The plot tells how every 10 years it is necessary to sacrifice people to the Abyss in order to protect oneself from the mystical Abyss - an otherworldly force with destructive power. Unfortunately, the main character was chosen to become a victim. There is always a chance of salvation: if you manage to pass all the tests that the Abyss has prepared, then you can continue your life.

item.title: Hand of Doom
item.description: Game Description Hand of Doom takes you on an exciting journey as an apprentice wizard who is faced with the difficult task of defeating the Doom Lords, the supreme rulers of reality itself. However, be careful, because your mentor may not be as reliable a figure as you think at first glance, and the fate of the entire Universe depends on your decisions. This fun RPG pays homage to the nostalgic feel of the early ’90s, capturing the essence of games that combined heavy metal aesthetics with lively FMV and addictive gameplay.

item.title: Superfluous Returnz
item.description: Game Description Superfluous Returnz is a delightful point-and-click adventure game that combines humor, brain-teasing puzzles and a charming storyline. The action takes place in the quiet French village of Foshuny, where a mysterious theft of apples from local orchards takes place. Entering the story is Harpagon Lonyon, a wealthy and eccentric man who takes on the role of Super Odd, a superhero devoid of any real powers or talents. Together with his assistant Sophie, they set off in search of a solution to the mystery of the apple theft.

item.title: Occupy Mars: The Game
item.description: Game Description Colonizing a planet in Occupy Mars is a challenging but fun task. Here the player will have to build his own base, explore the expanses of the red desert, extract water, grow food and find new ways to obtain oxygen. An open world with great sandbox potential will allow you to seriously immerse yourself in the role of a pioneer on Mars. Using advanced technologies, Occupy Mars will create a developed network of buildings.

item.title: Voidtrain
item.description: Game Description In the fairy-tale world of Voidtrain, you need to survive by train. Here the player awaits a journey between unique worlds filled with dangers and adventures. The main characters were mechanics who were sorting out the rubble of a war-torn laboratory in Koenigsberg. Here they find secret Nazi documents pointing to strange research. They lead the mechanics to a portal to the Interworld - a parallel reality filled with wonders.

item.title: Darkest Dungeon 2
item.description: Game Description Darkest Dungeon II, an exciting and intense roguelike game, immerses players in a nightmarish world on the brink of the apocalypse. In the game you have to become a brave leader, assemble a squad, equip your trusty stagecoach and go on a difficult journey through a crumbling landscape. As you plunge into the depths, you’ll soon discover that the biggest threat may come from your squad. The combat system, renowned for its innovation in the original Darkest Dungeon, makes a triumphant return in the sequel.

item.title: Death, Soul and Robots
item.description: Game Description Death, Soul and Robots is a new exciting game in the Metroidvania genre, which immerses users on an unusual trip on the planet, which is on the verge of disappearance. In the role of the main character - a charming cat - you have to find the soul of planet 42, which is the only chance to save the Earth from imminent destruction. However, you can’t cope with this task alone, because you will meet many companions and opponents on the way.

item.title: Keeper's Toll
item.description: Game Description Keeper’s Toll is a fun and challenging game that will test the skills of any gamer who enjoys the classic retro time survival genre. Featuring unique dark fantasy elements, the game boasts a carefully crafted blend of skill-based gameplay, roguelike elements, and unique mechanics that set it apart from others in the genre. Gamers will be able to choose from six different heroes, each with their own defining mechanics, abilities, and meta progression.

item.title: Silica
item.description: Game Description Silica is a dynamic alloy of action and a science fiction strategy that revolves around a fierce struggle for power over a Baltarus, a planet who is replete with quartz crystals, desired for all fractions. Players can manage their armies as commanders from orbit or plunge into battle with their heads as an infantry, vehicles or various insect -like aliens. Silica allows gamers to choose their game style without limiting them to specific rules.

item.title: Tiny Life
item.description: Game Description The developers** Tiny Life** were inspired by The Sims series, trying to transfer the gameplay to their own project. The gameplay presents pixel graphics and the vast capabilities of the simulator of the life of controlled characters. Before the start of the passage, the player can choose a certain group of people, one ward or use the function of creating. In Tiny Life, the user will have to control all aspects of the life of a group of people living together in the same house.

item.title: Ash of Gods: The Way
item.description: Game Description Ash of Gods: The Way is a tactical role-playing game that challenges enemies in intense turn-based combat. You need to collect two decks, line up units in three lines and join one of six factions. The gameplay is presented with limitless possibilities in making decisions and choosing tactics. Events begin 20 years after the end of the Last War. Frieza and Berkana make a shaky but peace. Unfortunately, grievances and disagreements do not go away, but they fade into the background for a while.

item.title: Dungeon Drafters
item.description: Game Description Dungeon Drafters is a top-down, turn-based roguelike with an emphasis on tactical combat. The project uses anime style and card game mechanics. An adventurer with red hair is given control. It moves through cells. The indie product has mini-games. For example: fishing. In the title you can unlock new characters. When confronted with opponents, the combat phase begins, and immediately, without switching to another screen, as in a JRPG.

item.title: TasteMaker: Restaurant Simulator
item.description: Game Description TasteMaker: Restaurant Simulator is a management simulator for a small restaurant that is constantly growing under the strict guidance of the player. The user will have to correctly distribute the available money in the account in order not to turn the food establishment into an unprofitable business that will be forced to close. The game from an indie developer, for whom this brainchild is a debut in the video game industry, gives the gamer full and extensive rights to manage this place, which obliges him to organize all the processes required for normal functioning independently.

item.title: Volcano Princess
item.description: Game Description Volcano Princess is a charming RPG that puts you in the role of a single parent raising a daughter in a kingdom blessed by a powerful goddess. But your daughter’s fate is in your hands, and you must make the right choices to prepare her for her future role as the country’s next monarch. After your wife left, you became the sole guardian of your child. Now you need to provide her with everything she needs to be happy and successful in school and everyday life.

item.title: Teslagrad Remastered
item.description: Game Description Teslagrad Remastered invites you to embark on an epic adventure through a unique universe full of dangers and mysteries, where you will have to uncover the secrets of the ancient technology of Teslamancy and save the kingdom of Electropia from a cruel tyrant. In this thrilling remake of the 2D action platformer, you’ll use electromagnetism to jump over chasms, solve challenging puzzles, and take on multiple enemies. Moving through hand-drawn locations, you will explore the mysterious Tesla Tower and immerse yourself in the atmosphere of steampunk - a dark and inhospitable Europe, where the spirit of industrial progress and technological development collided with a dystopian future.

item.title: Swirl Watch
item.description: Game Description Swirl Watch is a stealth scene of a horn, unfolding on a gas giant undergoing excessive operation. Players have to penetrate industrial complexes, bypass or neutralize protection vessels, committing corporate sabotage to create a resistance movement. In the dense atmosphere of the planet Cloud 2, ships find each other only in laser light, noise of engines and echolocation. This situation creates specific conditions for bypassing patrols and dismantling cloud processing stations.

item.title: Bosorka
item.description: Game Description Bosorka offers to take on the role of a young witch named Horpina, who must muster all her courage and cunning to defeat the evil demons that threaten to plunge the world into darkness. With the help of an ancient Grimoire, Horpina summons an acquaintance, but cannot control his power. The spell is broken, and the Grimoire finds itself at the mercy of evil forces that summon unspeakable monsters.

item.title: DE-EXIT - Eternal Matters
item.description: Game Description DE-EXIT - Eternal Matters is an adventure in which you explore the other world, trying to uncover the secrets of a lost memory. The game is filled with humor and mysticism. The graphic style is represented by an unusual voxel design. You will need to control the protagonist from a third party. Sometimes a game can change perspective, turning the gameplay on its head. Together with the hero you will have to save the world from the impending threat.

item.title: Shardpunk
item.description: Game Description Shardpunk is an isometric game whose gameplay is a mixture of XCOM and Darkest Dungeon. The setting is made in steampunk style. In the Capitol of the Empire, where the action takes place, a plague epidemic began and the streets were filled with rats. You take control of a survivor trying to escape the city. On your way you will meet survivors whom you can save. It is necessary not only to go through the entire Capitol, but also to defeat a huge number of mutated creatures, explore locations, collect useful resources and try to survive in this nightmare.

item.title: Rusted Moss
item.description: Game Description Rusted Moss is a dynamic platformer that stands out with swiftness and hardcore complexity. Actions are developing in the world of post -apocalypse. Life has long died, and everything was rusting around. Fight with rebellious machines covered with rust. The heroine Rusted Moss can jump, shoot and cling to the protrusions hook-cat. The visual side is made in a stylish pixel art with a retro-atmosphere. Game mechanics relieve on the old-school platformers of the 90s, but at the same time introducing many modern elements.

item.title: Wartales
item.description: Game Description Wartales is an open-world role-playing adventure that lets you lead your team of mercenaries on a treasure hunt. Events take place in a medieval fantasy world. You need to travel across continents, recruit party members, explore ancient tombs and collect rewards. The plot begins with the fall of the great Edoran Empire. The kingdom is engulfed in a plague, killing every living thing in its path. In connection with this, banditry, theft, murder and looting increased.

item.title: Wildfrost
item.description: Game Description Wildfrost is an exciting tactical RPG deck builder where gamers can take on the elements and banish the eternal winter! In a world conquered by the Fierce Cold, you are the only reliable stronghold of humanity capable of withstanding the eternal blizzard. You must travel across the frozen tundra, collect powerful companion cards and elemental items, and finally reach the Sun Temple to put an end to the frost.

item.title: The Library of Babel
item.description: Game Description The Library of Babel is a stealth platformer, the actions of which are transferred to the world of the future in the jungle of futuristic Babylon. The main character is Louis - a detective investing in the murder case. He has to solve the secret why Babylon’s library was closed many years ago. What did the creators try to hide there? The plot line is inspired by the work of Horhe Borges.

item.title: First Racer
item.description: Game Description First Racer is an arcade race where victory is achieved not only through quick reactions, but also through proper preparation of the car. The project offers a wide range of competitive disciplines, covering both city streets and specialized tracks. For fans of extreme driving, there are cross-country races that require a special approach to control. Drifting competitions, in turn, test your car control in a controlled drift, where points are awarded based on angle, speed and style of execution.

item.title: Crab Champions
item.description: Game Description Crab Champions is one of those projects where the gamer is given control of an extraordinary hero. As you can guess from the name, the characters of the game are crabs. The setting is tropical islands - the player will be surrounded by palm trees, sand, ocean, stones and exotic animals. And also other crabs, armed to the teeth. Crab Champions can be played in three different modes: Co-op.

item.title: DREDGE
item.description: Game Description The single-player adventure DREDGE invites the player to travel through the depths and gradually uncover their secrets while fishing. As you progress, the main character will have to improve his ship and explore the bottom more thoroughly in order to obtain long-buried secrets. The event takes place in the middle of a mysterious archipelago of islands, where many mysteries and dangers are hidden. The protagonist begins his journey by taking the helm of a fishing trawler and setting sail.

item.title: Terra Nil
item.description: Game Description Terra Nil is a urban planning simulator, which uses pixel graphics with a large number of parts of the area. A feature of the project is that the player needs to build a settlement from scratch, without using factories and other buildings, that they can pollute the air, water spaces and the ground, having achieved the title of environmental place for residence for his creation. Starting with a randomly generated area, the gamer receives initial capital for the construction of the first residential buildings and various production, to provide residents with work.

item.title: Mortal Sin
item.description: Game Description Mortal Sin stands out for its visual style. The graphics in this indie project combines 2D and 3D, and resembles an experimental animation. And the title itself is a first -person action hybrid of the action hybrid in the setting of dark fantasy. In the game made by just one developer there is blood and meat. It will be a person who fell into a certain semblance of purgatory or hell to manage it.

item.title: Nucleares
item.description: Game Description Nucleares may be of interest to lovers of original projects and unusual indie-symptures. This is a simulator of an employee of a nuclear power plant with a first -person view. The character has arms, legs and torso. They can be seen if you lower the camera. The hero turns out to be the only employee at an experimental nuclear power plant for which large staff does not need. This object requires only one person, because artificial intelligence is responsible for everything else.

item.title: The Wreck
item.description: Game Description The adventures in The Wreck follow the life of a failed screenwriter named Junon as she tries to cope with the challenges of adulthood. Players will follow a 36-year-old woman who experiences a turning point that derails her aspirations, career, and personal life. The game is a 3D visual novel that will showcase a melancholy story about sisterhood, motherhood, grief and survival in a cruel world. The storyline in The Wreck will develop gradually through episodes that immerse the protagonist in the past.

item.title: Barotrauma
item.description: Game Description Barotrauma is a two -dimensional simulator decorated in the style of the platformer. According to the plot, your courageous shoulders are entrusted to enter the captain of the real submarine, but you will not control it on the ground, but on one of the satellites of Jupiter called Europe, in the bowels of which the underground ocean spreads. The surface of the satellite is shrouded in an impassable radiation layer, due to which the colony of people are forced to hide under the thickness of the ice that protect the local waters.

item.title: Big Ambitions
item.description: Game Description Big Ambitions is positioned as an economic simulator of a completely new type. Here, users are invited to go a long path of formation, absorbing all the companies in the city. The ultimate goal is to become the largest tycoon, collecting business at hand of all possible scale. The action takes place in New York, one of the most popular center of the world economy. Gamers are pushing into the local “party” to try to get around competitors.

item.title: Sun Haven
item.description: Game Description Sun Haven mixes role-playing game and farming simulator together. The game has two-dimensional graphics made in the style of pixel art. The camera is located on top. The indie project has a single player mode and co-op mode. Online multiplayer supports up to 8 people. Events take place in a medieval fantasy world. The main action takes place in the village of Sun Haven and its surroundings. There is also the elven settlement of Nel’Vari and the monster city of Withergate.

item.title: The Black Grimoire: Cursebreaker
item.description: Game Description The Black Grimoire: Cursebreaker is an immersive, atmospheric role-playing adventure that takes you into the fictional world of Imbertal. The game focuses on classic old-school mechanics, allowing you to venture into a dark and dangerous dark fantasy setting. The main character is a cursed lord named Rothar Aekrest, who must deal with problems on his land, facing various obstacles and participating in difficult combat encounters with monsters. When going to The Black Grimoire: Cursebreaker, you have to complete a large number of tasks and gain experience that allows you to upgrade and improve your character’s characteristics or add new skills and abilities.

item.title: Boneraiser Minions
item.description: Game Description Boneraiser Minions plunges you into a very dark fantasy universe, where powerful creatures once lived, whom people called boneraisers. They were none other than necromancers - wizards who delved into the study of the dark arts and, with their help, learned to raise the dead from their graves, then making their slaves out of them. The main character is one of these magicians, who was caught red-handed and decided to resort to the only method practiced in those days - burning at the stake and then burial in a sacred temple.

item.title: Looking Up I See Only A Ceiling
item.description: Game Description Looking Up I See Only A Ceiling is a short but thought-provoking psychological visual novel that explores the difficult life of a student. The action takes place in hand-recreated locations, and unique characters immerse you in the seemingly measured world of textbooks and routine study. As they progress, players will have to make difficult choices that can change the fate of the main character forever. The plot revolves around the concept of reaching the “point of no return”, a critical moment that can make or break the protagonist’s life.

item.title: Contraband Police
item.description: Game Description Contraband Police - The simulator of the border guard in the first person. The player in the role of the commander of the border post makes an inspection of transport for the presence of smuggling on the border of the third world countries. The inspection tasks include: checking documents: inspection and permit for entry criminals … or take a bribe. What? Nobody heard this! To carry out reports on the successful completion of tasks through the mail; the accumulated experience can be spent on pumping the department, buying new equipment or training dogs;

item.title: Meg's Monster
item.description: Game Description Meg’s Monster is a fun indie RPG adventure where you take on the role of a grumpy ghoul from the underworld tasked with helping a lost little girl find her way home. But don’t be fooled by her creepy-cute aesthetic, because if this girl cries, your whole world will collapse before your eyes. Entering a twisted dungeon world where humans are just breakfast for the monsters and mutants that roam its lands, you will meet Roy, a huge ogre who has no interest in feeding on people.

item.title: We are screen!
item.description: Game Description We are screen! - This is a scientific and fantastic action with elements of a cirow, in which you will find yourself in the pilot’s chair in order to save multi-sized from death. Are you ready for an exciting joint game, like which has not yet been? But beware, chaos reigns in here, and it is your team from 4 space cadets to restore balance. After the theft of great forks, the fabric itself is put on the map.

item.title: Phantom Brigade
item.description: Game Description Phantom Brigade is a turn-based science fiction strategy game. The action takes place in a country that has become the victim of a large-scale invasion by a foreign power. Enemy forces defeated the army and began the occupation. You will have to act as a resistance commander trying to reclaim his homeland from the invaders. The player spends most of his time commanding units of small mechs and completing dangerous missions in a turn-based system.

item.title: The Pale Beyond
item.description: Game Description The Pale Beyond is a survival visual novel where every choice has a solution. The Arctic is harsh and cruel to anyone who decides to enter its territory, and explorers must always be prepared for unforeseen circumstances. But even they can be broken by some kind of misfortune and being on the verge of death from lack of food and terrible cold. Several years ago, the ship Viscount set out in search of the absolute South, but failed and never returned.

item.title: Research Story
item.description: Game Description Research Story offers to go on a fascinating journey through a mysterious area and help Violet Archive with a recording of exotic plants and creatures. This is a colorful farm simulator that you definitely should try! It is necessary to explore the chimerbruck and its environs, find and write down a variety of plants and creatures, as well as breed your unique garden and take care of pets. In addition, you will have to establish relations with local residents and fulfill various quests.

item.title: My Dream Setup
item.description: Game Description My Dream Setup is a simulator for building a room for gaming, streaming, and just relaxing. The project uses 2D graphics and an isometric view. The camera can be rotated left and right. Controls are designed for mouse and keyboard. The video game allows users to build the room of their dreams. It provides players with many opportunities for self-expression. You can even change weather conditions and time of day.

item.title: Ages of Conflict: World War Simulator
item.description: Game Description Ages of Conflict: World War Simulator is a unique map simulation game where gamers will witness epic battles between self-created or random AI-controlled nations. Here you can control the chosen powers, adjust world events to your preferences and follow their struggle for dominance in an infinite number of worlds. Get the unique experience of watching your own or random nations fight for control of the world. Players will face massive battles, uprisings and political upheavals, and only they will be able to determine who will be the great winner.

item.title: Plains of Pain
item.description: Game Description Plains of Pain is a dark, post-apocalyptic multiplayer action game that takes you into a world of survival where hope has faded and all that remains is the ultimate end of days. This is no ordinary game - it’s a journey into a sun-scorched dystopian world that will push you to the brink of your sanity. The backstory is chillingly real. When the planet was engulfed by monstrous solar flares, Earth’s wealthiest people fled Earth as part of a secret government initiative, leaving the remaining population to fend for itself.

item.title: The Last Starship
item.description: Game Description The Last Starship is a simulator for controlling a spaceship and its crew with strategy elements. Set in a sci-fi setting, the indie project uses a top-down view and 2D graphics in the style of pixel art. Here the player is offered to build his own huge aircraft and go on a journey through the galaxy. It is also possible to take one of several ready-made options, previously invented by the developers.

item.title: DR LIVESEY ROM AND DEATH EDITION
item.description: Game Description DR LIVESEY ROM AND DEATH EDITION is an adventure game set in fictional territories. The plot centers on Doctor Livesey and his popular squad. He goes on a journey with them, wanting to unravel the many mysteries on Treasure Island. However, behind the back of the main character, a conspiracy occurred that began right on the ship. They want to kill some members of the team and the Doctor himself.

item.title: Spectator
item.description: Game Description Spectator can please fans of Internet folklore. This game is inspired by popular urban legends. Here you can go Backstage, visit Slenderman’s habitat and visit other locations. It’s full of all kinds of references. The video game is a representative of the point-and-click survival horror genre. The indie title uses a first-person perspective. Before you start, you can choose one of 3 difficulty types: normal, hard and nightmare. There are 6 levels (days) in total.

item.title: Dread Templar
item.description: Game Description Dread Templar may be suitable for those who are nostalgic for the old first-person shooters from the late nineties and early two thousand. There is blood and meat in the game. In this retro FPS, the player controls the Dread Templar. He fights demons and undead. The hero can carry with him an entire arsenal of weapons and a large supply of ammunition for them. There is a bow, a double-barreled sawn-off shotgun, a shotgun, a rocket launcher, a grenade launcher, and a revolver.

item.title: Pizza Tower
item.description: Game Description Pizza Tower stands out with its pixel graphics and animation. The art imitates old cartoon series from the end of the last century. The project also boasts an energetic soundtrack. It is a 2D side-scrolling platformer. This title is the spiritual successor to the video games from the Wario Land series. In it you can walk left and right, run, accelerate, jump, make dashes, break some obstacles, ride mounts, and turn into monsters.

item.title: Trenches - World War 1 Horror Survival Game
item.description: Game Description Trenches - World War 1 Horror Survival Game lives up to its name. This is an indie survival horror. The project was made in the setting of the First World War. It uses the first-person view familiar to the genre. If you turn the camera down, the protagonist’s legs and arms will be displayed on the screen. The events take place in 1917. In Trenches - World War 1 Horror Survival Game you will play as soldier James.

item.title: Indies' Lies
item.description: Game Description The adventures in Indies' Lies immerse players in a dark fantasy world where they must fight against a variety of monsters. The game is made in the card battler genre, where you need to build a deck before battles. Players will go through missions that are randomly generated in roguelike style. Users will upgrade their squad of heroes by collecting Allies, customizing Runes and improving the Talents of the protagonists through a special Deck.

item.title: September 7th
item.description: Game Description September 7TH is an atmospheric horror adventure in which a guy named Dima will plunge into the history of a guy. Together with his family, he moves to a new town, where he soon receives as a gift to the Christmas elf - a strange doll, in which something mystical is traced. Gradually, inexplicable things begin to happen with the guy. September 7TH gameplay is a classic walking simulator with elements of a puzzle.

item.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. The World: The Game – Complete Edition
item.description: Game Description Scott Pilgrim vs. The World: The Game - Complete Edition is a whirlwind arcade action-adventure game based on the plot of the famous series of graphic novels and the movie of the same name. In addition to the original game, equally exciting add-ons Knives Chau and Wallace are also available. Players can choose to play through many of their favorite characters, such as Scott Pilgrim himself, Ramona, Knives, Stephen Stills and others.

item.title: Blessed Work
item.description: Game Description Blessed Work is an old-school casual strategy game in which you have to ensure the safety of your builders while completing the construction of a facility. Gamers must place objects, activate buttons, and move items to prevent their workers from dying due to a lack of safety measures at the construction site. There are 50 stages, each with over 10 mechanics, making it a challenging challenge that will keep players engaged for hours.

item.title: Psychosis
item.description: Game Description psychosis is a retro-game in the Survival-Horror style, in which the gamer has to fight with demons and his own reason in the endless hell. In this psychological horror, you will have to fight with a breathtaking gameplay for an hour to survive in the surrounding perverted world. The plot begins with the fact that after midnight the protagonist arrives a mysterious phone call. The voice on the other end of the line urgently asks the hero to come as soon as possible, because they all left.

item.title: Warsim: The Realm of Aslona
item.description: Game Description Warsim: The Realm of Aslona is a kingdom management simulator. The indie game combines elements of roguelike, adventure and strategy. The project uses a fantasy setting and ASCII graphics. A world consisting of 100 locations are created randomly. As well as the races inhabiting it and the events taking place in it. Procedural generation is capable of producing 94887852 variations of creatures. Among them are fire orcs, eyeless elves, trench dwarves and others.

item.title: EXOME
item.description: Game Description EXOME may be of interest to lovers of playing games with friends. The multiplayer is designed for 2-4 users. For those who like single more, there is an opportunity to play alone. This is a cooperative shooter with a third person with elements of survival and horror. When using optical sights, the camera angle during firing for a short time changes from the eyes. The project is made on the Unreal Engine 5 engine.

item.title: Lil Gator Game
item.description: Game Description Lil Gator Game from the first minutes creates a positive atmosphere and invites you to completely immerse yourself in this friendly world.
