Here, users take on the role of a little crocodile who wants to make new friends. But they need help, so the character will have to get down to business, completing their quests and instructions. And given that the main location in the game is a national park, you will have to spend a lot of time exploring individual areas and finding solutions.

item.title: SokoFrog
item.description: Game Description SokoFrog is a Sokoban-style puzzle game where the main goal is to move blocks to open a passage to the next stage. The little frog is under control and needs help in solving spatial problems. The entire gameplay is built around one central mechanic: you need to place a box with a symbol printed on it on a tile with a similar image. Successfully completing this action will unlock the door leading further.

item.title: Master of Magic
item.description: Game Description Master of Magic (2022) is a remake of the once classic project, which at one time attracted the attention of a large number of people. Users, as before, will have to go a long way through the territory of two neighboring worlds - Arcanus and Mirror - in order to face the strongest sorcerers for the title of the strongest. In total, there are 14 different wizards to choose from with their own unique abilities, who, among other things, are representatives of different schools.

item.title: Voor De Kroon
item.description: Game Description Historical battles in Voor De Kroon take place during the Dark Middle Ages, where knights with bladed weapons ruled. The game is a tactical slasher game where users will be able to engage in large-scale battles and at the same time control the coordination and movement of troops by giving orders. The main task is to seize the throne in order to conquer the Dutch kingdom in the 13th century.

item.title: Chained Echoes
item.description: Game Description Chained Echoes is a turn-based role-playing game in which you will not only pick up a sword, but also sit in the cockpit of a huge robot! In the world of Valandis, technology and magic go hand in hand. The visual style is made in the spirit of classic JRPGs. A special feature of the setting is that dragons and flying robots are commonplace in the world of Chained Echoes.

item.title: Dwarf Fortress
item.description: Game Description Dwarf Fortress is a strategy game with a complex open world simulation. You control a race of dwarves whose goal is to build their own fortress. To collect resources, you need to go explore the huge open world. Territories are generated randomly and contain many dangers. Don’t let your civilization fall into decay! Mechanics are represented by combat skills, physical properties of materials, pain, nausea, various poisoning effects, etc.

item.title: KYNSEED
item.description: Game Description KYNSEED is a role -playing game in an adventure genre and a life simulator in an open world. The game saw the light in 2018 and has already managed to find its own fan base. The essence of the passage is to completely immerse into the invented world, filled with various inhabitants, who have their own affairs and habits. The player is invited to interact with these characters, simultaneously equipping his own life.

item.title: Cafe Owner Simulator
item.description: Game Description Cafe Owner Simulator is a restaurateur simulator that allows you to open the cafeteria of your dreams. By renting a building, you can create unique interiors and exteriors. It is necessary to personally conduct interviews and recruit staff, including baristas, waiters, cooks, hostesses and cleaners. The task is extremely prosaic - to create the most comfortable place where people can relax and unwind. Ideally, do everything possible to keep them coming back.

item.title: Spire of Glory
item.description: Game Description Spire of Glory is a pixelated action roguelike that will take you on a climb to the top of this majestic mountain to prove your worth. Start your journey from scratch and make the right choices to become strong enough to overcome all the challenges of the Spire. To survive, you will have to fight enemies and collect crystals to purchase and upgrade items, as well as expand your team.

item.title: HELLSEED
item.description: Game Description The gloomy atmosphere inHELLSEED is filled with riddles and secrets that the protagonist must cope with. The main character finds himself in Italy in 1980, in the small province of Turin. Users will take on the role of a private investigator who is investigating a strange case. Doctors from a psychiatric hospital are worried about a missing employee who was last at home. Players will explore the estate of the missing doctor, starting from the rooms of his desolate apartment, studying objects and analyzing the situation.

item.title: Warhammer 40,000: Darktide
item.description: Game Description Warhammer 40,000: Darktide is a co-op first-person shooter. Events take place in the huge city of Tertium on the planet Atom Prime. The cult of insane heretics Admonition is trying to capture him. Four heroes, together with the forces of the Inquisition, must resist Chaos and stop the bloodthirsty horde of the living dead and save the inhabitants from extermination. Since this is a classic co-op shooter, the gameplay is primarily focused on shooting and killing demonic enemies using melee weapons.

item.title: In Nightmare
item.description: Game Description In Nightmare allows gamers to plunge into a dark atmosphere where they have to take control of a boy who has lost his beloved. The protagonist will make his way through dangerous locations where monsters live. The project is a horror adventure game with elements of an action platformer, where you need to overcome various obstacles on the hero’s path, solve puzzles, deal with monsters and look for the right path out of the frightening kingdom of darkness.

item.title: Retro Gadgets
item.description: Game Description Retro Gadgets is an engineer and programmer simulator with a first-person view and two-dimensional pixel graphics. This title can also be classified as a sandbox. The video game allows you to create outdated devices. For example: drum machines, portable game consoles of previous generations, radios, small weather stations, and so on. To achieve this, an ever-increasing range of buttons, speakers, ICs, LCDs, printed circuit boards, LEDs, sensors, indicators, joysticks and other components are available.

item.title: Ship of Fools
item.description: Game Description The comic roguelike Ship of Fools will take you to a fantasy world inhabited by strange creatures with a clearly low level of intelligence. And besides, they have an amazing ability to get into various kinds of troubles and funny situations, from which they amusingly try to find a way out. Another such situation is of a very global and sad nature. In a fictional country called the Archipelago, an Aquapocalypse is approaching, due to which all the islands may soon go under water.

Game Description The sandbox 171 stands out against the background of other GTA clones with its entourage. The action takes place in Brazil. The creators offer to ride on the suburbs of San Paulo. Poor areas with narrow streets, graffiti on the walls, dirt and garbage add a special flavor of the local atmosphere. The player controls his character with a third -person view. During shooting on the street, the camera is transferred by the hero’s shoulder.

item.title: Torii
item.description: Game Description In the Torii, gamers have to go to the study of surreal locations, where many strange creatures will be released. The heroine is a girl named Ipa, who has lost her loved one and is now forced to go through the adoption process. Players have to enjoy the introspective adventure, where you need to deal with the fears of the protagonist and search for the missing younger sister. The project is an indie header, where a colorful artistic style is used for the design of the environment.

item.title: ZERO Sievert
item.description: Game Description Plunging intoZERO Sievert, you will have to go on dangerous journeys through the post-apocalyptic expanses of a dying world, taking you to the terrain of a desolate alternative race. Taking control of one of the characters, you have to go on dangerous adventures, delving into creepy and gloomy places filled with strange phenomena and creatures that live beyond the limits of human vision. Adventures in ZERO Sievert immerse you in an atmosphere of loneliness and independent survival in wild conditions, full of unexplored places and unexplored locations through which the protagonist will have to wander and look for useful items for life support.

item.title: We Who Are About To Die
item.description: Game Description We Who Are About To Die takes the gamer back to the times of Ancient Rome and allows you to enter the arena as a gladiator. These magnificent fighters were mostly slaves and were forced to fight for their master in the hope of gaining glory on the sand and hoping for a chance to eventually become free, but only a few achieved this goal. Offers multiplayer content, thanks to which the gamer will fight against other real users in difficult battles.

item.title: Shadows Over Loathing
item.description: Game Description Shadows Over Loathing is a slapstick comedy-adventure RPG featuring mobsters, monsters, and secrets. You go in search of your Uncle Murray, who has been invited to his antiques store in Ocean City, but when you arrive there, you find that the old man is nowhere to be found. Your investigation leads you to shadowy conspiracies and dangers that threaten to bring about the end of the world. Explore a massive open world filled with danger, quests, puzzles, and minifigures in this single-player comedy RPG set during the Prohibition period in the Abomination universe.

item.title: The Exorcist's Story
item.description: Game Description The Exorcist’s Story is an atmospheric 2D adventure game in which you will find yourself in the shoes of a young priest, Antonio, who had experience in performing exorcism rituals. But one day everything went wrong and a girl died during the ceremony. You escaped prison, but you promised yourself never to perform such rituals again. But a few years later, strange things begin to happen in your small town and Asmodeus, the demon you once encountered, challenges you again.

item.title: Fabular: Once Upon a Spacetime
item.description: Game Description Fabular: Once Upon a Spacetime allows users to go to the study of the galaxy by taking space knights. The game is a role-playing adventure with elements of Rowl, where you have to move along the retro-futuristic universe in order to save the kingdom from the Lords of the abyss that abducted the sun. The protagonist will be a noble traveler, which is the last hope for the salvation of mankind.

item.title: Lunistic
item.description: Game Description Lunistice may be of interest to those nostalgic for early 3D platformers. The graphics in this project are specially made in a low-poly style and in low resolution. This retro platformer imitates the console hits that came out on fifth-generation consoles in the 90s. He suggests exploring the memories of the main character named Hana. In the story, she is trying to get to the Moon. Her adventures consist of linear levels.

item.title: Winter Falling: Battle Tactics
item.description: Game Description Winter Falling: Battle Tactics invites gamers to lead the troops and lead them to victory in the most stressful and tactical battles. And only your mind can save the dying world from devastation. You control a detachment of mercenaries, collect supplies and troops, perform tasks and even you can burn villages if you decide that you need it. But do not forget that all your actions have consequences.

item.title: A Little to the Left
item.description: Game Description Puzzle A Little to the Left in which you can spend a boring, rainy day. The drawing is expressed in a classic cartoon style, and the animation is smooth and realistic. The game is clearly not easy and promises to show the real voltage from the passage while the player is trying to restore order. This chaos was arranged by a naughty cat, so at the next level the gamer needs to be a little more patient from the drawings of his fluffy friend.

item.title: Plot of the Druid
item.description: Game Description Plot of the Druid is a point-and-click adventure that allows you to make earthquakes, turn night into day, and become a small furry animal. And all because the Druids have enormous power! The game will delight all lovers of true British humor and classic quests. Taking on the role of a druid apprentice, go on an exciting journey across the continent in order to restore the power of love and wisdom.

item.title: SIGNALIS
item.description: Game Description The space horror filmSIGNALIS is made in the style of anime. The indie project is a representative of the old-school survival horror genre. We play as a girl named Elster. She wakes up in a pressure chamber on a ship where something terrible happened. The main character is a Replica - a kind of android analogue. She periodically sees visions of others and picks up strange radio signals.

item.title: USAC: Code Breach
item.description: Game Description USAC: Code Breach is a unique co-op experience based on the French cyberpunk universe. You and your partner will have to investigate the sudden shutdown of a scientific center. The protagonist will have to act in a difficult situation, where every step can lead to death. It’s the middle of the 21st century - the world is going through big changes. The climate and energy crisis is being felt around the world.

item.title: Last Command
item.description: Game Description Last Command is deceptively easy to learn. To control, the player will only need the arrows on the keyboard and the mouse, but this does not make the task easier at all. A huge number of obstacles on the way, bosses with a large area of ​​​​AoE damage and many additional small attacks will definitely not let you relax. The game is perfect for those who love hardcore challenges mixed with a puzzle.

item.title: Mount and Blade 2: Bannerlord
item.description: Game Description Mount and Blade 2 Bannerlord is a role-playing game with elements of medieval wars, the action of which takes place 200 years before the start of Part 1. In this sequel you will find an improved combat system and an enlarged game world - Calradia. Fight with hundreds of troops under your command and take direct part in the battles as one of the soldiers. You can storm enemy fortresses and destroy fortifications with siege weapons in Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord.

item.title: Faith: The Unholy Trinity
item.description: Game Description Faith: The Unholy Trinity is an indie chorror with an unusual presentation. The project has a minimalistic pixel graphics in retro style. At the same time, there are full-fledged KAT scenes using rotoscopy. The creators also added synthesized computer speech. The plot is dedicated to the confrontation between the minister of the church and the satanic cult, trying to call a powerful demon. The action takes place in the 80s in Connecticut.

item.title: Monster Prom 3: Monster Roadtrip
item.description: Game Description Monster Prom 3: Monster Roadtrip - a continuation of the popular series of satirical adventure, the actions of which unfold in a fabulous universe. Instead of people, it is inhabited by various very cute monsters of all possible species and appearance. Unlike previous parts, here the developers do not focus on the simulation of dates, but on road travel and survival. Juzer needs to get to a certain epic place in order to end the campaign successfully.

item.title: Vampire Survivors
item.description: Game Description Survival in theVampire Survivors universe is based on minimalist gameplay, where you have to move around the map and knock out as much gold as possible. The main task for the protagonist is to advance through the levels generated in roguelight style. You need to try to survive the night, fighting off monsters and higher undead. Vampires will hunt for the protagonist, not giving him the opportunity to rest at a rest or come up with a future plan of action.

item.title: Backrooms: Escape Together
item.description: Game Description Backrooms: Escape Together is an atmospheric horror film designed for cooperative play, where in a group of 4 real users you need to find a way out of another dimension and return to the normal world. The scientists who were sent into these mysterious labyrinths almost completed their mission and were supposed to return back, but the mechanism broke down and they lost the opportunity to return. They know about one more exit, but it lies through the most separated levels, through which only a few managed to get through.

item.title: Jennifer Wilde: Unlikely Revolutionaries
item.description: Game Description Jennifer Wilde: Unlikely Revolutionaries is an adventure game set in 1921, against the backdrop of the great revolution in Paris. The main character, young French artist Jennifer Chevalier, has the opportunity to meet her idol, Oscar Wilde, whose soul is connected to a pendant found in the hotel where her father died. The protagonist is convinced that her father was killed, and using her gift of communication with spirits, she tries to summon his spirit.

item.title: CULTIC
item.description: Game Description Death inCULTIC is the beginning of a mysterious path, so you shouldn’t be afraid of it. The player will have to muster up the courage to fight through hordes of perverted cultists in order to gain the upper hand in this battle. As the character progresses, he encounters hundreds of NPCs with completely frozen minds, who are guided by blind faith in their ideals. The cultists are further corrupted by an immortal and invisible entity that seeks sole domination of the world.

item.title: Lost Eidolons
item.description: Game Description Lost Eidolons is a tactical role-playing game that allows you to plunge into the world of dark fantasy. The combat is made in a turn-based style. The action takes place in a world called Artemesia. Starring the adventurer Eden. He, along with a small detachment, is trying to fight for the free future of the empire. During the game, you can switch between turn-based combat and NPCs to strategize and try to find a way to outsmart your opponent.

item.title: The Case of the Golden Idol
item.description: Game Description The Case of the Golden Idol will allow you to become detectives, but not in the modern world - but in the past. The events take place in the 18th century and mostly in an aristocratic society. The plot revolves around the murders of 12 people that occurred over a period of 40 years. During this time, law enforcement agencies were unable to find the suspect, and even moreover, they believe that these crimes are in no way connected with each other.

item.title: Stardeus
item.description: Game Description The city-planning simulator Stardeus will plunge you into a cosmic world where there are no familiar objects, and, of course, there are robotic systems, spaceships, and advanced artificial intelligence that helps with everything. The main character, in the role of AI, is called upon to restore order on a large space cruiser, simultaneously building his own colony and introducing automation into the spheres of life of the newly built city.

item.title: Super Jagger Bomb
item.description: Game Description Super Jagger Bomb sets the gamer with the task of neutralizing incendiary devices on multi -level arenas. The main character in the cloak should quickly collect all the bombs in order to prevent the explosion. To move in locations, he uses running, jumping and jerking in the air. A special technique allows you to quickly fall down, which adds an element of tactical planning of the route to the process and turns it into a kind of puzzle.

item.title: 1428: Shadows over Silesia
item.description: Game Description 1428: Shadows over Silesia is a dark adventure where real historical events are intertwined with fantasy ones. There is a place here for those who worship the devil, who committed real crimes in his honor, as well as demons and other mythical creatures capable of attacking travelers. If a player accidentally finds himself in the minority, then we can say that this is certain death, since tactics cannot defeat creatures strongly, but you can learn from your own mistakes and save a larger squad at the right time.

item.title: Bibots
item.description: Game Description Bibots is a sci-fi action thriller that introduces the strange character Tayyar. This creature has the ability to transform into the mechanical robot Beebot. Moreover, there is far from just one - there are many varieties of Bibots and each of them differs in appearance, fighting style and set of perks. The protagonist’s task is to save the world from certain monsters. To complete the goal, you will have to travel through dozens of biomes, each of which has unique architecture and landscape.

item.title: NeverAwake
item.description: Game Description NeverAwake is a 2D side-scrolling action platformer with beautiful hand-drawn graphics about a girl named Rem. She is still a child of 10 years old and suffers from regular nightmares in which she strives to conquer everything that brought her resentment and pain in real life. Her opponents are not the classic monsters from banal dreams, but those who were somehow able to damage her psyche. These are school friends and just classmates, dentists who hurt when they pulled out teeth and even yard dogs that try to bite her every morning when she goes to school.

item.title: WTC: Relentless Protagonist [sxs]
item.description: Game Description WTC: Relentless Protagonist [sxs] - this is a visual short story with two -dimensional graphics. She imitates anime drawing. The atmosphere combines drama, comedy and thriller. There are scenes with violence in the game. Title includes 102 scenes, and his script consists of 73,000 words. The plot has 3 endings and 2 epilogue. The video game is designed for about 6-8 hours of passage. The gameplay traditionally for the genre consists of considering pictures, reading the text and periodic decision -making.

item.title: Salt 2: Shores of Gold
item.description: Game Description Salt 2: Shores of Gold tells the story of the complex life of a lone pirate who travels on a small sailing ship. Unlike other games on a similar theme, this project does not focus on sea battles or robbing other ships. The player will have to spend the bulk of his time constantly exploring the vast expanses of water and searching for treasures. The main character feels that the ocean is his real home.

item.title: HYPER DEMON
item.description: Game Description HYPER DEMON is a minimalist and experimental first-person shooter. It stands out for its visual style. It has very fast and dynamic gameplay. Here you can make jerks, slide, perform regular jumps and something like rocket jumps. There are more than a dozen techniques in total. You can master all these mechanics through training. The protagonist shoots daggers at demonic creatures from his outstretched hand. He is also capable of using consumable gems.

item.title: Card Survival: Tropical Island
item.description: Game Description Card Survival: Tropical Island – takes you into the atmosphere of tropical islands, on which the protagonist will have to survive and settle down. Players gain experience managing the time and resources available to build the structures and tools needed to live a solitary life in the wild. Being in an area filled with various materials and natural objects of the environment, you will have to search and collect useful elements that allow you to live in an area unfavorable for humans.

item.title: Trombone Champ
item.description: Game Description Trombone Champ is a humorous rhythm game with CCG elements. This is also an arcade simulator of playing the trombone. This title differs from other projects where you need to perform some actions in time with the music in that here you can play any notes at any time. This allows you to hear incorrectly played melodies and leads to all sorts of funny situations. A total of 20 famous melodies are available.

item.title: CHEMISTS: Area of ​​infection
item.description: Game Description CHEMISTS: Area of ​​Infection is a 3rd person shooter that will take you to an alternate reality full of dangers and mysteries. Years have passed since a global catastrophe, and you wake up in a hospital, remembering nothing from the past. Now your task is to survive in this harsh world and find out what happened. Players will have to rely on their experience and navigate the environment, remembering every corner so as not to get lost.

item.title: After the Collapse
item.description: Game Description AFTER The COLLAPSE is a 2D strategy, a management and management simulator of its own settlement. A camera that is above above the surface at right angles is used. The surrounding world survived the apocalypse, which is why it turned into radioactive wastelands and became very dangerous for living people without means of protection against monsters and aggressive bandits. The task of the gamer is to develop existing buildings and build new ones to increase population growth and create a powerful army that is ready to fight off external threats.

item.title: Taiji
item.description: Game Description Taiji combines two genres. This is a mixture of a puzzle game and an adventure game. This indie project has two-dimensional graphics in the style of pixel art. The camera is located at the top and at an angle. There are a huge number of puzzles here. They consist of grids of tiles, and are built around the need to turn these squares on or off. The main feature of the title is that absolutely all puzzles use a single interface.

item.title: Gunner, Heat, PC!
item.description: Game Description Gunner, Heat, PC! - A tank simulator aimed at realistic battles between military equipment from the Cold War. The gameplay focuses on realistic behavior of each tank. Each type of combat transport has unique management features, and is also represented by individual characteristics. Gunner gameplay, Heat, PC! It is distinguished by a high level of complexity. The players have such legendary tank models as T-55A or M-60A3. By managing your tank, it is necessary to destroy enemy objects and perform many different tasks.

item.title: Gloomwood
item.description: Game Description Gloomwood is not just an indie chorror in the first person. The game offers to survive in the open world. The project has stealth elements. The Title boasts the elaborate sound system, which is believably spreads the noise during the movement of the user. Gloomwood transfers gamer to the Gothic city, in which the Victorian era and steampunk were intertwined. The user explores it freely, choosing ways independently. The protagonist was stolen and transported to a gloomy metropolis, whose inhabitants mysteriously disappeared somewhere.

item.title: Railbound
item.description: Game Description Railbound is a fascinating puzzle game on a railway theme, the main characters of which are 2 cute dogs setting off on a trip around the world. In their adventure, they will have to visit bright locations - from green plains to steep mountain slopes, and everywhere they will need to lay ruts in order to continue moving further - to new interesting adventures. You can also pick up passengers along the way and receive additional rewards.

item.title: Brok The Investigator
item.description: Game Description Brok The Investigator is an adventure role -playing game that combines the elements of the action, quest and detective. In the center of history, anthropomorphic creatures. You play for a crocodile-drinker named Brock, investigating a mysterious case. During the game, you have to use not only the bright mind, but also the fists. Choose a detective that has to play. You can be a good cop, trying to resolve conflicts with the help of a good word, or you can knock out information through rough power.

item.title: Queen's Wish 2: The Tormentor
item.description: Game Description Queen’s Wish 2: The Tormentor may be of interest to fans of classic RPGs on PC. This indie project is made in the old school style. It was created by a studio that had previously made several series of budget RPGs. This title is set in a medieval fantasy setting. It has 2D graphics with a top view. To understand the plot and lore, it is not necessary to go through the first part first.

item.title: Justin Wack and the Big Time Hack
item.description: Game Description Justin Wack and the Big Time Hack is a representative of the point-and-click adventure genre. It emulates classic 2D escape games. The video game is about time travel. The plot outline is as follows. Scientist Justin cannot fully recover from his breakup with Julia. One day, a portal appears due to a broken microwave. As a result of this incident, the scientist finds himself in the Stone Age, and the caveman Klut is transported to his time and takes the place of the hero.

item.title: Kalinur
item.description: Game Description Kalinur sends a player on a trip to a huge castle to confront a wizard who plunged the kingdom into suffering. It is necessary to explore the nonlinear card in order to find the sorcerer and put an end to its influence. The main task is to return the world by overcoming the source of disasters. The adventure is built on overcoming serious trials, bringing awards and contributing to advance to the final battle with a powerful magician.

item.title: Lost Branch of Legend
item.description: Game Description Touhou: Lost Branch of Legend will transfer you to the fantastic world of Genskoo. Create your deck using mana of different colors, and then fight with famous characters from the Touhou universe. In this Roguelike builder, there is a constant increase in mana from scattered exhibits, which makes each passage of the game unique. The game can boast of more than 500 unique bullet rains, which accurately recreate the frantic charm of Gennosoko.

item.title: Spirit of the Island
item.description: Game Description Life simulator Spirit of the Island places the player on a tropical island, offering to grow crops, take care of pets, help the locals and much more. Spirit of the Island will require turning the deserted Archipelago into a populated tourist center. However, this requires a lot of effort and a thorny path from a small farm to a noisy city. The danger comes from pirates who are also hunting for treasure and exploring the tropical paradise.

item.title: Regiments
item.description: Game Description Regiments is a real-time strategy game where the Cold War escalated into World War III. Events will unfold in Germany in 1989, which became the main battlefield between NATO armies and the Warsaw Pact. Here the player will be able to become the commander-in-chief of the army: control platoons, call for artillery strikes or air support. Both regular infantry and tanks with fighters will be under control. Squads can be formed and changed directly during battle.

item.title: Rollerdrome
item.description: Game Description The Rollerdrome shooter combines dynamic and vibrant battles, smooth graphics, third-person view and tactical mechanics that allow you to influence the outcome of the battle even with lower chances of winning. The player will have to participate in fierce battles with a variety of opponents. By killing opponents, the main character restores health and replenishes ammunition. During the fight, you can perform spectacular tricks, dodges, or use various tactical movements to eliminate opponents.

item.title: Escape the Backrooms
item.description: Game Description Atmospheric horrorEscape the Backrooms offers cooperative gameplay for up to 4 gamers. A group of people find themselves in a huge and very strange room, from where it is not so easy to find a way out. Users are required to actively interact with each other via voice chat to coordinate actions. It is very important not to separate - you need to move in such a way that users can see each other.

item.title: Cult of the Lamb
item.description: Game Description InCult of the Lamb, finding himself in the lands belonging to the false prophets, the gamer is invited to found his own cult, creating a powerful community of admirers. In an adventure game with roguelike elements, the player needs to spread his word to the forest dwellers, gradually making various forays into countries and regions in order to try to expand the sphere of influence of his religion, making it cover all regions.

item.title: Farthest Frontier
item.description: Game Description Farthest Frontier is a strategic game with the simulator elements. The game is made by all canons of 4x-mechanics. You have to develop your settlement and defend it from an attack by the enemy. Guide your people and try not only to survive, but also to develop. The world of wildlife is fraught with many dangers with which you have to face face every day. Collect resources, go hunting, do fishing or farming - do everything possible to survive in harsh and wild conditions.

item.title: GigaBash
item.description: Game Description GigaBash is an adventure game about huge kaiju monsters capable of destroying entire cities. One day, humanity was faced with a global threat: huge monsters appeared on Earth and began to wage a protracted battle among themselves, destroying human settlements and killing each other. Gigabash talks about how complete chaos reigned on the planet: people fight against unknown creatures, monsters fight with themselves and confront people. Absolute madness and destruction reign.

item.title: Plateup!
item.description: Game Description Plateup! -This is an arcade simulator of cooking and restaurant control with elements of time management. This arcade is designed for cooperative passage. Multiplayer is available through a local network (LAN) and the Internet. There is also the opportunity to play together at the same computer. Single mode is also available. In this video game, users own a whole franchise. Each institution is a separate level. It randomly generates the conditions, climate and visitors.

item.title: Star Valor
item.description: Game Description Star Valor gives many opportunities: to explore the huge expanses of the galaxy on the cosmic shuttle, to extract resources, to trade, to fight and create your own weapons. With the help of flexible tools, you can configure the ship by your own preference. Each decision -making affects relations with fractions and has its consequences. At the start, it is necessary to take the place of the captain of a small ship, to fulfill simple instructions and hire small personnel.

item.title: Civitatem
item.description: Game Description Civitatem is a single-player city-planning simulator with a top-down view and a medieval setting, expressed in the architecture of the buildings available for construction, the clothing of the population and the technologies present. The gamer helps civilians find a place to live to replace the old one, which was destroyed during an attack by bandits. By correctly distributing human resources to all areas of activity under the player’s control, one can achieve immediate growth of the settlement and the discovery of technologies that make life much easier.

item.title: Alchemia: Creatio ex nihilo
item.description: Game Description Alchemia: Creatio Ex Nihilo combines several genres. This is a head-headed game, a step-by-step strategy and a simplified corgorate. The action takes place in the fantasy world, where magic is adjacent to alchemy. The hero travels through the forgotten kingdom, finds artifacts (available 30 species), collects materials, opens recipes (there are 40 varieties here), crafts weapons from them and fights with its help with different monsters. The user can choose a route for his ward on a fork.

item.title: Ctrl Alt Ego
item.description: Game Description Ctrl Alt Ego uses a science fiction setting. The action takes place in the gloomy future. The plot is dedicated to the fate of human consciousness. The game is a first -person shooter and an immersion simulator. It must be controlled by the incorporeal ego of the protagonist. The main character can instill in robots and objects (for example, doors or computers). He cannot really die. In the case of the destruction of the membrane, the hero simply returns to the form of the spirit and does not lose progress.

item.title: Stray
item.description: Game Description Stray takes the player to the distant future, the world of cyberpunk. The story follows the adventures of a lost cat looking for his way home. A stray animal found itself in the fortified city of Kowloon, from which it is not easy to find a way out. People have not lived here for a long time, and the streets are filled with robots. Find out the secrets of a long-abandoned settlement.

item.title: Tor Eternum
item.description: Game Description Tor Eternum is an exciting role -playing online game with a cooperative regime, which offers colorful experience for players looking for exciting adventures. Take friends, because here you can unite with 10 companions and go on a trip through a huge and insidious tower, where surprises and dangers await you at every step. You will meet many enemies that will give you the opportunity to test your skills and strategic skills.

item.title: Sentry City
item.description: Game Description Sentry City, a cyberpunk adventure, immerses gamers in a dystopian future where an evil AI is destroying social order. Taking on the role of a resourceful hacker, the player races through the metropolis on a motorcycle, infiltrating various areas of the city, each of which represents a separate treacherous landscape. Dexterity and quick reflexes are crucial as opponents require precision shooting, intricate puzzles require solving, and formidable AI guardians await confrontation.

item.title: PowerWash Simulator
item.description: Game Description In thePowerWash Simulator you need to clean surfaces from dirt, plaque, rust and much more. The calming and peaceful gameplay of PowerWash Simulator is designed for those who love the noise of dishwashers and love cleanliness. You will have a water pump in your hands that can clean absolutely any surface. Wash away all the dirt from the city and show society who the real professional is here! Do your job carefully and earn reputation points.

item.title: Monument Valley 2: Panoramic Edition
item.description: Game Description Monument Valley 2 is an isometric adventure and puzzle game. What is posted here is not the original version, but a re-release called Panoramic Edition. It contains all previously released additional content. The project was initially released on mobile devices. When transferring the title to PC, the developers adapted the controls. They also added support for ultra-wide monitors and improved the visual component, which can now be admired in Full HD.

item.title: Monument Valley: Panoramic Edition
item.description: Game Description Monument Valley can please connoisseurs of meditative projects. This is a calming puzzle game with hand-drawn graphics in a minimalist style. The title is made in isometry. Video games help develop spatial thinking. All the puzzles in it are based on optical illusions. The puzzles are of moderate difficulty. The cards are made in the style of imp art. In the game you can activate mechanisms and change camera angles.

item.title: Neon Blight
item.description: Game Description Neon Blight is an isometric metroidvania in a cyberpunk setting in which you will manage your own underground weapons store. When collecting unique weapons, you need to sell them at a high price. The game features a huge number of locations. The battles will take place in the scenery of the metropolis of the future, in dense forests, warehouses of large corporations, etc. Most of Neon Blight’s elements are procedurally generated, changing the placement of items and some location details.

item.title: Alaloth: Champions of The Four Kingdoms
item.description: Game Description Action RPGAlaloth: Champions of The Four Kingdoms takes the player into the magical Middle Ages. The story begins in the Valley of Storms - a place where four legendary peoples intersect: Humans, Elves, Dwarves and Orcs. It is here that the cruel god Alaloth is imprisoned. From the very kingdom of the dead, he poisons all kingdoms with his evil. Soon monsters, storms, diseases and mighty dragons will strike this world.

item.title: Surroundead
item.description: Game Description Surroundead is a survival simulator in the open world where the apocalypse happened. In the indie project, you can switch between the view from the first and third-party. Its three -dimensional graphics are made in Low Poly style. According to the plot, a zombie virus appeared on Earth. For 5 years, people fought to him unsuccessfully. As a result, the planet has changed forever. Along the devastated streets, living dead began to roam, and civilization in its level of development rolled back to dark times.

item.title: Last Days of Lazarus
item.description: Game Description Last Days of Lazarus is an excellently executed adventure adventure game, especially in visual terms, the events of which take the gamer to the territory of post-Soviet Russia. The main character is a member of an ancient family who, after a long absence from his homeland, returns home. The reason for this was the suicide of the mother. The protagonist came to support his only relative - his sister Lyudmila.

item.title: Raft
item.description: Game Description Raft is a first-person survival sandbox in which the player will have to survive on a small raft and explore new lands. The main character will begin his journey by waking up hungry and dehydrated on a small wreck of a ship. Get food and drink by catching garbage floating past the hero on the waves. To catch the item, you can use the hook. Find useful items and materials to craft a mug, light a fire, and filter sea water.

item.title: Neon White
item.description: Game Description Neon White is a first-person adventure platformer with card game elements. The gameplay stands out for its incredible dynamics and speed. It is necessary to quickly react to situations and the environment, because enemies, traps, obstacles and other dangers await you at every turn. Events develop behind the pearly gates of Paradise. The task in the game is simple and trivial - you need to destroy all the demons in Heaven.

item.title: Symphony of War: The Nephilim Saga
item.description: Game Description Symphony of War: The Nephilim Saga tells about the events that erupted after the conflict between the Empire of Veridia and Tanra. They fought for a long time, and in the end all these events led to the fact that the first empire remained in losses. However, thanks to the young ruler of Florin, a shaky, but peace finally formed. Everyone began to gradually recover until something terrible happened.

item.title: Attack at Dawn: North Africa
item.description: Game Description Attack at Dawn North Africa is a military-strategic project that takes participants into the conditions of the North African campaign during the Second World War. Players will lead the Axis or Allied forces, taking command of battalions, divisions and air forces across the vast expanses of Libya and Egypt. Set across a vast map stretching from the Gulf of Sirte to the Suez Canal, the action spans the period 1940 to 1943.

item.title: Nemesis: Lockdown
item.description: Game Description Nemesis: Lockdown immerses users in dark adventures that are designed for multiplayer playthroughs with a team. Users will survive and fight off the monsters that are in the dark. You have to cooperate with your partners or go into solo mode. The project is a survival horror game where you need to perform step-by-step actions and think through your moves in advance. The game is based on a board game, which shows a sci-fi setting.

item.title: Fabled Lands
item.description: Game Description Fabled Lands is an old-school RPG adventure. A large open world is presented, available for exploration. The setting immerses you in a fantasy world, in which you have to complete a huge number of main and secondary quests, fight, trade and level up your character. You need to explore an entire continent, taking on the role of a merchant, priest, scientist, thief, magician or soldier. The accumulated funds allow you to buy ships, townhouses, temples and much more.

item.title: Keplerth
item.description: Game Description The events of the futuristic Indo-video trigger Keplerth unfold in the distant future-on the previously unknown planet Kepler. According to the genre, the project can be attributed to the simulator of survival with the possibility of construction and RPG elements. According to the plot, people built a large spaceship, which was supposed to transport the colonists on board to the nearest planet suitable for life. But there is a disaster, as a result of which the ship crashes on an unknown planet.

item.title: Venture Towns
item.description: Game Description Venture Towns allows players to build a city landscape. This project transfers to the gamers the corporation forming a settlement. From the initial structures to vast skyscrapers, the player leads the development, striving for economic superiority. The game emphasizes the deliberate arrangement of various architectural elements, contributing to a systematic approach to urbanistic growth and current economic activity. In Venture Towns, the processes of the construction of objects open the ways for development.

item.title: Shotgun King: The Final Checkmate
item.description: Game Description Shotgun King: The Final Checkmate is an alternate version of chess with elements of classic roguelikes. Users will have to go on action missions, controlling a selected figure with a royal shotgun. The main task for the protagonist will be the destruction of enemy objects on a field designed in the form of a standard chessboard. Players have to destroy the white pieces on behalf of the Black King, who has prepared firearms.

item.title: Lost Nova
item.description: Game Description Lost Nova is an isometric adventure about a trip to space. A spaceship with the main character crashed. The girl was on an alien planet called Lost Nova. Left alone, the protagonist should explore the surface of the planet, collecting useful objects, creating tools, building a base and much more. All this is necessary in order to find the way home. The heroine is the name of Mia. She decided to spend a vacation outside the Earth, but could not even imagine what kind of disaster it would turn out.

item.title: We Were Here Forever
item.description: Game Description Waking up in We Were Here Forever in the dangerous Castle Rock, the hero must figure out how to get out of an ominous place from which there is no way out. In an adventure game with puzzle elements, the protagonist and a friend will have to face dangerous dark forces in order to get out of the trap, or they will remain here forever. The game features a cooperative system that is designed for 2 players, where each puzzle needs to be solved together, performing separate roles, communicating through walkie-talkies and trying to convey to a partner all kinds of information about what they saw and heard.

item.title: HunterX
item.description: Game Description Gamers in HunterX will wander through dark dungeons, exploring a fantasy universe. The project is an action adventure game where you have to fight a variety of monsters. Players will move through side-view locations, encountering hardcore soulslick-style gameplay mechanics. You will have to use the protagonist’s abilities, various fighting stances and magic in battles. The heroine will use a variety of weapons for close combat, delivering slashing and piercing blows.

item.title: Dorfromantik
item.description: Game Description Dorfromantik - strategy in low-poly style. The game encourages you not to think about military strategies and operations. enjoy peaceful buildings and development of your lands. Game mechanics of Dorfromantic combine classic RTS and puzzle. Create a village, developing and expanding, building new buildings on hexagonal tiles. Explore a procedurally generated world filled with diverse and colorful biomes. Complete tasks to fill locations with new life and create truly unique worlds.

item.title: Kapital: Sparks of Revolution
item.description: Game Description Kapital: Sparks of Revolution is a city planning simulator that allows you to deal with all economic issues in managing the capital. Events start at a time when European countries find themselves in a deep systemic crisis. There is a class struggle and it becomes difficult to avoid a social explosion. The player finds himself in such conditions. What price must be paid to save Europe from anarchy?

item.title: Metal Mind
item.description: Game Description Metal Mind is a 2D action roguelike that gives you the opportunity to control a mech that has a mind. The gameplay combines many mechanics and various physical quantities: weight, heat, power, etc. Metal Mind contains elements of looting. It is necessary to look for pieces of armor, improved weapons and create useful items. You have to transform the robot using hundreds of different assemblies. Events take place in a science fiction world where people have been able to build self-developing artificial intelligences that have managed to become self-aware.

item.title: Skabma - Snowfall
item.description: Game Description Skabma - Snowfall immerses you in a mythological setting, where users will take control of a young boy named Áilu. The hero will travel through the Scandinavian regions, encountering mystical creatures and monsters from ancient legends. The game is made in the form of a three-dimensional action-adventure game, where the main emphasis is on the deep storyline of the protagonist. The boy will face difficult challenges, fight enemies and solve various puzzles.

item.title: Teardown
item.description: Game Description Teardown is a robbery simulator in a variety of conditions prepared by indie developers from Tuxedo Labs. Stylistically, the project was made using a voxel graphic component. This solution made it possible to implement complete destructibility of all available objects in the location. This freedom opens up the possibility of performing operations in a variety of ways, improvising on the fly. The gamer will have at his disposal explosives and a sledgehammer for destroying all kinds of surfaces to penetrate the territory, as well as several types of vehicles of different sizes for loading valuables and other things that need to be stolen according to the terms of a particular task.

item.title: Dummynation
item.description: Game Description Gamers in Dummynation will have to try themselves as a world invader, expanding their influence on the planet. The game is a geopolitical simulator where you need to develop your own strategy to improve your political position on the planet. Users will select one of the states to begin gradually expanding their borders. It is necessary to carry out military occupations, declare annexation of selected territories, and much more.

item.title: Stacklands
item.description: Game Description InStacklands you have to build a village, completing various levels in the style of a deck-building battler. Users will collect food, build buildings and fight monsters on a special field using ability cards. It will be possible to use combinations of cards. For example, when you move a “village dweller” to a “berry bush”, “berries” will appear, which the city dweller will consume as food and get a chance to survive.

item.title: Coromon
item.description: Game Description Coromon is a role-playing indie adventure about taming animals for their further fights among themselves, according to the type of Pokemon. This project uses a rare pixel visual design as a tribute to the game industry of the last century. The camera is at an angle to create an isometric view of the world around the world, which is much more examined in this position. The single -user campaign of this game will take a gamer not for one day, and a thorough study will require even more free time.

item.title: Crystal Project
item.description: Game Description Crystal Project is an atmospheric adventure where users will go to explore a fantasy world. The game is a non-linear role-playing adventure game where you will have to collect crystals scattered across the map, discover new abilities and specializations for the character, and also participate in dangerous battles with bosses, developing your own strategy. The hero will have to fulfill an ancient prophecy to restore balance in the territory of Sequoia.

item.title: Polimines
item.description: Game Description Thanks to** Polimines** you can try to swing your own intelligence, as well as strangle to strain your brains. Yes, this is a head-headed game in which the levels will need to go through the locations. But it will not be at all as easy as it might seem at first glance. Therefore, it will be necessary to make all your efforts, as well as understand the basic principle.

item.title: Knights of the Chalice 2
item.description: Game Description Knights of the Chalice 2 immerses users in a fantasy world where they can assemble a squad of 6 adventurers. The heroes are forced to explore dark dungeons, fighting against monsters. The gameplay is made in the form of old-school role-playing adventure games with a top-down view, where you need to give instructions to characters on an isometric map. The rules are based on the tabletop role-playing game Dungeon & Dragons 3.

item.title: Black Geyser: Couriers of Darkness
item.description: Game Description Black GEYSER: Couriers of Darkness - role -playing party game based on classical mechanics of old -school RPG: isometric camera, active pause, etc. The team can have up to 5 people. At the same time, the campaign can be passed alone, traveling around the world only the main character. As in any worked out and large -scale role -playing game, you have to perform many epic quests, pump your abilities, choose a character class and even build a romantic relationship.

item.title: From Lex to Rex
item.description: Game Description From Lex to Rex is an atmospheric adventure in a medieval setting, where you take control of a treacherous character named Lex. The hero wants to take a place in an aristocratic family, taking power away from Rex by deception. The gameplay is a point-and-click quest where you interact with interactive objects on the screen to solve intricate puzzles. The game is made in old-school pixel graphics, where you can visit many thematic locations.

item.title: Shredders
item.description: Game Description Shredders is a snowboarding simulator. The indie project contains a large number of references for fans of this sport and related media products. You can play it alone or with other users online. For single-player fans, there is a single-player story mode. The plot begins with the protagonist and best friend Scotty trying to make entertaining videos about winter extreme sports. A representative of one of the brands named Lisa contacts them and offers sponsorship along with participation in the championship.

item.title: Wobbledogs
item.description: Game Description Wobbledogs is a bright sandbox with simulation elements, based on funny physics and funny ragdoll. The gameplay is a pet simulator. Take care and raise fancy dogs. They can change shape and mutate. Acid colors, funny style and cute animals are the basis of such an unusual project. Wobbledogs helps you learn how to take care of your pets. At the beginning of their life, dogs behave relatively calmly and normally.

item.title: Iron Lung
item.description: Game Description Gamers in Iron Lung will plunge into dark adventures aboard the Iron Lung submarine. The game is designed as a horror adventure where players need to make their way through the ocean on the surface of an alien moon. Users will move as a first-person character through various locations, represented by corridors and rooms on the ship. You will have to navigate the environment using the central window, as well as monitoring the data on the dashboard.

item.title: Buccaneers!
item.description: Game Description Buccaneers adventures! takes gamers to a pirate setting, where they can become a fearless captain and go in search of lost treasures. You will have to face enemy ships, change the course of history and join one of the unique factions in order to seize full power over the Caribbean Sea. There are 4 sides in the game: British, French, Spanish and the formidable Pirate League. Each group will have unique abilities, appearances, and fighting styles during the battle at sea.

item.title: HordeCore
item.description: Game Description HordeCore is a dynamic scrolling shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world. You can play alone or join forces with other players to survive together in a city plagued by a zombie epidemic. Explore, fight, survive, craft, customize, etc. Become the leader of a group that is constantly growing with new people. Try to find as many supplies as possible, develop your team’s skills, and make traps and various devices.

item.title: Pets at Work
item.description: Game Description Pets at Work is a colorful arcade puzzle adventure game designed for local multiplayer that revolves around a group of funny animals who have lost their owners in an office building. To find people, pets must interact as a team using boxes, mats, buttons and climbing on shelves and tables. Dozens of levels have been implemented, each of which has more than six different mechanics, which provides players with exciting and dynamic gameplay.

item.title: Milling Machine Simulator 3D
item.description: Game Description Milling Machine Simulator 3D allows players to try themselves in the role of a master who will work at a milling machine. He will go out to drill, grind, cut and mill in a small hut where the protagonist’s private workshop is located. The game performs a training function, made in the form of a simulator of working at a machine in three-dimensional space, where realistic physics and the ability to carefully inspect components and equipment are implemented.

item.title: SCP: 5k
item.description: Game Description SCP: 5k - cooperative shooter in the first person with the elements of the horror. Play both alone and unite with friends. The game is represented by hardcore complexity. Particular attention is paid to the detailed environment and plot. The team can have up to four people. Go to a complex and saturated adventure! The story of SCP: 5k talks about how a foreign creature was discovered in the human psyche, which is responsible for all negative features: pain, cruelty, etc.

item.title: Firelight Fantasy: Force Energy
item.description: Game Description Firelight Fantasy: Force Energy is an action-adventure game that gives you the opportunity to engage in energetic sword fights with the enemy and plunge into an interesting story. The game is created on the basis of Scandinavian mythology, describing many non-standard legends, gods and their powers. The gamer will have to pick up a sword and gain strength that was previously only possessed by the celestials. The protagonist can immerse himself in a fascinating story and learn more about the bloody battle between Thor and Grungnir.

item.title: OlliOlli World
item.description: Game Description OlliOlli World is the third part of an exciting action game where every user can feel like a professional skateboarder and perform several difficult tricks without the risk of driving face-first on the asphalt. The game will gladly welcome both experienced gamers and those who are getting acquainted with the universe for the first time. There is no clear linear plot, and the character can be completely customized without worrying about ride comfort.

item.title: Chaos Chain
item.description: Game Description Chaos Chain is a role-playing project, which takes place in a dystopian world, where every alley hides danger, and every corner is fraught with the possibility of betrayal. The plot takes place in Slade City, a gloomy metropolis where crime, corruption and constant struggle for power reign. As a gamer, you step into the well-worn shoes of a citizen caught in the suffocating grip of this city. This place is not for the faint of heart.

item.title: Hidden Deep
item.description: Game Description Hidden Deep is a sci-fi thriller with shooter and puzzle elements. The scene of action is an oceanic underwater base located at a depth of 1.6 kilometers. The single-player campaign, which takes 20 hours to complete, begins with the recording of anomalous activity on the territory of the research laboratory. A group of rescuers was sent to reconnaissance of the situation and stayed there for more than a year, after which contact with them was interrupted.

item.title: Mirror 2: Project X
item.description: Game Description Mirror 2: Project X follows the adventures of Dinkudin Naoto, who collaborates with the FBI (Federal Bureau of Research and Conservation). The hero searches for mystical manifestations and otherworldly creatures that sometimes appear in the world. The plot begins with a story with a Demon that infects the body of one of the victims. During the proceedings and investigation of the case, the protagonist will find out the motivations and goals of the creatures in order to make a choice to support or destroy the monster.

item.title: Red Tether
item.description: Game Description Red Tether is a cosmic action with a view of the top, where the battle is completely dependent on the system of harpoons with cables. The player will have to resist huge armada, having at their disposal only this device for navigation according to the procedurally created fields filled with asteroids and fragments. Key project mechanics are focused on indirect destruction: enemy vessels are skillfully tied and pulled with force for destructive clashes.

item.title: Idle Calibur
item.description: Game Description Idle Calibur combines a study of the open world with tactical RPG tactical and real -time mechanics in real time. The gameplay is focused on the construction of a city, which serves to recruit heroes with special abilities. Battles can be automatically due to IDLE function, or you can take direct manual control of your detachments during the fight. Key tasks include the collection of forces to attack other settlements on the world map and participate in structured tests with bosses for development.

item.title: DeadPoly
item.description: Game Description The DeadPoly universe has undergone colossal changes that have turned the lives of humanity upside down. A disaster occurred due to problems in the laboratory, where scientists did not keep track of the spread of the terrible virus. The planet gradually began to become infected, and people mutated into the walking dead, aggressively opposed to any other forms of life. The user takes control of a character who is destined to find himself in a brutal post-apocalyptic environment, where many factors besides creatures pose danger.

item.title: Firelight Fantasy: Vengeance
item.description: Game Description Firelight Fantasy: Vengeance may be of interest to fans of Norse mythology. The plot of the indie project is based on the legend of Sigurd’s betrayal. The entire story, including descriptions, dialogues and monologues, is presented in text form with a demonstration of local beauty in the background. This is a fantasy slasher film with a third-person perspective. In this game, the user controls a warrior who looks like a Viking.

item.title: Black One Blood Brothers
item.description: Game Description Black One Blood Brothers is a full-fledged immersion in combat operations, where users will take control of a special forces squad. The game is made in the genre of tactical sandbox shooter, designed for one player. Gameplay mechanics are made in the style of the Rainbow six and Ghost Recon projects. Users will perform secret missions (JSO), where the protagonist has to move from a first-person perspective, taking on the role of a French naval officer serving in the Marine Corps.

item.title: Ship Simulator Realistic
item.description: Game Description Ship Simulator Realistic, as the name suggests, is a maritime simulator. The game gives you the opportunity to sail on different ships in the waters of Greece. There are 7 islands available with a day and night cycle. The indie project contains a single-player free-swimming mode and multiplayer available via the Internet. There is also a level editor. This title has realistic physics. The engine can realistically simulate sea waves and foam when moving vehicles.

item.title: Motor Town: Behind the Wheel
item.description: Game Description Motor Town: Behind the Wheel is a car simulator that focuses on realistic physics and individual behavior of machines. A large open world presented in low polygonal style is available for research. Explore the streets of the city both by car and on foot, take part in racing races, tunen transport and much more. At your disposal of Maslkar. Just roll around the world, take with you on the trip of fellow travelers, go to the warehouse where you can do the sorting or delivery of goods to earn money.

item.title: Brutal Orchestra
item.description: Game Description Immersion in Brutal Orchestra allows users to venture into a brutal world filled with insidious demons and grotesque monsters. The game is designed as a turn-based strategy with roguelike elements and deck building. Players will be exploring levels, searching for ancient artifacts and fighting treacherous monsters. You have to make deals with the devil and try to find a way out to save your own soul. The protagonist in Hieronymus Bosch’s Brutal Orchestra dies and finds himself in purgatory, where he must wander through mysterious locations and cope with difficult challenges.

item.title: Mon Bazou
item.description: Game Description While repairing a car inMon Bazou, players have to deal with a variety of everyday problems that affect the life of the main character. The protagonist is a guy who dreams of turning his old car into a racing car that can compete with professional drivers and reach great speed. The game is made in the form of a simulator, where users have to take on the role of a novice racer who will live the everyday routine and do simple things, trying to earn a living.

item.title: Milk outside a bag of milk outside a bag of milk
item.description: Game Description The narrative adventureMilk outside a bag of milk outside a bag of mil continues the story of the previous part. The player finds himself in a crazy and mysterious world filled with different combinations of unusual colors and surreal events. On a new journey, you will again have to help the young girl become a little happier. Initially she will be terrified, but as she progresses she will meet new people and realize her own dreams.

item.title: Sands of Salzaar
item.description: Game Description Sands of Salzaar is a strategic game whose actions unfold in the Salzaara desert. Fight with numerous hostile factions, gathering your own army and developing your city. Choose your character, profession and faction, on whose side your army will have to fight. The eastern land is filled with various secrets and you have to solve them all. Sands of Salzaar events talk about an exotic old empire that once ruled the desert.

item.title: Savage Lands
item.description: Game Description Savage Lands is a fantasy survival game on PC in a medieval setting. Before starting the game, you are invited to customize your character a little: hair, skin color, face, tattoos. Next, you appear on the shore of the island. The wreckage of a boat is visible in the water. The only thought in my head is: “What am I doing here?” The interface is very simple: in the right corner of the screen there is a guide or tasks that you can complete.

item.title: Noble Fates
item.description: Game Description The fantasy world of Noble Fates immerses you in adventures taking place in a fairy-tale kingdom. A group of gods oversee the plane of human material existence while mortals vie for control over territories and new lands. The main character is Contra, who is a demigod and capable of influencing people and other inhabitants of the planet. It will be possible to manage entire colonies of settlers in order to achieve prosperity for the future great civilization.

item.title: One Hand Clapping
item.description: Game Description One Hand Clapping is a musical puzzle game where you need to overcome obstacles with the help of your singing. The structure is a familiar platformer, where the heroine travels through fictional and unusual worlds. Moreover, all puzzles and puzzles are solved directly thanks to the voice. The intensity of singing affects the structure of the world. This game is about how you can find confidence and freedom both in your voice and within yourself.

item.title: Breakwaters
item.description: Game Description In Breakwaters, the player will reconnolate the procedurally generated world with monstrous ocean depths and huge titans that change the method of interaction with water. Water is replaced by powerful crystals obtained in the mine. The user is able to delve into its bowels to collect rare objects, build obstacles to restrain the ocean or block waves, and help people after destruction. Titans, creatures of an extinct submarine race, wander around the world, causing cataclysms.

item.title: Perfect Heist 2
item.description: Game Description The dynamic adventures in Perfect Heist 2 allow you to feel the atmosphere of a team of robbers who are hoping to commit the last global robbery and go to the bottom. Players will take control of the protagonist, who will participate in a dangerous operation, where they need to thoughtfully and harmoniously carry out certain actions with a group of partners. You have to quietly make your way through traps and police barricades, hoping to wait for the perfect moment and knock out one of the bank employees so that you can use the clothes as a disguise.

item.title: Fights in Tight Spaces
item.description: Game Description Fights in Tight Spaces - a mixture of a card game with a step -by -step strategy and animated battles made in classical setting. Here, a gamer will learn to build his own tactics in any conditions, knocking out the right cards and their location in order to win in battles. To create a deck in the game, there are 150 cards compiled taking into account the abilities of the enemy.

item.title: Mud and Blood
item.description: Game Description The rethought project MUD and Blood is a shootout between the two sides of the conflict, where the user has to observe the events. The setting transfers during the Second World War, where soldiers converge in battles. The updated engine and improved artificial intelligence allows you to try out the old classic flash game, filled with innovations in terms of functions and a graphic component that immerses gameplay into the process.

item.title: Thrive
item.description: Game Description Thrive users will try themselves as an observer, which will track the natural evolution of cells living on an alien planet. The game is a simulator where you have to survive in a dangerous environment with competing species that are fighting for resources. Players will take control of an organism that emerged from the last universal ancestor called LUCA. The main goal for the hero is survival and adaptation to new mutations.

item.title: Factory Town
item.description: Game Description The urban planning simulator, which combined the classical and engineering development of the city. You will have to take all aspects of the life of the population. The creation of a gas pipeline, water supply, the construction of municipal buildings, the design of roads and markings, as well as a functional component, which allows your people to get to work faster and mines resources in principle. There is no restriction on the creation of a whole settlement in Factory Town, which will function the way you want, but, remember that in your perspective the creation of a city in which people will be really comfortable to exist.

item.title: Gunfire Reborn
item.description: Game Description The shooterGunfire Reborn contains elements of a roguelike and role-playing game. The player can choose to control several heroes with individual abilities. The game has a huge amount of randomness, from procedurally generated locations to dropped guns and loot. Gunfire Reborn is designed for both one and a company of up to 4 people. The game features 100 different types of items. Various mechanics will encourage you to study each fighter presented, who are more or less suitable for a specific situation and location.

item.title: Dysmantle
item.description: Game Description Dysmantle offers gamers to survive on the island and find a way to get out of this place. The local post -apocalyptic world is not gloomy. There is no atmosphere of hopelessness here either. The game has a bright cartoon graphics with juicy colors. During the end of the world, the protagonist hides in an underground bunker. Once the hero crawls out and discovers that people and animals have turned into evil creatures similar to zombies.

item.title: Urge
item.description: Game Description Urge is an exciting and addictive game that immerses you in a post-apocalyptic environment where users take on the role of a car accident survivor. The plot revolves around a mysterious drug called fog that has corrupted the world. This substance reacts to actions, shaping the environment and influencing the behavior of enemies encountered. The game mechanics offer a fun experience while allowing you to make strategic choices. Making short work of enemies by shooting them in the head may seem like a viable option, but it comes with consequences.

item.title: Synthetik 2
item.description: Game Description In Synthetik 2, the player will fight with ruthless opponents and inexorable bosses enclosed in a constantly changing environment. The fighting offers to use 15+ types of weapons with distinctive abilities. The user is able to configure weapons and change the passage style. The central character is pumped by increasing the level or obtaining a new equipment. The gameplay includes a single -user and cooperative regime. Innovations at Synthetik 2:

item.title: Ziggurat 2
item.description: Game Description Ziggurat 2 is a continuation of the single-player first-person shooter with the most dynamic gameplay and an unusual setting. A huge number of special effects that appear on the monitor screen during battles have high-quality visualization thanks to the use of a modern engine. The main feature of the project is the procedural generation of locations, which allows you to replay the campaign many times and not end up in the same rooms with your enemies.

item.title: Kathy Rain: Director's Cut
item.description: Game Description Kathy Rain: Director’s Cut is an expanded version of the original project, in the center of which Kathy Rain finds herself on a deadly and interesting adventure. The gameplay has undergone many changes, and innovations have also appeared. The story has been expanded, many locations and new puzzles with previously non-existent mechanics and objects for interaction have been added. The event takes place in the 1990s. The game is a rethinking of a standard project released back in 2016.

item.title: Logic World
item.description: Game Description Logic World can captivate engineers and science enthusiasts, or serve as a teaching tool. The puzzle game asks you to assemble various digital circuits. The simulation of their work is as close as possible to the real world. With their help you can solve various mathematical problems. In addition to solving puzzles, players can build everything from scratch. Logic World allows you not only to assemble virtual hardware, but also to program it.

item.title: Escape Simulator
item.description: Game Description Escape Simulator is a first-person puzzle game aimed at cooperative play. The gameplay is a quest room in which you need to solve all the puzzles and successfully leave the room. Quests, tasks and item locations are randomly generated, thereby increasing the replayability of the project. The environment is completely interactive. You can interact with any objects, picking them up and rotating them in any plane. You can inspect objects, move furniture, break, destroy fragile vases and much more.

item.title: Inscryption
item.description: Game Description Inscryption is a card adventure with roguelike elements that focuses on the fact that the darkness still hides many unknown secrets. The strategy is made in an escape the room format, has multiple puzzles and a terrifying atmosphere. The user is transported to the goblin’s hut, where he needs to embark on dangerous adventures to find out what secrets are hidden in this building. The events take place in a forest house, where the protagonist is trapped by some sinister creature who wants the guy to play board games with him.

item.title: Evil Tonight
item.description: Game Description Evil Tonight is an action-adventure game with role-playing game elements. Take control of a brave heroine who is not afraid to look Evil in the eye. As an experienced exorcist, the girl Sylvia encounters numerous horrors of ancient estates and crypts. She has the unusual ability to materialize evil and fight it in open battle. The visual side is represented by pixel style. Face ghosts and other evil spirits as you unravel the mystery of a huge mansion.

item.title: The Riftbreaker
item.description: Game Description The Riftbreaker is a survival adventure role-playing game that has some mechanics taken straight from real-time strategy and action games. The project has dynamic gameplay, using an isometric camera to create the most convenient and complete view around the female protagonist named Ashley Novak. She has a powerful invention of mankind - a combat mech named “Mr. Riggs”, which helps to most effectively fight the various monsters that inhabit the planet Galatea-37, where the single-player campaign takes place, designed for dozens of hours of gameplay.

item.title: Junkyard Simulator
item.description: Game Description Explore open environments in Junkyard Simulator in search of trash that can be used to upgrade and create cars. The main character’s business is searching for junk, purchasing parts and creating cars. The whole world is a dump, full of scrap metal and useful items. In the nooks and crannies of landfills, the character will find the best items. Found items are sold for good money, but they are also used in the workshop.

item.title: The Last Campfire
item.description: Game Description The Last Campfire is a project from the studio that developed No Man’s Sky. It is made in cartoonish, bright graphics, each of the landscapes is unique and creates new details of the world. The story is presented in the genre of an adventure quest.
