The protagonist will be a coal shining with kindness. He got lost in the forest because a strong current knocked his boat off course and washed ashore.

item.title: Urban Tale
item.description: Game Description The immersion in Urban Tale is made in the form of a role-playing adventure, where you have to go to conquer a big city. The game creates a life simulation where the main character tries to succeed in life. The user’s choices and decisions made along the way will determine what area the protagonist will go into to develop. You have to start from scratch, trying to find your way from the possible options.

item.title: Vagrus - The Riven Realms
item.description: Game Description Vagrus - The Riven Realms is a role-playing game with strategy elements where you will need to take control of the leader of the caravan and survive in a dark surreal world. Lead a travel company, recruit powerful warriors into your ranks and travel across the mainland, fighting enemies and earning useful materials. Explore a vast continent filled with unique locations, strange factions, and numerous dangers. Many minor characters can be interacted with and communicated with.

item.title: Touhou Mystia's Izakaya
item.description: Game Description Touhou Mystia’s Izakaya takes gamers to a fictional Japanese town called Gensoke, where the young and very charming owner of the local night izakaya lives. This term usually refers to a night drinking establishment where people gather, usually after a night shift, and drink alcoholic beverages. The protagonist is the beautiful Mistia Lorelei, who has a dream to make the entire establishment the most popular in the city.

item.title: Bonfire Peaks
item.description: Game Description The Bonfire Peaks user finds himself on a voxel island and faced with numerous puzzles. The mysterious place hides many mysteries and artifacts that will need to be reached by interacting with moving objects. The main character will burn his own property and face deadly traps. The world is three-dimensional and allows you to move in all directions, but strictly in blocks. The playing area is divided into squares.

item.title: MADNESS: Project Nexus
item.description: Game Description MADNESS: Project Nexus is a three-dimensional dynamic shooter with a side view, as well as a huge number of opponents and violence that happens on the monitor screen. The arcade controls are easy to remember, allowing you to quickly start enjoying the gameplay. This project from indie developers is a driving mixture of beat’em’up and slasher using not only melee weapons, but also firearms with different damage. The main feature of the gameplay is the ability to play cooperatively on one personal computer.

item.title: Elijah and the out of this world adventure
item.description: Game Description Elijah and the out of this world adventure will show a journey through Cleveland, Ohio, where a regular night turns into an incredible nightmare. The story begins with the fact that Elijah, a simple person working in a local grocery store, is attacked by an alien creature after the end of his shift. Waking up, he sees that his hometown in chaos. The military blocked the territory, and to explain the situation they come up with a bizarre legend about the spill of chemicals.

item.title: Medieval Dynasty
item.description: Game Description Medieval Dynasty is an adventure in medieval Europe, where nobles and clergy rule. The country conducts active trade with its neighbors and is prospering. You will become a poor man who lives by hunting and farming. Go from a loner to the head of a community. Set up a small camp and turn it into your own settlement. Find food by chasing wild animals, including deer, wild boar and rabbits.

item.title: Erannorth Chronicles
item.description: Game Description Erannorth Chronicles combines an RPG and a card game. It’s also a sandbox. There is no complete single plot here. The indie title invites users to entertain themselves: explore the open world, fight monsters, upgrade their character, and participate in random events. You can also go treasure hunting or take tests. This CCG has a high barrier to entry due to the large number of deep mechanics that gamers have to figure out for themselves.

item.title: TOEM
item.description: Game Description TOEM is an adventure puzzle game made in black and white style. Go fancy. expedition, revealing the secrets of the magical world of TOEM. The visual style is made entirely in a hand-drawn monochrome manner. Meet funny characters and help solve their problems. Travel the world and take different photos. Puzzles revolve around exploring the environment and taking pictures. By taking a photo, you can find the answer to your question, thereby helping local animals with pressing problems.

item.title: Virtual Surfing
item.description: Game Description Virtual Surfing may be suitable for fans of sports games. The title offers to harness the sea and ocean waves. The project lives up to its name. This is an arcade surfing simulator. It boasts well-developed water physics. It has different weather conditions and several locations. At the very beginning, the gamer is asked to enter a name. And then the user is offered to customize the appearance of his surfer (there is a choice of gender) and customize the board.

item.title: Gas Station Simulator
item.description: Game Description GAS Station Simulator - simulator of owning its own refueling, combined with the raising station for road transport, which is located in deserted areas, near the number 66, which is in the United States of America. There is an opportunity to control the gameplay using a gamepad. The player will have to refuel with all the affairs with the help of a virtual protege with a first -person view.

item.title: Scrapnaut
item.description: Game Description Scrapnaut stands out against the background of other sandboxes with elements of survival with its concept. The hero has to fight for life in an open world using the surroundings of steampunk. He periodically fights steam robots and is engaged in the study of the surroundings. On the back, the protagonist wears an oxygen cylinder, so it is important to monitor the level of air. The appearance of the adventurer can be changed due to the change of clothing.

item.title: TimberBorn
item.description: Game Description TimberBorn allows you to develop a beaver colony. The game does not claim realism, because rodents behave and move like people. This is a full -fledged urban planning simulator. The settlement has to rebuild in the world where humanity has disappeared, leaving behind the exhausted land. In an alternative future, the planet suffers from drought. To control the water resource in TimberBorn, you can build dams and dig channels.

item.title: Residual
item.description: Game Description Residual is a platformer with elements of the survival simulator. The game can boast of the worked out pixel graphics and procedural generation of the world. It is made in a science fiction setting. According to the plot, the hero crashes on one of the planets in the forgotten part of the galaxy. Its task is to study alien technologies and find a way to fix a starship.

item.title: Webbed
item.description: Game Description The story ofWebbed revolves around a happy little spider who tries to save her boyfriend from a huge and annoying bird. Take control of the spider and overcome difficult obstacles until you reach the main character’s beloved. Navigate through dangerous locations where predators live or difficult deadly objects are located. Explore the dangerous desert using your character’s abilities and your wits. Visit the tropics, slums and dungeons, where you will encounter original obstacles and enemies.

item.title: Cookie Clicker
item.description: Game Description Cookie Clicker lives up to its name. This is a clicker about earning cookies. The title is considered one of the first such games. The project developed and popularized an entire genre. Initially it was a browser. Here is an improved version of Cookie Clicker. The re-release boasts an achievement system with 500 achievements, 600 improvements, the ability to exchange some goodies for others, and receiving constant upgrades. There are also mini-games here.

item.title: Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous
item.description: Game Description Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous - RPG about the fight against demons. Here the player will have to become a legendary warrior, and at the same time understand the true price of good and evil. The story will begin with a fault in the abyss. Crowds of terrible demons escaped from their imprisonment and now they want to enslave this world. The main character and his team of brave fighters with evil will be opposed to them.

item.title: Lake
item.description: Game Description Lake is a humorous open world adventure game. You need to play as a girl, Meredith Weiss, who decides to take a vacation and go to her hometown. At the same time, she volunteers to help her father with his work, replacing him for some time at the postal company. Once ready, she heads to Providence Oaks, Oregon, where a stunning lake and many locals await her. The events of the game take place in 1986.

item.title: Mecha Knights: Nightmare
item.description: Game Description Mecha Knights: Nightmare takes place in the near future. Here in 2049, with the peak of another Cold War between NATO and the Russian-Chinese alliance, the conflict is about to go global. But suddenly, humanity’s worst nightmare comes - demonic creatures begin to appear out of nowhere, wreaking havoc on Earth. As a young American pilot, Ethan, who finds himself at the epicenter of what is happening, the user will have to fight the creatures using a mechanized military development called “Mobile Armor”.

item.title: Sprocket
item.description: Game Description Sprocket will give gamers an unusual experience, because here they will create their own designs and models of tanks. Here you can not only manipulate the type of hull and guns, but also study the specifics of armor to make your model more practical. Variations from different periods are available here, from the early stages of the First World War to the last years of the Second World War.

item.title: Myst
item.description: Game Description In Myst, the user finds himself on a mysterious island about which almost nothing is known. And it is the main character who will have to unravel the mystery of this place, passing through numerous locations and solving a number of puzzles. Each puzzle will lift the veil of secrecy, allowing you to learn about what happened here before, as well as reveal details of the plot. The essence of the gameplay is to move in the indicated direction and solve current puzzles.

item.title: City Game Studio: A Tycoon ABOUT GAME DEV
item.description: Game Description City Game Studio: A Tycoon ABOUT GAME DEV is a strategic simulator in which it is important not only to chase the demand of players, but also be able to reduce expenses and vice versa, be able to spend money where they are actually needed. Games developers presented a simulator in which you will have to develop a company that develops games. A small studio creating video games decided to expand, so you must make every effort to create a whole headquarters of developers who can satisfy the needs of modern gamers.

item.title: The Doors of Trithius
item.description: Game Description The Doors of Trithius is a RPG -Rogalik in the fantasy world with procedurally generated content. Here you have to fight monsters, avoid traps, collect prey and much more, traveling along the mysterious world of Enalia. Every time you start the game, you have to explore the new generated city, dungeon and map of the world. Movement and battle use a unique time system, returning the priority of the player based on the speed of weapons or action, maintaining tactical decisions, as well as knowledge about your enemies.

item.title: My Garage
item.description: Game Description My Garage is a simulator simulator with a first -person view. In it you can not only repair cars, but also ride them. During travel by transport, you can switch the camera angle. In Indo Tailet, weather conditions are changing. The change of day and night is also available. When driving in the dark, you can turn on the headlights. My Garage has an open world. It consists of mountains, forests, a field, rivers and attractions, like a lighthouse.

item.title: Death Trash
item.description: Game Description Death Trash is an isometric RPG in the world of post -apocalypse, in which there is total devastation and harsh pancakes with guns. The game is a mixture of cyberpunk, science fiction, horrors and dark fantasy. All locations are made manually. The storyline can be held both alone and in the company with a friend. There is a splitiskrin mode. Game events take place on the Nexus planet.

item.title: Clone Drone in the Danger Zone
item.description: Game Description Clone Drone in the Danger Zone is an exciting arcade game in which the player will play as a person whose mind has been transferred into an iron robot! The player enters the arena with the only task - to survive. It is worth considering that each opponent is endowed with individual characteristics and skills, so winning will not be easy. Each blow is under the close attention of a robot commentator, who will cover the course of the battle and your actions throughout it.

item.title: Mini MotorWays
item.description: Game Description Mini MotorWays - Top -Daw Simulator, which allows you to develop the city, building buildings, infrastructure, roads, etc. It is necessary to build a huge metropolis, filling it with highways, highways, in various ways, etc. It is important to create the best option to avoid traffic jams and accidents. The problem of urban traffic is the most important question for any mayor. The Mini MotorWays game process is a real puzzle in which it is necessary to solve the problem with the movement of transport.

item.title: Ancient Life
item.description: Game Description Ancient Life is a simulator in which the main goal is to live an eventful life in the vastness of ancient China, where the ending of one generation serves as the starting point for a new one. The project invites you to immerse yourself in a detailed reconstruction of the era, offering a wide range of activities from farming and handicrafts to hunting or a career as a government official.

item.title: Wrestling Empire
item.description: Game Description In Wrestling Empire the player becomes a participant in the World Lightweight Championship. It is necessary to manage an athlete in the ring, apply his abilities and win rivals. The battles are presented in real time with extensive visual effects. This part includes a smooth frequency of personnel and modern graphics, while leaving the atmosphere of retro-style. This version has more functions and capabilities in pumping and battles. The user will face unique opponents with the original characteristic and special skills.

item.title: The Fermi Paradox
item.description: Game Description The Fermi Paradox is a fantastic setting strategy. The gameplay is focused on choosing a plot, which will affect the player’s decisions, the place of travel and presented civilizations. It is necessary to conduct races and types of creatures through tens of centuries, helping them to study the expanses of the universe, establish contacts with other living organisms and create harmony. Being the ruler of an alien civilization, you will need to direct them to prosperity, help survive, collect radio signals from long stars and make contact with new races.

item.title: Doki Doki Literature Club Plus!
item.description: Game Description Doki Doki Literature Club Plus! is a visual novel, the plot tells the story of a student who joins a literature club. Most of the passage is focused on interactions with the girls who are part of the team. The gameplay is similar to other projects in this genre. The player gets few interactive moments. Only occasionally do elections appear that significantly affect the further passage. The scenes in Doki Doki consist of static 2D images with drawn anime characters.

item.title: Momiji From Purgatory
item.description: Game Description Momiji From Purgatory is a first-person adventure in which a young student finds himself embroiled in a series of frightening events after his infidelity is discovered. The campus, which was once an ordinary place of study, is transformed into a location filled with traps and a strange atmosphere. The main task is to save your true love, making your way through a dangerous environment. The protagonist’s path is complicated by persecution from obsessed fans, creating constant tension.

item.title: PULSAR: Lost Colony
item.description: Game Description PULSAR: Lost Colony is a cooperative space simulator in which you will control a star shuttle and explore outer space. Players take on a specific role on the ship: captain, pilot, scientist, weapons specialist, or engineer. Only coordinated work will lead to victory over the enemy. While traveling through the universe, you need to scan the planets for life or useful resources. There will always be dangers along the way, so it is possible to launch a warp jump to avoid a collision and escape from the upcoming battle.

item.title: Cruelty Squad
item.description: Game Description Cruelty Squad is an immersive simulator that includes elements of stealth and first-person shooter. You will need to penetrate the depths of a high-tech corporation to stop its atrocities. A huge arsenal of weapons is available, including shotguns, darts, pistols, launchers and much more. The difficulty increases with each new stage. It is necessary to take part in intense firefights with a huge number of different enemies. It is possible to emerge victorious from a fight without death.

item.title: Luna's Fishing Garden
item.description: Game Description Luna’s Fishing Garden is a two -dimensional adventure, the mechanics of which are tied to research, fishing and construction. Traveling through the surrounding waters, you need to catch fish to sell it to the fox. A dream garden is being built with the proceeds. The heroine can plant trees and plants, construct water bodies, as well as populate animals on developing islands. The game process Luna’s Fishing Garden has no restrictions and timers - everything can be done at its pace, enjoying the pacifying gameplay.

item.title: Rise Eterna
item.description: Game Description The story of Rise Eterna follows Lua as she attempts to uncover the secrets of her own origins. The gameplay combines tactical elements and RPG in a Japanese animated style. The user will assemble a squad of characters with special skills and characteristics. A squad can have up to 14 wards. The heroes will go through brutal battles, dungeons and boss encounters. As the player progresses, he discovers a dark and mature story centered around the relationship between two lost souls.

item.title: Fuzz Dungeon
item.description: Game Description Fuzz Dungeon is an arcade adventure that combines elements of role-playing games, platformers, puzzles and many other genres. The plot begins when a sexy sasquatch amulet appears in the world, absorbing all living things. The main character will have to overcome 15 absurd levels to return everything to normal. As the adventure progresses, the protagonist realizes that he can create a new society in which he no longer needs to work.

item.title: DOOMBRINGER
item.description: Game Description DOOMBRINGER is an uncompromising arena shooter, the gameplay formula of which is built on rapid movement, merciless destruction of enemies and masterful use of the arsenal. Confrontation with opponents is devoid of an element of chance, since each attack is predictable and can be prevented, which transfers all responsibility for survival to the skill of the gamer himself. The visual style refers to the classics of the genre, and the movement system with an emphasis on expressive jumping and jumping allows you to navigate the well-designed maps as efficiently as possible.

item.title: Reskue
item.description: Game Description Reskue sends an agent to a silent space station in deep space to investigate the reasons for the loss of communication and salvation of scientific personnel. The main mission is to awaken scientists from cryostasis, emerging from it in a disoriented state and in need of protection. The mysterious hostile force has taken control of the object, turning the station technology against the survivors. The operative must dispose of available equipment and ammunition, moving along dangerous locations divided into cells, and controlling the ship on radioactive fuel.

item.title: Tennis Elbow 4
item.description: Game Description Tennis Elbow 4 allows gamers to try themselves in tennis competitions, where simple and intuitive management is implemented. It is ahead to go to the courts to take part in tournament tests. The game emphasizes the realism of the events, allowing you to fully feel the possibilities of athletes. We will have to think through your tactics on the field, as well as to carefully monitor the actions of the opponent in order to react to his attacks in a timely manner.

item.title: Tunguska: The Visim
item.description: Game Description After the fall of the meteorite, in Tunguska: The Visitation begins the invasion of mutants. Having fallen to the ground in the Tunguska area, the alien body caused the transformation of all local residents. As a result, a special zone is formed here, the main goal in which is to survive and survive against enemies. The game often has to make a difficult choice, on the result of which its own existence depends.

item.title: Going Medieval
item.description: Game Description Going Medieval is a simulator in which you need to build a fortress on the ruins of an old castle and equip it to protect your settlement. Any event can affect the mood of your people, so you need to satisfy all their needs and be a good king. Events unfold in the era of the dark Middle Ages of the late XIV century. Only five percent of the population survived after a heavy plague epidemic.

item.title: Truck Driver
item.description: Game Description Truck Driver is a simulator in which you have to build a career as a truck driver. At the beginning of the game, select your character, be it a man or a woman, and get behind the wheel of a truck. Your task is to transport various goods and cargo. The better you cope with tasks, the higher the level of reputation you will have among employers. Starting from the very bottom with a simple truck, you will gradually improve your transport by buying spare parts or buy a whole fleet of trucks.

item.title: Imagine Earth
item.description: Game Description Imagine Earth is a sandbox strategy where the goal is to create your own race and further develop it. Humanity needs a lot of different resources for a normal life, but it will always want more. The map is three-dimensional, made in the form of a globe, rather than a flat surface, this allows you to observe your planet from any angle. A special feature will be the realistic modulation of all kinds of disasters, both those that occurred due to human influence and due to nature.

item.title: Subnautica: Below Zero
item.description: Game Description A game about the underwater world, which became a continuation of the original game, completely borrowing the engine. The world ofSubnautica: Below Zero is inhabited not by simple creatures similar to those in the previous part, but by aliens who are more interesting to fight, and their world is much more beautiful than our reality. Adventures will be with you at every step, but do not forget that the world of the game was recognized as a real horror setting, where it is light and bright only in the first hundreds of meters of immersion in depth.

item.title: Demeo
item.description: Game Description Dark fantasy in Demeo plunges a party of adventurers into dangerous adventures where they have to fight against monsters. The game is made in the form of a role-playing turn-based adventure game, which you can play using virtual reality glasses. The project combines the dungeon crawler genre and tactical strategy, allowing you to take turns on the field and clear locations from opponents. Gamers will extract loot from enemies and strengthen their characters with found artifacts and things.

item.title: Reknum Cheri Dreamland
item.description: Game Description Reknum Cheri Dreamland starts an adventure in which Cheri’s heroine awakens from fantasies and falls into a real conflict. Her wanderings in the world of dreams will force to encounter materialized nightmares that threaten the kingdom. Progress depends on the passage of the thematic stages and the deciphering of poetic instructions of the ancestors. The study of the environment prepares for a deeper immersion in the main tests and plot lines of this game, conducting the characters through a series of difficult locations and battles.

item.title: Tiny Bunny
item.description: Game Description Tiny Bunny is a black and white visual novel containing a considerable amount of horror and sappress. Get lost in the forest, in no case can you hear his voice, otherwise death will follow. The events of the game occur in winter. Something follows you and constantly walks between the trees. There are rumors about constant screams from the forest, and the board with the losses of children is replenished each time.

item.title: Across the Obelisk
item.description: Game Description Across the Obelisk is a cooperative game with role -playing elements and collecting its own deck. The gameplay presents a single and multi -user regime. Participants choose a variety of heroes, open access to new items and cards, creating a set of characters. After that, you have to fight monsters and bosses in deep tactical contractions. Features of Across the Obelisk: Dynamic assembly of decks in the Roguelite style, where each card improves by different items, increased level or other methods.

item.title: Astrodogs
item.description: Game Description Astrodogs is an arcade action game where space dogs take part in battles. The main characters will have to save the galaxy from the WOOFER company, which controls all territories and planets. Enemy dogs attack civilians, deceive ordinary workers and commit other wrong acts, because of which the ruin of the entire civilization is on the verge. The usual antics of the suspicious organization weren’t too bad until they started attacking every planet in the solar system.

item.title: Before Your Eyes
item.description: Game Description Before Your Eye s will take users on an emotional journey from a first-person perspective. The player influences the plot with his own blinks, changing the story and actions. Innovative technology allows you to use a webcam to track the gamer’s blinks and interact with the virtual universe. Along the way you will encounter joyful and heartbreaking memories as your whole life flashes before your eyes. It all begins with the soul setting off on a journey through the afterlife.

item.title: First Feudal
item.description: Game Description First Feudal takes the gamer to the classic Middle Ages and invites you to become a feudal lord (landowner and lord). The game does not have a plot - users face a classic sandbox with endless gameplay. Initially it will be difficult, because a small village is vulnerable and a small landowner is not able to protect it. But try to make good money and gather your own army so that no one tries to take the resources.

item.title: Element TD 2
item.description: Game Description Element TD 2 is a strategy in the style of “protection of a tower” with competitive elements. Events unfold in a fantastic world, where the player will use six main elements: nature, earth, fire, light, darkness and water. Before passing, you will need to choose several elements that determine the type of towers and abilities. At the start of the match, a certain amount of funds for which buildings are installed is issued.

item.title: Totally Accurate Battle Simulator
item.description: Game Description Totally Accurate Battle Simulator is a crazy tactical war game, heavily tied to physics. The battles take place in real time using weapons from different eras. The game is built on the laws of physics, so you can witness the most incredible combat in the history of video games! One of the main features of the game is its caricature and the creation of the most insane atmosphere of battles.

item.title: ROUNDS
item.description: Game Description ROUNDS is a competitive game with several modes and numerous locations for competition. Each match takes place in a 1v1 style, where participants try to score more points or kill their opponent. In a 2D side-scrolling world, you control round characters with arms and legs. They use the elements around them or firearms to win battles. As soon as the round ends, the next, more dynamic level immediately begins.

item.title: Metal Heads
item.description: Game Description Metal Heads is a multiplayer adventure with 1 to 8 participants simultaneously in each match. Users will compete in a variety of modes, team or single matches. The gameplay features over 15 original mini-games with multiple elements, easy process and difficult to master. The project allows you to participate via a local network, on one monitor or online. Mini-games in Metal Heads: Pipemare - takes participants to a small area where they will try to survive among a dozen dangers.

item.title: pureya
item.description: Game Description pureya is a collection of pixel mini-games lasting 10 seconds. The user will go through hundreds of modes with original obstacles and goals. The location, missions and traps will change constantly. Somewhere you have to travel on a spaceship and fly around objects, or fight enemies as a powerful knight. Each arcade is controlled using two buttons. The gameplay features 2 main modes: complete passage and change every 10 seconds.

item.title: Inspector Waffles
item.description: Game Description Inspector Waffles is a noir point-and-click detective thriller. There was a murder. This is not going to be an easy matter. You will investigate the crime together with Inspector Waffles, exploring every corner of the city to find evidence and clues to this mysterious crime. You have to interrogate witnesses and suspects. Carefully study the locations and try to find the slightest clues that will lead to the killer.

item.title: Machinika Museum
item.description: Game Description Machinika Museum takes the player to a museum, a special place where a variety of mysterious machines of extraterrestrial origin are displayed. Each mechanism is a separate puzzle, and to solve it you have to use logic and innovative thinking. The player will need to repair alien machines, opening access to the next levels, gradually increasing the difficulty of passing. The events of Machinika Museum take place in the distant future, where the central character encountered artifacts of an alien civilization.

item.title: Mr. Prepper
item.description: Game Description Mr. Prepper is a construction simulator where you have to build a bunker under a residential building. Mr. The survivor of those who believe in the theory of conspiracies and understands that a serious threat of nuclear war hung over the world. He does not care about his neighbors and those who do not believe him, so he alone begins to build his own bomb shelter. The nuclear war is close and you must be ready!

item.title: Endzone - A World Apart
item.description: Game Description Endzone - A World Apart is a post-apocalyptic mayor simulator, where under your strict guidance there will be a small settlement in need of a competent leader capable of developing a small commune that has survived a nuclear war. The plot tells how in 2021 one terrorist group carried out a nuclear bombing of all known states, as a result of which the planet systematically plunged into global chaos.

item.title: Rhythm Doctor
item.description: Game Description Rhythm Doctor is an indie game in which you need to treat patients to the rhythm of music. The music in the game has healing properties. Each patient has unusual problems based on music theory: polyrhythms, hemiols, atonality, syncopation, etc. Rhythm Doctor helps you learn music theory through gameplay. The game contains: more than 20 levels with their own stories; each chapter is a rhythmic concept; many doctors and unique patients; single and cooperative mode; about 50 different visual effects and backgrounds.

item.title: The Room 4: Old Sins
item.description: Game Description The Room 4: Old Sins is an adventure puzzle game inspired by the works of Lovecraft. The story begins with the disappearance of the chief engineer and his high-ranking wife. After this, the hunt for ancient artifacts begins. A chain of events leads to the attic of their mansion, where there is an old dollhouse… You have to explore a mystical toy mansion that is full of various rooms.

item.title: Firework
item.description: Game Description The dark journey of the boy inFirework allows gamers to find themselves in dangerous environments where they must survive and solve difficult puzzles. The game presents the opportunity to go investigate a mysterious fire that killed many people. The main character, named Lin Lixun, goes to explore the territory where the disaster occurred. In the process of clarifying the circumstances, the young policeman is forced to deal with mysterious phenomena and confusing facts that overlap with each other.

item.title: Valheim
item.description: Game Description Valheim is a survival in the open world where you will build your own base and fight with the mythical creatures of Scandinavian folklore. The events of the game take place in Valheim - the tenth world of the Vikings. The goal of the hero is to get to the gate of Walgalla. Killing various monsters and monsters, you earn the blessing of the gods. The hero will visit the most diverse corners of the world: thick forests, snowy mountains and much more.

item.title: War on the Sea
item.description: Game Description War on the Sea is a single-player tactical simulator of combat operations that take place in the oceanic space. The gamer will have control of not only 50 types of warships for various purposes, including submarines, but also realistic copies of real aircraft. The setting of the project is the era of the Second World War; the year 1942 has recently arrived on the planet. The location of all available battles in the single-player campaign is the Pacific Ocean, and more specifically, locations near the Solomon Islands, which represent a strategically important point for both sides of the conflict.

item.title: DEVOUR
item.description: Game Description DEVOUR is a first-person cooperative survival game that allows up to four players to team up. In this atmospheric and scary horror, your task is to stop a dark cult that is turning people into bloodthirsty and possessed creatures. Find the leader and destroy him before he drags you to hell. Run, hide and try to resist. Never let yourself be pinned into a corner! The leader of a mystical order called the Guardians of Azazel is a certain Anna Puerta.

item.title: Dyson Sphere Program
item.description: Game Description Dyson Sphere Program is a space simulator that allows you to develop your base and explore the galaxy. Go into the vastness of outer space to colonize distant planets. Build an intergalactic factory using the power of the stars. Design and plan production chains. Collect resources and develop your base. Start your journey as a small workshop and progress to the Dyson Sphere - a megastructure that orbits the stars.

item.title: Binky's Trash Service
item.description: Game Description Binky’s Trash Service lays a waste collection route that runs through a series of villainous shelters. The key task at each level is to find and clean all the garbage containers, and then get to the exit. Performing a mission requires verified movements surrounded by a complete platform obstacles. Success depends on the methodical stripping of locations and accurate control of the actions of the hero. The gameplay in Binky’s Trash Service is built on three buttons responsible for a limited set of movements.

item.title: Ship Handling Simulator
item.description: Game Description Ship Handling Simulator is a comprehensive maritime simulator, the main goal of which is to hone your ship handling skills in a variety of conditions. The project involves facing changing weather conditions, changing times of day and obstacles such as icebergs. Particular attention is paid to the physical damage model, which includes visual deformation of the hull during collisions. Careless maneuvering can lead to the ship’s flooding, even to the point of spectacularly breaking it in half.

item.title: OMORI
item.description: Game Description Two realities and only one is true in the gameOMORI. A psychological history of surrealism with elements of thriller and horror. The protagonist will have to travel between two dimensions. They are similar, and at the same time radically different. Each reality has its own mysteries and secrets. Explore the new (old) world, make acquaintances with friendly characters who, in another reality, will immediately attack you. Explore the memories of your own path, and finally determine which world is the real reality for you, and which is the other world.

item.title: Founders' Fortune
item.description: Game Description Founders' Fortune is a fantasy sim where, in addition to building and defending a base, you need to monitor the psychological state of the heroes. The colonists reach the island empty-handed to settle in a new place. By collecting resources, they build houses and various objects. Construction begins with walls and floors, after which furniture is placed and the façade is put in order. Colonists are the main element of Founders' Fortune.

item.title: FireWorks Mania - An Explosive Simulator
item.description: Game Description FireWorks Mania - an Explosive Simulator - a simulator in which you need to deal with fireworks. Explore firecrackers, run various signal missiles into the air, etc. Your task is to arrange a real fire show. However, nothing prevents you from just blowing things up and enjoy the gameplay. The gameplay was developed with the aim of entertaining players or to please creative people who know how to think non-standard and create truly amazing fireworks.

item.title: Elephantasy
item.description: Game Description Elephantasy puts the player under the control of a tiny elephant who has fallen into a miniature world. The main goal is to help him return home, and the path to this depends on the achievement of the mysterious tower in the clouds. The local wizard Snorri explains that the collection of gems is the method of ascent to this construction. These artifacts are scattered throughout the environment, and their presence is directly related to the promotion of the character.

item.title: THE CORRIDOR
item.description: Game Description THE CORRIDOR is an experimental adventure exploring the relationship between humans and interactive entertainment. The main action takes place in a closed space, where the only visible goal is to press the orange button. However, every interaction with this object causes the application to immediately close, forcing you to start all over again. The process is punctuated by fourth-wall-breaking meta-commentary and encounters with surreal characters, such as a cardboard therapist who acts as an inspirational companion.

item.title: Bridge Constructor: The Walking Dead
item.description: Game Description Bridge Constructor: The Walking Dead is a collaboration between two famous franchises. “The Walking Dead” is a famous series based on a comic book, “Bridge Builder” is an arcade simulator of a construction worker using ragdoll animation and a realistic physical model that follows the laws of the real world. The gamer will have to join a group of survivors in a universe where an apocalypse has occurred due to the appearance of zombies due to an unknown disease.

item.title: Easy Red 2
item.description: Game Description Easy Red 2 is a first -person shooter with elements of a strategy that immerses in an authentic atmosphere of World War II. The gameplay can plunge into tense and cruel battles, where the main thing is planning and tactics. The gameplay relies on realism. Take a break through the tanks and the enemy’s huge army. Do not fall into the explosion zone and look for ways to survive on the battlefield with your partners.

item.title: The Falconeer
item.description: Game Description The plot of The Falconeer tells about the secrets of already forgotten gods and ancient civilizations. The game combines fantasy, action and role-playing elements in an ocean world located on the Great Ursi. Take control of an armed man and a huge bird to soar upward and explore a gradually crumbling and beautiful world. Battles constantly take place across vast territories between militant groups and factions fighting for the secrets and mysteries hidden in these places.

item.title: Kingdoms Reborn
item.description: Game Description Kingdoms Reborn is a urban planning simulator with a full multipleor and card game elements. The project was primarily created under the online, but there is also a single in it. The world is randomly generated. It is divided into 7 biomes that do not gameplay. In the Arctic zone and tropics, it will be more difficult to grow food on ordinary fields than in the territory with a temperate climate.

item.title: Stirring Abyss
item.description: Game Description Stirring Abyss is a turn-based strategy with role-playing game elements. Uncover the ancient secrets of the undersea depths in a twisted and mystical story inspired by the works of famous writer Howard Phillips Lovecraft. The main character is the captain of the surviving underwater crew of the submarine Salem. The shipwreck occurred during the Cold War. The soldiers survived, but found themselves at the ruins of an extinct civilization.

item.title: Monster Prom 2: Monster Camp
item.description: Game Description Monster Prom 2: Monster Camp is a multi -user dite simulator, the actions of which take place in the monsters camp. The game is replete with charismatic characters and black humor. The events of the game are transferred to the summer camp, where teenagers rest before the start of the new school year. Among the characters, both old heroes and many new ones are represented: Damien, Calcelter, Milo, Dalia, Joy and Arab.

item.title: Mesmer
item.description: Game Description Mesmer is a revolution simulator that is a vibrant adventure in which you need to unite people and take a fortress by storm. Take on the role of the leader of a revolutionary uprising, influencing the consciousness of people and factions operating within the city. The secret police are monitoring every action, so be vigilant! The task is simple: to lead Mesmer and his people to a better life.

item.title: Matsuro Palette
item.description: Game Description Matsuro Palette is based on survival and mystery, in which gamers find themselves locked in a studio with a cursed painting. The story unfolds over seven days, during which the protagonist must navigate the complex and disturbing world created by the girl’s painting. To survive, the user must carefully paint her portrait, using notes left by previous victims as clues. However, there is a constant threat: if you anger the girl depicted in the painting, it can lead to fatal consequences.

item.title: Flipon
item.description: Game Description Flipon invites gamers to immerse themselves in a fast-paced adventure across the solar system as they join Kat and her team on a planet-spanning quest. The adventure consists of 75 levels, each of which is set against the backdrop of five unique planets, representing challenges guarded by formidable creatures. Users will have to show strategic thinking, building combinations of flip blocks and solving various puzzles. The cute opponents you meet along the way add an extra layer of challenge that makes the game lively and fun.

item.title: 9th Dawn 3
item.description: Game Description 9th Dawn 3 is a role-playing adventure in which the player will have to explore a huge variety of dungeons, made in pixelated, two-dimensional graphics with a low-angle top-down view. The game supports a cooperative mode, which allows you to invite friends to spend time together on a project that includes more than 270 types of monsters that must be destroyed. “9th Dawn III” supports the connection of an external controller to provide more convenient control for those gamers who are used to gamepads.

item.title: Kinky Fight Club
item.description: Game Description Competitive fights in Kinky Fight Club allow you to enjoy observing beautiful girls who compete on the field for winning the match. The main task of each round is to bring the enemy to orgasm, by applying cunning tricks and secret techniques. The game is designed for an adult audience of users who have reached adulthood. The project contains a large amount of erotic content, which can be unacceptable for young players.

item.title: The Sojourn
item.description: Game Description The Sojourn is an adventure puzzle game with a first-person view, where the user will travel through fictional worlds. These are parallel universes representing Light and Darkness. Go through obstacles to discover the truth about the nature of existence. The story has a classic idea about the confrontation between Good and Evil. The main character appeared in a stunning world, but here everything is not as it really is.

item.title: Cauldrons of War - Barbarossa
item.description: Game Description Cauldrons of War - Barbarossa is a hardcore wargame set in the Second World War. Turn-based tactical strategy dedicated to the Second World War. There are 2 factions available in it: USSR and Nazi Germany. The period from the summer of 1941 to the winter of 1942 is covered. Gameplay for the Red Army and Wehrmacht troops differs. Both sides of the conflict are balanced with each other. The project emphasizes historical accuracy and realism.

item.title: Under the Sand REDUX - a road trip game
item.description: Game Description Under the Sand REDUX - a road trip game is an adventure game in which the player is invited to travel around the world by car. The universe around the main character experienced a terrible apocalypse, turning into a desert. Graphically, the project is made using low-detail textures to create its own style. The locations where the gamer is present are created randomly thanks to the use of artificial intelligence in the process of generating territories, which is responsible for randomizing the environment.

item.title: Root
item.description: Game Description Root is a strategy with simulator elements, offering to experience an asymmetrical type of combat. The action will take place in the forest where anthropomorphic creatures live. Create your faction and lead it to victory in this bloody forest war! The gameplay of Root is designed for both one player and a company of up to 4 people. The story begins with the vile Marquis de Cote taking over the area, trying to get rich with the help of natural resources and treasures.

item.title: Squad
item.description: Game Description Squad is a military tactical first person shooter game. This is a multiplayer game with an emphasis on realism. An important role is assigned to team interaction between users. This project does not have a story campaign or single player modes. Instead, players in it capture points, destroy weapons depots, or hold the defense. The title was originally called Project Reality. This was a modification for the second “Battle”.

item.title: Endless Furry Killer 2020
item.description: Game Description The conflict in Endless Furry Killer 2020 puts a player against the endless waves of anthropomorphic opponents. The gamer has to move through two -dimensional arenas with a view of the top intended for continuous battles. The key lesson lies in the shooting of goals in a tense struggle for life with a constant stream of enemies. Such a gameplay requires constant movement and aiming to defeat non -aloscorizing resistance.

item.title: Songs of Syx
item.description: Game Description Songs of Syx is a top-down city builder with roguelike elements. The progression system allows you to turn a small colony into a full-fledged settlement, from a village into a large city, and from a metropolis into an entire empire. When creating a state, to maintain the capital, you will need to build other settlements, castles, and ports. The maximum number of inhabitants in the village is 30,000 people.

item.title: Phasmophobia
item.description: Game Description Phasmophobia is a cooperative horror game designed for four players. The plot is built around paranormal phenomena, where a group of researchers is trying to prove with the help of special equipment that spirits and ghosts exist. You have to collect as much evidence as possible to find out what type of evil entity you are dealing with. Having studied the strengths and weaknesses of otherworldly forces, begin to expel demons.

item.title: Hades
item.description: Game Description In the roguelikeHades you will constantly engage in epic battles. Upgrade new abilities by fighting enemies. Gifts can be acquired by meeting the gods of Olympus, who will be happy to give you a piece of their power. Complete the instructions of Zeus, Athena, or simply get to know them to master new skills or equipment. Every time you meet a new character, you will witness some interesting event.

item.title: The Dungeon Of Naheulbeuk: The Amulet Of Chaos
item.description: Game Description The Dungeon Of Naheulbeuk: The Amulet Of Chaos is a humorous adventure set in the Naheulbeuk Universe. John Lang wrote a comedy series based on role-playing game parodies and heroic adventures. The developers decided to create a game based on the author’s universe. In a dungeon set in a fantasy setting, clumsy characters try to get their hands on treasure. The RPG has complex tactical elements, with a dose of humor, unexpected surprises and ridiculous encounters.

item.title: Wingspan (Wings)
item.description: Game Description Wingspan (wings) - a collectible card game based on the same tough. The version for personal computers is designed for a session of one to five people. Players are assigned the role of ornithologists involved in studying new species of birds and trying to collect and bring as many rare individuals as possible to the natural reserve. Gathering in the world of various birds, more points go to those who will be able to get a unique and dying look.

item.title: Ostranauts
item.description: Game Description Ostranauts-a role-playing lifetime in a zero gravity in a noir ship, which is located in outer space. The game supports only a single -user study of the universe, and has no voice acting, the information is submitted in the form of text in subtitles or notes. The main character is a character that is created and customized personally by a gamer in order to achieve uniqueness. Also, before the start of the passage, the initial ship is also set up, which is subject to further improvement after collecting the necessary resources.

item.title: Paradise Killer
item.description: Game Description Paradise Killer is a first-person action-adventure game with visual novel elements. The events of the game will take place on Paradise Island. A brutal murder occurs in a resort town. Lady Love Dies takes on the investigation. She will have to find out who the killer is by collecting evidence and interrogating the inhabitants of the archipelago. An open world is available for exploration. The island is beyond reality.

item.title: ULTRAKILL
item.description: Game Description ULTRAKILL is a game inspired by classic and modern shooters. You will find yourself in a future where people have become extinct. Now the main thing on the planet has become machines whose fuel is blood. There was little valuable liquid left on the surface of the Earth, and so robots began to explore the underground world in search of living creatures. Game Features: Fight multiple enemies. Destroy the risen dead, demonic creatures and other profit seekers.

item.title: The Divine Invasion
item.description: Game Description The Divine Invasion is an adventure action that uses a third -person camera, which allows you to better consider dynamic fights with crowds of enemies and increases the view around the hero. The setting of this project, developed by a small indie studio, becomes a science fiction future with multiple elements of a popular direction-cyberpanus. Thanks to the main task of the gamer, which consists in the extermination of enemies, the game can be considered a simulator of a bond hunter, which serves as mysterious employers for a huge monetary reward.

item.title: Struggling
item.description: Game Description Struggling is a 2D physics-based platformer that can be played alone or with a friend. You will control a creepy monster, accompanying him through a crazy surreal world. During the passage you will run away from voracious rats, ride an SUV, jump over puddles of radioactive waste and much more. Co-op is based on playing as one character. Each of you will control a separate arm of the creature.

item.title: Milk inside a bag of milk inside a bag of milk
item.description: Game Description Milk inside a bag of milk inside a bag of milk is a short visual novel with a deep message and unusual execution, made by the efforts of one developer, one of the indie creators. The visual design of the single-player campaign, which is the only game mode, is made using only two colors - purple and black. For completing a short story, which will take about 15 minutes, the developer has prepared three rewards, implementing a small list of achievements.

item.title: Chronicon
item.description: Game Description Chronicon has a large amount of content, despite its indie-production. There are about 900 skills, abyles and perks and 700 items. The main campaign is divided into 4 acts: a fallen temple, an elven war, Clerburg Castle and dangerous wastelands. Of the classes, the choice is available: Templar, berserker, guard and sorcerer. These are a kind of analogue of the paladin, warrior, archer and magician. Each has various talent branches with active and passive skills.

item.title: Factorio
item.description: Game Description The new planet should have everything to provide people with a comfortable, peaceful existence. Factorio is a sandbox in 2D graphics, where a new planet should be fully equipped for the future life of people. As soon as we arrive in a new place, we need to extract resources, assemble elements from them, and build structures so that people in the future can settle in and exist peacefully. Don’t forget that the planet reacts aggressively to colonizers.

item.title: Lawless Lands
item.description: Game Description Lawless Lands is a role-playing game in a dark fantasy setting. You will challenge the Darkness itself and explore the territory of Crossia - a formerly great kingdom, which is now plunged into poverty and crime. Hunger and death reign all around. The army has lost its power and the country is in turmoil. You take on the role of a hero rising from the ashes. He challenges the entire empire and is the only one capable of restoring Crossia’s greatness.

item.title: Risk of Rain 2
item.description: Game Description Risk of Rain 2 is a continuation of the classic online game, which has become better and more complex than the original. The player will challenge the cruel world alone or team up with friends to defeat hordes of monsters, collect the necessary relics and escape from the terrifying planet. With each new attempt, you will be able to better understand the behavior of your opponents and defeat them outright with your skills, even when they are outnumbered.

item.title: The Henry Stickmin Collection
item.description: Game Description The Henry Stickmin Collection - a collection of games about the adventures of Henry Stickmin. This is a series of humorous adventure games that give you freedom of choice. The Henry Stickmin Collection is an updated classic, represented by 6 different games in the series. Both canon endings are included, as well as completely new end credits. Choice is at the core of The Henry Stickmin Collection’s gameplay. At each stage of the adventure you make a choice.

item.title: There Is No Game: Wrong Dimension
item.description: Game Description There Is No Game: Wrong Dimension is a humorous adventure game where you have to click on every element available in the locations. You are taken on an amazing adventure through different video game universes. The visual style of the game is made in a 2D pixel style. Each of the numerous characters in There Is No Game: Wrong Dimension is voiced and played by professional actors. On your way there are many puzzles that need to be solved in an unconventional way.

item.title: Empyrion - Galactic Survival
item.description: Game Description Empyrion - Galactic Survival shows the world of the future. In the 24th century, in the ice of Antarctica, they find a spacecraft of aliens. Scientists investigated the object and discovered the technology of the hyperdrod. Earthlings send an expedition to the planet Empirion, which is in the Andromeda nebula. The crew gets to the destination, but tolerates the crash and cannot return home. In survival mode, the player leaves the rescue capsule and is alone against the hostile world.

item.title: The Battle of Polytopia
item.description: Game Description The Battle of Polytopia is a turn-based strategy game with city builder elements. The events of the game develop in the fictional world of Square. There are 12 factions to choose from, one of which you can start a campaign for. Lead your people to world domination by expanding your sphere of influence and exploring new technologies. You will explore the surrounding lands, develop various technologies and collect useful materials, on the basis of which your base will develop.

item.title: Spirit Island
item.description: Game Description Spirit Island is a strategy game made in the style of a board game, in which you need to become the spirits of the earth and protect the island from colonizers who are sowing plague and destruction. The spirit interacts with the native islanders, helping to increase your strength to fight the foreigners. There is a place of magic in the world of Spirit Island. The countries of Europe are trying to expand their influence to distant lands, but the ancient gods are ready to thwart the plans of strangers.

item.title: Travellers Rest
item.description: Game Description Travellers Rest gives the opportunity to live the life of an innkeeper. You own a small tavern that you dream to turn into a noisy and crowded place in the district. But to achieve this goal, you need to work a lot. Build a bro -up and cook the most delicious beer. Manage the farm and serve only the best products on the table. Satisfy customer requests and gain popularity so that a whole kingdom speaks of your institution!

item.title: Terrordrome - Reign of the Legends
item.description: Game Description Terrordrome - Reign of the Legends is a dynamic and bloody fighting game, the action of which takes place in an alternative version of our reality, where characters from books, urban legends, cryptozoology, mythology and folklore exist. All heroes of Terrordrome are monsters and villains. The game shows a hypothetical world where all the scary stories heard turned out to be true. There is a story campaign for Alex Van Helsing.

item.title: Wobbly Life
item.description: Game Description Wobbly Life is a bright and dynamic sandbox that relies on an open world and body physics. The gameplay is tailored for local and online co-op. Team up with friends to compete in various mini-games and competitions. There is a single-player game aimed at developing your hero. Earn money and spend it on new skins, clothes, equipment and much more. You will explore the vastness of Wobbly Island, controlling cute characters that resemble children’s toys.

item.title: Outer Wilds
item.description: Game Description Outer Wilds is a first-person action-adventure game based on the popular Groundhog Day theme. Events take place on the fictional planet Kamelok, which is destroyed by a star explosion 22 minutes after the start of the game. But the story is just beginning. The user finds himself in a “time loop”, which allows you to gradually develop the plot, travel through the planetary system and meet new characters. After a “reboot” of life, all accumulated information remains available.

item.title: Colt Canyon
item.description: Game Description Colt Canyon is an isometric action game filled with brutal shootouts in the vastness of a wild canyon. Here, armed thugs, dangers and treasures await at every turn. The plot tells about a hero who armed himself with his trusty Colt and went in search of his best friend. The player controls a cowboy, but as the game progresses, new heroes will be available. A friend was captured by local bandits and getting to their camp is not so easy.

item.title: Barn Finders
item.description: Game Description In the Barn Finders simulator, you need to explore abandoned warehouses, barns, bases and villages to find valuable items. Having discovered interesting things, you need to bring them to your pawnshop and put them up for sale, trying to get the highest possible price for your finds. Things can be very different: old watches, musical instruments, antiques, gold, weapons, vintage cars, motorcycles and much more. Auctions and sales are an important gameplay element.

item.title: Baldi's Basics Plus
item.description: Game Description Baldi’s Basics Plus - a parody of the first -person horror and educational games of the 90s. All levels are randomly generated, and mini-games are made in bright colors and allow you to go to nature. Baldi’s Basics Plus is an extended version of the original game containing more objects and characters. The game contains a huge number of strange characters and useful objects necessary for passing. Exploring the confusing corridors of Baldie’s school, the hero will come across many random and hilarious events.

item.title: Wooden Ocean
item.description: Game Description Wooden Ocean presents a narrative that begins when a teenager named Simon is transported to another world, and 42 years later, Violet goes in search of her brother Marcus. The setting is a simulation inside a structure called the Infinite Hotel, which serves as a kind of afterlife and contains many other virtual realities. It is inhabited by both local residents unaware of the nature of their existence and knowledgeable individuals, as well as entities such as demons, poets, angels and gods.

item.title: Space Simulation Toolkit
item.description: Game Description Space Simulation Toolkit is a physics sandbox that offers a unique approach to simulating worlds using your graphics card as a supercomputer. This game goes beyond the traditional experience, allowing users to manipulate the laws of physics and create complex worlds with living creatures. This is a platform for experiments - from the development of artificial intelligence to the design of mechanisms and simulation of various physical environments.

item.title: Carrier Battles 4 Guadalcanal
item.description: Game Description Carrier Battles 4 Guadalcanal - Pacific War Naval Warfare dives into the air conflicts that unfolded in the Pacific during World War II. This strategy game puts you in the middle of the historical battles between the US and Japan in 1942-1943. Using a system of hexes and counters, the title tasks you with outflanking your opponent while defending critical areas or attacking key enemy positions. It’s all about decision making: when to strike, when to retreat, how to preserve your carriers and prevent the enemy from gaining a foothold.

item.title: Crosshair X
item.description: Game Description The Crosshair X software application for gamers will allow you to freely customize your sight in any way for games focused on shooter gameplay mechanics, and gives the final answer to the question: “how to make a sight for Rasta or CS GO?” Players can choose one of the presented presets to apply it or create their own based on it. The project has the ability to make the desired skin and size for the cursor from scratch, using a flexible editor with a settings window.

item.title: Cepheus Protocol
item.description: Game Description Cepheus Protocol is a real-time strategy game where you are given a large open world so that you have the opportunity to find patient zero. A terrible virus has taken over San Francisco, turning residents into bloodthirsty monsters. You will lead a squad of soldiers from the Center for Epidemic Research and Control (CERC) fighting on the streets of an infected city. The task is to find the zero infected person to defeat the epidemic.

item.title: Pyro Fighters
item.description: Game Description Pyro Fighters sets the fighters to recapture the attack of an alien army at long levels. Each character is armed with flamethrower - a universal tool for attack and movement. If you direct the weapon down, reactive traction is created for flight. The same stream of flame destroys enemies, which forces to constantly choose between the retention of heights and fire. Monitoring the only resource underlies each clash and requires a competent distribution of forces in stressful conditions.

item.title: Fury Unleashed (Badass Hero)
item.description: Game Description Fury Unleashed (formerly Badass Hero) is a dynamic roguelike made in the style of comics, where the main resource is ink. The main character of the game is John Kowalski, who is working on a story of the same name. The author is experiencing a crisis of ideas, and the player must help overcome it. The combat is tied to a combo system, which motivates you to kill enemies as quickly as possible, thereby increasing the protagonist’s rage and making him more aggressive.

item.title: TROUBLESHOOTER: Abandoned Children
item.description: Game Description In the exciting turn-based strategy TROUBLESHOOTER: Abandoned Children, the player will take control of a desperate character and begin to explore a huge and beautiful world where it is worth fighting opponents, finding new allies, and more. So, the hero will be a certain boy Albus, it was he who was lucky enough to return after some time to his native metropolis and become a “problem raker” - a kind of person on whom all people place great hopes and responsibilities.

item.title: Euphoria: Supreme Mechanics
item.description: Game Description Supreme Mechanics - Challenges out-of-the-box thinking and explores different genres and perspectives. It is a first-person puzzle game that combines elements of dystopian fantasy, crime-solving, and horror with deep philosophical questions. You’ll have to solve some dark and twisted cases as you explore the world around you, uncover your character’s hidden identity, overcome the boundaries of danger and logic, and create your own version of time and history.

item.title: Drug Dealer Simulator
item.description: Game Description Drug Dealer Simulator will allow you to create your own criminal empire without moral and legal consequences. The player starts in a shabby shelter and begins to develop his business. You can either become a dark genius or a cruel gangster. The player needs to purchase goods from the cartels, avoid the police and organize safe houses. You can sell goods both in small quantities and individually, and in large quantities to entire gangs.

item.title: Zompiercer
item.description: Game Description Conceptively Zompiercer is a sandbox with an open detailed world, but the whole thing is played as a first-person shooter about survival during the zombie apocalypse. The planet is covered by a virus. People mutated in bloodthirsty walking corpses. Not many managed to survive, but you are lucky more than the rest. Or not? Survival is just beginning! The game from an independent developer under the nickname DDDIMANN is not a comprehension not by the setting, but by the scale and the implementation of ideas.

item.title: Automobilista 2
item.description: Game Description Automobilista 2 is a continuation of the video game of the same name, which displays a series of car races to a new level. An important innovation compared to the first part is the transition to the eminent Project Cars engine called Madness. This contributed to the addition of advanced graphic technologies, including a realistic weather change, precisely recreated carriers and tracks, and many other functions. In the project, you will face a variety of single modes - Custom Race and Test Day.

item.title: Ostriv
item.description: Game Description OSTRIV, this is a city -building simulator that makes you the ruler of the monarch of the 18th century. The player will have to work hard and show his ability to the manager, as well as creative abilities. The goal of the game to transfer the gameplay of simulators of this kind to a new level, by means of adding a huge number of opportunities and abandoning the usual restrictions.

item.title: Ori and the Will of the Wisps
item.description: Game Description Ori and the Will of the Wisps is an adventure platformer with stunning hand-drawn graphics. You will find yourself in distorted lands that you must save from evil and overcome all the obstacles prepared by fate for the main character. You will take control of the little spirit Ori, who knows a lot about the obstacles and pitfalls of this world. Your owl friend Ku is in trouble after another flight.

item.title: Avorion
item.description: Game Description People have always been attracted to space. And Avorion is one of the embodiments of human desires. This game doesn’t have much of a story or great graphics. Like many indie games, Avoiron is built on a specific idea for which the creators consciously sacrificed everything else. The backstory is this: several hundred years ago, a cataclysm almost destroyed the entire galaxy. Since then, no one has been able to break into the central regions of the galaxy.

item.title: Black Mesa
item.description: Game Description Black Mesa is a remake of the cult shooter Half-Life, which at one time turned out to be a breakthrough in the world of video games and made the name of Valve. They worked on this project for eight whole years, during which the creators tried to transfer the old game to the new Source engine with varying success. As a result, they managed to achieve the desired effect and in May 2015 the game was released.

item.title: Hex of Steel
item.description: Game Description Players in Hex of Steel have to go during the Second World War, where you will have to control the troops on land, water and in the air. The project is a full -scale Vargam, where you have to perform step -by -step actions on the global map of the world, which includes Europe, Africa and the Pacific regions. Users will be able to fight against AI in a single campaign or special historical scenarios, as well as in the cross -platform mode of PBEM and multiplayer skirmishes against other users (there is the possibility of cooperative passage).

item.title: JEF
item.description: Game Description The protagonist of JEF is an alien who does not remember his name or how he even ended up in the place of the initial events. Soon, he discovers that his home planet has been taken over by a huge, evil spa cult. Now you need to find a way to escape and make your way through space and time to get to other colonies. And the main goal is to get to Earth.

item.title: The Test
item.description: Game Description The Test is a psychological horror with elements of a visual novel, role-playing adventure, and immersive sim with a lot of text monologues inside the protagonist’s head. The player gets the opportunity to directly influence what is happening using a decision-making system of varying degrees of importance. The isometric camera allows you to get the best view of the two-dimensional space where all the action of the single-player campaign takes place with a well-developed plot about mental suffering.

item.title: Maiden and Spell
item.description: Game Description Maiden and Spell is a scrolling shooter in which the main characters are girls. The user is given a choice of 8 female characters, which differ from each other not only in appearance, but also in their ability sets. The fictional universe created by indie developers is filled with magic and unusual creatures. The setting is the Kingdom of Stars, which is represented by many locations in the background, because the game has a top-down camera.

item.title: Lumote: The Mastermote Chronicles
item.description: Game Description Lumote: The Mastermote Chronicles is a game about two opposing forces, blue energy versus red energy. The ruler of the first is Lumoth, while only being able to jump and control the creatures of the bright and colorful three-dimensional world in which he travels, the second is controlled by Hypnomoth. With the help of the strange and unusual inhabitants of his world, using his abilities, Lumoth, step by step, captures platforms and makes his way through fantastic landscapes, solving many puzzles.

item.title: Stoneshard
item.description: Game Description Come in the role of a harsh mercenary in a harsh, ruined war, kingdom. Take part in step -by -step battles and examine the RPG elements of Stoneshard, available in the gameplay. You can perform contracts, secondary and plot missions. Heal the wounds, purchase equipment and improve the protagonist as soon as you wish. Freely move around the big and seamless world. Explore the villages lying in the ruins, go down to the dungeons or look into abandoned tracts.

item.title: Peaceful Days
item.description: Game Description Peaceful Days immerses you in the atmosphere of a cozy town, where communication with local residents becomes an integral part of everyday life. Regular festivals allow you to get to know your neighbors, each with their own personalities and schedules, and take part in unique events. Behind the façade of outward hospitality there are numerous secrets waiting to be discovered. All this rich social life revolves around the main thing - the creation and development of their own prosperous economy, which has become the center of attraction for the entire community.

item.title: The Pedestrian
item.description: Game Description The Pedestrian invites you to immerse yourself in a dynamic 2.5D world with stunning graphics and challenging puzzles. The game is presented in the platformer genre, where you will find the adventure of an extraordinary little man living in a world of road signs and signs. You have to find out whether he can get out of his two-dimensional world into the real one, or whether this attempt will be in vain.

item.title: some convenience store
item.description: Game Description some some convenience store is a visual novel with a lot of sexual content related to naked female bodies, which quite often flash on the monitor screen. The user finds himself in a kind of dating simulator in an alternative reality, playing the role of a simple guy working as a half-time senior salesman in a small grocery store. The goal of the project from indie developers is to establish a relationship with a representative of the fair sex, choosing a companion to your liking from the proposed options and achieving her favor.

item.title: Necesse
item.description: Game Description Necesse is an adventure sandbox with a procedurally generated world. Controlling the main character, you need to build a settlement and upgrade your character. There are many spacious locations available for exploration where you can extract various minerals. You can craft items from collected materials. Traveling around the world, the protagonist meets different characters. You can take quests from them or trade with NPCs. In the dungeons you can find powerful weapons.

item.title: The Sapling
item.description: Game Description The Sapling is a simulator in which you will be selected by growing new plant species or crossing animals. Build your own world inhabited by unusual animals and a phantasmagoric fauna. The Sapling allows you to choose a random mutation mode to be a third -party observer, providing nature to conduct evolution itself and create its own ecosystems. At any time, you can take the development of the environment into your own hands.

item.title: Plutocracy
item.description: Game Description Plutocracy is a strategy in which you will be transported to the Golden Age, to the time when the first rich people of the United States of America just appeared. The gameplay will begin in 1870 and continue until the present day. During this gap, you will need to buy out many companies and put your name on the highest line of the board. You will start from scratch and will earn and work to become a shadow ruler.

item.title: The Political Process
item.description: Game Description The Political Process is a political simulation game in which you create your own character and run for office to create and pass laws, handle budget issues, and move up the political hierarchy. You can side with the Republicans or the Democrats. Customize the hero’s appearance, select his age and set a name. There are over 40 political positions available that your character can represent. Any position reflects aspects of social and financial ideology.

item.title: Unity of Command 2
item.description: Game Description In Unity of Command 2 you have to control your teammates, design routes and develop your own battle tactics. Transform from a novice into a seasoned commander and manage anti-Hitler coalitions on the Western Front, Africa, or take command of Allied divisions. With a dynamic campaign, you can write your own history of World War II. Non-linear paths will lead you to completely different endings. In combat you will need to clear the fog of war, one of the innovations in the sequel to the cult classic Unity of Command II.

item.title: Ai War 2
item.description: Game Description In AI WAR 2, an even more advanced version of AI captured the entire galaxy, and left only a tiny planet to the player. It’s time to strike and outwit the enemy. This will come in handy new capabilities, large flotillas and hacking skills. Or you can get involved in a much more confusing galactic struggle. On the agenda - macrophages, Dyson spheres, nanocosts and much more. Each faction has its own goal, its own rules, units and a completely unique economy.

item.title: Little Big Workshop
item.description: Game Description Little Big Workshop is a meditation game with calm, measured gameplay. The passage begins very strangely, someone left a game with figures of little human workers on his desktop. And this someone begins to fantasize that these little men come to life, and work is in full swing in their toy workshop.
