The physics of the game and the gameplay invite us to go through the platformer to the last level with a lot of deaths, puzzles, solving difficult problems and good visuals, combined with the atmosphere and the usual soundtrack. The death of our hero is an endlessly scary animation.

item.title: The Room Two
item.description: Game Description A puzzle game where in the first part you manipulated a magic clock mechanism. In the second part of the game, they were given the opportunity to walk around different rooms, solving various riddles. The Room Two - Follows a mysterious path with the help of letters from a scientist known as “AS”. The hero is trapped in a pocket dimension. He must find the author of the notes.

item.title: VA-11 Hall-A: Cyberpunk Bartender Action
item.description: Game Description VA-11 Hall-A: Cyberpunk Bartender Action is an adventure simulator of a bartender in the setting of a dystopian future, where humanity finds itself under the control of huge corporations dictating the rules of life, and nanorobots controlling every area of ​​human activity and the implementation of laws and regulations adopted new world government. Stylistically, this project refers to Japanese games of the last century. The gameplay consists of communicating with bar visitors and providing them with high-quality service in order to build warm, friendly relationships with them.

item.title: Planet Centauri
item.description: Game Description Planet Centauri is a sandbox with action RPG elements, made in 2D style. Unlike other games of this genre, Planet Centauri starts with a really well-developed character editor: the player can choose from a wide range of not only different clothes, but also unique appearance features. There are two modes available in Planet Centauri: story mode and free mode. The goal of the protagonist in both cases is to grow a new civilization on the planet Centauri from scratch.

item.title: Wayward
item.description: Game Description Survive in the wild in Wayward, traveling around the open world. The protagonist has no basic specialization, as he passes, he pumps skills and becomes capable of everything. To get new characteristics, you have to interact with objects and the world around you. You have the opportunity to play as you want. The world is endless and generated randomly. Objects, chests, opponents, dangers, dungeons and tasks are also created by chance.

item.title: Don't Starve Together
item.description: Game Description Don’t Starve Together is a survival simulator in an unknown world, where our character, pre-selected in the editor, wakes up and immediately goes to look for firewood, because Maxwell said so. The game is cooperative, since the story passage is divided into 2 parts. The first is survival. It is built on three phases of the day: day, evening and night. During the day, your character calmly survives, collects items, crafts new ones, eats and carries out orders for Maxwell.

item.title: Enter the Gungeon
item.description: Game Description InEnter the Gungeon you will remember such a genre as bullet hell or “hell of bullets”. The main characters explore the Gungeon and try to find a legendary artifact - a weapon that can kill the past. To do this, you need to fight your way through hordes of monsters and defeat formidable bosses. Loot, secrets, penny-pinching merchants and shopkeepers, new equipment and more loot - the recipe for a good game.

item.title: Hot Dogs, Horseshoes and Hand Grenades
item.description: Game Description The gameHot Dogs, Horseshoes and Hand Grenades can be called a full-fledged weapons simulator. You need to go to the training ground, which contains a huge selection of different firearms: pistols, machine guns, shotguns, rocket launchers, grenades, etc. You can use any available ammunition, training on targets and taking the highest positions on the leaderboard. Afterwards you can go and set off fireworks. Targets can be not only static within the walls of a gray pavilion, but also moving in open space.

item.title: There's Poop In My Soup
item.description: Game Description Theres Poop In My Soup is a humorous simulator in which the main goal is to organize large-scale riots on city streets. The protagonist, being on a hill, carries out targeted discharges of excrement on unsuspecting pedestrians and passing vehicles. Each successful throw earns points, and creating consecutive hits generates multipliers for the final score. The geography of hooligan antics covers several megacities, from New York to Beijing. The entire process is based on a physical model that takes into account the flight path and the behavior of objects after a collision.

item.title: Stardew Valley
item.description: Game Description Stardew Valley is a sandbox simulator with pixel graphics and multi-platform support, but with a well-thought-out system for earning money and maintaining game balance for the player. The beginning of the game shows how our hero first comes to an abandoned farm, which he received from a deceased relative. Since the protagonist does not mind making money by planting and selling vegetables and fruits, he decides not to sell the farm, but to start equipping it.

item.title: Grim Dawn
item.description: Game Description The gloomy dawn inGrim Dawn showed that the fabric of the created universe was too weak, so Cairn accepted robbers, bandits, magicians and a bunch of all kinds of creatures and undead into its embrace. Dark times have come to the territory of Cairn. But after that, people did not give up trying to attack their enemies, and called aliens into the world. They opened portals for them and let in several individuals to receive ether.

item.title: UnReal World
item.description: Game Description The plot of UnReal World takes place in the early period of the Iron Age in the northern regions of Europe, and more precisely in the territory of modern Finland. The game is a life simulator, and therefore does not have a main plot - the player gets complete freedom of action and determines the fate and career of the character under his care. The game’s mechanics focus on survival aspects.

item.title: Aseprite
item.description: Game Description The program** aseprite** provides users with an extensive range of settings that allows you to create two -dimensional animations, springs or graphics for any games. Layers and frames can be used in the form of separate concepts to make your own sprouts. Indexed colors, RGBA modes are provided to the user, thanks to which animated or static images are drawn. After completing the work, the program will save work in GIF, PNG and other options.

item.title: American Truck Simulator
item.description: Game Description American Truck Simulator doesn’t have the typical pick-up-and-drop-off. This is a strategic and economic simulator rolled into one: we will upgrade our trucks, buy new ones, decide which contracts to take on and what to leave aside. An important component in the process is the driving itself, because it is done in the first person, from the driver’s cabin. Compliance with all traffic rules is the basis and responsibility of every driver.

item.title: Scrap Mechanic
item.description: Game Description Scrap Mechanic is a multiplayer engineering sandbox that offers you to design various mechanisms and compete with friends. The game world revolves around a mechanic who maintains robots on an agricultural planet. He makes sure that they are working properly: that they are cultivating the land on time, sowing, collecting raw materials, which the hero then sends to the central planets, where people live ordinary lives. But one day the spaceship crashed, and the robots around went crazy.

item.title: Darkest Dungeon
item.description: Game Description Turn-based strategy with a side view -Darkest Dungeon - developed in a dark style and with rogue-like elements. A huge number of characters will not let you calm down until everyone on the playing field creates the perfect combination for victory. Each battle with opponents is a fascinating tactical adventure, where victory is 80% knowledge of the game and 20% knowledge of logic. Your characters are ordinary people with extraordinary health.

item.title: UnderRail
item.description: Game Description UnderRail originates far in the future. Due to an eco-catastrophe, humanity cannot exist on the surface of the earth. The remnants of people are now huddled in underground metro stations, gradually reviving the nation. But there would be no role-playing game if a conflict had not started between individual factions of residents. Dungeon factions regularly shed each other’s blood, from which the main character will have to escape from shootouts and battles.

item.title: Nuclear Throne
item.description: Game Description Nuclear Throne is a shooter with a top-down view, which provides an excellent overview of what is happening around and allows you to better dodge bullets flying at the protagonist. The goal of the single-player campaign of this project from two indie developers is to search for a certain Nuclear Throne in the depths of the post-apocalyptic territories of the fictional world. The game collects statistical data for further processing and placement in a summary leaderboard, where you can compare your own skills with other users from around the globe.

item.title: The Isle
item.description: Game Description The island on whichThe Isle takes place has a rich and varied environment that is randomly generated. All artifacts, items and events will be located in different places with each new launch. Players must team up to effectively explore the area, which contains many secrets, including various quest items that further advance the plot. The map contains an area of ​​16x16 square kilometers. Multiplayer survival game The Isle allows you to play with three different factions in three different modes:

item.title: Broforce
item.description: Game Description Broforce is a powerful paramilitary organization that is called upon when the world is in danger due to an excessive number of evil forces. Take control of dozens of different brothers to counter terrorist attacks and save civilians. Destroy your opponents with napalm, shooting, lightning and other various character skills. Broforce is a 2D shooter platformer with pixel graphics. You will move around locations, destroying opponents in every possible way.

item.title: Keep Talking and Nobody Explodes
item.description: Game Description Keep Talking and Nobody Explodes is a cooperative sapper simulator. You are locked up with your friends. No one knows where the explosives are, but instructions are issued on how to disarm them. They must verbally explain what elements the bomb consists of and ensure that the player, acting as a sapper, can defuse it. Each round will be quite intense. Everything depends only on the correct and competent relationship between the participants.

item.title: Undertale
item.description: Game Description In the universe ofUndertale, a role-playing game with pixel graphics, a war broke out between humans and monsters. The people won and locked all the creatures from the other world in an underground wasteland. The underground world of the game tells the story of one boy who finds himself in a closed space with monsters. 7 magicians guarded the dungeon area using barrier spells, but somehow a baby got there, for whom we have to play.

item.title: Fran Bow
item.description: Game Description Fran Bow is an indie horror quest with unusual art and animation. The backdrops are made very attractively; you will want to explore the world of the game thanks to the interesting plot. A ten-year-old girl named Fran Bow-Dagenhart has been unhappy since childhood - her parents were killed. She was able to escape and later good people were able to find her in the forest. They really can’t help her.

item.title: Universe Sandbox
item.description: Game Description Universe Sandbox is a continuation of the space simulator, which showed the real behavior of various objects in space. The game can be used as a virtual allowance for astronomy to understand how black holes behave or asteroids move. At the same time, the game will be interesting not only to beginners, but also to people who know definitions such as Betelheze and quantum voids. The gameplay of space sandbox will create objects, interact with them and destroy using Newton’s mechanics.

item.title: Planetary Annihilation: TITANS
item.description: Game Description Planetary Annihilation: TITANS is a real-time strategy game with new elements and features. The player will need to equip his own planet in order to gather an army and smash the enemy’s planet to pieces. The gameplay has many story missions, gradually teaching the player and showing all the possibilities in the match. In addition to battles against AI, gamers can play against each other. Each match begins with the selection of one of the Commanders, the mandatory and most important character in the battle.

item.title: Touhou kanjuden ~ legacy of lunatic kingdom
item.description: Game Description Touhou Kanjuden ~ Legacy of lunatic Kingdom opens as city legends become tangible events throughout Gansko. The rumor that the Apollo program never reached the moon is gaining strength against the backdrop of the appearance of an enemy army from the lunar capital. At the same time, metal spiders begin to cross the mountains, moving with an even, leisurely step. These machines have a functional, non -biological form, and the earth under them loses vitality: the fog is dissipated, and the vegetation fades.

item.title: Barony
item.description: Game Description Barony is a first -person cooperative pung in which it is necessary to go down to dangerous dungeons in order to fight monsters with the help of a sword and magic, to collect treasures and consider death. You will have to die a lot and often. You should be ready for this in advance. Dange is randomly generated and include many secrets that you and your friends have to unravel.

item.title: Duck Game
item.description: Game Description Duck Game is an action game developed by Landon Podbielski and published by Adult Swim Games. You can play alone or with friends online. Duck Game gives us both options. The game received extremely positive reviews from both professional critics and gamers, as well as from ordinary people. A simple 2D fighting game with multiplayer simply couldn’t get bad reviews. True, some are indignant about the name of the game because the name, according to some players, does not reflect anything.

item.title: Waste Walkers
item.description: Game Description Waste Walkers sets us in the harsh reality of a world ravaged by war, nuclear holocaust and societal collapse. Set in the near future, it features a landscape where survival depends on ingenuity. Humanity’s struggle to survive takes place in a crumbling society where bandits, mutated creatures and an unforgiving environment pose a constant threat. In this world of scavenger hunts and crafts, players navigate a city plagued by horrors, trying to stay one step ahead of those who want to take away what little they have.

item.title: Software Inc.
item.description: Game Description Software Inc. - An economic simulator that allows the development of a company engaged in the development of software. Initially, it is required to build an office building, buy inexpensive equipment and hire several employees, distributing tasks between them. To get funding, at first the newly made team will take on third -party projects and various simple tasks. As the budget becomes more, the staff will be more experienced and new faces will come, it will also be possible to engage in the external design of the facade, build beautiful paths and decor items to give the office a presentable look.

item.title: Exanima
item.description: Game Description Exanima is a representative of the category of isometric role -playing games on a PC, in which the camera is fixed above the character, but it can be brought closer to detailed examination of objects and objects, as well as deleted, for more convenient battles. This project operates the theme of the gloomy Middle Ages, so the arsenal of a character managed by a player consists mainly of long -tier -fingered and remote weapons (bows, crossbows, throwing spears).

item.title: Kerbal Space Program
item.description: Game Description In the space simulatorKerbal Space Program the player will lead the Kerbal race exploring the vastness of space. Be the one who guides them towards a brighter future, inventing new technologies, constructing many new mechanisms and helping in the exploration of the galaxy. Start your journey in one of three modes. In “Career” you will need to monitor the education and training of your charges, as well as help in modernizing their devices.

item.title: Automation - The Car Company Tycoon Game
item.description: Game Description Automation - The Car Company Tycoon Game is the simulator of the owner of the car concerns. A good product if you like to disassemble and redo cars in your own way. To design a car starting from the engine and ending with the suspension, body, as well as other parts. In this game there is a company where we will be the head of the campaign for the production of machines and will be part of the market from the end of World War II and now on our days.

item.title: Forsaken Isle
item.description: Game Description Forsaken Isle is an adventure survival with a view of the top. You find yourself on a uninhabited island where you have to explore the surrounding territories, collect resources, build refuge and fight with a huge number of enemies. The main thing is to survive at all costs in the hostile environment of the forgotten island. Once alone with nature, you have to use all the skills to survive.

item.title: Geometry Dash
item.description: Game Description Geometry Dash is a 2D arcade game aimed at hardcore level completion. You will take control of a unique character, which can be in the form of a geometric figure, to pass the most difficult levels and open up new opportunities in the gameplay. Here you will find more than 100 original and challenging missions, as well as the opportunity to create your own main character and share your results on the leaderboard.

item.title: Assetto Corsa
item.description: Game Description Assetto Corsa is a car simulator developed based on test drives of cars using a model of real behavior. Includes both single player and multiplayer modes. The developers presented a variety of licensed cars and tracks, which were specially digitized specifically for the race to convey maximum authenticity to their prototypes. The machines can be customized to your individual taste, because… the creators have added an extensive set of settings and support for modifications.

item.title: Dungeonmans
item.description: Game Description Dungeonmans The Heroic Adventure Roguelike - a traditional horned in which you explore the dungeons, fight with a variety of monsters and collect lutus. You have to develop your academy in order to open new opportunities and skills. Go to the adventure and take part in step -by -step battles. A fascinating fantasy story awaits you, telling about the confrontation of good and evil. Gameplay Dungeonmans The Heroic Adventure Roguelike:

item.title: Rising World
item.description: Game Description Rising World - a game in the “sandbox” genre. Your main goal is to survive in a world that you can create yourself. Explore caves, forests, mountains and dungeons. Develop new tools to solve problems and invent your powerful technologies. You can unite with other players to create civilization, trade and fight. This world is in your hands! Peculiarities: The modified world - everything you see can be changed.

item.title: Craft the World
item.description: Game Description Craft the World is an adventure 2D game that combines multiple elements. You can explore the procedurally generated worlds, build locks and fortresses, fight with hostile creatures and get materials necessary for numerous crafts. Manage the dwarf tribe and lead them the way you want. The player can send his wards to extract resources, build structures or fight with opponents. But, not everything is so simple. You have to put them on, help in battles and feed them in time.

item.title: Amazing Frog?
item.description: Game Description Amazing Frog? is an open-world adventure game where you play as a toad who wreaks havoc on the streets of the city. The gameplay is based on humor and the physical properties of bodies. The events will take place in the city of Swindon, UK. The metropolis is home to the main character, so he decides to turn a once quiet place into the center of madness and disaster.

item.title: Bloons TD 5
item.description: Game Description Bloons TD 5 is one of many sequels to the series that uses tower defense mechanics. This franchise has more than 10 games in a shared universe; in addition to numbered parts, there are also separate spin-offs. The main goal is standard for the genre - to prevent opponents (in the case of this project, the antagonists are balls), attacking in waves, from crossing the line outside the screen; this is done with the help of towers that shoot at enemies and burst them in this way.

item.title: This War of Mine
item.description: Game Description This War of Mine is a cross-platform platformer game with elements of survival for an entire group of people. At the beginning of the game, you are given several characters to control the group, and you develop them depending on the time of day. During the day, the characters live in a house located in a city besieged by rebels. They arrange their everyday life, help each other, perform joint tasks and craft the necessary items.

item.title: The Binding of Isaac: Rebirth
item.description: Game Description The Binding of Isaac: Rebirth is a remake of the original title, allowing you to embark on exciting adventures with additional innovations and improved graphics. The game has been optimized, allowing for stable FPS on most devices. The picture looks more colorful, thanks to hand-drawn pixel characters and environments that increase the quality of the visual component. The effects of shots and enemy deaths have become more detailed, creating tangible dynamics on the battlefield.

item.title: BlazeRush
item.description: Game Description The creators of BlazeRush were clearly inspired by Blizzard’s ride-alongs that came out on consoles back in the 90s. Since that project ultimately did not reach the PC, its spiritual successor appeared a couple of decades later. The game also successfully played with the idea of ​​another racing hit of those years - “Micromachines” - in the form of a single screen for all participants in the race. The arcade action game features co-op for four people.

item.title: Bridge Constructor Medieval
item.description: Game Description The events of Bridge Constructor Medieval take players to the distant past, when knights and castles existed in the world. The gameplay is based on physics, where you will need to build bridges to supply your lands with food and goods. Build structures that can withstand enormous weight, or, on the contrary, will not allow the enemy army to pass through, eager to capture your fortress. The campaign consists of 40 episodes.

item.title: The Room
item.description: Game Description The Room is an indie project in the mystical puzzle genre, which spawned a series of 4 sequels. Look at where it all began and what has changed in the future. The gameplay consists of exploring the secrets of a box of secrets. You need to show remarkable restraint and have a keen eye to find hidden objects on the box, for example, keys, cabinet handles, nails and other small parts, and small secret drawers to gradually unravel the puzzles found inside the compartments.

item.title: Vertical Drop Heroes HD
item.description: Game Description Vertical Drop Heroes HD is an exciting action game that combines the best elements of the platformer, RPG and roguelike genres. This updated version of the original web game that has gained immense popularity around the world offers endless possibilities. Start by creating your own hero, choosing from a wide range of skills, traits and abilities. Once your character is ready, you can embark on an exciting adventure through randomly generated stages, replete with enemies, traps and secrets.

item.title: Contraption Maker
item.description: Game Description Contraption Maker is a puzzle game that relies on the laws of physics, adding a pinch of absurdity and madness. Create puzzles based on chain reactions. Place trampolines, trampolines, springs, hamsters, alligators, cats, etc. Create the craziest, most complex mechanism you can imagine. The game is the spiritual successor to Incredible Machine. The campaign includes about 200 original puzzles, as well as many contributions from the fan community. You have to deal with the placement of complex mechanisms or their repair.

item.title: Bridge Constructor Playground
item.description: Game Description Bridge Constructor Playground is a bridge construction simulator that gives complete creative freedom. Build a wide variety of structures that connect the banks and allow cars to cover distances from point A to point B, significantly saving time. The Bridge Constructor Playground campaign consists of 32 varied levels in which you build complex structures through valleys, canals and rivers. After you have built an object, it needs to pass a stress test.

item.title: 100% Orange Juice
item.description: Game Description 100% Orange Juice is a multiplayer board game that also has single-player modes against artificial intelligence. The characters used in this project are collected from many other Japanese universes, such as: Flying Red Barrel, QP Shooting, Sora and Suguri. There are also personalities created specifically for this game. The plot of the campaign tells about a growing piece of Evil that originated in a high-tech world, where people and machines learned to fly, and banditry was practically zero.

item.title: One Finger Death Punch
item.description: Game Description One finger death punch is an arcade fighting game in the style of beat’em up, in which you can feel like a real martial arts master. In this game we have to fight off crowds of enemies that have surrounded the main character and are advancing from opposite sides. The game design is made in 2D, and all the characters are drawn people, which adds simplicity to the game, but at the same time makes it unusual.

item.title: Insurgency
item.description: Game Description Insurgency is a first-person shooter, in which the developers focused on playing in cooperative or multiplayer mode, about the Iraq War. The protagonist is a member of the US PMC, and he is fighting against Iraqi insurgents. The player chooses one side at the beginning of the match, and after that a brutal fight begins between the two factions. The basis of the game is a confrontation between two teams, which include 16 people.

item.title: Kingdom Rush
item.description: Game Description Kingdom Rush is a project in the “tower defense” genre, in the style of the Middle Ages, interspersed with magic, creatures that do not exist in real life, like trolls, and real-time control of heroes with a choice of the direction and course of their attacks. This game received recognition on many platforms and later reached personal computers. The gameplay is standard for the genre, the advantage over other projects is the refined balance and exciting, moderately difficult levels that challenge and force you to change battle tactics and constantly be on the alert.

item.title: Project Zomboid
item.description: Game Description Project Zomboid is a cross-platform game in which we will have to find a house, equip it, and start surviving in a world where a zombie apocalypse has recently occurred. We are located in Knox County. The latest epidemic infected more than 90% of the district’s residents, and they all became zombies. Difficult conditions will force us to survive, stock up on food, water, weapons and all available supplies in order to simply survive.

item.title: Contagion
item.description: Game Description Contagion - a fascinating zombie at the first person, created in the best traditions of action with a completely open world. The plot tells us about the world into which the virus penetrates and absorbs everyone without a trace. Everyone who fell under his actions turned into half -dead carcasses that crave blood. We take the role of the character, for the large -scale cleansing of human lands from the zombie.

item.title: FORCED: Slightly Better Edition
item.description: Game Description FORCED: Slightly Better Edition is a top-down action RPG about unique gladiatorial battles for your freedom in an unusual arena. Your character will be assisted by a spirit named Balfus. You have to take one of the slaves presented to choose from, specially raised in a closed village, where everyone born becomes a slave. Upgrading your combat skills, you must defeat the guards of each of the mystical arenas.

item.title: Outlast (+Whistleblower)
item.description: Game Description Outlast (+Whistleblower) - DLC for the game of the same name, which added more content and a new storyline. The addition contains a backstory of the events that happened in the original, where Miles Upshur played the game. The journalist went to the Mount Massive mental hospital, where, for information received, there were many violations. Here he encountered a crowd of terrible psychos - monsters who had taken over the hospital.

item.title: Papers, Please
item.description: Game Description The fictional country of Arstotzka is a small world of the game’s protagonist, where he will check documents at customs every day. The plot ofPapers, Please - a puzzle game with an unusual approach and graphics, as well as the beginning of the simulator - shows the events with the main character winning the profession of a customs officer at a checkpoint in the lottery. His task will be to check documents and apply stamps.

item.title: Gunpoint
item.description: Game Description Gunpoint takes the user to the near future, where many interesting spy things have been invented. Richard Conway works as a spy for hire, performing a variety of tasks. One day he gets a special copy - hyperpants. This item of clothing helps you jump over huge distances, and also help you fall from a height without harm to your health. The protagonist receives a new task - to investigate the murder of an employee of a weapons company.

item.title: Don't Starve
item.description: Game Description Don’t Starve is an adventure arcade game in the action strategy genre with crafting elements. This game is an interesting survival simulator with a complete open game world. The plot tells us about the main character who was sailing on a ship and was shipwrecked. He woke up on an abandoned island. You will travel a lot through beautiful locations that were drawn by hand. Let’s begin to explore previously unknown living creatures and the remains of bygone times.

item.title: Starsed Pilgrim
item.description: Game Description Starsed Pilgrim puts a player in the role of a gardener in the void. This figure takes care of the silent space, planting seeds that create structures from color and sound. Each new sprout contributes to the composition that fills the abyss and transforming it with a direct action. The character moves through these new platforms, continuing the process of nurturing. The constantly spreading darkness serves as a motivation for this continuous creation, pushing the gardener to the construction of a new world away from its reach.

item.title: Primordia
item.description: Game Description The whole world in the game Primordia is mired in devastation and chaos after nuclear apocalypse. Everything around is gloomy, gray and lifeless, like the whole planet as a whole. In the computer application, topics of religion, freedom, justice and laws are raised. The protagonist Horatio The Human Blessed is a mechanic-engineer, a leading hermit lifestyle. The robot wears a black cloak with a dense hood, and his only friend of Crispin, a small flying saucer, constantly funny all around, sometimes bending the stick.

item.title: Super Hexagon
item.description: Game Description Super Hexagon does not contain any plot. This is a dynamic arcade game with a top view. From the outside it looks like an endless game. But in fact, it can be passed. It will not be easy to reach the end, since the title is very hardcore. The project uses a minimalistic visual style. The gameplay is about survival in the arena. In Super Hexagon it is hexagonal in shape.

item.title: Hotline Miami
item.description: Game Description Hotline Miami is a 2D top-down action game created by two incredibly hardworking and talented young people under the auspices of the same computer game development studio - Dennaton Games. The international release of this project took place in October 2012. The developers admitted that they took their inspiration from the Hollywood crime action films of the 80s. The game, as the name implies, takes place in the city of Miami, in the first half of the 80s.

item.title: Euro Truck Simulator 2
item.description: Game Description The basis ofEuro Truck Simulator 2 is permanent contracts that will be stolen from under your nose by more experienced players controlled by artificial intelligence. Long routes to the capital of Germany, the Netherlands, England, France and Belgium are your main route when traveling with dangerous or simply expensive cargo. The main task of the driver is to deliver on time, deliver in good condition and not get caught with a fine.

item.title: Castle Crashers
item.description: Game Description Castle Crashers is an arcade action game in which players will take control of powerful characters and fight monsters. Create a squad by choosing from 25 characters to fight your way through castles against your enemies. Compete with other users or monsters living throughout the continent. The plot will unfold at a ball in the king’s castle. During the fun, an evil sorcerer stole a precious magic stone and four princesses, who must be rescued by the knights and fight the enemy.

item.title: FTL: Faster Than Light
item.description: Game Description FTL: Faster Than Light - this project is a two-dimensional simulator of a space combat ship. The creation and publication of this media product was carried out by the Subset Games studio. The official release took place in the first half of autumn 2012. The gameplay is based on the interaction between the player and the crew of the combat starship. The success of this space tactical strategy will depend on how successful this cooperation is.

item.title: To the Moon
item.description: Game Description To the Moon is a philosophical story about two doctors - Eva Rosalina and Neil Watts from the Sigmund organization. The heroes make a tragic journey through the memories of a dying man. In this way they are trying to fulfill his last will, the essence of which is to let the person live his life again. The dying person remembers the new life that he sees at death before leaving this world.

item.title: Dungeon Defenders
item.description: Game Description Dungeon Defenders is an interesting game that combines a huge number of different genres: action, strategy, role-playing, RPG. This game is initially designed for multiplayer connections. Before we start, we have to choose the most interesting character class, his equipment style and the color of the magic crystal. This item is the most vital for the hero; if its structure is disrupted, the character’s death may occur. There are many different types of improvements in the game: hero characteristics, crystals and passive abilities, and most importantly, basic combat spells.

item.title: Touhou shinreibyou ~ ten desires
item.description: Game Description Touhou shinreibyou ~ ten desires begins when strange divine perfumes begin to come from people, Yokaev and fairies. In response to this event, female protagonists of the game go to the other world, suggesting that it is the key to unraveling the phenomenon. The gameplay offers to lead the chosen heroine through a series of levels filled with flitches of shells from opponents. The task is to survive these attacks and destroy the entire opposition, completing the passage of the stage with the boss.

item.title: Terraria
item.description: Game Description Terraria is a simulator of construction, life, survival, an interesting storyline and everything that could be combined into a game with the Sand Box style. Simple 8-bit graphics take us into a randomly generated world generated by the game itself. The open map is almost endless if you dig deep into the world, but you will be stopped by armies of monsters or underground knights. Terraria is not as simple as it seems.

item.title: Mount and Blade: Warband
item.description: Game Description Mount & Blade: Warband is a standalone add-on that brings many improvements and innovations to the game. New textures, object and character models, as well as sophisticated visualization settings. Change FSAA anti-aliasing, tone mapping and other effects in the settings. Modernized animations, improved combat system and the spirit of the heroes. People will flee if they are in imminent danger or, conversely, fight to the last if their morality is high.

item.title: Touhou Searensen ~ undefined fantastic object
item.description: Game Description Touhou Searensen ~ Undefined Fantastic Object is a scroll-player in which the player controls the human character and uses shells to win the antagonists. Any contact with enemy bullets, lasers or opponents themselves leads to a loss of life. When the player’s reserve runs out, the game ends. All items on the screen are collected when moving the controlled character to the upper boundary of the location. Activation of the function of the slow movement attracts the nearest objects directly to the protagonist, helping in their collection during the battle.

item.title: Plants vs. Zombies GOTY Edition
item.description: Game Description Plants vs. Zombies became the game of the year, winning in many categories. The developers invite us to once again plunge into battles in a small location in order to free ourselves from the shackles of various zombies, hold back all the ardor of the monsters and save the city by using the latest technologies in the agricultural industry. Among the primary weapons in strategy, we have a pea shooter, a cherry bomb and sunflowers, which we use to earn money to purchase new strategic weapons.

item.title: The Legend of Crystal Valley
item.description: Game Description The Legend of Crystal Valley is a point-and-click adventure game in which gamers follow Eva, a young woman on a quest to find her missing father. The journey begins with an unexpected letter that prompts Eva to go to her family estate in France. Upon arrival, she discovers that her father has gone missing, setting off a chain of events that leads her into the depths of Crystal Valley.

item.title: Garry's Mod
item.description: Game Description Garry’s Mod is a game and physics sandbox. The main game mode is aimless and provides the player with a freely customizable world powered by the Source engine. The player creates non-player characters with various interaction objects. Special tools and tools allow you to construct new objects in reality, fix beams, iron, objects. Changing facial expressions is also available. Thanks to the flexible engine, users create their own modifications: Spacebuild, Wiremod, Elevator: Source, DarkRP, Prop Hunt and others.

item.title: Serious Sam 2
item.description: Game Description The entire Serious Sam 2 - a first-person shooter with a lot of action - shows us the atmosphere of an absurd fight with many monsters, weapons and a huge number of bonuses scattered on each planet. Cool Sam is full of hope to kill Mental. Everyone in the universe knows that the antagonist is immortal, and in order to destroy him, make him vulnerable, you will have to collect the Medallion of Power.

item.title: POSTAL 2
item.description: Game Description POSTAL 2 is a first-person shooter full of dark humor, references, blood and other hardcore stuff like desecrating graves or putting cats on a machine gun as a silencer. The plot develops in a strange town - Paradise. The main character of Postal 2 will be a character named Dude. He tries to live an ordinary life without doing anything illegal. At the beginning of the story, he gets a job at the computer game development office Running with Scissors.

item.title: Ardenfall
item.description: Game Description Ardenfall - a role -playing role, plunging wanderers into the world of ancient cultures, secret magic and political intrigues on the mysterious island of Ardenfall. The hero’s path runs through a variety of lands: from windy plains and rain flooded to long abandoned ruins and winding caves, lurking both treasures and deadly dangers. In this world, each solution has weight, affecting the economy of the regions and the attitude of local residents towards you.

item.title: International Vending Machine
item.description: Game Description The International Vending Machine tells about a homeless girl who has found a strange apparatus. The device, located in a tight and buzzing space at the junction of the worlds, accepts Japanese yen, giving out objects from unknown times and realities in return. The exhausted heroine is forced to use it for the extraction of food. Any item obtained contradicts the laws of biology and logic, creating an oppressive atmosphere of mystery in its attempts to survive another night.

item.title: Dreamed Away
item.description: Game Description Dreamed Away causes a feeling of foggy nostalgia, a journey along the path of memories that takes an unexpected turn. The bizarre charm of the France of the 1990s collapses around the edges, opening the world at the same time alarming and strangely alluring. Theo, our main character, is drawn into this fairy -tale world. K conmitted bridges turn into impossible figures, familiar houses turn into grotesque carications on themselves.

item.title: Legends of Astravia
item.description: Game Description Legends of Astravia Transes users to a world filled with magic - a world where Oliver, mystic with amnesia occupies the central place. This is a tribute to retro-role-playing games, invites to explore the mystical kingdom of Astravia. The solution to ancient secrets and battles with formidable enemies are only part of the adventure. Traveling around the vast world, reminiscent of the classic Zelda dungeons, gamers will find hidden corners and nooks, which are asked to be opened.

item.title: Machine Mind
item.description: Game Description Machine Mind places the player in the role of consciousness transferred to a mechanical shell after the crash of a spaceship. The existence of a gamer is limited by the world, a changed planetary virus and subsequent nuclear conflict - the cataclysm, which forced the remnants of civilization to hide at the orbital station. Managing a series of rovers, it is necessary to provide its survival on the surface of the planet, now inhabited by aggressive raiders.

item.title: MilitSioner
item.description: Game Description Militsioner is a surreal game in which the player will need to prove his innocence. He is accused of committing a crime that he never did, but is it so easy to convince a policeman who rarely changes his point of view and, in his opinion, has a clear moral compass. In addition, he has a rather tough Soviet mentality that will break through even more difficult. Perhaps the escape will be the only decision.

item.title: Mother Hub
item.description: Game Description Mother Hub - this is not a typical shooter. This game throws you headlong into a hopeless situation - humanity on the edge of the abyss, and only you keep the reins of government. Each of your solution, each path you have chosen can become the difference between survival and oblivion. Fasten, because here the choice has consequences. Here it is not just that you need to press the trigger.

item.title: Ribby: The Game
item.description: Game Description Ribby: The Game - this is not a typical role -playing adventure. Forget about the extermination of dragons or collecting a million gold coins. Here is the hero - Ribbie, a kind girl, who has lost and seeking the house. Title combines elements of role -playing games and visual novels, creating a unique experience. Of course, the main goal is to return Ribbie home, but this is only the top of Lilia.

item.title: Coven
item.description: Game Description Going to the gloomy world ofCoven, you have to deal with a large number of enemy creatures and deal with their elimination. The universe takes you into an atmospheric medieval fantasy world, where witches and other mythical creatures live alongside people. The first episode is available in the game, where you will take on the role of a young girl. The heroine is burned at the stake during the 1600s, mistaken for a witch and a fiend.

item.title: VED
item.description: Game Description VED is an action role-playing game focused on story and turn-based combat. The gameplay contains roguelike elements. The game involves exploring a mysterious island full of monsters and dangerous creatures. In the world of the game, the magic of witches operates - powerful creatures with forbidden knowledge. The protagonist of the game is a hero named Cyrus. He comes to Micropolis with the hope of finding a new life.

item.title: HAVEN: Secret of Caledria
item.description: Game Description The game process Haven: Secret of Caledria is inspired by the classic JRPG of the 90s. All the key features of the gameplay are observed: a journey through a large open world in the company of partners, the implementation of numerous quests, a study of the dungeons and step -by -step battles. It will take about 20 hours of real time to pass the main storyline. Hample Haven: Secret of Caledria is inspired by such cult projects as Lufia, Breath of Fire, Suikoden and Chrono Trigger.

item.title: The X-Com Files
item.description: Game Description The X -Com Files is a global modification for the same step -by -step strategy that allows you to see how all the events of the franchise began. The game transfers in 1996. The organization of x-hk is only born. The tasks of employees include an investigation of abnormal incidents. Stylistics is inspired by the series secret materials. It will be necessary to manage two special agents, moving in regular transport.

item.title: Electric Trains
item.description: Game Description Electric Trains is an isometric train management simulator where it is necessary to build routes so that transport can reach another station to another. It is required to build railways and organize a schedule so that the locomotives do not collide with each other. The player will switch the ruts and monitor the movement of locomotives. The gameplay is tied to physics and realism. Depending on the type of train, management is felt differently.

item.title: AGRONOM
item.description: Game Description AGRONOM sends players to 22nd century Mars to build a working estate. You arrive on a specific piece of Martian land with a specific task. This mission involves creating a living space designed to fulfill the wishes of Grandfather Makar and dedicated to the memory of his late wife Sofia. The idea extends beyond the simple construction of buildings, seeking to recreate the atmosphere symbolized by pancakes with plum jam, pickled cucumbers and home-made moonshine.

item.title: Alchemist's Alcove
item.description: Game Description Alchemist’s Alcove takes the player on a journey through ancient lands, collecting components from defeated enemies to create spells, tools and weapons. The process of battle and discovery is central to the gameplay, and the remains of opponents become the basis for a growing arsenal. Heroes navigate the territories of warring factions using a grid-based map, pursuing the ultimate goal of creating the Philosopher’s Stone through turn-based combat and exploration of the world.

item.title: Ancient Cits
item.description: Game Description Ancient Cits - a strategic game based on survival and construction mechanics. The game transfers in ancient times when people lived in tribes and built the first settlements. Plunge in prehistoric times and find the primitive life of our ancestors and their ancient cities. Events develop in the era of mesolithic. Draw your settlers through a whole generation, improving technologies, mastering new tools, engaged in resources, developing the population and fighting external threats.

item.title: Animal Shelter
item.description: Game Description Animal Shelter offers the player to open his own animal shelter. Choose homeless animals on the streets, and provide medical care. Take care of your wards and make sure that they get along well with each other. Life on the street leaves prints on the body of animals. Process scratches and stick patcharies. Trinch the wounded paws and observe how the pet is recovering. Buy your patient well using a hose and a sponge.

item.title: Another Farm Roguelike: Rebirth
item.description: Game Description Another Farm Roguelike: Rebirth abandoned long walks and romantic novels with stars that are found in other farm sigas. It’s enough just to click a cursor. The Title with a strategic farm bias with your head immerses you in the creation, construction, collection and management of a prosperous farm. Starting from a modest site, do not allow the initial sizes to deceive you. Another Farm Roguelike: Rebirth is all about potential.

item.title: Atomic OWL
item.description: Game Description Atomic OWL puts the player in the role of Idalgo Bladywing, a bird who went to save his comrades. The main conflict is tied to the confrontation with the sorcerer-Voron Omega Vinc, who by force subjugated his entire troupe. The plot starts 2 years after this incident that happened during the return of the detachment to Ramennaya. Idalgo begins a campaign to correct the deed, and a daring speaking blade helps him in this.

item.title: BattleBlock Theater
item.description: Game Description BattleBlock Theater is a platformer with cartoon graphics and a side view. It has a simple plot, because it is far from the main one in this genre. The player takes on the role of a prisoner who goes through various levels of the theater with one goal - to save Hatty Hattington. The gameplay is not complicated at first glance: level progression is linear, jumps are simple and standard for the genre, and there are a couple of types of enemy attacks.

item.title: Beastieball
item.description: Game Description Beastieball unites two seemingly unrelated genre - taming monsters and sport - into a single holistic experience. In this game, users take on the role of a coach who is not like a coach or manager, directing the team of animals through various biomes in order to gain, train and ultimately take part in a step -by -step volleyball league. Paying special attention to strategies, research and teamwork, Advencura is a new look both at the monsters gathering genre and the world of sports.

item.title: Caravanners
item.description: Game Description Caravanners is an open-world survival game with the ability to customize vehicles. The action takes place in a post-apocalyptic world. The main character is a member of SUNK, a biological research company. The company’s centers are located in different parts of the world. You will need to explore vast territories, completing various main and secondary quests. Throughout the territory you need to collect various materials necessary for crafting. The world is on the verge of destruction, so resources in locations are strictly limited.

item.title: Citizen Sleeper
item.description: Game Description Citizen Sleeper is a bright-looking, dark-looking space adventure where human lives don’t matter. Everyone is someone’s property or a hermit who is trying to find a job and feed himself among the stars. There are many enemies and potential friends around. Having strong connections and alliances in this place is very important, as they can help you get out of a dangerous situation or even save a life.

item.title: Clicker Clicker Clickker
item.description: Game Description Clicker Clicker Clicker begins the gameplay with a direct impact on the central pointer generating currency - clicker gold. The frequency of initial presses directly affects the speed of the appearance of numerous gold cursors falling on the screen. Interaction with these omiting objects before their disappearance brings more gold than standard clicks according to the main pointer. This mechanic forms a key gameplay cycle based on the accumulation of resources in two different but related methods.

item.title: Clockwork Ambrosia
item.description: Game Description Clockwork Ambrosia Submits you into the world of secrets and chaos. Take control of Iris, a fearless engineer, and go to the shadow depths of the distant island. The research colony has discovered ambrosia - a substance that can rewrite the rules of invention. But something went wrong. Now silence hung in the air. Iris will have to navigate this interconnected world, fighting with monstrous creations and mechanized monsters.

item.title: Coral Island
item.description: Game Description Coral Island is a classic farm simulator that transports you to a tropical island where you will grow crops, care for living creatures and communicate with secondary characters. Your task is to create your own farm, to gradually expand the territory, to acquire new seedlings and animals. There are 16 characters with which you are able to build relationships and even create a couple. It all starts with how you leave Pokier, after which you go to the coral island to build a farm in a paradise.

item.title: Cultist Simulator
item.description: Game Description Cultist Simulator is a role-playing card game that allows you to create your own unique card deck. The plot tells us about a magical world, in which they give the opportunity to find out all the mysterious and mysterious events that happened in the real world. You can go fight witches, find Masons and go in search of other adventures. At the very beginning, gamers have the opportunity to choose starting cards, and then start completing missions and exploring a huge text world.

item.title: DELTATRAVELER
item.description: Game Description DELTATRAVELER is a role-playing adventure based on the characters and universe of Toby Fox. At the center of the story are characters such as Chris, Susie and Noel. All of them migrated to the Undertale universe from the cult game called Deltarune. A squad of heroes sets off to explore a gloomy world full of monsters and traps. The gameplay of DELTATRAVELER is represented by roguelike mechanics, and also allows you to go through the same locations in several different ways, greatly increasing the replayability of the project.

item.title: Doctor Life Simulator
item.description: Game Description Doctor Life Simulator puts the player in charge of a medical practice and its day-to-day affairs. People come to the clinic with various symptoms that require careful examination. The gamer uses diagnostic tools such as blood tests, temperature measurements and heart rate monitors to build a picture of the patient’s condition. Situations range from simple ailments to complex diseases, and each requires a special approach to therapy. This process involves conducting examinations and interpreting instrument readings to make the correct diagnosis before starting treatment.

item.title: Dracomaton
item.description: Game Description Dracomaton begins with the awakening of a small robot named Eklips at an abandoned factory inhabited by faulty training bots and storing secrets about space dragons. The main task of the player is to climb the tower, overcoming locations with a view of the top, filled with bumpy fire of hostile mechanisms. The key aspect of survival is the ability to transform the physical shell of the robot, allowing to instantly change its entire combat arsenal.

item.title: Dustland Delivery
item.description: Game Description Dustland Delivery puts users in the post -apocalyptic world, where they have to build an empire of delivery. The center of the game is profit, survival and strategic decisions. Gamers start with a truck and gain a team, each of which has unique skills. The purpose of the game? Build cities by successful delivery of goods, competing with rivals and overcoming dangers. The world is inexorable. Users move in an insidious area, control resources and make a critical choice.

item.title: Echolocaution
item.description: Game Description Echolocaution immerses in the night world, in which gamers are guided by sound. A small bat is given under control, whose main occupation is a hunt for insects from sunset to dawn. The key gameplay mechanics are tied to the emission of ultrasound waves covering the dark environment. Such echolocation reveals both sources of food and hidden threats. The task of each race is to absorb as much production as possible before the morning, relying on the ear to search for food and avoid dangers.

item.title: Follow me
item.description: Game Description Follow Me is a charming 2D platformer that takes you on an exciting adventure through a huge and colorful world. The plot revolves around a curious little white rabbit who goes on a journey to discover what lies behind a mysterious door. Game mechanics focus on exploration and interaction with other characters. The world is full of both friendly and hostile creatures, and you need to use your wits and skills to navigate various locations and solve puzzles.

item.title: From the Depths
item.description: Game Description From the Depths allows you to accept command of battleships, aircraft, submarines, space ships, balloons and many other modes of transport. The story campaign will visit more than a hundred lands and fight against 8 fractions. Misses consist in planning competent tactics and protecting your own fleet in a series of difficult tests. In addition to the main campaign, there is an adventure mode where it will be proposed to start the game alone on a small ship and grow to a whole fleet, furrows the expanses of the universe.

item.title: GODSOUL
item.description: Game Description Gamers in GODSOUL will be immersed in a cyberpunk atmosphere mixed with mythological creatures. The game is a card battler with elements of a role-playing visual novel, where the events taking place are demonstrated in the form of drawn anime art. Users will have to take control of rebel girls who have the power of the “Divine Soul,” which allows them to travel through different spaces. Players will be able to connect souls that resonate with each other to awaken God and deal with evil.

item.title: Good Heavens!
item.description: Game Description Good HEAVENS! It takes place in the Severe Kingdom of Xant-Rar, a bizarre afterlife, where souls live on floating islands. This songwriter with the open world allows gamers to pave their own path in the world, crowded with bizarre capabilities. Imagine: you have lived a good life, have left the earthly path and got into Xant -Rar - a place intended for the fulfillment of all your desires throughout eternity.

item.title: Half-Life 2D: Block Mesa
item.description: Game Description Half-Life 2D: Block Mesa is a two-dimensional remake of the original Half-Life. The story also begins with a laboratory where another experiment was to take place. There were no signs of trouble until a powerful explosion occurred right before your eyes. Alien entities have infiltrated from the world of Zen, a military detachment is trying to rectify the situation, but it is becoming more and more difficult every minute.

item.title: Haste: Broken Worlds
item.description: Game Description Haste: Broken Worlds presents the world with a rapid action from a third person, the action of which unfolds in a setting, which is on the verge of collapse. The user will have to take on the role of Zoe, which rushes along the procedurally generated levels, trying to escape from the decay of the world surrounding it. Each of the ten fragments is a series of levels that need to be passed in a certain order, and each time the journey unfolds differently, due to the accident of procedural generation.

item.title: Heli-Cats
item.description: Game Description Heli-Cats puts players in a world experiencing an energy and economic crisis. Against the background of this instability, the rebellious forces begin a coordinated attack on the Alliance. The combined security alliance uses a special helicopter unit acting under the guise of a local militarized formation. Pilots Tiger and Lynx fulfill the mission to repel the invaders and clarify the causes of the conflict. Their operations are planned so that they can renounce them in case of failure, conducting gamers through 8 arcade stages and 2 more available under special conditions.

item.title: Ifsunsets
item.description: Game Description IFSUnsets is an adventure role -playing adventure for survival in which gamers fall into a complex situation. The game begins with the fact that users find themselves on the island after a shipwreck. This initial scenario lays the basis for research and survival. During the day, users can collect supplies and resources scattered across the island. This stage of collecting resources is very important for preparing for dangers that are hidden after sunset.

item.title: Ikarus Parkour
item.description: Game Description Ikarus Parkor is transferred to the role of a contestant in a television competition arranged for the entertainment of a chosen group. The contestants voluntarily join this event, after which they are transported to a secret underground place for the test. The goal is to climb the massive 850-meter vertical structure from its base to the top. Successful overcoming the obstacles of the tower means obtaining a monetary prize and personal freedom, which is awarded to the finish.

item.title: Kalpa: Cosmic Symphony
item.description: Game Description Kalpa: Cosmic Symphony - a rhythm game for five keys. Users will breathe life into a dying universe, playing music. This is a space trip to save Iggdrasil. Rhythmic patterns go beyond the standard gameplay. A beginner or professional, Adventure checks the skills. Original music belongs to Morimori Atsushi, Ice, Team Grimoire and Hyun. The project also refers to the classic of the rhythm Halcyon, Sound Chimera, The Last Page, äventyr and L2 -reminisceence-.

item.title: Killer Chat! - Expanded Edition
item.description: Game Description Killer Chat! - Expanded Edition - a dating simulator that plunges you into a deadly adventure, where the price of a mistake is your own life. The main character, being a reporter and aspiring writer, is forced to pose as a maniac in a closed online chat for six months. This risky game has a dual goal: to collect exclusive material for a future crime novel and not to become another victim of your new acquaintances.

item.title: Lagoda Odyssey
item.description: Game Description Lagoda Odyssey is a journey through a world imbued with the spirit of Slavic and Nordic legends, where dense forests, caves and thriving cities are open for exploration. Traveling through these lands is fraught not only with dangers, but also with peaceful activities. Valuable resources are obtained through fishing, farming, or mining, allowing you to prepare for the challenges ahead. Adventures unfold in the vast expanses of a vibrant world full of wonders and discoveries, where every corner is fraught with both opportunities and hidden threats that require ingenuity and courage from the heroes.

item.title: Let's Build a Zoo
item.description: Game Description Let’s Build a Zoo - A bright sandbox with a simulator elements, which provides players with the opportunity to build their own zoo. It is required to install enclosures, buy rare animals, hire employees for service and much more. It is allowed to cross animal DNA, producing more than 300,000 unique rocks into the world. In order for the reserve to function, it will be necessary to hire veterinarians, trainers, cleaners, repairmen and other performers who support their lives in the zoo.

item.title: Mad Games Tycoon 2
item.description: Game Description Mad Games Tycoon 2 is a tycoon that takes you back to 1976, when the first game studios began to appear. Build your own studio and start developing games. Rent offices, install server rooms and improve production facilities. Try to develop the game of your dreams or create a next-generation console. Start your journey from a small garage company and grow into one of the most powerful corporations on the planet.

item.title: Merc Tactics
item.description: Game Description Tactical strategy Merc Tactics gives players the opportunity to control a small squad of fighters. Their task is to fight their way through an entire region to confront a huge number of militias. You will collect various weapons, armor and upgrades in locations. It is necessary to recruit new units into your squad and join forces with allied forces. Controlling your fighters in turn-based mode requires you to use cover and the environment to your advantage.

item.title: Microcivilization
item.description: Game Description Microcivilization - a hybrid of the genres of an incremental clker and a strategy - offers players a dynamic gameplay. A unique combination of expansion, construction, research, battles and gathering heroes allows you to solve multifaceted problems. The narrative unfolds in a campaign mode, during which players pass various historical scenarios - from ancient times to a futuristic setting. A distinctive feature of the game is the ascension mechanism that allows players to lose their progress and start everything from the clean sheet.

item.title: Mr. Nomad
item.description: Game Description Mr. Nomad immerses in a world, where survival depends on the only camp, serving as a mobile refuge. The main task is to build a fortified base around this van to reflect constant raids of the horde of zombies. The basis of gameplay is a two -level construction system that allows you to place ground fortifications and at the same time dig a safe bunker under them. This underground space serves as a protected area for growing a crop and storing valuable supplies far from external threats.

item.title: Nihongo Quest
item.description: Game Description The fantasy world in** nihongo quest** shows the Gakush universe, where users will be able to create and customize their character to go on adventure. The game is made in the form of Japanese role adventura, where you have to move on a pixel isometric map with a view of the top. Players will participate in step -by -step battles with opponents, pump a hero and face a variety of puzzles, which are based on the creation of more than 1000 words and hieroglyphs.

item.title: No Such Place
item.description: Game Description No Such Place is a tactical shooter in which agents of the Unknown Research Consortium (U.R.C.) organization are tasked with carrying out dangerous forays into anomalous zones. Operatives must penetrate unstable regions known as Dimensional Fragments, where the laws of physics and time gradually collapse. The main task becomes not only the destruction of supernatural threats, but also the collection of valuable information and resources before the area is completely erased from reality.

item.title: OneShot
item.description: Game Description OneShot is an adventure puzzle game with Metroidvania elements. As Niko, you interact with both the character and the world. The gameplay invites you to go through an inventive quest in which you need to find a variety of objects, combining them with each other and using them on the environment, which will allow you to advance through the plot. Stylistically, OneShot is a 2D game from a top-down perspective.

item.title: Operator
item.description: Game Description Operator is an exciting game where you become a secret operative performing dangerous tasks around the world. A realistic experience of tactical battle awaits you, where your every decision matters. The game contains a unique system of physical interaction, which allows you to manipulate objects and weapons naturally. This adds a feeling of presence and realism, without the need to use VR-Schles. A special emphasis in the operator is placed on a multi -user cooperative regime.

item.title: PANICORE
item.description: Game Description PANICORE throws you into a nightmare as an urban explorer. You and your friends, thrill-seekers who are attracted to creepy abandoned places, ignore the warnings and go to a creepy place. But the exploration takes a turn for the worse when you find yourself trapped. An unseen force is blocking the exit, and terrible creatures lurk in the shadows. Panic begins. You realize that you are not alone.

item.title: Paperklay
item.description: Game Description Paperklay paves a unique way in the landscape of the video game. Forget about princesses and bonuses, this adventure throws you into a world built of cardboard, paper and clay. Think about Minecraft and the exciting Battle Royale - you study, develop a strategy and adapt on the go. What is the charm? Title allows your imagination to take a walk. You are not limited by the world created by the developers; You can create, deconstruct and change the surrounding space as you think it is necessary.

item.title: PILGRIM
item.description: Game Description PILGRIM cuts through the post-apocalyptic wasteland like a rusty machete. Developed by DESPERATE MEASURES, this co-op horror adventure is not for the faint of heart. You and your fellow travelers become pilgrims on a treacherous journey along the Road, facing both monstrous threats and the unraveling of your own mind. The beauty of PILGRIM is its “we’re all in this together” approach. Teamwork is key as you navigate the desolate landscape, collecting resources and fighting off nightmarish creatures.

item.title: Refind Self: The Personality Test Game
item.description: Game Description Refind Self: The Personality Test Game is a unique interactive science fiction in which the gameplay allows you to explore the depths of the user personality. In this 2D-visual short story, you fall in the place of the Android and find yourself on the grave of the doctor that created you. From this moment on, your journey unfolds as you are exploring different locations associated with the previous doctor, meeting along the way with various robots.

item.title: Rogue Labyrinth
item.description: Game Description Rogue Labyrinth throws you into a maze mosquito, the brainchild of a billionaire with a complex of God. But this is not Dedushkino’s journey through the dungeons. Of course, you will beat the monsters and dodge the chopper, but there is a performance element here. The numerous eyes of the maze are fixed on you, and they crave a show. The labyrinth itself is a changeable beast. Each entry promises a new turn, test - consider that this is a dungeon with adventures to choose from.

item.title: Rooster
item.description: Game Description Rooster transfers players to a bright holiday of Chinese culture and society. This single -user advent is unfolding in a manually drawn world filled with traditional folklore, art, music and, of course, delicious food. The story begins with a festive party on the eve of the Lunar New Year, on which there are twelve animals of the Chinese zodiac. A rooster, well, let’s say, with his antics leads to some of himself.

item.title: Schedule I
item.description: Game Description Schedule 1 puts a gamer in the place of a small drug dealer trying to build a criminal empire from scratch. The action takes place in the gloomy city of Highland Point, and users get the opportunity to expand the scale of their activities, controlling everyone - from production to sales. You will begin with an empty wallet and the necessary connections, gradually rising to control over the criminal world.

item.title: Shape of Dream
item.description: Game Description Shape of Dream A project whose essence is this: Imagine an action Rogue-Lite, seasoned with Moba elements, invented by Lizard Smoothie for PC roamers. Are you intrigued? Still. This world of dreams is your playground. You are sculpting the heroes from their memories, turning them into champions, like a sculptor from a cutter. Alone or with three friends in a cooperative, Adventure destroys the boundaries of the genre, offering something fresh.

item.title: Shattehed Pixel Dungeon
item.description: Game Description Shattehed Pixel Dungeon is an adventure in gloomy dungeons where users will take on the role of an adventurer. The setting is made in the style of dark fantasy, where you have to face various monsters. The game was made in the genre of Rolewal Rowlian Adventure, showing the journey of 4 characters. Levels in a single campaign are made in a randomized form, filling each time randomly locations with opponents and rooms in which the protagonist will be able to get.

item.title: Soul Apocalypto
item.description: Game Description Soul Apocalypto is a role -playing game that includes systems of several strategic sucks. The gameplay combines team battles with the collecting of creatures and some mechanics of collecting decks, with a view of both from above and from a third party. The main lesson is the call of various companions for creating a personalized combat detachment. Progress directly depends on the choice of these fighters and their layout in a group that can explore the open world.

item.title: Soul of the Dungeon
item.description: Game Description Soul of the Dungeon is an action with a view of the top, which makes the opponents resist the hordes in a hostile location. The gameplay is tied to survival in a series of attacks, collecting gold from defeated enemies and investing resources in pumping skills. Such progress is necessary, because each next wave is complicated, introducing more formidable rivals. The key task is built on constant adaptation and honing of combat techniques for the confrontation of the growing threat.

item.title: Soulfall
item.description: Game Description Soulfall is a gloomy fantasy adventure that immerses the hero in an ongoing battle for survival against the inconspicuous hordes of evil spirits. The space around the protagonist is constantly filled with demons, skeletons and other monsters, forcing him to constantly move and use the entire arsenal of abilities to reflect deadly waves. Each sortie into these damned lands becomes a unique test where the procedural generation of the world guarantees the absence of two identical passages.

item.title: Soulmask
item.description: Game Description Soulmask is a mystical twist on the survival genre. Gamers eschew the usual “rags” and instead awaken clutching an ancient mask after a near-death experience. This relic is more than just a creepy wall decoration, it’s a game changer. Angry weather and wild animals won’t be your only problem. Soulmask features a vast open world that you must navigate in order to survive. Gathering resources is a must, but you can’t do it alone.

item.title: Sunrider Legends Tactics
item.description: Game Description Sunrider Legends Tactics will put a player at the head of the Navy leading his ships along the seas of the fantasy world in the era of sails. You have to command the courts in step -by -step battles, making tactical decisions on maneuvers, positioning and the use of weapons against enemy armades. The adventure will require solving strategic problems in the open sea and participation in special plot events.

item.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Splintered Fate
item.description: Game Description Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Splintered Fate immerses players in a Roguelike adventure, in the center of which are your favorite ninja turtles. Here, gamers take on the roles of Leonardo, Michelangelo, Donatello and Raphael, each of which is endowed with certain abilities. The narrative begins with the abduction of their mentor, Splinter, an evil Shredder. This laid the foundation for the study of various areas of New York, full of difficulties and enemies hiding behind each angle.

item.title: Terratech Worlds
item.description: Game Description In TerRatech Worlds, you will plunge with your head in a PVE survival with the open world on the mysterious planet of aliens. Put your way as a free prospector, exploring an extensive environment with an area of ​​300 km² with a variety of bioms, dynamic weather and a day/night cycle. To confront the hostile flora and fauna, rival fractions and insidious areas - and at the same time use the power of the planet in their interests.

item.title: The Darkest Files
item.description: Game Description The Darkest Files unfolds in post -war Germany in 1956, in the period marked by the consequences of World War II and a complex process of searching justice. The user rises in place Esther Katz, a young prosecutor who joins the special unit of Fritz Bauer, who is instructed to investigate war crimes committed many years ago. In this role, the gamer will have to find hidden evidence, to navigate in a society that does not want to recognize his past, and to confront criminals, who are now occupied by leading posts.

item.title: Therefore
item.description: Game Description Therefore, it can be classified as a point and click adventure. The camera in this game is located at an angle from above. The gameplay consists of wandering around locations, communicating with NPCs, and solving puzzles. Set in a quaint and decaying open world that suffers from Decay. Therefore, it has a non-linear and rather confusing plot, as well as deep lore. The nameless hero, suffering from amnesia, wakes up in an unknown place.

item.title: Tick ​​Hop
item.description: Game Description Tick ​​Hop is a 2D platformer that requires the accuracy of movements, where a gamer assumes the role of the keeper of time. The journey includes the passage of the stages, each of which consists of temporary fragments. The main goal is to solve riddles, opening the aspects of the past to restore the future. The reverse reference system in this project requires quick actions to move through chronological spaces.

item.title: Under a New Sun
item.description: Game Description Under a New Sun begins after a catastrophic failure of the ship, who left the player on an unknown planet. Awakening from cryosn occurs among fragments, completely solitude under a stranger sky. The mission to search for a new house for humanity failed, and the fate of the crew remains a mystery. The path begins in the middle of the wreckage of the vessel, in a world where the earthly flora has taken roots next to local views.

item.title: Vault of the void
item.description: Game Description Vault of the Void is a well -planning contractions, where users need to collect abyss stones and make their way through the fantasy worlds of emptiness. We’ll have to fight against various monsters and aggressive creatures that penetrate the universe of people. The game is an atmospheric map of the Rowlaik project, where the users will be able to influence the storyline and the events taking place with their actions and decisions during the passage.

item.title: Vintage Story
item.description: Game Description Vintage Story is a sandbox with survival elements that takes inspiration from Minecraft. You are in a post-apocalyptic world where the entire civilization is overrun by wild nature. At the same time, all kinds of unrest are constantly happening. The world is definitely living a turbulent life. You, as a hero, have only one goal - to revive civilization and return humanity to its former greatness. You find yourself in the vastness of Vintage Story with your bare hands.
